    <string name="sozluk.001.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ismi allahi: &lt;/b>Allah'in ismi ile&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahmân er rahîm: &lt;/b>Rahmân ve Rahîm Rahîm esmasi ile tecelli eden, rahmet nuru gönderen"
    <string name="sozluk.001.002">"&lt;br />&lt;b>el hamdu: &lt;/b>hamd, övgü, sena, manevî ni'metlere sükür&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah için, Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi: &lt;/b>Rab&lt;br />&lt;b>el âlemîne: &lt;/b>âlemler"
    <string name="sozluk.001.003">&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahmâni: &lt;/b>Rahman esmasi ile tecelli eden&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahîmi: &lt;/b>rahîm esmasi ile tecelli eden, rahmet nurunun sahibi
    <string name="sozluk.001.004">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâliki: &lt;/b>malik, sahip&lt;br />&lt;b>yevmid dîne (yevme ed dîne): &lt;/b>dîn günü, &lt;br>&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;(kisinin mürsidine ulastigi ve ruhunun Allah'a dogru yola çiktigi gün)"
    <string name="sozluk.001.005">"&lt;br />&lt;b>iyyâ-ke: &lt;/b>yalniz sen, yalniz sana&lt;br />&lt;b>na'budu: &lt;/b>(biz) kul oluruz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>iyyâ-ke: &lt;/b>yalniz sen, yalniz senden&lt;br />&lt;b>nestaînu: &lt;/b>istiane (mürsidimizin kim oldugunu ögrenmek için özel yardim) isteriz"
    <string name="sozluk.001.006">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ihdi-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi hidayet et, ulastir&lt;br />&lt;b>es sirâte el mustakîme: &lt;/b>Sirati Mustakîm, Allah'a ulastiran yol"
    <string name="sozluk.001.007">"&lt;br />&lt;b>sirâta: &lt;/b>yol&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>en'amte: &lt;/b>sen ni'met verdin&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara, onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>gayri: &lt;/b>baska, hariç, degil&lt;br />&lt;b>el magdûbi: &lt;/b>gadap, öfke duyulanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara, onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ed dâllîne: &lt;/b>dalâlette olanlar degil"
    <string name="sozluk.002.001">&lt;br />&lt;b>elif, lâm, mim: &lt;/b>elif, lâm, mim
    <string name="sozluk.002.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu, bu&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbu: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ: &lt;/b>yok, degil&lt;br />&lt;b>reybe: &lt;/b>süphe&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda, onun içinde, onda&lt;br />&lt;b>huden: &lt;/b>hidayet, hidayete erdiren&lt;br />&lt;b>li el muttekîne: &lt;/b>takva sahipleri için
    <string name="sozluk.002.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>îmân ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile, ... e&lt;br />&lt;b>el gaybi: &lt;/b>gayb, bilinmeyen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yukîmûne: &lt;/b>ve ikame ederler, hakkiyla yerine&lt;br />&lt;b>es salâte: &lt;/b>salat, namaz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>ve o seyden, ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>razaknâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari riziklandirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>yunfikûne: &lt;/b>infâk ederler, (Allah yolunda)"
    <string name="sozluk.002.004">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>îmân ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seye&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>kabli-ke: &lt;/b>senden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el âhireti: &lt;/b>ahirete (ruhun ölümden evvel Allah'a ulasmasina)&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yûkinûne: &lt;/b>yakîn hasil ederler (kesin olarak inanirlar)"

    <string name="sozluk.002.013">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kîle: &lt;/b>denildi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>âminû: &lt;/b>îmân ediniz, âmenû olunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâ: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>âmene: &lt;/b>îmân etti, âmenû oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>e nu'minu: &lt;/b>biz îmân mi edelim, âmenû mu olalim&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâ: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>âmene: &lt;/b>îmân etti, âmenû oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>es sufehâu: &lt;/b>sefihler, akilsizlar&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ: &lt;/b>(öyle) degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum: &lt;/b>hiç süphesiz onlar, muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>es sufehâu: &lt;/b>sefihler, akilsizlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>lâkin: &lt;/b>lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmiyorlar, bilmezler"

    <string name="sozluk.002.016">&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>isterevû: &lt;/b>satin aldilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dalâlete: &lt;/b>dalâlet&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>el hudâ: &lt;/b>hidayet&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>fakat, o taktirde, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabihat: &lt;/b>kâr&lt;br />&lt;b>ticâretu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ticareti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kânû: &lt;/b>degillerdi, olmadilar&lt;br />&lt;b>muhtedîne: &lt;/b>hidayette olanlar, hidayete erenler
    <string name="sozluk.002.017">&lt;br />&lt;b>meselu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin misali, onlarin durumu&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>meseli: &lt;/b>misal, durum&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezi: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>istevkade: &lt;/b>ates yakti, tutusturdu&lt;br />&lt;b>nâren: &lt;/b>ates&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>edâet: &lt;/b>aydinlatti&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>havle-hu: &lt;/b>onun etrafi, çevresi&lt;br />&lt;b>zehebe: &lt;/b>giderdi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>... i&lt;br />&lt;b>nûri-him: &lt;/b>onlarin nuru, nurlari, aydinligi, isigi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>tereke-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari terketti, birakti&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içine, içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>zulumâtin: &lt;/b>zulmet, karanliklar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yubsirûne: &lt;/b>onlar görmüyorlar, görmezler,
    <string name="sozluk.002.018">&lt;br />&lt;b>summun: &lt;/b>sagir&lt;br />&lt;b>bukmun: &lt;/b>dilsiz&lt;br />&lt;b>umyun: &lt;/b>kör&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hum: &lt;/b>artik onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yerciûne: &lt;/b>(onlar) dönmezler, dönemezler
    <string name="sozluk.002.019">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>ke sayyibin: &lt;/b>yagmur gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan, gökyüzünden&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun içinde vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>zulumâtun: &lt;/b>zulmet, karanliklar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ra'dun: &lt;/b>ve gök gürlemesi, gök gürültüsü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve berkun: &lt;/b>ve simsek&lt;br />&lt;b>yec'alûne: &lt;/b>kilarlar, yaparlar&lt;br />&lt;b>esâbia-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin parmaklari, parmaklari&lt;br />&lt;b>fî âzâni-him: &lt;/b>kulaklarinin içine, kulaklarina&lt;br />&lt;b>min es savâiki: &lt;/b>yildirimlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>hazara: &lt;/b>korku&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevt (mevti): &lt;/b>ölüm&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>muhîtun: &lt;/b>ihata eden, kusatan&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirleri"
    <string name="sozluk.002.020">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yekâdu: &lt;/b>neredeyse (olacak)&lt;br />&lt;b>el berku: &lt;/b>simsek&lt;br />&lt;b>yahtafu: &lt;/b>kamastirir, kapip alir, alacak, kapacak&lt;br />&lt;b>ebsâre-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin gözleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kullemâ: &lt;/b>her zaman, her defa&lt;br />&lt;b>edâe: &lt;/b>aydinlatti&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar, onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>mesev: &lt;/b>yürüdüler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun içinde, onda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>azleme: &lt;/b>karanlik çöktü&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>kâmû: &lt;/b>ayakta kaldilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>sâe: &lt;/b>diledi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le zehebe: &lt;/b>elbette giderdi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sem'i-him: &lt;/b>onlarin isitmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ebsâri-him: &lt;/b>ve onlarin görmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>hiç süphesiz, muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine, ... e&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>hersey&lt;br />&lt;b>kadîrun: &lt;/b>kaadir, gücü yeten"
    <string name="sozluk.002.021">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>u'budû: &lt;/b>kul olun&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-kum: &lt;/b>(sizin) Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>o ki, ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka-kum: &lt;/b>sizi yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>vellezîne (ve ellezîne): &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>kabli-kum: &lt;/b>sizden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tettekûne: &lt;/b>takva sahibi olursunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.002.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ âdemu: &lt;/b>ey Âdem&lt;br />&lt;b>enbi'-hum: &lt;/b>onlara haber ver, bildir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi esmâi-him: &lt;/b>O'nun (Allah'in) isimleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>olunca, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>enbee-hum: &lt;/b>onlara haber verdi, bildirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi esmâi-him: &lt;/b>O'nun (Allah'in) isimleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem: &lt;/b>olmaz mi, olmadi mi&lt;br />&lt;b>ekul: &lt;/b>ben derim, söylerim&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin, size&lt;br />&lt;b>in-nî a'lemu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben bilirim&lt;br />&lt;b>gaybe: &lt;/b>gayb, bilinmeyen&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve a'lemu: &lt;/b>ve ben bilirim&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>tubdûne: &lt;/b>açikliyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve seyi, seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>tektumûne: &lt;/b>gizliyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.002.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz: &lt;/b>ve o zaman, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kulnâ: &lt;/b>biz dedik&lt;br />&lt;b>li el melâiketi: &lt;/b>meleklere&lt;br />&lt;b>uscudû: &lt;/b>secde edin&lt;br />&lt;b>li âdeme: &lt;/b>Âdem'e&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, hemen&lt;br />&lt;b>secedû: &lt;/b>secde ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç, den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>iblîse: &lt;/b>iblis (ümitsizlige düsen, Allah'in rah-&lt;br />&lt;b>ebâ: &lt;/b>çekindi, kaçindi, direndi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve istekbere: &lt;/b>ve kibirlendi, büyüklendi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>min el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirlerden"
    <string name="sozluk.002.035">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kulnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz dedik&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>âdemu: &lt;/b>Âdem&lt;br />&lt;b>uskun: &lt;/b>iskân ol, otur, yerles&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zevcu-ke: &lt;/b>ve senin esin&lt;br />&lt;b>el cennete: &lt;/b>cennet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kulâ: &lt;/b>ve ikiniz yeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ragaden: &lt;/b>bol bol&lt;br />&lt;b>haysu: &lt;/b>yerden&lt;br />&lt;b>si'tumâ: &lt;/b>dilediniz (ikiniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ takrabâ: &lt;/b>ve yaklasmayin (ikiniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzihi: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>es secerete: &lt;/b>agaç&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde, aksi halde, yoksa&lt;br />&lt;b>tekûnâ: &lt;/b>siz (ikiniz) olursunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>min ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalimlerden"
    <string name="sozluk.002.036">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>ezelle-humâ: &lt;/b>onlari (o ikisini) kaydirdi (ayagini&lt;br />&lt;b>es seytânu: &lt;/b>seytan&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan, oradan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>ahrece-humâ: &lt;/b>onlari (ikisini) çikardi&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>kânâ: &lt;/b>ikisi oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>kulnâ: &lt;/b>biz dedik&lt;br />&lt;b>ihbitû: &lt;/b>(ikiniz) inin&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'du-kum: &lt;/b>sizin baziniz&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>... e, için&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'din: &lt;/b>baziniz&lt;br />&lt;b>aduvvun: &lt;/b>düsman&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekum: &lt;/b>ve sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, de&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardi: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>mustekarrun: &lt;/b>kararlastirilmisolan, karar kilma,&lt;br />&lt;b>ve metâun: &lt;/b>ve meta, geçinme, maisetini temin etme,&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ: &lt;/b>... e kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>hînin: &lt;/b>belli bir zaman"
    <string name="sozluk.002.037">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>telekkâ: &lt;/b>telâkki etti, aldi, ögrendi&lt;br />&lt;b>âdemu: &lt;/b>Âdem&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-hi: &lt;/b>Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>kelimâtin: &lt;/b>kelimeler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe tâbe aleyhi: &lt;/b>böylece onun tövbesini kabul etti&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o, çünkü o&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>et tevvâbu: &lt;/b>tövbeleri kabul eden&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahîmu: &lt;/b>Rahim esmasiyla tecelli eden

    <string name="sozluk.002.053">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz âteynâ: &lt;/b>ve biz vermistik&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsa: &lt;/b>Musa&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>el furkâne: &lt;/b>furkan, hakki bâtildan ayirma, idrak&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki siz böylece diye&lt;br />&lt;b>tehtedûne: &lt;/b>hidayete erersiniz

    <string name="sozluk.002.055">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz: &lt;/b>ve olmustu, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kultum: &lt;/b>siz dediniz&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ: &lt;/b>ya, ey&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa&lt;br />&lt;b>len nu'mine: &lt;/b>biz asla inanmayiz&lt;br />&lt;b>leke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>olana kadar, olmadikça&lt;br />&lt;b>nerâ: &lt;/b>biz görürüz&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>cehreten: &lt;/b>açikça&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, bunun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ehazet-kum(u): &lt;/b>sizi aldi, yakaladi&lt;br />&lt;b>es sâikatu: &lt;/b>yildirim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tenzurûne: &lt;/b>bakiyorsunuz, görüyorsunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.002.068">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ûd'u: &lt;/b>dua et&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bize, bizim için&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>yubeyyin: &lt;/b>açiklasin&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bize&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>ne, nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o, süphesiz o&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlu: &lt;/b>diyor, söylüyor&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>bakaratun: &lt;/b>bir inek&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ fâridun: &lt;/b>yasli olmayan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ bikrun: &lt;/b>çok genç olmayan&lt;br />&lt;b>avânun: &lt;/b>orta yasta&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne zâlike: &lt;/b>bu (ikisi) arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>if'alû: &lt;/b>yapin&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>tu'merûne: &lt;/b>emrolundunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.002.084">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz: &lt;/b>ve olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>ehaznâ: &lt;/b>aldik&lt;br />&lt;b>mîsâka-kum: &lt;/b>sizin misakiniz (kesin sözünüz)&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tesfikûne: &lt;/b>dökmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>dimâe-kum: &lt;/b>kanlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tuhricûne: &lt;/b>ve çikarmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-kum: &lt;/b>birbirinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>min diyâri-kum: &lt;/b>yurdunuzdan&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ekrartum: &lt;/b>siz kabul ettiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>teshedûne: &lt;/b>sahit olursunuz, sahadet edersiniz
    <string name="sozluk.002.085">"&lt;br />&lt;b>summe entum: &lt;/b>sonra siz&lt;br />&lt;b>hâulâi: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>taktulûne: &lt;/b>öldürüyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-kum: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>muharremun: &lt;/b>haram kilinan, haram olan&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>ihrâcu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin çikarilmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe tu'minûne: &lt;/b>o &lt;br>(ma ... illa): &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, den baska &lt;br>: (den baska degildir) &lt;br />&lt;b>hizyun: &lt;/b>rezillik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayatinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve     <string name="sozluk.002.086">&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike ellezîne: &lt;/b>iste o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>esteravu: &lt;/b>satin aldilar&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayâte ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayati&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el âhireti: &lt;/b>ahiret ile&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuhaffefu: &lt;/b>hafifletilmez&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbu: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ hum yunsarûne: &lt;/b>ve onlar yardim olunmazlar

/>&lt;b>min ehadin: &lt;/b>bir kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>olmadikça&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlâ: &lt;/b>(ikisi) söylüyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>ama, fakat, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>nahnu: />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, bundan sonra, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>yeteallemûne: &lt;/b>ögreniyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-humâ: &lt;/b>onlardan (o ikisinden)&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br &lt;/b>bir kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>den baska, olmaksizin, olmadan&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni: &lt;/b>izniyle&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yeteallemûne: &lt;/b>ve     <string name="sozluk.002.116">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ittehaze: &lt;/b>edindi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>veleden: &lt;/b>çocuk&lt;br />&lt;b>subhâne-hu: &lt;/b>o sübhandir, münezzehtir&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir, bilâkis&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun içindir, onundur&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalardaki, göklerdeki seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>kullun: &lt;/b>hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>kânitûne: &lt;/b>kanitun olanlar, saygi ile huzurda
    <string name="sozluk.002.117">&lt;br />&lt;b>bedîu: &lt;/b>essiz, örneksiz herseyin ilkini yaratan, yaratici&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve o zaman, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kadâ: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>emren: &lt;/b>emir, is&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlu: &lt;/b>söyler&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>kun: &lt;/b>ol&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûnu: &lt;/b>olur
    <string name="sozluk.002.118">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olsa, olmaz miydi, olsaydi ya&lt;br />&lt;b>yukellimu-nâ: &lt;/b>bizimle konusur&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>te'tî-nâ: &lt;/b>bize gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>âyetun: &lt;/b>bir âyet, delil, mucize&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle, bunun gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>misle: &lt;/b>gibi, misal, örnek, benzer&lt;br />&lt;b>kavli-him: &lt;/b>onlarin sözleri&lt;br />&lt;b>tesâbehet: &lt;/b>benzedi&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyennâ: &lt;/b>beyan ettik, biz açikladik&lt;br />&lt;b>el âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetler&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim için, bir kavme, bir topluluga&lt;br />&lt;b>yûkinûne: &lt;/b>kesin olarak görenler ve bilenler, yakîn hasil edenler (kalp gözüyle Allah'in gösterdiklerini görüp, kalp kulagiyla Allah'in gösterdigi seyler hakkinda verdigi bilgiyi isiten ve idrak eden ve bu bilginin hangi Kur'ân-i Kerim âyetlerine dayandigini Allah'tan ögrenerek, seviyelerine göre sirasiyla Ilm'el yakîn, Ayn'el yakîn ve Hakk'ul yakîn sahibi olan kisiler)"
    <string name="sozluk.002.119">"&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz, hiç süphesiz biz&lt;br />&lt;b>erselnâ-ke: &lt;/b>seni gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>besîren: &lt;/b>müjdeleyici olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nezîren: &lt;/b>ve uyarici olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tus'elu: &lt;/b>ve sana sorulmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>an ashâbi el cahîmi: &lt;/b>cehennem ehlinden, cehennem halkindan"
    <string name="sozluk.002.120">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve len terdâ: &lt;/b>ve asla razi olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>an-ke: &lt;/b>senden&lt;br />&lt;b>el yahûdu: &lt;/b>yahudi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ en nasârâ: &lt;/b>ve hristiyanlar da degil, olmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar, olmadikça&lt;br />&lt;b>tettebia: &lt;/b>sen tâbî olursun&lt;br />&lt;b>millete-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin dîni&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki, hiç süphesiz&lt;br />&lt;b>hudâllâhi (hudâ allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in hidayeti, Allah'a ulasmak&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>el hudâ: &lt;/b>hidayettir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le in: &lt;/b>ve eger gerçekten olursa&lt;br />&lt;b>itteba'te: &lt;/b>sen tâbî oldun&lt;br />&lt;b>ehvâe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin nefslerinin istekleri, hevalari&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>câe-ke: &lt;/b>sana geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>min el ilmi: &lt;/b>(ilimden) bir ilim&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ leke: &lt;/b>senin için yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>min veliyyin: &lt;/b>(dostlardan) bir dost&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ nasîrin: &lt;/b>ve yardimci yoktur, olmaz"

    <string name="sozluk.002.129">"&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>veb'as (ve ib'as): &lt;/b>ve beas et, hayata getir, görevlendir 3 - fî-him&lt;br />&lt;b>resûlen: &lt;/b>bir resûl, elçi, mürsid&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, kendilerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>yetlû aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara okur&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-ke: &lt;/b>senin âyetlerin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuallimu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlara ögretir&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitabi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hikmete: &lt;/b>ve hikmeti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuzekkî-him: &lt;/b>ve onlari tezkiye eder, nefslerini temiz- ler, tasfiye eder&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-ke: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki sen&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzu: &lt;/b>azîz, üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakîmu: &lt;/b>hakîm, hüküm ve hikmet sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.002.130">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yergabu: &lt;/b>ragbet etmez, yüz çevirir, uzaklasir&lt;br />&lt;b>an milleti ibrâhîme: &lt;/b>Ibrâhîm'in dîni&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>sefihe: &lt;/b>sefih oldu, akilsiz oldu, cahillik etti&lt;br />&lt;b>nefse-hu: &lt;/b>nefsini, kendini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>istafeynâ-hu: &lt;/b>biz onu seçtik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünyada&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne-hu: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>ve fî el âhireti: &lt;/b>ve ahirette&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka, kesinlikle&lt;br />&lt;b>min es sâlihîne: &lt;/b>salihlerden, salâha ulasmislardan"

    <string name="sozluk.002.132">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve vassâ: &lt;/b>ve vasiyet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ibrâhîmu: &lt;/b>Ibrâhîm&lt;br />&lt;b>benî-hi: &lt;/b>kendi ogullarina&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ya'kûbu: &lt;/b>ve Yâkub&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ beniyye: &lt;/b>ey ogullarim&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>istafâ: &lt;/b>seçti&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dîne: &lt;/b>dîn&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o halde, öyleyse, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ temûtunne: &lt;/b>ölmeyiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, dan baska, olmaksizin, olmadan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>muslimûne: &lt;/b>teslim olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.002.133">"&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>suhedâe: &lt;/b>sahitler&lt;br />&lt;b>iz hadara: &lt;/b>hazir oldugu zaman, hazir olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'kûbe: &lt;/b>Yâkub&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevtu: &lt;/b>ölüm&lt;br />&lt;b>iz kâle: &lt;/b>demisti&lt;br />&lt;b>li benî-hi: &lt;/b>ogullarina&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ta'budûne: &lt;/b>neye kulluk edeceksiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'dî: &lt;/b>sonradan, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>na'budu: &lt;/b>kul olacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhe-ke: &lt;/b>senin ilâhin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ilâhe: &lt;/b>ve ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>âbâi-ke: &lt;/b>senin atalarin&lt;br />&lt;b>ibrâhîme: &lt;/b>Ibrâhîm&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ismâîle: &lt;/b>ve Ismail&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ishâka: &lt;/b>ve Ishak&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhen vahiden: &lt;/b>tek, bir ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nahnu: &lt;/b>ve biz&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu muslimûne: &lt;/b>ona teslim olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.002.134">"&lt;br />&lt;b>tilke: &lt;/b>iste o (onlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>ummetun: &lt;/b>bir ümmet, bir toplum&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>halet: &lt;/b>gelip geçti&lt;br />&lt;b>lehâ mâ kesebet: &lt;/b>onun kazandigi seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekum: &lt;/b>ve sizin&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kesebtum: &lt;/b>kazandiginiz seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tus'elûne: &lt;/b>ve size sual olunmaz, sorulmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>onlar oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorlar"

    <string name="sozluk.002.144">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>muhakkak, olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>nerâ: &lt;/b>görüyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>tekallube: &lt;/b>çeviriyorsun&lt;br />&lt;b>vechi-ke: &lt;/b>yüzünü&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâi: &lt;/b>semaya&lt;br />&lt;b>fe le nuvelliye enne-ke: &lt;/b>artik seni mutlaka çevirecegiz&lt;br />&lt;b>kibleten: &lt;/b>bir kibleye&lt;br />&lt;b>terdâ-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan razi, hosnut olacagin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe velli: &lt;/b>bundan sonra çevirin&lt;br />&lt;b>veche-ke: &lt;/b>yüzünüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>satra: &lt;/b>taraf, yön&lt;br />&lt;b>el mescidi el harâmi: &lt;/b>Mescid-i Haram&lt;br />&lt;b>ve haysu: &lt;/b>ve nerede&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kuntum: &lt;/b>siz olursunuz, bulunursunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe vellû: &lt;/b>öyleyse çevirin&lt;br />&lt;b>vucûhe-kum: &lt;/b>yüzlerinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>satra-hu: &lt;/b>onun yönüne, tarafina&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve hiç süphesiz, muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtû: &lt;/b>verildiler&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>le ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>elbette biliyorlar, bilirler&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hu: &lt;/b>onun oldugu&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakku: &lt;/b>bir hak, gerçek&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ âllâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah degildir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gâfilin: &lt;/b>gâfil&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>sey(ler)den&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorlar"

    <string name="sozluk.002.146">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âteynâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlara verdik, getirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'rifûne-hu: &lt;/b>onu tanirlar, bilirler&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâ: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'rifûne: &lt;/b>tanirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ebnâe-hum: &lt;/b>ogullarini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve hiç süphesiz, muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ferîkan: &lt;/b>bir firka, bir grup&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>yektumûne: &lt;/b>gizlerler&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakka: &lt;/b>hakki&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>biliyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.002.147">&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakku: &lt;/b>hak, gerçek&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tekûnenne: &lt;/b>sakin olma&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mumterîne: &lt;/b>süphe edenlerden
    <string name="sozluk.002.148">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li kullin: &lt;/b>ve herkes için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>vichetun: &lt;/b>vech, cihet, yön&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>muvellî-hâ: &lt;/b>ona yönelinen (yer)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>istebikû: &lt;/b>yarisin, yaris edin&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayrâti: &lt;/b>hayirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>eyne mâ: &lt;/b>her nerede&lt;br />&lt;b>tekûnû: &lt;/b>olursunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'ti bi-kum: &lt;/b>sizi getirir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>hepsi, topluca, biraraya&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseye&lt;br />&lt;b>kadîrun: &lt;/b>kaadirdir"
    <string name="sozluk.002.149">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min: &lt;/b>ve den&lt;br />&lt;b>haysu: &lt;/b>neresi&lt;br />&lt;b>harec-te: &lt;/b>sen çiktin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>velli: &lt;/b>dön, çevir&lt;br />&lt;b>veche-ke: &lt;/b>yüzünü&lt;br />&lt;b>satra: &lt;/b>yön, taraf&lt;br />&lt;b>el mescidi el harâmi: &lt;/b>Mescid-i Haram&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne-hu: &lt;/b>ve hiç süphesiz o, muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakku: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve degildir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gâfilin: &lt;/b>gâfil&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>sey(ler)den&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.002.150">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min haysu: &lt;/b>ve nereden&lt;br />&lt;b>harecte: &lt;/b>sen çiktin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>velli: &lt;/b>dön, çevir&lt;br />&lt;b>veche-ke: &lt;/b>yüzünü&lt;br />&lt;b>satra: &lt;/b>yön&lt;br />&lt;b>el mescidi el harâmi: &lt;/b>Mescid-i Haram&lt;br />&lt;b>ve haysu: &lt;/b>ve nerede&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz (bulundunuz)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, hemen&lt;br />&lt;b>vellû: &lt;/b>dönün, çevirin&lt;br />&lt;b>vucûhe-kum: &lt;/b>yüzleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>satra-hu: &lt;/b>onun tarafina, o tarafa&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellâ yekûne: &lt;/b>olmamasi için&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlara, insanlarin&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize, size&lt;br />&lt;b>huccetun: &lt;/b>hüccet, delil&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>zalemû: &lt;/b>zulmettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tahsev-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan korkmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>vahsev-nî: &lt;/b>benden korkun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li utimme: &lt;/b>ve tamamlamam için&lt;br />&lt;b>ni'metî: &lt;/b>ni'metimi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size, sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lealle-kum: &lt;/b>ve umulur ki siz, böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tehtedûne: &lt;/b>hidayete erersiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.002.151">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâ: &lt;/b>gibi, oldugu gibi, öyle ki, nitekim&lt;br />&lt;b>ersel-nâ: &lt;/b>biz gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-kum: &lt;/b>sizin içinizde&lt;br />&lt;b>resûlen: &lt;/b>bir resûl, elçi&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>yetlû: &lt;/b>okur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim âyetlerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuzekkî-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizi tezkiye eder&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuallimu-kum: &lt;/b>ve size ögretir&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitabi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hikmete: &lt;/b>ve hikmeti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuallimu-kum: &lt;/b>ve size ögretir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>lem tekûnû ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>sizin bilmediginiz"

    <string name="sozluk.002.158">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak, hiç süphesiz&lt;br />&lt;b>es safâ: &lt;/b>Mekke'de Safa&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>el mervete: &lt;/b>Mekke'de Merve&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>seâirillâhi (seâiri allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in nisaneleri, alâmetleri, isaret ettigi yerler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>hacce: &lt;/b>hac yapti&lt;br />&lt;b>el beyte: &lt;/b>beyt, ev&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>i'temera: &lt;/b>ziyaret yapti, umre yapti, Beytullah'i ziyaret etti&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ cunâhâ: &lt;/b>vebal yoktur, günah yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona, onun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>en yettavvefe: &lt;/b>tavaf etmek&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-himâ: &lt;/b>ikisini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>tetavvaa: &lt;/b>tav'an, gönülden, nafile olarak (farz olmadigi halde) yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>hayran: &lt;/b>bir hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>sâkirun: &lt;/b>sakir, sükrün karsiligini mükâfat olarak veren&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>hakkiyla bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.002.159">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak, hiç süphesiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yektumûne: &lt;/b>ketmederler, gizlerler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>enzelnâ: &lt;/b>biz indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min el beyyinâti: &lt;/b>beyyinelerden, deliller, mucizeler, ispat vasitalarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hudâ: &lt;/b>ve hidayet, ruhun ölmeden önce Allah'a ulasmasi, Allah tarafindan ulastirilmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>sonradan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyennâ-hu: &lt;/b>biz onu açikladik&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitapta&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yel'anu-humu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah onlara lânet eder&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yel'anu-humu: &lt;/b>ve onlara lânet eder&lt;br />&lt;b>el lâinûne: &lt;/b>lânet ediciler"
    <string name="sozluk.002.160">&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>tâbû: &lt;/b>tövbe ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>aslahû: &lt;/b>islâh oldular (nefs tezkiyesi yaptilar)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyenû: &lt;/b>beyan ettiler, açikladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>etûbu aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin tövbelerini kabul ederim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>ene: &lt;/b>ben&lt;br />&lt;b>et tevvâbu: &lt;/b>tövbeleri çok kabul eden&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahîmu: &lt;/b>rahîm esmasi ile tecelli eden, çok merhametli olan
    <string name="sozluk.002.161">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak, hiç süphesiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>gizlediler, küfrettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâtû: &lt;/b>ve öldüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kuffârun: &lt;/b>kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>la'netu allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in lâneti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el melâiketi: &lt;/b>ve melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en nâsi: &lt;/b>ve insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ecmaîne: &lt;/b>hepsi"
    <string name="sozluk.002.162">&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidîne: &lt;/b>ebedî kalacak olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada, onun içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuhaffefu: &lt;/b>hafifletilmez&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbu: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ hum yunzarûne: &lt;/b>onlara bakilmaz
    <string name="sozluk.002.163">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin ilâhiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhun: &lt;/b>ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhidun: &lt;/b>tek, bir&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ilâhe: &lt;/b>ilâh yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, dan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahmân: &lt;/b>Rahmân olan, Rahmân esmasinin&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahîmu: &lt;/b>ve Rahîm olan, rahmet nurunun sahibi
    <string name="sozluk.002.164">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>fî halki: &lt;/b>yaratilista&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ihtilâfi: &lt;/b>ve ihtilâfli (karsilikli) olmasi, birbiri ardinca gelmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>el leyli: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en nehâri: &lt;/b>ve gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el fulki: &lt;/b>ve gemiler&lt;br />&lt;b>elletî: &lt;/b>o ki, ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>tecrî: &lt;/b>akar, gider, yüzer&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el bahri: &lt;/b>denizde&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>dolayisiyla, sebebiyle, ..... yaparak&lt;br />&lt;b>yenfeu: &lt;/b>fayda verir&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>enzele allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan, gökten&lt;br />&lt;b>min mâin: &lt;/b>sudan, suyu&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ahyâ bi-hi: &lt;/b>böylece onunla hayat verdi, diriltti&lt;br />&lt;b>el arda: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü, toprak&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>mevti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ölümü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve besse: &lt;/b>ve yaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>min kulli: &lt;/b>hepsinden&lt;br />&lt;b>dâbbetin: &lt;/b>(yürüyen) hayvanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tasrîfi: &lt;/b>ve esmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>er riyâhi: &lt;/b>rüzgâr(lar)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sehâbi: &lt;/b>ve bulutlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el musahhari: &lt;/b>emre amade kilinmis olan&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne: &lt;/b>arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâi: &lt;/b>sema, gökyüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>le âyâtin: &lt;/b>elbette âyetler, kanitlar, deliller&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim için&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'kilûne: &lt;/b>akil ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.002.165">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min en nâsi: &lt;/b>ve insanlardan (bir kismi)&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yettehizu: &lt;/b>edinir&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>endâden: &lt;/b>es, esit, ortak (put)&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhibbûne-hum: &lt;/b>onlari severler&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>hubbillâhi (hubbi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in sevgisi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular (Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler)&lt;br />&lt;b>eseddu: &lt;/b>daha siddetli, daha çok kuvvetli&lt;br />&lt;b>hubben: &lt;/b>sevgi, muhabbet&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'i&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev yerâ: &lt;/b>ve keske görselerdi (bilselerdi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne zalemû: &lt;/b>zulmedenler&lt;br />&lt;b>iz yeravne: &lt;/b>gördüklerinde, gördükleri zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbe: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>enne: &lt;/b>oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>el kuvvete: &lt;/b>kuvvet&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in, Allah'a ait&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>hepsi, bütün, tamami, tamamen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne: &lt;/b>ve oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdu: &lt;/b>siddetli&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbi: &lt;/b>azap"
    <string name="sozluk.002.166">&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>o zaman, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>teberree: &lt;/b>berî oldu, uzaklasti&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ittubiû: &lt;/b>tâbî olundular&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ittebeû: &lt;/b>tâbî oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>reavû: &lt;/b>(onlar) gördüler&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbe: &lt;/b>azab&lt;br />&lt;b>takattaat: &lt;/b>kesildi, koparildi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlar ile&lt;br />&lt;b>el esbâbu: &lt;/b>sebepler, baglar

    <string name="sozluk.002.175">&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike ellezîne: &lt;/b>iste onlar ki ..... yapanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>isteravû: &lt;/b>satin aldilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dalâlete: &lt;/b>dalâleti&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hudâ: &lt;/b>hidayet ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el azâbe: &lt;/b>ve azap&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el magfireti: &lt;/b>magfiret ile, günahlarin sevaba&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey, ne, nedir&lt;br />&lt;b>asbere-hum: &lt;/b>onlari sabirli yapti&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ en nâri: &lt;/b>atese karsi

    <string name="sozluk.002.177">"&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>el birre: &lt;/b>birr, ebrar kilacak davranis biçimi&lt;br />&lt;b>en tuvellû: &lt;/b>dönmeniz, yönelmeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>zevî el kurbâ: &lt;/b>yakinlik sahipleri, akrabalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el yetâmâ: &lt;/b>ve yetimler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mesâkîne: &lt;/b>ve çalisamayacak durumdaki ihtiyarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve için)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ekâme es salâte: &lt;/b>namazi ikame etti, devam ettirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âte ez zekâte: &lt;/b>ve zekât verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mûfûne: &lt;/b>ve vefa eden, hakkiyla yerine getiren&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ahdi-him: &lt;/b>(onlarin) ahdlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ âhedû: &lt;/b>ahd verdikleri zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sâbirîne: &lt;/b>ve sabredenler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el be'sâi: &lt;/b>sikintida, musîbet isabet ettigi zaman, hastalikta&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ed darrâi: &lt;/b>ve darlik, zorluk, zaruret&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hîne: &lt;/b>ve o zamanda, o hallerde&lt;br />&lt;b>el be'si: &lt;/b>siddetli savas&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne sadakû: &lt;/b>onlar sadik oldular, sadik olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ulâike: &lt;/b>ve iste onlar&lt;br     <string name="sozluk.002.178">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>kutibe: &lt;/b>yazildi, farz kilindi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum(u): &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize, size&lt;br />&lt;b>el kisâsu: &lt;/b>kisas, esit olarak misilleme&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el katlâ: &lt;/b>öldürülme hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>el hurru: &lt;/b>hür&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hurri: &lt;/b>hür ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el abdu: &lt;/b>ve köle&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el abdi: &lt;/b>köle ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el unsâ: &lt;/b>ve kadin, disi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el unsâ: &lt;/b>kadin ile, disi ile&lt;br />&lt;b>fe men: &lt;/b>fakat, o taktirde, artik, o zaman kim&lt;br />&lt;b>ufiye lehu: &lt;/b>o affedilir&lt;br />&lt;b>min ahî-hi: &lt;/b>onun kardesi tarafindan&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'un: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>fakat, o taktirde, artik, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ittibâun: &lt;/b>tâbî olmak, uymak, geregini yapmak&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>iyilikle, bilinen sekilde, örfe tâbî olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve edâun: &lt;/b>ve eda etmek, ödemek&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ihsânin: &lt;/b>ihsan ile&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu, bu&lt;br />&lt;b>tahfîfun: &lt;/b>hafifletme&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmetun: &lt;/b>ve bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>fe men: &lt;/b>fakat, o taktirde, artik, o zaman kim&lt;br />&lt;b>i'tedâ: &lt;/b>haddi asti&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de zâlike: &lt;/b>bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lehu: &lt;/b>o taktirde, o zaman onun için (vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun elîmun: &lt;/b>elîm bir azap"

    <string name="sozluk.002.189">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yes'elûne-ke: &lt;/b>sana soruyorlar, sorarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>el ehilleti: &lt;/b>hilâller (Ay'in hilâl seklinden dolunay olana kadar geçirdigi hilâl sekilleri)&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>mevâkîtu: &lt;/b>vakitleri bildiren vakit ölçüsü&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hacci: &lt;/b>ve hac&lt;br />&lt;b>ve leyse: &lt;/b>ve degildir&lt;br />&lt;b>el birru: &lt;/b>birr, ebrar yapan davranis biçimi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi en te'tû: &lt;/b>gelmeniz, girmeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>el buyûte: &lt;/b>evler&lt;br />&lt;b>min zuhûri-hâ: &lt;/b>onun arkasindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat, oysa&lt;br />&lt;b>el birre: &lt;/b>birr, ebrar yapan davranis biçimi&lt;br />&lt;b>menittekâ (men ittekâ): &lt;/b>kisi takva sahibi olur&lt;br />&lt;b>ve u'tû: &lt;/b>ve gelin, girin&lt;br />&lt;b>el buyûte: &lt;/b>evler&lt;br />&lt;b>min ebvâbi-hâ: &lt;/b>onun kapilarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekû: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tuflihûne: &lt;/b>felâha, kurtulusa erersiniz"

/>&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yertedid: &lt;/b>geri döner&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>an dîni-hi: &lt;/b>dîninden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yemut: &lt;/b>o zaman, o gider&lt;br />&lt;b>a'mâlu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin amelleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünyada&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el âhiret: &lt;/b>ve ahirette&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ulâike: &lt;/b>ve iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbu en nâri: &lt;/b>ates ehlidir&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>onun içinde, orada&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidûne: &lt;/b>ebediyyen kalicak olanlardir"
    <string name="sozluk.002.218">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ellezîne: &lt;/b>muhakak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular (Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler) îmân ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hâcerû: &lt;/b>hicret ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve câhedû: &lt;/b>ve cihad ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yercûne: &lt;/b>ümit ederler, arzu ederler, dilerler&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmete allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in rahmeti&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>gafûr olan, magfiret eden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>rahmet nurunun sahibi,"
    <string name="sozluk.002.219">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yes'elûne-ke: &lt;/b>sana soruyorlar, sorarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an el hamri: &lt;/b>saraptan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el meysiri: &lt;/b>ve kumar&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-himâ: &lt;/b>ikisinde vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>ismun kebîrun: &lt;/b>büyük günah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve menâfiu: &lt;/b>ve menfaat, faydalar&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ismu-humâ: &lt;/b>ve onlarin (o ikisinin) günahlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ekberu: &lt;/b>daha büyük&lt;br />&lt;b>min nef'i-himâ: &lt;/b>onlarin (o ikisinin) faydalarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yes'elûne-ke: &lt;/b>ve sana soruyorlar, sorarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâzâ: &lt;/b>ne, nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>yunfikûne: &lt;/b>infâk ediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kul(i): &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>el afve: &lt;/b>afv olan, ihtiyaçtan fazla olan mal, affedilen, vazgeçilen&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>bunun gibi, iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>yubeyyinu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah açikliyor&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>el âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetler&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tetefekkerûne: &lt;/b>tefekkür edersiniz, düsünürsünüz"
    <string name="sozluk.002.220">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hakkinda, dünyada&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el âhirati: &lt;/b>ve ahiret&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yes'elûne-ke: &lt;/b>ve sana soruyorlar, sorarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an el yetâmâ: &lt;/b>yetimlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle,&lt;br />&lt;b>islâhun: &lt;/b>islâh etmek, düzeltmek&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayir, hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in tuhâlitû-hum: &lt;/b>ve eger onlara karisirsaniz, katilirsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ihvânu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin kardesleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>el mufside: &lt;/b>fesat çikaranlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min el muslihi: &lt;/b>islâh edenlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve sâyet, olsa, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>sâallâhu (sâe allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah diledi&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>a'nete-kum: &lt;/b>sizi sikintiya soktu&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>azîzdir, üstündür&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîmdir, hüküm ve hikmet sahibidir"
    <string name="sozluk.002.221">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tenkihû: &lt;/b>ve (kendinize) nikâhlamayin&lt;br />&lt;b>el musrikâti: &lt;/b>müsrik kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ yu'minne: &lt;/b>mü'min oluncaya, îmân edinceye kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le emetun: &lt;/b>ve elbette bir cariye&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'minetun: &lt;/b>mü'min (kadin)&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayirli, daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>min musriketin: &lt;/b>müsrik bir kadindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev a'cebet-kum: &lt;/b>ve size hos gelse bile, hosunuza gitse bile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tunkihû: &lt;/b>ve (siz kadinlarinizi) nikâhlamayin&lt;br />&lt;b>el musrikîne: &lt;/b>müsrik erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ yu'minû: &lt;/b>mü'min olunca, îmân edinceye kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le abdun: &lt;/b>ve elbette bir köle&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'minun: &lt;/b>mü'min (erkek)&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayirli, daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>min musrikin: &lt;/b>müsrik erkekten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev a'cebe-kum: &lt;/b>ve size hos gelse bile&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike yed'ûne: &lt;/b>iste onlar davet ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ en nâri: &lt;/b>atese&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yed'û: &lt;/b>davet ediyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ el cenneti: &lt;/b>cennete&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el magfireti: &lt;/b>ve magfiret&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni-hi: &lt;/b>onun izni ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yubeyyinu: &lt;/b>ve açikliyor&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-hî: &lt;/b>kendi âyetlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için, insanlara&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yetezekkerûne: &lt;/b>tezekkür ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.002.222">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yes'elûne-ke: &lt;/b>ve sana soruyorlar, sorarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>anil mahîdi (an el mahîdi): &lt;/b>(kadinlarin) hayz (ay) hallerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>ezen: &lt;/b>eza, istirap&lt;br />&lt;b>fa'tezilû (fe i'tezilû): &lt;/b>o taktirde, bu yüzden uzak durun&lt;br />&lt;b>en nisâe: &lt;/b>kadin(lar)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el mahîdi: &lt;/b>hayz (ay) hallerinde, hayz zamaninda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ takrabûhunne: &lt;/b>ve onlara yaklasmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ yathurne: &lt;/b>temizleninceye kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyle olunca, (öyle) ise, artik, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ tetahherne: &lt;/b>temizlendikleri zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyle olunca, (öyle) ise, artik, o zaman,&lt;br />&lt;b>e'tûhunne: &lt;/b>onlara gelin, yanina gidin (biraraya gelin)&lt;br />&lt;b>min haysu: &lt;/b>yerden&lt;br />&lt;b>emere-kum(u) allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah size emretti&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhibbu: &lt;/b>sever&lt;br />&lt;b>et tevvâbîne: &lt;/b>tövbe edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuhibbu: &lt;/b>ve sever&lt;br />&lt;b>el mutetahhirîne: &lt;/b>temizlenenler, temizlenmis olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.002.223">"&lt;br />&lt;b>nisâu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin kadinlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>harsun: &lt;/b>tarla&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, sizin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik, o halde&lt;br />&lt;b>e'tû: &lt;/b>gelin, yaklasin&lt;br />&lt;b>harse-kum: &lt;/b>sizin tarlaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ennâ: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>si'tum: &lt;/b>dilediniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kaddimû: &lt;/b>ve takdim edin&lt;br />&lt;b>li enfusi-kum: &lt;/b>nefsleriniz için, kendiniz için&lt;br />&lt;b>vettekû (ve ittekû): &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>va'lemû (ve i'lemû): &lt;/b>ve bilin&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin ..... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>mulâkû-hu: &lt;/b>ona mülâki olma, ruhunu ona ölmeden önce ulastirma&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bessir(i): &lt;/b>ve müjdele&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"
    <string name="sozluk.002.224">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tec'alû: &lt;/b>ve kilmayin, yapmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>urdaten: &lt;/b>siper, mani, engel&lt;br />&lt;b>li eymâni-kum: &lt;/b>yeminlerinize, yeminleriniz için&lt;br />&lt;b>en teberrû: &lt;/b>ebrar kimseler olmaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tettekû: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tuslihû: &lt;/b>ve islâh edin, düzeltin&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne: &lt;/b>arasi&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>semîun: &lt;/b>en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.002.225">&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuâhizu-kum: &lt;/b>sizi muaheze etmez, sorgulamaz&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el lagvi: &lt;/b>bos, lüzûmsuz sözler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî eymâni-kum: &lt;/b>yeminleriniz konusunda, hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>yuâhizu-kum: &lt;/b>sizi muaheze eder, sorgular&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ kesebet: &lt;/b>kazandigi seyler ile&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-kum: &lt;/b>kalpleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>gafûr olan, magfiret eden&lt;br />&lt;b>halîmun: &lt;/b>halîm olan, yumusak muamele eden

    <string name="sozluk.002.227">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in azemû: &lt;/b>ve eger azmederlerse&lt;br />&lt;b>et talâka: &lt;/b>bosama&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>semîun: &lt;/b>en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen
    <string name="sozluk.002.228">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mutallakâtu: &lt;/b>ve bosanmis kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yeterabbasne: &lt;/b>dururlar, beklerler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enfusi-hinne: &lt;/b>kendi kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>selâsete: &lt;/b>üç&lt;br />&lt;b>kurûin: &lt;/b>dönem (hayz zamani)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yahillu: &lt;/b>ve helâl olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>lehunne: &lt;/b>onlara (o kadinlara)&lt;br />&lt;b>en yektumne: &lt;/b>gizlemek&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ halaka: &lt;/b>yarattigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>fî erhâmi-hinne: &lt;/b>onlarin rahimlerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>in kunne: &lt;/b>eger onlar (kadinlar) iseler&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minne: &lt;/b>îmân ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el yevmi el âhiri: &lt;/b>ve son güne, sonraki güne, ahirete&lt;br />&lt;b>ve buûletu-hunne: &lt;/b>ve onlarin esleri, kocalari&lt;br />&lt;b>ehakku: &lt;/b>daha çok hak sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi reddi-hinne: &lt;/b>onlara geri dönmeye&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zâlike: &lt;/b>bunda&lt;br />&lt;b>in erâdû: &lt;/b>eger isterlerse&lt;br />&lt;b>islâhan: &lt;/b>islâh etmek, düzeltmek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehunne: &lt;/b>ve onlarin (kadinlarin) vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>mislu ellezî: &lt;/b>onun misli, onun gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhinne: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>iyilik ile, örfe ve adete uygun olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li er ricâli: &lt;/b>ve erkekler için, erkeklerin vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhinne: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>derecetun: &lt;/b>bir derece&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>azîzdir, üstündür&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîmdir, hüküm sahibidir"
    <string name="sozluk.002.229">"&lt;br />&lt;b>et talâku: &lt;/b>bosamak&lt;br />&lt;b>merratâni: &lt;/b>iki kere&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>imsâkun: &lt;/b>tutmak&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ma'rûfin: &lt;/b>iyilik ile, örf ve adete uygun olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>tesrîhun: &lt;/b>birakmak, serbest birakmak&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ihsânin: &lt;/b>ihsan ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yahillu: &lt;/b>ve helâl olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>en te'huzû: &lt;/b>almaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>âteytumû-hunne: &lt;/b>onlara verdiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>en yehâfâ: &lt;/b>korkmalari&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ yukîmâ: &lt;/b>ikame edememek, ayakta tutamamak, yerine getirememek&lt;br />&lt;b>hudûda allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in hudutlari, sinirlari&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, bu durumda, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>in hiftum: &lt;/b>eger korkarsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ yukîmâ: &lt;/b>ikame edememek, ayakta tutamamak, yerine getirememek&lt;br />&lt;b>hudûda allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in hudutlari, sinirlari&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, bu durumda&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ cunâha: &lt;/b>günah yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhimâ: &lt;/b>onlarin ikisi üzerine, ikisine&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>iftedet: &lt;/b>fidye (mehr) verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>tilke: &lt;/b>iste o, bu (bunlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>hudûda allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in hudutlari, sinirlari&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ta'tedû-hâ: &lt;/b>onu asmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yeteadde: &lt;/b>asiyor, asar&lt;br />&lt;b>hudûda allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in hudutlari, sinirlari&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, iste&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum(u) ez zâlimûne: &lt;/b>onlar zalimler, haksizlik edenler"
    <string name="sozluk.002.230">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>in tallaka-hâ: &lt;/b>eger onu bosarsa&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tahillu: &lt;/b>helâl olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'du: &lt;/b>sonradan&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>olmadikça, oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>tenkiha: &lt;/b>nikâhlanir&lt;br />&lt;b>zevcen: &lt;/b>es, zevce&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra-hu: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>in tallaka-hâ: &lt;/b>eger onu bosarsa&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ cunâha: &lt;/b>günah yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aley-himâ: &lt;/b>onlarin ikisi üzerine, ikisine&lt;br />&lt;b>en yeterâceâ: &lt;/b>dönmeleri&lt;br />&lt;b>in zannâ: &lt;/b>eger zannettiler ise, inanirlarsa&lt;br />&lt;b>en yukîmâ: &lt;/b>ikame etmek, ayakta tutmak, yerine getirmek&lt;br />&lt;b>hudûda allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in hudutlari, sinirlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tilke: &lt;/b>ve iste o, bu (bunlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>hudûdu allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in hudutlari, sinirlari&lt;br />&lt;b>yubeyyinu-hâ: &lt;/b>onu açikliyor&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim (toplum) için&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>biliyorlar, bilirler"

    <string name="sozluk.002.236">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ cunâhe: &lt;/b>günah yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize, size&lt;br />&lt;b>in tallaktumu: &lt;/b>eger bosarsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>en nisâe: &lt;/b>kadin(lar)&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lem temessû-hunne: &lt;/b>henüz kendilerine dokunmadiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>tefridû: &lt;/b>takdirettiniz, tayin ettiniz(farz kildiniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>lehunne: &lt;/b>onlar için, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>farîdâten: &lt;/b>takdir edilen (farz kilinan) miktar, mehir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mettiû-hunne: &lt;/b>ve onlari metelandirin, faydalandirin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el mûsii: &lt;/b>eli genis olan üzerine (zengin olana)&lt;br />&lt;b>kaderu-hu: &lt;/b>muktedir oldugu (kendi kudreti) kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ el muktiri: &lt;/b>ve dar geçimli olan üzerine (fakir olana)&lt;br />&lt;b>kaderu-hu: &lt;/b>muktedir oldugu (kendi kudreti) kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>metâan: &lt;/b>meta, mal, fayda&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>marufla, örf ve adete uygun olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkan: &lt;/b>bir hakk olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el muhsinîne: &lt;/b>muhsinlerin üzerine, muhsinlere"
    <string name="sozluk.002.237">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in tallaktumû-hunne: &lt;/b>ve eger onlari bosarsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>en temessû-hunne: &lt;/b>onlara dokunmaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kad: &lt;/b>ve olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>farad-tum: &lt;/b>size farz kilindi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehunne: &lt;/b>onlar için, onlarin&lt;br />&lt;b>farîdaten: &lt;/b>takdir edilen (farz kilinan) miktar, mehir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>nisfu: &lt;/b>yarisi&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ faradtum: &lt;/b>sizin farz kildiginiz miktar, mehir&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>en ya'fûne: &lt;/b>affetmeleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'fuve: &lt;/b>affeder&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>bi yedi-hî: &lt;/b>onun elinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ukdetun: &lt;/b>ahid, söz, bag&lt;br />&lt;b>en nikâhi: &lt;/b>nikâh&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en ta'fû: &lt;/b>ve sizin affetmeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>akrabu: &lt;/b>daha yakin&lt;br />&lt;b>li et takvâ: &lt;/b>takvaya, takva sahibi olmaniza&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tensevu: &lt;/b>ve unutmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>el fadla: &lt;/b>fazl, fazilet&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yaptiginiz sey(ler)i&lt;br />&lt;b>basîrun: &lt;/b>en iyi gören"

&lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>bundan sonra, fakat, nitekim&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>câveze-hu: &lt;/b>onu(karsidan karsiya) geçtiler&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tâkate: &lt;/b>takat, güç yok&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bizim&lt;br />&lt;b>el yevme: &lt;/b>bugün&lt;br />&lt;b>bi câlûte: &lt;/b>Calut ile, Calut'a karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cunûdi-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun askerleri (ordusu ile)&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yezunnûne: &lt;/b>yakîn hasil edenler, kesin olarak bilenler&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ..... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>mulâkû: &lt;/b>mülâki olanlar, kavusanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kem: &lt;/b>kaç tane, nice&lt;br />&lt;b>min fietin: &lt;/b>topluluk(lar)dan&lt;br />&lt;b>kalîletin: &lt;/b>az, pek az&lt;br />&lt;b>galebet: &lt;/b>gâlip oldu, üstün geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>fieten: &lt;/b>topluluk, grup&lt;br />&lt;b>kesiraten: &lt;/b>çok&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni: &lt;/b>izni ile&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>mea: &lt;/b>beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>es     <string name="sozluk.002.250">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lemmâ berazû: &lt;/b>ve karsisina çiktiklari zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>li câlûte: &lt;/b>Calut'a (Calut'un karsisina)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cunûdi-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun askerleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>efrig: &lt;/b>bosalt, yagdir, indir (ver)&lt;br />&lt;b>aleynâ: &lt;/b>üzerimize, bize&lt;br />&lt;b>sabren: &lt;/b>sabir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sebbit: &lt;/b>ve sabit kil&lt;br />&lt;b>ekdâme-nâ: &lt;/b>ayaklarimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve unsur-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bize yardim et&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el kavmi: &lt;/b>kavmine karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirler"
    <string name="sozluk.002.251">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, sonra, nihayet&lt;br />&lt;b>hezemû-hum: &lt;/b>onlari hezimete, yenilgiye ugrattilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in izniyle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve katele: &lt;/b>ve öldürdü&lt;br />&lt;b>dâvûdu: &lt;/b>Davut&lt;br />&lt;b>câlûte: &lt;/b>Calut&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âtâ-hu allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah ona verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>el mulke: &lt;/b>mülk, meliklik, hükümdarlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hikmete: &lt;/b>ve hikmet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alleme-hu: &lt;/b>ve ona ögretti&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diledi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev lâ: &lt;/b>ve eger olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>def'u allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in defetmesi, yok etmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bâ'da-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin bir kismi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ba'din: &lt;/b>bir kismi ile, digerleri ile&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>fesedeti: &lt;/b>fesat çikti&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardu: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>zû: &lt;/b>sahip&lt;br />&lt;b>fadlin: &lt;/b>fazl&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el âlemîne: &lt;/b>âlemlerin üzerine"

    <string name="sozluk.002.260">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz kâle: &lt;/b>ve demisti&lt;br />&lt;b>ibrâhîmu: &lt;/b>Ibrâhîm&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>eri-nî: &lt;/b>bana göster&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhyi: &lt;/b>diriltiyorsun, hayy yapiyorsun,&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevtâ: &lt;/b>ölüler&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>e ve lem tu'min: &lt;/b>ve inanmiyor musun&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>belâ: &lt;/b>hayir, bilâkis, tam aksi (evet)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>li yatmainne: &lt;/b>tatmin olmasi için&lt;br />&lt;b>kalbî: &lt;/b>benim kalbim&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>huz: &lt;/b>al, tut&lt;br />&lt;b>erbeaten: &lt;/b>dört&lt;br />&lt;b>min et tayri: &lt;/b>kuslardan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>surhunne ileyke: &lt;/b>(sana) yanina al, parçala&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ic'al: &lt;/b>kil, yap, koy&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine, ... e&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli: &lt;/b>hepsi, her&lt;br />&lt;b>cebelin: &lt;/b>dag&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hunne: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>cuz'en: &lt;/b>bir parça&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>id'u-hunne: &lt;/b>onlari çagir&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'tîne-ke: &lt;/b>sana gelirler, gelecekler&lt;br />&lt;b>sa'yen: &lt;/b>kosarak&lt;br />&lt;b>va'lem: &lt;/b>ve bil&lt;br />&lt;b>enne allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'in ..... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>azîz, üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakim, hüküm sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.002.261">"&lt;br />&lt;b>meselu: &lt;/b>durum, hal&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar 3 - yunfikûne&lt;br />&lt;b>emvâle-hum: &lt;/b>kendi mallarini&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîlillâhi (sebîlii allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>meseli: &lt;/b>durum, hal&lt;br />&lt;b>habbetin: &lt;/b>tane, tohum&lt;br />&lt;b>enbetet: &lt;/b>yetistirdi (verdi)&lt;br />&lt;b>seb'a: &lt;/b>yedi&lt;br />&lt;b>senâbile: &lt;/b>sünbüller, basaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ... de&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli: &lt;/b>hepsi, herbiri&lt;br />&lt;b>sunbuletin: &lt;/b>sünbül, basak&lt;br />&lt;b>mietu: &lt;/b>yüz&lt;br />&lt;b>habbetin: &lt;/b>tane, tohum&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yudâifu: &lt;/b>kat kat arttirip, verir&lt;br />&lt;b>li men: &lt;/b>kisi için, o kimseye&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>vâsiun: &lt;/b>vasi olan, herseyi kapsayan, lûtfu genis (bol) olan&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.002.262">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yunfikûne: &lt;/b>infâk ederler, verirler&lt;br />&lt;b>emvâle-hum: &lt;/b>kendi mallarini&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîlillâhi (sebîli allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yutbiûne: &lt;/b>tâbî kilmazlar, arkasindan (minnet, basa&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ enfekû: &lt;/b>infâk ettikleri sey, verdikleri sey&lt;br />&lt;b>mennen: &lt;/b>minnet etirerek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ ezen: &lt;/b>ve eza etmeyerek&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>ecru-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin mükâfatlari&lt;br />&lt;b>inde: &lt;/b>yaninda, katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin Rab'leri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ havfun: &lt;/b>ve korku yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ hum yahzenûne: &lt;/b>ve onlar mahzun olmazlar"

    <string name="sozluk.002.271">"&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>tubdû: &lt;/b>açikça ortaya çikarirsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>es sadakâti: &lt;/b>sadakalar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde, iste&lt;br />&lt;b>niimmâ (niim mâ): &lt;/b>ne güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in tuhfû-hâ: &lt;/b>ve onu gizlerseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tu'tû-ha: &lt;/b>ve onu verirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>el fukarâe: &lt;/b>fakirler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayirlidir, daha hayirlidir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yukeffiru: &lt;/b>ve örter&lt;br />&lt;b>an-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>min seyyiâti-kum: &lt;/b>günahlarinizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>habîrun: &lt;/b>haberdar olan"

/>&lt;b>ve eshidû: &lt;/b>ve sahit tutun&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ tebâya'tum: &lt;/b>alisveris, anlasma yaptiginiz zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yudârra: &lt;/b>ve zarar verilmesin&lt;br />&lt;b>kâtibun: &lt;/b>kâtip, yazici&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ sehîdun: &lt;/b>ve sahitler olmasin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in tef'alû: &lt;/b>ve eger yaparsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o, mutlaka o&lt;br />&lt;b>fusûkun: &lt;/b>fisktir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-kum: &lt;/b>size, kendinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekû: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuallimu-kum: &lt;/b>ve size ögretiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyi"
    <string name="sozluk.002.283">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in kuntum: &lt;/b>ve eger siz, iseniz, olduysaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ seferin: &lt;/b>seferde, yolculukta&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem tecidû: &lt;/b>ve bulamadiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>kâtiben: &lt;/b>bir kâtip, bir yazici&lt;br />&lt;b>fe rihânun: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde rehinler&lt;br />&lt;b>makbûdatun: &lt;/b>kabzedilmis, tutulmus, alinmis olan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in emine: &lt;/b>emin oldugunuz taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'du-kum: &lt;/b>sizin bir kisminiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'dan: &lt;/b>bir kismina&lt;br />&lt;b>felyueddi (fe li yueddi): &lt;/b>böylece, o halde ödesin&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>u'tumine: &lt;/b>itimat edildi, güven duyuldu&lt;br />&lt;b>emânete-hu: &lt;/b>onun emanetini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li yetteki allâhe: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a karsi takva sahibi olsun ve Allah'tan sakinsin&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-hu: &lt;/b>onun Rabbi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tektumû: &lt;/b>ve gizlemeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>es sehâdete: &lt;/b>sahitlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yektum-hâ: &lt;/b>onu ketmeder, saklar, gizler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>innehû: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>âsimun: &lt;/b>günahkâr&lt;br />&lt;b>kalbu-hu: &lt;/b>onun kalbi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.002.284">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in, Allah'a ait&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>göklerde bulunan seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ fî el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzünde bulunan seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in tubdû: &lt;/b>ve eger siz açiklarsaniz, açiklasaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fî enfusi-kum: &lt;/b>nefslerinizde, içinizde olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhfû-hu: &lt;/b>onu gizlersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhâsib-kum: &lt;/b>sizi hesaba çeker&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>yagfiru: &lt;/b>magfiret eder, bagislar, günahlari&lt;br />&lt;b>li-men: &lt;/b>kimseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuazzibu: &lt;/b>ve azap eder&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseye&lt;br />&lt;b>kadîrun: &lt;/b>kaadir, kudret sahibi, gücü yeten"
    <string name="sozluk.002.285">"&lt;br />&lt;b>âmene: &lt;/b>îmân etti, inandi&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûlu: &lt;/b>resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>seye&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-hi: &lt;/b>onun Rabbi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mu'minûne: &lt;/b>ve mü'minler&lt;br />&lt;b>kullun: &lt;/b>hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>âmene: &lt;/b>îmân etti, inandi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve melâiketi-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun meleklerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kutubi-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun kitaplarina&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rusuli-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun resûllerine&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ nuferriku: &lt;/b>fark gözetmeyiz, ayirmayiz&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne: &lt;/b>arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ehadin: &lt;/b>biri&lt;br />&lt;b>min rusuli-hi: &lt;/b>onun resûllerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>semi'nâ: &lt;/b>biz isittik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ata'nâ: &lt;/b>ve biz itaat ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>gufrâne-ke: &lt;/b>senin magfiret etmen&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ileyke: &lt;/b>ve sana&lt;br />&lt;b>el masîru: &lt;/b>masîr, varis, ulasma, seyr-i sülûk"
    <string name="sozluk.002.286">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yukellifu: &lt;/b>mükellef kilmaz, sorumlu tutmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsen: &lt;/b>nefs, kisi, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>vus'a-hâ: &lt;/b>onun gücü, kapasitesi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehâ: &lt;/b>onun&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kesebet: &lt;/b>kazandigi seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve aleyhâ: &lt;/b>ve (sorumlulugu) onun üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>mektesebet (mâ iktesebet): &lt;/b>kazandigi negatif seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tuâhiz-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi aheze etme, sorgulama&lt;br />&lt;b>in nesînâ: &lt;/b>eger, sâyet unuttuysak&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>ahta'nâ: &lt;/b>hata yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tahmil: &lt;/b>ve yükleme&lt;br />&lt;b>aleynâ: &lt;/b>bizim üzerimize, bize&lt;br />&lt;b>isran: &lt;/b>zorluk, güçlük&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâ: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>hamelte-hu: &lt;/b>onu yükledin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimselere, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-nâ: &lt;/b>bizden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tuhammil-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bize yükleme&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lâ tâkate lenâ: &lt;/b>bizim takat, güç yetiremeyecegimiz seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve a'fu an-nâ: &lt;/b>ve (bizden günahlarimizi) affet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve igfir: &lt;/b>ve magfiret et, günahlarimizi sevaba&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bizi, bize, bizim için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve irham-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bize rahmet et, Rahîm esmasi ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>mevlâ-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim mevlâmizsin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>ensur-nâ: &lt;/b>bize yardim et&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el kavmi el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirler kavmine karsi"

    <string name="sozluk.003.011">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ke de'bi: &lt;/b>gibi, benzer, durumu gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>âli fir'avne: &lt;/b>firavun ailesi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar, ve o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>tekzip ettiler, yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ehaze-hum allâhu: &lt;/b>bunun üzerine Allah onlari yakaladi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zunûbi-him: &lt;/b>günahlari ile, günahlari sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdu el ikâbi: &lt;/b>ikâbin (azabin) siddeti, ikâbi (azabi) siddetli"
    <string name="sozluk.003.012">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>kâfir olanlara&lt;br />&lt;b>se tuglebûne: &lt;/b>yakinda yenileceksiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tuhserûne: &lt;/b>ve toplanacaksiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehenneme (cehennemde)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi'se el mihâdu: &lt;/b>ve ne kötü dösek"
    <string name="sozluk.003.013">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kad kâne: &lt;/b>olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>âyetun: &lt;/b>âyet, ibret&lt;br />&lt;b>fî fieteyni: &lt;/b>iki topluluk hakkinda, toplulukta&lt;br />&lt;b>el tekatâ: &lt;/b>çarpisti&lt;br />&lt;b>fietun: &lt;/b>bir topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>tukâtilu: &lt;/b>savasiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda (Allah yolunda)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve uhrâ: &lt;/b>ve digeri&lt;br />&lt;b>kâfiratun: &lt;/b>kâfir, inkârci&lt;br />&lt;b>yeravne-hum: &lt;/b>onlari görüyor&lt;br />&lt;b>misley-him: &lt;/b>onlarin (kendilerinin) iki misli&lt;br />&lt;b>ra'ye el ayni: &lt;/b>gözleri ile görüyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yûeyyidu: &lt;/b>destekler, kuvvetlendirir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi nasri-hî: &lt;/b>kendi yardimi ile&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zâlike: &lt;/b>bunda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>le ibreten: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka ibret&lt;br />&lt;b>li ulî el ebsâri: &lt;/b>basiret sahipleri için"

    <string name="sozluk.003.031">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntum: &lt;/b>eger, siz ... iseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhibbûne allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'i seviyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ittebiû-nî: &lt;/b>o taktirde bana tâbî olun&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhbib-kum(u) allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah sizi sever&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yagfir lekum: &lt;/b>ve size magfiret eder&lt;br />&lt;b>zunûbe-kum: &lt;/b>sizin günahlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu gafûrun: &lt;/b>ve Allah magfiret eden, günahlari sevaba çeviren&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>Rahim esmasi ile tecelli eden rahmet nuru gönderen"

    <string name="sozluk.003.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>âmennâ: &lt;/b>biz îmân ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seye&lt;br />&lt;b>enzelte: &lt;/b>sen indirdin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve itteba'nâ: &lt;/b>ve biz tâbî olduk&lt;br />&lt;b>resûle: &lt;/b>resûl, elçi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe uktubnâ: &lt;/b>artik, bizi yaz&lt;br />&lt;b>mea es sâhidîne: &lt;/b>sahit olanlarla birlikte, beraber"
    <string name="sozluk.003.054">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mekerû: &lt;/b>ve hile yaptilar, tuzak kurdular&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mekere allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah'in tuzagi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>hayru: &lt;/b>en hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>el mâkirîne: &lt;/b>hile yapanlar, tuzak kuranlar"
    <string name="sozluk.003.055">&lt;br />&lt;b>iz kâle allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah (söyle) buyurmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ îsâ innî: &lt;/b>ey Isa, muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>muteveffî-ke: &lt;/b>seni vefat ettirecek olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve râfiu-ke: &lt;/b>ve seni yükseltecek olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyye: &lt;/b>bana, kendime&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mutahhiru-ke: &lt;/b>ve seni temizleyecek olan&lt;br />&lt;b>min ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimselerden, onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve câilu: &lt;/b>ve kilacak olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ittebeû-ke: &lt;/b>sana tâbî oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>fevka: &lt;/b>üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ yevmil kiyâmeti: &lt;/b>kiyâmet gününe kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyye: &lt;/b>bana&lt;br />&lt;b>merciu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin dönüsünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ahkumu: &lt;/b>o zaman, ben hüküm verecegim&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-mâ kuntum: &lt;/b>sizin ... oldugunuz seyde&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi tahtelifûne: &lt;/b>hakkinda ihtilâf ettiginiz, ayriliga düstügünüz
    <string name="sozluk.003.056">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe emma: &lt;/b>artik, fakat öyle ise&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe uazzibu-hum: &lt;/b>o taktirde onlara azap edecegim&lt;br />&lt;b>azâben sedîden: &lt;/b>siddetli azap&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünyada&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el âhireti: &lt;/b>ve ahirette&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlar için, onlarin yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min nâsirîne: &lt;/b>(yardimcilardan) bir yardimci
    <string name="sozluk.003.057">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emmâ: &lt;/b>ve lakin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olan (ölmeden önce Allah'a ulasmayi dileyen)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve nefsi tezkiye edici amel yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde, öyle ise&lt;br />&lt;b>yuveffî-him: &lt;/b>onlara ödenir&lt;br />&lt;b>ucûre-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ecirleri, mükâfaatlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuhibbu: &lt;/b>sevmez&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zâlimler, haksizlik edenler"
    <string name="sozluk.003.058">"&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu, iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>netlû-hu: &lt;/b>onu tilâvet ediyoruz, okuyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyke: &lt;/b>sana, senin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>minel âyâti: &lt;/b>...dan, âyetler, kanitlar, deliller&lt;br />&lt;b>vez zikri: &lt;/b>ve, ögüt, Kur'ân, zikir&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakîmi: &lt;/b>hikmetli"
    <string name="sozluk.003.059">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>mesele: &lt;/b>misal, örnek, durum&lt;br />&lt;b>îsâ: &lt;/b>Hz. Âdem&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka-hu: &lt;/b>onu yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>min turâbin: &lt;/b>topraktan&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi, buyurdu&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu kun: &lt;/b>ona \"ol\" dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yekûnu: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece o olur"
