    <string name="sozluk.003.061">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe men: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik kim&lt;br />&lt;b>hâcce-ke: &lt;/b>seninle tartisti&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>sonradan, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ câe-ke: &lt;/b>sana gelen sey&lt;br />&lt;b>min el ilmi: &lt;/b>ilimden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kul: &lt;/b>o zaman de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>teâlev: &lt;/b>gelin&lt;br />&lt;b>ned'u: &lt;/b>çagiralim, davet edelim&lt;br />&lt;b>ebnâe-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim ogullarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ebnâe-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin ogullariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nisâe-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bizim kadinlarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nisâe-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin kadinlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enfuse-nâ: &lt;/b>ve kendimiz, bizler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enfuse-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizler&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>nebtehil: &lt;/b>dua edelim&lt;br />&lt;b>fe nec'al: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece kilalim&lt;br />&lt;b>la'nete allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in lânetini&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el kâzibîne: &lt;/b>yalancilarin üzerine"
    <string name="sozluk.003.062">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>le huve: &lt;/b>gerçekten o&lt;br />&lt;b>el kasasu el hakku: &lt;/b>hak kisas, gerçek olay&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ min: &lt;/b>ve ...'dan yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhin: &lt;/b>ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'dan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le huve: &lt;/b>gerçekten o&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzu: &lt;/b>üstün, aziz&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakîmu: &lt;/b>hüküm ve hikmet sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.003.063">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in tevellev: &lt;/b>buna ragmen dönerlerse&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inne allâhe: &lt;/b>o zaman muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el mufsidîne: &lt;/b>fesad çikaranlari, bozgunculari
    <string name="sozluk.003.064">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ ehle el kitâbi: &lt;/b>ey kitap ehli (yahudiler ve hristiyanlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>teâlev: &lt;/b>gelin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ kelimetin: &lt;/b>bir kelimeye, bir söze&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâin: &lt;/b>esit, müsavi, ayni, bir&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim aramizda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve beyne-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ na'bude: &lt;/b>kul olmayalim&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'dan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ nusrike: &lt;/b>ve sirk, ortak kosmayalim&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî sey'en: &lt;/b>ona bir seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yettehize: &lt;/b>ve edinmeyelim&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'du-nâ: &lt;/b>bir kismimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'den: &lt;/b>bazilari&lt;br />&lt;b>erbâben: &lt;/b>Rab'ler&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in tevellev: &lt;/b>bundan sonra eger, dönerse&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kûlû: &lt;/b>o zaman deyiniz, söyleyiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ushedû: &lt;/b>sahit olun&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ennâ: &lt;/b>bizim ... oldugumuza&lt;br />&lt;b>muslimûne: &lt;/b>müslümanlar, teslim olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.003.065">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ ehle el kitâbi: &lt;/b>ey ehli kitap (yahudiler, hristiyanlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>lime: &lt;/b>niçin, nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhâccûne: &lt;/b>tartisiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ibrâhîme: &lt;/b>Ibrâhîm hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ unzilet: &lt;/b>ve indirilmedi&lt;br />&lt;b>et tevrâtu ve el incîlu: &lt;/b>Tevrat ve Incil&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di-hî: &lt;/b>ondan sonra (oldu, ondan önce olmadi ki...)&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe lâ ta'kilûne: &lt;/b>hâlâ akil etmiyor musunuz,"
    <string name="sozluk.003.066">"&lt;br />&lt;b>hâ entum: &lt;/b>iste siz&lt;br />&lt;b>hâulâi: &lt;/b>bunlarsiniz (busunuz)&lt;br />&lt;b>hâcectum: &lt;/b>tartistiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî mâ lekum bihî: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda sizin ..... yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmun: &lt;/b>ilim, bilgi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lime tuhâccûne: &lt;/b>artik siz niçin tartisiyorsunuz,&lt;br />&lt;b>fî mâ leyse lekum: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda sizin ..... yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>bihi: &lt;/b>için, sizin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmun: &lt;/b>ilim, bilgi&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu ya'lemu: &lt;/b>ve Allah bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmiyorsunuz, bilmezsiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.003.067">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kâne: &lt;/b>olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>ibrâhîmu: &lt;/b>Hz.     <string name="sozluk.003.068">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne evlâ en nâsi: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki insanlarin en yakin olani&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ibrâhîme: &lt;/b>Hz. Ibrâhîm'e&lt;br />&lt;b>le ellezîne: &lt;/b>elbette onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ittebeû-hu: &lt;/b>ona tâbî oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hâza en nebiyyu: &lt;/b>ve bu peygamber&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>veliyyu: &lt;/b>veli, dost&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"
    <string name="sozluk.003.069">"&lt;br />&lt;b>veddet: &lt;/b>diledi&lt;br />&lt;b>tâifetun: &lt;/b>taife, bir grup, topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>min ehli el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitap ehlinden, kitap verilenlerden, yahudiler ve hristiyanlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>sayet, ise, keske olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>yudillûne-kum: &lt;/b>sizi dalâlete düsürür&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ yudillûne: &lt;/b>ve düsüremezler&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>kendilerinden baskasini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ yes'urûne: &lt;/b>ve farkinda degiller"
    <string name="sozluk.003.070">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ ehle el kitâbi: &lt;/b>ey kitap ehli, kitap sahipleri, kitab verilenler&lt;br />&lt;b>lime tekfurûne: &lt;/b>niçin, inkâr ediyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in âyetlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>teshedûne: &lt;/b>sahit oluyorsunuz, görüyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.003.071">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ya ehle el kitâbi: &lt;/b>ey kitap ehli, kitap sahipleri&lt;br />&lt;b>lime telbisûne: &lt;/b>niçin, karistiriyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakka bi el bâtili: &lt;/b>hakki (gerçegi), batil (bos seyler) ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tektumûne: &lt;/b>ve gizliyorsunu&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakka: &lt;/b>hakki, gerçegi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>biliyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.003.072">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlet: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>tâifetun: &lt;/b>tâife, bir grup, topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>min ehli el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitap ehlinden, kitap verilenlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>âminû: &lt;/b>îmân edin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ellezî: &lt;/b>ona ki, ona&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>îmân ettiler, âmenû oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>veche en nehâri: &lt;/b>gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ukfurû: &lt;/b>ve inkâr edin&lt;br />&lt;b>âhira-hu: &lt;/b>onun sonunda, aksamleyin&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yerciûne: &lt;/b>dönerler
    <string name="sozluk.003.073">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tu'minû: &lt;/b>inanmayin, îmân etmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ li men: &lt;/b>o kimseden baska&lt;br />&lt;b>tebia dîne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin dîninize tâbî oldu, uydu&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>inne el hudâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki hidayet (Allah'a ulasmak)&lt;br />&lt;b>hudâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in hidayetidir (Allah'in Kendisine ulastirmasidir)&lt;br />&lt;b>en yu'tâ: &lt;/b>verilmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>ehadun: &lt;/b>bir kimse, bir baskasi&lt;br />&lt;b>misle: &lt;/b>benzer&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ûtîtum: &lt;/b>size verilen sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ev yuhâccû-kum: &lt;/b>yoksa onlar sizinle çekisiyorlar mi&lt;br />&lt;b>inde rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbiniz'in huzurunda&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>inne el fadla: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki fazilet&lt;br />&lt;b>bi yedi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in elinde&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'tî-hi: &lt;/b>onu verir&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimseye, diledigine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu vâsiun: &lt;/b>ve Allah Vâsi'dir (ilmi genistir, herseyi kapsar)&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilendir"
    <string name="sozluk.003.074">&lt;br />&lt;b>yahtassu: &lt;/b>tahsis eder&lt;br />&lt;b>bi rahmeti-hî: &lt;/b>rahmetini&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimse, diledigine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>zû el fadli: &lt;/b>fazl sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîmi: &lt;/b>büyük
    <string name="sozluk.003.075">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min: &lt;/b>ve ...den, ...dan&lt;br />&lt;b>ehli el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitap ehli, kitap sahipleri&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse, kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>in te'menhu: &lt;/b>eger onu, ona emanet etsen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kintârin: &lt;/b>kantarlarca, tarti ile, ölçü ile, kantar kantar&lt;br />&lt;b>yueddihî: &lt;/b>onu iade eder, geri verir&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>ve minhum: &lt;/b>ve onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse, kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>in te'menhu: &lt;/b>eger onu, ona emanet etsen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi dînârin: &lt;/b>bir dinar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yueddihî: &lt;/b>iade etmez, geri vermez, onu&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ mâ dumte: &lt;/b>ancak, devamli olmadikça&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi kâimen: &lt;/b>onun üzerine, dikilici, ayakta durucu&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ennehum: &lt;/b>hiç süphesiz onlarin&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse aleynâ: &lt;/b>degildir, bizim üzerimize, bize&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ummiyyîne: &lt;/b>okuma yazma bilmeyenler, ümmîler hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîlun: &lt;/b>bir yol, sorumluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yekûlûne: &lt;/b>ve diyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>el kezibe: &lt;/b>yalan söyledi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>biliyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.003.076">&lt;br />&lt;b>belâ: &lt;/b>hayir, öyle degil&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>evfâ: &lt;/b>vefa etti, ifa etti, yerine getirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ahdi-hî: &lt;/b>ahdini, yeminini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekâ: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inne allâhe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhibbu: &lt;/b>sever&lt;br />&lt;b>el muttekîne: &lt;/b>takva sahipleri

    <string name="sozluk.003.095">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>sadaka allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah dogruyu söyledi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ittebiû: &lt;/b>öyle ise tâbî olun&lt;br />&lt;b>millete ibrâhîme: &lt;/b>Ibrâhîm'in dînine&lt;br />&lt;b>hanîfen: &lt;/b>hanif olarak (tek Allah'a inanarak teslim olmak)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne: &lt;/b>ve o olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>min el musrikîne: &lt;/b>müsriklerden"
    <string name="sozluk.003.096">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>evvele beytin: &lt;/b>ilk ev&lt;br />&lt;b>vudia li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için vaz'edildi, yapildi&lt;br />&lt;b>le ellezî: &lt;/b>elbette ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>bi bekkete: &lt;/b>Bekke'de, Mekke'de&lt;br />&lt;b>mubâreken: &lt;/b>mübarek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huden: &lt;/b>ve hidayet vesilesi olan&lt;br />&lt;b>li el âlemîne: &lt;/b>âlemler için"
    <string name="sozluk.003.097">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fîhi: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtun: &lt;/b>âyetler, deliller, kanitlar&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyinâtun: &lt;/b>açik beyyineler&lt;br />&lt;b>makâmu ibrâhîme: &lt;/b>Hz.     <string name="sozluk.003.114">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a îmân ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el yevmi el âhiri: &lt;/b>ve âhir güne, son güne, sonraki güne&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ye'murûne: &lt;/b>ve emrederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>irfan ile, iyilik ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yenhevne: &lt;/b>ve nehy ederler, men ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>an el munkeri: &lt;/b>münkerden, kötülükten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yusâriûne: &lt;/b>ve kosarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el hayrâti: &lt;/b>hayirlarda, hayirlara&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ulâike: &lt;/b>ve iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min es sâlihîne: &lt;/b>sâlihlerden"
    <string name="sozluk.003.115">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ yef'alû: &lt;/b>ve yaptiklari sey&lt;br />&lt;b>min hayrin: &lt;/b>hayirdan, hayir olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>fe len yukferû-hu: &lt;/b>o taktirde o asla örtülmez&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el muttekîne: &lt;/b>takva sahiplerini"
    <string name="sozluk.003.116">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ellezîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>len tugniye an: &lt;/b>asla fayda vermez&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>emvâlu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin mallari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ evlâdu-hum: &lt;/b>ve evlâtlari ... olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ulâike: &lt;/b>ve iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbu en nâri: &lt;/b>ates ehlidir, ates halkidir&lt;br />&lt;b>hum fî-hâ: &lt;/b>onlar orada&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidûne: &lt;/b>devamli kalacak olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.003.117">&lt;br />&lt;b>meselu: &lt;/b>misal, durum&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yunfikûne: &lt;/b>infak edilen seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ...de&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzihi el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>bu dünya hayati&lt;br />&lt;b>ke meseli: &lt;/b>gibi, misal, durum&lt;br />&lt;b>rîhin: &lt;/b>kavurucu, dondurucu bir rüzgâr&lt;br />&lt;b>fîhâ: &lt;/b>onun içinde, ona&lt;br />&lt;b>sirrun: &lt;/b>dondurucu soguk&lt;br />&lt;b>esâbet: &lt;/b>isabet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>harse: &lt;/b>ekinler&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmin: &lt;/b>kavim, toplum&lt;br />&lt;b>zalemû: &lt;/b>zulmettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>kendi kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ehleket-hu: &lt;/b>böylece onu helâk etti, yok etti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ zaleme-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlara zulmetmedi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>kendi kendilerine, kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>yazlimûne: &lt;/b>zulmediyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.003.118">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar, îmân edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tettehizû: &lt;/b>edinmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>bitâneten: &lt;/b>sirdas&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni-kum: &lt;/b>sizlerden baska, kendinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ye'lûne-kum: &lt;/b>size ... yapmaktan geri kalmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>habâlen: &lt;/b>fesada düsürmek&lt;br />&lt;b>veddû: &lt;/b>istediler, temenni ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ anittum: &lt;/b>size sikinti verecek seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>kad bedet: &lt;/b>belli olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>el bagdâu: &lt;/b>kin ve öfke&lt;br />&lt;b>min efvâhi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin agizlarindan (sözlerinden)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ tuhfî: &lt;/b>ve gizledikleri sey&lt;br />&lt;b>sudûru-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin gögüsleri, sineleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ekberu: &lt;/b>daha büyük&lt;br />&lt;b>kad beyyennâ: &lt;/b>açiklamistik&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>el âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntum: &lt;/b>eger siz ... olmus olsaydiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'kilûne: &lt;/b>akil ediyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.003.119">"&lt;br />&lt;b>hâ entum ulâi: &lt;/b>iste siz busunuz, böylesiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhibbûne-hum: &lt;/b>onlari seversiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yuhibbûne-kum: &lt;/b>ve onlar sizi sevmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tû'minûne: &lt;/b>ve siz îmân edersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitaba&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli-hi: &lt;/b>onun tamamina&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve ...oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>lekû-kum: &lt;/b>sizinle karsilastilar&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>âmennâ: &lt;/b>biz îmân ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ halev: &lt;/b>ve yalniz kaldiklari zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>addû: &lt;/b>isirdilar&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size (karsi olan)&lt;br />&lt;b>el enâmile: &lt;/b>parmak uçlari&lt;br />&lt;b>min el gayzi: &lt;/b>öfkelerinden, kinlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>mûtû: &lt;/b>ölün&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayzi-kum: &lt;/b>öfkeniz ile (öfkenizden)&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zâti es sudûri: &lt;/b>sinelerin sahip oldugu, sinelerde olan"

    <string name="sozluk.003.125">"&lt;br />&lt;b>belâ: &lt;/b>(olumsuz soruya, olumlu cevap verirken kullanilir) evet, hayir, bilakis&lt;br />&lt;b>in tasbirû: &lt;/b>eger siz sabrederseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tettekû: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olursaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ye'tû-kum: &lt;/b>ve size gelirler&lt;br />&lt;b>min fevri-him: &lt;/b>onlarin ani hareketlerinden, aniden&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ yumdid-kum: &lt;/b>bu size yardim&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hamseti âlâfin: &lt;/b>bes bini ile&lt;br />&lt;b>min el melâiketi: &lt;/b>melekerden&lt;br />&lt;b>musevvimîne: &lt;/b>isaretlenmis, nisanli"

    <string name="sozluk.003.135">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ fealû: &lt;/b>yaptiklari zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>fâhiseten: &lt;/b>kötülük&lt;br />&lt;b>ev zalemû: &lt;/b>veya zulmettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>nefslerine, kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>zekerû allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'i zikrettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe estagferû: &lt;/b>o zaman, hemen istigfar ettiler, magfiret dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>li zunûbi-him: &lt;/b>kendi günahlari için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yagfiru ez zunûbe: &lt;/b>magfiret eder, bagislar (günahlari sevaba çevirir)&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yusirrû: &lt;/b>ve israr etmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ mâ fealû: &lt;/b>yaptiklari seyler üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>biliyorlar, bilirler"
    <string name="sozluk.003.136">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>cezâu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin cezasi, karsilig?, mükâfati&lt;br />&lt;b>magfiretun: &lt;/b>bagislanma, magfiret (günahlarin sevaba çevrilmesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cennâtun: &lt;/b>ve cennetler&lt;br />&lt;b>tecrî: &lt;/b>akar&lt;br />&lt;b>min tahti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun altindan&lt;br />&lt;b>el enhâru: &lt;/b>nehirler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidîne fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada, içinde kalacak olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ni'me: &lt;/b>ve ne güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>ecru: &lt;/b>ecir, bedel, karsilik&lt;br />&lt;b>el âmilîne: &lt;/b>amel edenler"

    <string name="sozluk.003.138">"&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>beyânun: &lt;/b>bir beyan, açiklama&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için, insanlara&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huden: &lt;/b>ve hidayet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mev'izatun: &lt;/b>ve vaaz, ögüt&lt;br />&lt;b>li el muttekîne: &lt;/b>takva sahipleri için, takva sahiplerine"

&lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zâti es sudûri: &lt;/b>gögüslerde olani, sinelerde olani"
    <string name="sozluk.003.155">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ellezîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>tevellev: &lt;/b>yüz çevirdiler&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden, içinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme ilteka: &lt;/b>karsilastigi gün&lt;br />&lt;b>el cem'âni: &lt;/b>iki cemaat, iki topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>fakat, ancak, oysa&lt;br />&lt;b>istezelle-hum: &lt;/b>onlari zillete düsürmek istedi&lt;br />&lt;b>es seytânu: &lt;/b>seytan&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ba'di mâ: &lt;/b>bazi seylerden dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>kesebû: &lt;/b>kazandilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>afâ allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah affetti&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>gafûr olan, bagislayan&lt;br />&lt;b>halîmun: &lt;/b>halîm, yumusak davranan, acele etmeyen"
    <string name="sozluk.003.156">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar, îmân edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tekûnû: &lt;/b>siz ... olmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>li ihvâni-him: &lt;/b>kendi kardesleri için&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ darabû: &lt;/b>sefere çiktiklari zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ev kânû: &lt;/b>veya ... oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>guzzen: &lt;/b>gâzi olanlar (savasa katilanlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>lev kânû: &lt;/b>eger olsaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>inde-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim yanimizda&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ mâtû: &lt;/b>ölmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kutilû: &lt;/b>ve öldürülmezlerdi&lt;br />&lt;b>li yec'ale allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah, ... kilmak için&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bunu&lt;br />&lt;b>hasreten: &lt;/b>hasret, pismanlik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>kalpleri içinde, kalplerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhyî: &lt;/b>diriltir, yasatir, hayat verir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yumîtu: &lt;/b>ve öldürür&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yaptiginiz seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>basîrun: &lt;/b>en iyi gören"
    <string name="sozluk.003.157">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le in: &lt;/b>ve eger ... olursa&lt;br />&lt;b>kutiltum: &lt;/b>siz öldürüldünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>ev muttum: &lt;/b>veya öldünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>le magfiretun: &lt;/b>mutlaka magfiret vardir (günahlar sevaba çevrilir)&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmetun: &lt;/b>ve rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>yecmeûne: &lt;/b>onlar toplayacaklar, toplarlar"

    <string name="sozluk.003.174">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inkalebû: &lt;/b>böylece döndüler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ni'metin: &lt;/b>bir ni'met ile&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve fadlin: &lt;/b>ve bir fazl&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yemses-hum: &lt;/b>onlara dokunmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>sûun: &lt;/b>bir kötülük&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ettebeû: &lt;/b>ve tâbî oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ridvâne allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in rizasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>zû fadlin: &lt;/b>fazlin sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmin: &lt;/b>azîm, büyük"

    <string name="sozluk.003.176">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yahzun-ke: &lt;/b>ve seni mahzun etmesin&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yusâriûne: &lt;/b>kosuyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el kufri: &lt;/b>küfür konusunda&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>len yadurrû allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a asla zarar veremezler&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'an: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah diliyor, istiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ yec'ale: &lt;/b>kilmamak, yapmamak (vermemek)&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>hazzan: &lt;/b>bir haz, bir nasip&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el âhireti: &lt;/b>ahirette&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun azîmun: &lt;/b>büyük azap"

    <string name="sozluk.003.191">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yezkurûne allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'i zikrederler&lt;br />&lt;b>kiyâmen: &lt;/b>ayakta iken&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kuûden: &lt;/b>ve oturur iken&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ cunûbi-him: &lt;/b>ve yanlari üzere iken, yatarken&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yetefekkerûne: &lt;/b>ve tefekkür ederler, düsünürler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî halki es semâvâti: &lt;/b>göklerin yaratilisi hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yerler, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ halakte hâzâ: &lt;/b>Sen bunu yaratmadin&lt;br />&lt;b>bâtilân: &lt;/b>batil olarak, faydasiz, bosuna&lt;br />&lt;b>subhâne-ke: &lt;/b>Sen Subhan'sin (Seni tesbih ve tenzih ederiz)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ki-nâ: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik bizi koru&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbe en nâri: &lt;/b>atesin azabi"
    <string name="sozluk.003.192">&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-ke: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki sen&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimi&lt;br />&lt;b>tudhili en nâre: &lt;/b>atese sokarsan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kad ahzeyte-hu: &lt;/b>artik onu hakir ve rezil etmissindir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ li ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>ve zalimler için yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min ensârin: &lt;/b>yardim edenlerden bir yardimci
    <string name="sozluk.003.193">"&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-nâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>semi'nâ: &lt;/b>isittik&lt;br />&lt;b>munâdiyen: &lt;/b>nida eden, davetçi&lt;br />&lt;b>yunâdî: &lt;/b>davet ediyor&lt;br />&lt;b>li el îmâni: &lt;/b>îmâna&lt;br />&lt;b>en âminû: &lt;/b>âmenû olmak, îmân etmek&lt;br />&lt;b>bi rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbinize&lt;br />&lt;b>fe âmennâ: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece biz âmenû olduk îmân ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe agfir lenâ: &lt;/b>o halde, artik bizi magfiret et&lt;br />&lt;b>zunûbe-nâ: &lt;/b>günahlarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve keffir annâ: &lt;/b>ve bizden ört&lt;br />&lt;b>seyyiâti-nâ: &lt;/b>günahlarimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve teveffe-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bizi vefat ettir, öldür&lt;br />&lt;b>mea el ebrâri: &lt;/b>ebrar olan (Allah'a ulasan ve veli olan cennetlik) kullarinla beraber"

    <string name="sozluk.004.006">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ibtelû: &lt;/b>ve deneyin, imtihan edin&lt;br />&lt;b>el yetâmâ: &lt;/b>yetimleri&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>... oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ belagû: &lt;/b>erince, erisince&lt;br />&lt;b>en nikâha: &lt;/b>nikâh&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in ânestum: &lt;/b>bundan sonra eger hissederseniz (anlarsaniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, onlarda&lt;br />&lt;b>rusden: &lt;/b>rüst, yeterlilik, olgunluk&lt;br />&lt;b>fe idfeû: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde verin&lt;br />&lt;b>emvâle-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin mallarini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ te'kulû-hâ: &lt;/b>ve onu yemeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>isrâfen: &lt;/b>israf ederek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bidâren: &lt;/b>acele ederek, acele davranarak, acele ile&lt;br />&lt;b>en yekberû: &lt;/b>büyüyor olmalari, büyümeleri, büyürler diye&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men kâne: &lt;/b>ve kim ... oldu, ...ise&lt;br />&lt;b>ganiyyen: &lt;/b>zengin&lt;br />&lt;b>felyesta'fif (fe li yesta'fif): &lt;/b>o taktirde iffetli olsun, sakinsin, çekinsin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men kâne: &lt;/b>ve kim ... oldu, ...ise&lt;br />&lt;b>fakîran: &lt;/b>fakir&lt;br />&lt;b>felye'kul (fe li ye'kul): &lt;/b>o taktirde yesin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>iyilikle, örfe uygun olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>fe izâ defa'tum: &lt;/b>sonra, nihayet geri verdiginiz (vereceginiz) zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhim emvâle-hum: &lt;/b>onlara mallarini&lt;br />&lt;b>fe eshidû: &lt;/b>o zaman sahit tutun&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kefâ bi: &lt;/b>ve kâfidir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>hasîben: &lt;/b>hesap görücü, hesap gören olarak"
    <string name="sozluk.004.007">&lt;br />&lt;b>li er ricâli: &lt;/b>erkekler için vardir, erkeklere&lt;br />&lt;b>nasîbun: &lt;/b>nasip, pay&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden (miras, tereke)&lt;br />&lt;b>terake: &lt;/b>geriye birakti&lt;br />&lt;b>el vâlidâni: &lt;/b>ebeveyn, ana baba&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el akrabûne: &lt;/b>ve akrabalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li en nisâi: &lt;/b>ve kadinlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>nasîbun: &lt;/b>nasip, pay&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden (miras, tereke )&lt;br />&lt;b>terake: &lt;/b>geriye birakti&lt;br />&lt;b>el vâlidâni: &lt;/b>ebeveyn, ana baba&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el akrabûne: &lt;/b>ve akrabalar&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>kalle: &lt;/b>az&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>kesura: &lt;/b>çok&lt;br />&lt;b>nasîben: &lt;/b>nasip, pay&lt;br />&lt;b>mefrûdan: &lt;/b>farz kilinmis olan

    <string name="sozluk.004.019">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler, îmân ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yahillu: &lt;/b>helâl olmaz, helâl degldir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>en terisû: &lt;/b>sizin varis olmaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>en nisâe: &lt;/b>kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kerhen: &lt;/b>zorla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ ta'dulû-hunne: &lt;/b>ve onlara baski yapmayin, sikistirmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>li tezhebû: &lt;/b>gidermek, almak&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ba'di: &lt;/b>bazisini, bir kismini&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey (seyler)&lt;br />&lt;b>âteytumû-hunne: &lt;/b>onlara verdiginiz seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>en ye'tîne: &lt;/b>gelmeleri, yapmalari&lt;br />&lt;b>bi fâhisetin: &lt;/b>fuhus ile, kötülük ile&lt;br />&lt;b>mubeyyinetin: &lt;/b>açikça&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âsirû-hunne: &lt;/b>ve onlarla geçinin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>iyilikle&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>in kerihtumû-hunne: &lt;/b>eger onlardan (kadinlardan) hoslanmadinizsa&lt;br />&lt;b>fe asâ: &lt;/b>o taktirde umulur ki&lt;br />&lt;b>en tekrahû: &lt;/b>sizin kerih görmeniz, hoslanmamaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>yec'al: &lt;/b>kilar, yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onda, onun hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>hayran: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîran: &lt;/b>çok"

    <string name="sozluk.004.027">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdu: &lt;/b>diler, ister&lt;br />&lt;b>en yetûbe aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin tövbenizi kabul etmek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yurîdu: &lt;/b>ve diler, ister&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, ... olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yettebiûne: &lt;/b>tâbî oluyorlar, uyuyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>es sehevâti: &lt;/b>sehvetler, siddetli arzu, nefsin istekleri&lt;br />&lt;b>en temîlû: &lt;/b>meyletmeniz, yönelmeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>meylen: &lt;/b>meyil, yönelme&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmen: &lt;/b>büyük

    <string name="sozluk.004.029">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, ... olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, îmân ettiler, yasarken Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ te'kulû: &lt;/b>yemeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>emvâle-kum: &lt;/b>mallarinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-kum: &lt;/b>kendi aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el bâtili: &lt;/b>bâtilla, haksizlikla&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>en tekûne: &lt;/b>sizin ... olmaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ticâraten: &lt;/b>ticaret, alis veris&lt;br />&lt;b>an terâdin: &lt;/b>rizaniz, razi olmaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden, birbirinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ taktulû: &lt;/b>ve öldürmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-kum: &lt;/b>nefslerinizi, kendi kendinizi, birbirinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-kum: &lt;/b>size, size karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmen: &lt;/b>rahim"
    <string name="sozluk.004.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim ... ise&lt;br />&lt;b>yef'al: &lt;/b>yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu, bu (bunu)&lt;br />&lt;b>udvânen: &lt;/b>düsmanlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zulmen: &lt;/b>ve zulüm, haksizlik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe sevfe: &lt;/b>o taktirde yakinda&lt;br />&lt;b>nuslî-hi: &lt;/b>biz onu yaslayacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>nâran: &lt;/b>ates&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu, idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu, bu&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a (Allah için)&lt;br />&lt;b>yesîran: &lt;/b>kolay"
    <string name="sozluk.004.031">&lt;br />&lt;b>in tectenibû: &lt;/b>eger çekinirseniz, kaçinirsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>kebâira: &lt;/b>büyükler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ tunhevne: &lt;/b>yasaklandiginiz seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>nukeffir: &lt;/b>örteriz&lt;br />&lt;b>an-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>seyyiâti-kum: &lt;/b>sizin günahlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nudhil-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizi dahil ederiz, koyariz&lt;br />&lt;b>mudhalen: &lt;/b>dahil edilen yer, girilen yer, makam, giris&lt;br />&lt;b>kerîmen: &lt;/b>güzel, güzel olan, ikram olunan, serefli

    <string name="sozluk.004.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li kullin: &lt;/b>ve hepsi için, hepsini, herkesi&lt;br />&lt;b>cealnâ: &lt;/b>kildik, yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>mevâliye: &lt;/b>yakinlari, akrabadan olan mirasçilar&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min-mâ ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>terake: &lt;/b>birakti&lt;br />&lt;b>el vâlidâni: &lt;/b>ana-baba&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el akrabûne: &lt;/b>ve akrabalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar, o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>akadet: &lt;/b>akit yapti, yeminlesti, bagladi&lt;br />&lt;b>eymânu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin yeminleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe âtû-hum: &lt;/b>artik onlara verin&lt;br />&lt;b>nasîbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin nasipleri, paylari&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ... idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>her seye&lt;br />&lt;b>sehîden: &lt;/b>sahit"
    <string name="sozluk.004.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>er ricâlu: &lt;/b>erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>kavvâmûne: &lt;/b>kâim olanlar, idareciler, koruyup gözetenler&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ en nisâi: &lt;/b>kadinlar üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle, dolayisiyla&lt;br />&lt;b>faddala: &lt;/b>üstün kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'da-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin bir kismi, bazilari&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ba'din: &lt;/b>bir kismina, bazilarina, digerlerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi mâ: &lt;/b>ve sebebiyle, dolayisiyla&lt;br />&lt;b>enfekû: &lt;/b>verdiler, harcadilar&lt;br />&lt;b>min emvâli-him: &lt;/b>mallarindan, kendi mallarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe es sâlihâtu: &lt;/b>bu sebeble, bu bakimdan salih kadinlar, nefsini tezkiye eden kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kânitâtun: &lt;/b>kanitindir, saygili ve itaatkârdir&lt;br />&lt;b>hâfizâtun: &lt;/b>muhafaza edendir, koruyucudur&lt;br />&lt;b>li el gaybi: &lt;/b>gaybda, olmadigi zaman, yokken&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle, dolayisiyla&lt;br />&lt;b>hafiza: &lt;/b>korudu&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellâtî: &lt;/b>ve onlar (kadinlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>tehâfûne: &lt;/b>korkarsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>nusûze-hunne: &lt;/b>onlarin itaatsizliklerinden, bas kaldirmalarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe izû-hunne: &lt;/b>... ise onlara ögüt verin, nasihat edin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve uhcurû-hunne: &lt;/b>ve onlardan ayrilin, yaklasmayin, yalniz birakin&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el medâcii: &lt;/b>yataklarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>vadribû-hunne: &lt;/b>ve onlara vurun&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>bundan sonra, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>in ata'ne-kum: &lt;/b>eger size itaat ederlerse&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>bundan sonra, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tebgû: &lt;/b>aramayin&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhinne: &lt;/b>onlara, onlarin üzerine (aleyhine)&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîlen: &lt;/b>bir yol&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>aliyyen: &lt;/b>âli, yüce&lt;br />&lt;b>kebîran: &lt;/b>büyük"
    <string name="sozluk.004.035">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in hiftum: &lt;/b>ve eger korkarsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>sikâka: &lt;/b>ayrilik, arasinin açilmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>beyni-himâ: &lt;/b>onlarin ikisinin arasi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ib'asû: &lt;/b>o taktirde görevlendirin, gönderin&lt;br />&lt;b>hakemen: &lt;/b>bir hakem&lt;br />&lt;b>min ehli-hî: &lt;/b>onun (erkegin) ailesinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hakemen: &lt;/b>ve bir hakem&lt;br />&lt;b>min ehli-hâ: &lt;/b>onun (kadinin) ailesinden&lt;br />&lt;b>in yurîdâ: &lt;/b>eger ikisi isterse&lt;br />&lt;b>islâhan: &lt;/b>islâh etme, düzelme&lt;br />&lt;b>yuveffiki: &lt;/b>muvaffak eder, basarili kilar&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-humâ: &lt;/b>onlarin ikisinin arasi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmen: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>habîran: &lt;/b>haberdar olan"

    <string name="sozluk.004.037">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yebhalûne: &lt;/b>cimrilik ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ye'murûne: &lt;/b>ve emrederler&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el buhli: &lt;/b>cimrilik ile, cimriligi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yektumûne: &lt;/b>ve ketmederler, gizlerler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>âtâ-hum(u): &lt;/b>onlara verdi, kendilerine verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>min fadli-hî: &lt;/b>onun fazlindan, kendi fazlindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve a'tednâ: &lt;/b>ve biz hazirladik&lt;br />&lt;b>li el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirler için&lt;br />&lt;b>azâben: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>muhînen: &lt;/b>alçaltici, rüsvay edici"

    <string name="sozluk.004.041">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe keyfe: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman nasil olur, nasil olacak&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ci'nâ...(bi): &lt;/b>getirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min kulli: &lt;/b>hepsinden, her birinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ummetin: &lt;/b>ümmet&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sehîdin: &lt;/b>sahit&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ci'nâ ...(bi): &lt;/b>ve getirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>seni&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ hâulâi: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>sehîden: &lt;/b>sahit olarak"
    <string name="sozluk.004.042">&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme izin: &lt;/b>izin günü&lt;br />&lt;b>yeveddu: &lt;/b>ister, temenni eder&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler, kâfir oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ve asavû: &lt;/b>ve asi oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûle: &lt;/b>resûl, elçi&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>keske, olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>tusevvâ: &lt;/b>sevva olma, yerle bir olma&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlari, kendileri&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardu: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yektumûne: &lt;/b>ve gizleyemezler&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>hadîsen: &lt;/b>söz

    <string name="sozluk.004.056">&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>sevfe: &lt;/b>yakinda, ileride&lt;br />&lt;b>nuslî-him: &lt;/b>onlari yaslayacagiz, atacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>nâran: &lt;/b>ates&lt;br />&lt;b>kullemâ: &lt;/b>her defasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>nadicet: &lt;/b>yandi, kavruldu&lt;br />&lt;b>culûdu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin derileri&lt;br />&lt;b>beddelnâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari degistirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>culûden: &lt;/b>deriler&lt;br />&lt;b>gayre-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan baskasi, baska&lt;br />&lt;b>li yezûkû: &lt;/b>tatmalari için&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbe: &lt;/b>azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzen: &lt;/b>aziz, üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmen: &lt;/b>hüküm ve hikmet sahibi
    <string name="sozluk.004.057">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, îmân ettiler, yasarken Allah’a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>nefsi islah edici, tezkiye edici amel yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>se nudhilu-hum: &lt;/b>yakinda onlari dahil edecegiz, koyacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>cennâtin: &lt;/b>cennetler&lt;br />&lt;b>tecrî: &lt;/b>akar&lt;br />&lt;b>min tahti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun altindan&lt;br />&lt;b>el enhâru: &lt;/b>nehirler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidîne: &lt;/b>devamli kalacak olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>ebeden: &lt;/b>ebediyyen&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>ezvâcun: &lt;/b>zevceler, esler&lt;br />&lt;b>mutahharatun: &lt;/b>tertemiz, temiz olan, temiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nudhilu- hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari dahil edecegiz, koyacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>zillen: &lt;/b>gölge&lt;br />&lt;b>zalîlen: &lt;/b>devamli ve güzel gölgeli
    <string name="sozluk.004.058">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'muru-kum: &lt;/b>size emrediyor&lt;br />&lt;b>en tueddû: &lt;/b>iade etmeniz, teslim etmeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>el emânâti: &lt;/b>emanetler&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ: &lt;/b>...'e&lt;br />&lt;b>ehli-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ehli, sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve ... oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hakemtum: &lt;/b>siz hakemlik yaptiniz, hüküm verdiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne: &lt;/b>arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>en tahkumû: &lt;/b>hükmetmeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el adli: &lt;/b>adalet ile&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>niimmâ: &lt;/b>ne güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>yeizu-kum: &lt;/b>size vaaz ediyor, ögüt veriyor&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>semîan: &lt;/b>en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>basîran: &lt;/b>en iyi gören"
    <string name="sozluk.004.059">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, îmân ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>atîû: &lt;/b>itaat edin&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>atîû: &lt;/b>itaat edin&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûle: &lt;/b>resûl, elçi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ulî el emri: &lt;/b>ve idareciler, komutanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in: &lt;/b>bundan sonra eger&lt;br />&lt;b>tenâza'tum: &lt;/b>nizaya, anlasmazliga, ihtilâfa düstünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>hakkinda, konuda, hususta&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'in: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>ruddû-hu: &lt;/b>onu arz edin, götürün&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve er resûli: &lt;/b>ve resûle, elçiye&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntum: &lt;/b>eger siz ... iseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>tu'minûne: &lt;/b>îmân ediyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el yevmi el âhiri: &lt;/b>ve son güne&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ahsenu: &lt;/b>ve daha güzel, en güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>te'vîlen: &lt;/b>te'vil, yorum bakimindan"
    <string name="sozluk.004.060">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>lem tera: &lt;/b>sen görmedin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>yez'umûne: &lt;/b>zanda bulunuyorlar, zannediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>kendilerinin ... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>îmân ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>seye&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-ke: &lt;/b>senden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdûne: &lt;/b>isterler, istiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>en yetehâkemû: &lt;/b>muhakeme olmak&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ et tâgûti: &lt;/b>seytan ve onun avanesi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kad: &lt;/b>ve ... olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>umirû: &lt;/b>emrolundular&lt;br />&lt;b>en yekfurû: &lt;/b>inkâr etmek&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yurîdu: &lt;/b>ve ister, istiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>es seytânu: &lt;/b>seytan&lt;br />&lt;b>en yudille-hum: &lt;/b>onlari dalâlete düsürmek, saptirmak&lt;br />&lt;b>dalâlen: &lt;/b>dalâlet&lt;br />&lt;b>baîden: &lt;/b>uzak"
    <string name="sozluk.004.061">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve ... oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kîle: &lt;/b>denildi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>teâlev: &lt;/b>haydi gelin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ: &lt;/b>...'a&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>enzele: &lt;/b>indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ilâ: &lt;/b>ve ...'a&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûli: &lt;/b>Resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>raeyte: &lt;/b>sen gördün&lt;br />&lt;b>el munâfikîne: &lt;/b>münafiklar, iki yüzlüler&lt;br />&lt;b>yasuddûne: &lt;/b>yüz çevirip ayrilirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an-ke: &lt;/b>senden&lt;br />&lt;b>sudûden: &lt;/b>yüz çevirerek"
    <string name="sozluk.004.062">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil olur&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman, olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>esâbet-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>musîbetun: &lt;/b>bir musibet&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle, ...'dan dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>kaddemet: &lt;/b>takdim etti, yapti, isledi&lt;br />&lt;b>eydî-him: &lt;/b>onlarin elleri, kendi elleri, elleri&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>câû-ke: &lt;/b>sana geldiler&lt;br />&lt;b>yahlifûne: &lt;/b>yemin ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>in .....(illâ): &lt;/b>sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>eradnâ: &lt;/b>biz istedik&lt;br />&lt;b>(in)....illâ: &lt;/b>sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>ihsânen: &lt;/b>ihsan, iyilik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tevfîkan: &lt;/b>ve birlik, arayi bulma, birlestirme"
    <string name="sozluk.004.063">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar, ... olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>biliyor, bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kalplerinde var olan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>a'rid: &lt;/b>yüz çevir&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>vaiz-hum: &lt;/b>onlara vaaz et, ögüt ver, nasihat et&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kul: &lt;/b>ve de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>fî enfusi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin nefsleri hakinda, kendileri hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>kavlen: &lt;/b>söz&lt;br />&lt;b>belîgan: &lt;/b>belig, açik, tesirli, güzel"
    <string name="sozluk.004.064">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ erselnâ: &lt;/b>göndermedik&lt;br />&lt;b>min resûlin: &lt;/b>bir resûl, bir elçi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>....'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için, olsun diye&lt;br />&lt;b>yutâa: &lt;/b>itaat edilsin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni: &lt;/b>izni ile&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ... olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>zalemû: &lt;/b>zulmettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin nefsleri, nefsleri, kendileri&lt;br />&lt;b>câû-ke: &lt;/b>sana geldiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>istagferû: &lt;/b>istigfar ettiler, tövbe ettiler, magfiret dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>Vestagfera (ve istagfera): &lt;/b>ve istigfar etti, tövbe etti, magfiret diledi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûlu: &lt;/b>resûl, elçi&lt;br />&lt;b>le vecedû: &lt;/b>mutlaka buldular&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>tevvâben: &lt;/b>tövbeleri kabul eden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmen: &lt;/b>rahmet edici, rahmet nuru gönderen, rahim esmasi ile tecelli eden"
    <string name="sozluk.004.065">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lâ: &lt;/b>artik hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>Rabbine andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yu'minûne: &lt;/b>îmân etmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>... oluncaya kadar, olmadikça&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhakkimû-ke: &lt;/b>seni hakem tayin ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-mâ: &lt;/b>o sey hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>secera: &lt;/b>çekistiler&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>kendi aralarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yecidû: &lt;/b>bulmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî enfusi-him: &lt;/b>kendi nefslerinde, içlerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>haracen: &lt;/b>darlik, sikinti&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden, ...'dan dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>kadayte: &lt;/b>sen hüküm verdin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yusellimû: &lt;/b>ve teslim olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>teslîmen: &lt;/b>tam bir teslimiyetle"
    <string name="sozluk.004.066">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, ... olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>ennâ: &lt;/b>biz ... olduk&lt;br />&lt;b>ketebnâ: &lt;/b>yazdik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmak&lt;br />&lt;b>uktulû: &lt;/b>öldürün&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-kum: &lt;/b>kendi nefslerinizi, kendinizi, birbirinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>uhrucû: &lt;/b>çikin&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>diyâri-kum: &lt;/b>sizin (kendi) yurtlariniz, yurtlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fealû-hu: &lt;/b>onu yapmadilar&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>....'den baska, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>kalîlun: &lt;/b>biraz, pek az&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, ... olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ... olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>fealû: &lt;/b>yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>yûazûne: &lt;/b>vaaz edilir, ögüt verilir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ... idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>hayran: &lt;/b>hayirli, daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için, kendileri için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve esedde: &lt;/b>ve daha siddetli, daha kuvvetli, daha saglam&lt;br />&lt;b>tesbîten: &lt;/b>tesbit, sebat bakimindan"
    <string name="sozluk.004.067">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izen: &lt;/b>ve o zaman, ...olunca, ...olsaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>le âteynâ-hum: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka onlara verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min ledun-nâ: &lt;/b>katimizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>ecran: &lt;/b>ecir, karsilik, mükâfat&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmen: &lt;/b>azim, büyük

    <string name="sozluk.004.069">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yutii: &lt;/b>itaat eder&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve er resûle: &lt;/b>ve resûl, elçi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mea: &lt;/b>beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>en'ame: &lt;/b>ni'met verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara, kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>min en nebiyyîne: &lt;/b>nebilerden, peygamberlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es siddîkîne: &lt;/b>ve siddîklar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es suhedâi: &lt;/b>ve sehitler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sâlihîne: &lt;/b>ve salihler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hasune: &lt;/b>ne güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>rafîkan: &lt;/b>arkadas olarak, arkadas"
    <string name="sozluk.004.070">"&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>el fadlu: &lt;/b>fazl, büyük ihsan&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kefâ bi: &lt;/b>ve kâfi, yeterli&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmen: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.004.071">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, ... olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>amenu oldular, îmân ettiler, yasarken Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>huzû: &lt;/b>aliniz&lt;br />&lt;b>hizra-kum: &lt;/b>silahlariniz (muhimmatiniz, techizatiniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>infirû: &lt;/b>savasa çikin&lt;br />&lt;b>subâtin: &lt;/b>bölük bölük, bölükler halinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>infirû: &lt;/b>savasa çikin&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>topluca, toplu olarak"
    <string name="sozluk.004.072">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden bir kismi, bazilari&lt;br />&lt;b>le men: &lt;/b>mutlaka o kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>le yubattienne: &lt;/b>mutlaka yavas davranir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in: &lt;/b>sonra eger ... olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>esâbet-kum: &lt;/b>size isabet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>musîbetun: &lt;/b>bir musibet&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi, söyledi&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>oldu, olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>en'ame: &lt;/b>ni'met verdi, nimetlendirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyye: &lt;/b>bana&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>lem ekun: &lt;/b>ben olmadim&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-hum: &lt;/b>onlarla beraber, birlikte&lt;br />&lt;b>sehîden: &lt;/b>sahit, sehit"

    <string name="sozluk.004.082">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe: &lt;/b>hâlâ ... mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yetedebberûne: &lt;/b>tedebbür etmezler, tetkik edip düsünmezler, incelemezler&lt;br />&lt;b>el kur'âne: &lt;/b>Kur'ân&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ... idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>min indi: &lt;/b>katindan, yanindan&lt;br />&lt;b>gayri: &lt;/b>gayri, baska&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le vecedû: &lt;/b>mutlaka buldular (bulurlardi)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ihtilâfen: &lt;/b>ihtilâflar, ayriliklar, zitliklar, çeliski&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîran: &lt;/b>çok, birçok, pekçok"
    <string name="sozluk.004.083">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ câe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara geldigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>emrun: &lt;/b>bir emir, is, durum, haber&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>el emni: &lt;/b>eminlik, güvenlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>el havfi: &lt;/b>korku&lt;br />&lt;b>ezâû: &lt;/b>açikladilar, ifsa edip yaydilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>reddû-hu: &lt;/b>onu ilettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ: &lt;/b>...'e&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûli: &lt;/b>resûl, elçi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ilâ: &lt;/b>ve ...'e&lt;br />&lt;b>uli el emri: &lt;/b>emir sahipleri, Allah'tan emir alanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, kendilerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>le alime-hu: &lt;/b>mutlaka onu bilirlerdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yestenbitûne-hu: &lt;/b>onun (o isin) batinini, iç yüzünü, gerçegini arastirirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, onlarin arasindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev lâ: &lt;/b>ve eger olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>fadlu: &lt;/b>fazli&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmetu-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun rahmeti&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>itteba'tum: &lt;/b>tâbî oldunuz, uydunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>es seytâne: &lt;/b>seytan&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>kalîlen: &lt;/b>biraz, pek az"
    <string name="sozluk.004.084">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>kâtil: &lt;/b>savas, cihad et&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>...'da&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolu&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tukellefu: &lt;/b>ssen mükellef, sorumlu tutulmazsin&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...'den baska, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>nefse-ke: &lt;/b>senin nefsin, kendi nefsin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve harridi: &lt;/b>ve tesvik et&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler&lt;br />&lt;b>asâ: &lt;/b>umulur ki&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmak, yapmak&lt;br />&lt;b>yekuffe: &lt;/b>çeker (kuvveti, gücü, siddeti)&lt;br />&lt;b>be'se: &lt;/b>kuvvet, güç&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkar ettiler, kâfir oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>eseddu: &lt;/b>daha siddetli, daha çetin, daha güçlü&lt;br />&lt;b>be'sen: &lt;/b>kuvvet, güç olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eseddu: &lt;/b>ve daha siddetli, daha çetin, daha güçlü&lt;br />&lt;b>tenkîlen: &lt;/b>intikam, korkunç ceza"
    <string name="sozluk.004.085">"&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>yesfa': &lt;/b>sefaat eder, yardimci olur&lt;br />&lt;b>sefâaten haseneten: &lt;/b>güzel sefaat, iyilige yardim etme&lt;br />&lt;b>yekun: &lt;/b>olur&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun&lt;br />&lt;b>nasîbun: &lt;/b>pay, hisse, nasip&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yesfa': &lt;/b>sefaat eder, yardimci olur&lt;br />&lt;b>sefâaten seyyieten: &lt;/b>kötü sefaat, günah islemeye yardim etme&lt;br />&lt;b>yekun: &lt;/b>olur&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun&lt;br />&lt;b>kiflun: &lt;/b>ser için olan nasip, pay&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu, ... idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>...'a&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>her sey&lt;br />&lt;b>mukîten: &lt;/b>mukayyet olan, gözeten"

    <string name="sozluk.004.092">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve olmaz, olamaz&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ...idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'minin: &lt;/b>bir     <string name="sozluk.004.093">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yaktul: &lt;/b>öldürür&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'minen: &lt;/b>mü'min&lt;br />&lt;b>muteammiden: &lt;/b>taammüden , kasten&lt;br />&lt;b>fe cezâu-hu: &lt;/b>o taktirde onun cezasi&lt;br />&lt;b>cehennemu: &lt;/b>cehennem&lt;br />&lt;b>hâliden: &lt;/b>ebediyyen kalici&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada, içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve gadiba: &lt;/b>ve gadap etti, gazap etti, öfkelendi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve leane-hu: &lt;/b>ve ona lanet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eadde: &lt;/b>ve hazirladi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona, onun için&lt;br />&lt;b>azâben: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmen: &lt;/b>azim, büyük"

    <string name="sozluk.004.103">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, o takdirde, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>olunca, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kadaytum: &lt;/b>kada ettiniz, yerine getirdiniz, tamamladiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>es salâte: &lt;/b>namaz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe uzkurû: &lt;/b>artik zikredin&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kiyâmen: &lt;/b>ayakta iken&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kuûden: &lt;/b>ve otururken&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ cunûbi-kum: &lt;/b>ve yaniniz üzerinde, yan üstü iken, yatarken&lt;br />&lt;b>fe izâ: &lt;/b>sonra, daha sonra ...oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>itma'nentum: &lt;/b>tatmin oldunuz, güvenlige kavustunuz, emin oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ekîmu: &lt;/b>o zaman yerine getirin, erkaniyla kilin&lt;br />&lt;b>es salâte: &lt;/b>namaz&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>es salâte: &lt;/b>namaz&lt;br />&lt;b>kânet: &lt;/b>oldu, olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minlerin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>kitâben: &lt;/b>yazilmis olan, farz olan&lt;br />&lt;b>mevkûten: &lt;/b>vakitlendirilmis, vakitleri belirlenmis"
    <string name="sozluk.004.104">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tehinû: &lt;/b>gevseklik göstermeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ibtigâi: &lt;/b>arama konusunda, aramakta&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavmi: &lt;/b>kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>tekûnû: &lt;/b>siz oluyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>te'lemûne: &lt;/b>aci çekersiniz, aci duyarsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>sonra, ayrica&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'lemûne: &lt;/b>aci çekiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâ: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>te'lemûne: &lt;/b>siz aci çekiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tercûne: &lt;/b>ve ümit ediyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yercûne: &lt;/b>ümit etmiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmen: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmen: &lt;/b>hüküm ve hikmet sahibi"

    <string name="sozluk.004.120">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yeidu-hum: &lt;/b>onlara vaad eder&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yumennî-him: &lt;/b>onlara emaniyyeye, kuruntuya düsürür&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yeidu-hum(u): &lt;/b>onlara vaad etmez&lt;br />&lt;b>es seytânu: &lt;/b>seytan&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>gurûran: &lt;/b>gurur, aldatma"
    <string name="sozluk.004.121">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>me'vâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin siginacagi, barinacagi yer&lt;br />&lt;b>cehennemu: &lt;/b>cehennem&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yecidûne: &lt;/b>bulamazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>mahîsan: &lt;/b>kaçis, kaçamak, kaçis yeri"
    <string name="sozluk.004.122">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar, ...olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>amenu oldular, îmân ettiler, yasarken Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve salih amel, nefsi tezkiye edici amel islediler&lt;br />&lt;b>se nudhilu-hum: &lt;/b>onlari dahil edecegiz, koyacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>cennâtin: &lt;/b>cennetler&lt;br />&lt;b>tecrî: &lt;/b>akar&lt;br />&lt;b>min tahti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun altindan&lt;br />&lt;b>el enhâru: &lt;/b>nehirler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidîne: &lt;/b>devamli kalacak olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>ebeden: &lt;/b>ebediyyen&lt;br />&lt;b>va'de allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in vaadi&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkan: &lt;/b>hak, gerçek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim (vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>asdaku: &lt;/b>daha sadik, daha dogru&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kîlen: &lt;/b>söylenen söz, söz"
    <string name="sozluk.004.123">"&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degil, olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi emâniyyi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin emaniyyeniz ile (kuruntularinizla)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ emâniyyi: &lt;/b>ve emaniyye degil&lt;br />&lt;b>ehli el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitap ehli, kitap sahipleri&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'mel: &lt;/b>yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>sûen: &lt;/b>kötülük&lt;br />&lt;b>yucze: &lt;/b>cezalandirilir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yecid: &lt;/b>ve bulamaz&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun için, kendisi için&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...den&lt;br />&lt;b>dûni: &lt;/b>baska&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>veliyyen: &lt;/b>veli, dost&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ: &lt;/b>ve olmaz, degil, yok&lt;br />&lt;b>nasîran: &lt;/b>yardimci"

    <string name="sozluk.004.127">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yesteftûneke: &lt;/b>senden fetva (bilgi) istiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî en nisâi: &lt;/b>kadinlar hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yuftî-kum: &lt;/b>size fetva veriyor&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hinne: &lt;/b>onlar hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>yutlâ: &lt;/b>tilâvet olunan, okunup açiklanan&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitapta&lt;br />&lt;b>fî yetâme: &lt;/b>yetimler hakkinda, konusunda&lt;br />&lt;b>en nisâi: &lt;/b>kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>elletî: &lt;/b>ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tu'tûne-hunne: &lt;/b>onlara vermiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>kutibe: &lt;/b>yazildi, farz kilindi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehunne: &lt;/b>onlar, onlara, onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tergabûne: &lt;/b>ve ragbet ediyorsunuz, arzuluyorsunuz, istiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>en tenkihû-hunne: &lt;/b>onlari nikâhlamaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mustad'afîne: &lt;/b>ve zayif olanlar, aciz olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min el vildâni: &lt;/b>çocuklardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>en tekûmû: &lt;/b>ikame etmeniz, hakkiyla, geregi üzere yerine getirmeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>li el yetâmâ: &lt;/b>yetimler için, yetimlere&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kisti: &lt;/b>adalet ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey, ve ne&lt;br />&lt;b>tef'alû: &lt;/b>yaparsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min hayrin: &lt;/b>hayirdan, hayir olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmen: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.004.128">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger, sayet, ... ise, olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>imraetun: &lt;/b>bir kadin&lt;br />&lt;b>hâfet: &lt;/b>korktu&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'li-hâ: &lt;/b>kendi kocasindan&lt;br />&lt;b>nusûzen: &lt;/b>geçimsizlik, ilgisizlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>i'râdan: &lt;/b>yüz çevirme&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ cunâha: &lt;/b>günah yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhimâ: &lt;/b>ikisinin üzerine, ikisine&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmak&lt;br />&lt;b>yuslihâ: &lt;/b>islah edilmesi, düzeltilmesi, uzlasma&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-humâ: &lt;/b>onlarin ikisinin arasi&lt;br />&lt;b>sulhan: &lt;/b>sulh yapilarak, anlasma yapilarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sulhu: &lt;/b>ve sulh, baris, anlasma&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayirli, daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>ve uhdirati: &lt;/b>ve hazir kilindi&lt;br />&lt;b>el enfusu: &lt;/b>nefsler&lt;br />&lt;b>es suhha: &lt;/b>hirs, cimrilik, kiskançlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger, sayet, ... ise, olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhsinû: &lt;/b>ihsan edersiniz, ihsanla davranirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tettekû: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olursunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>siz yaparsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>habîran: &lt;/b>en iyi haberdar olan, haberdar olan"
    <string name="sozluk.004.129">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>len testatîû: &lt;/b>asla güç yetiremezsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmak&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'dilû: &lt;/b>adaletle davranirsiniz, adaleti saglarsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne: &lt;/b>arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>en nisâi: &lt;/b>kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger olsa bile&lt;br />&lt;b>harastum: &lt;/b>hirsli oldunuz, çok gayret ettiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o halde, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ temîlû: &lt;/b>meyletmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>kulle: &lt;/b>bütünüyle,hepsi, tamamen&lt;br />&lt;b>el meyli: &lt;/b>meyil, sevgi, ilgi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>tezerû-hâ: &lt;/b>onu terkedersiniz, birakirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>el muallakati: &lt;/b>muallakta, boslukta&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger, olsa, ... ise&lt;br />&lt;b>tuslihû: &lt;/b>islah edersiniz, arayi düzeltirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tettekû: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûran: &lt;/b>Gafur, magfiret eden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmen: &lt;/b>Rahim, merhamet eden, Rahim esmasi ile tacelli eden, rahmet nuru gönderen"

    <string name="sozluk.004.132">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'in, Allah'a ait&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey, seyler, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semâlarda, göklerde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey, seyler, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>arzda, yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kefâ bi: &lt;/b>ve kâfi, yeterli, yeter&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>vekîlen: &lt;/b>vekil olarak"

    <string name="sozluk.004.134">&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse, kisi ...ise&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ... dir&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdu: &lt;/b>istiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâbe: &lt;/b>sevap (nimet)&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde, halbu ki, oysa, olsa bile&lt;br />&lt;b>inde: &lt;/b>yaninda, katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâbu: &lt;/b>sevap&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el âhirati: &lt;/b>ve ahiret&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>semîan: &lt;/b>semî, en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>basîran: &lt;/b>basîr, en iyi gören
    <string name="sozluk.004.135">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, ... olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, îmân ettiler, yasarken Allah’a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>kûnû: &lt;/b>olun&lt;br />&lt;b>kavvamîne: &lt;/b>himaye edenler, hakkiyla yerine getirenler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kisti: &lt;/b>adaleti&lt;br />&lt;b>suhedâe: &lt;/b>sahitler&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, olsa bile&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ enfusi-kum: &lt;/b>kendi nefslerinize, kendinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>el vâlideyni: &lt;/b>ana-baba&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el akrabîne: &lt;/b>ve yakinlar, akrabalar&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, ...da olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>yekun: &lt;/b>olur&lt;br />&lt;b>ganiyyen: &lt;/b>zengin&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>fakîran: &lt;/b>fakir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde, oysa, halbuki&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>evlâ: &lt;/b>daha yakin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-himâ: &lt;/b>ikisine&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde, oysa, halbuki&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tettebiû: &lt;/b>tâbî olmayin, uymayin&lt;br />&lt;b>el hevâ: &lt;/b>hevesler, nefsin istekleri&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmak&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'dilû: &lt;/b>adaletle davrama&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger, olsa, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>telvû: &lt;/b>dilinizi egip bükersiniz, sözü degistirirsiniz, dogruyu söylemezsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>tu'ridû: &lt;/b>yüz çevirirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>habîran: &lt;/b>haberdar olan"
    <string name="sozluk.004.136">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, ...olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, îmân ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>âminû: &lt;/b>amenu olun, îmân edin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûli-hî: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kitâbi: &lt;/b>ve kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>nezzele: &lt;/b>indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ resûli-hî: &lt;/b>onun resûlüne, kendi resûlüne, resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kitâbi: &lt;/b>ve kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>enzele: &lt;/b>indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yekfur: &lt;/b>inkâr eder&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'i&lt;br />&lt;b>ve melâiketi-hî: &lt;/b>ve onun melekleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kutubi-hî: &lt;/b>ve onun kitaplari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rusuli-hî: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlleri, elçileri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el yevmi el âhiri: &lt;/b>ve âhir gün, son gün&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kad: &lt;/b>o taktirde olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>dalle: &lt;/b>sapti&lt;br />&lt;b>dalâlen: &lt;/b>dalâlet&lt;br />&lt;b>baîden: &lt;/b>uzak"

    <string name="sozluk.004.141">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, ... olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yeterabbesûne: &lt;/b>gözlüyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-kum: &lt;/b>sizi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyle ki, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>in kâne: &lt;/b>sayet, eger oldu ise&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>fethun: &lt;/b>bir fetih&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>lem nekun: &lt;/b>biz olmadik&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-kum: &lt;/b>sizinle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>in kâne: &lt;/b>sayet, eger oldu ise&lt;br />&lt;b>li el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirler için, kâfirlere&lt;br />&lt;b>nasîbun: &lt;/b>bir nasip&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>lem nestahviz: &lt;/b>biz kaplamadik, siper olmadik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size, sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nemna'-kum: &lt;/b>ve size ... olmasina mani olduk&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yahkumu: &lt;/b>hükmeder, hükmedecek&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme el kiyâmeti: &lt;/b>kiyâmet günü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>len yec'ale: &lt;/b>asla yapmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>li el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirlere&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler üzerine, mü'minlere karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîlen: &lt;/b>bir yol"

    <string name="sozluk.004.148">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuhibbu: &lt;/b>sevmez&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>el cehra: &lt;/b>açikça, açik olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>bi es sûi: &lt;/b>kötüyü, fenayi&lt;br />&lt;b>min el kavli: &lt;/b>sözden, sözün&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>zulime: &lt;/b>zulmedildi, zulum yapildi, haksizliga ugratildi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>semîan: &lt;/b>en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmen: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.004.149">"&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, sayet, olsa, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>tubdû: &lt;/b>açiklarsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>hayran: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya, ya da&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhfû-hu: &lt;/b>onu gizlersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya, ya da&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'fû an: &lt;/b>siz affedersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>sûin: &lt;/b>kötülük, fenalik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>afuvven: &lt;/b>affeden, affedici&lt;br />&lt;b>kadîran: &lt;/b>kaadir, kudret sahibi, gücü yeten"

    <string name="sozluk.004.164">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rusulen: &lt;/b>ve resûller&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>kasasnâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari kissa ettik, anlattik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rusulen: &lt;/b>ve resûller&lt;br />&lt;b>lem naksus-hum: &lt;/b>onlari kissa etmedik, anlatmadik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kelleme: &lt;/b>ve konustu&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsâ: &lt;/b>Hz.     <string name="sozluk.005.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey!&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>yasarken Allah'a ulasmayi, teslim olmayi dileyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>evfû: &lt;/b>ifâ edin, yerine getirin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ukûdi: &lt;/b>akitleri, anlasmalari&lt;br />&lt;b>uhillet: &lt;/b>helal kilindi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>behîmetu: &lt;/b>dört ayakli hayvanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el en'âmi: &lt;/b>deve, sigir veya davar gibi hayvanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ mâ yutlâ: &lt;/b>okunacak seyler hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra: &lt;/b>disinda, baska, diger&lt;br />&lt;b>muhilli es saydi: &lt;/b>helal kilinan av, avlama&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve, siz&lt;br />&lt;b>hurumun: &lt;/b>hac veya umre için ihramli olmak&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yahkumu: &lt;/b>hükmeder, hüküm verir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yurîdu: &lt;/b>ne dilerse, diledigi sey"
    <string name="sozluk.005.002">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey!&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>yasarken Allah'a ulasmayi, teslim olmayi dileyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tuhillû: &lt;/b>size />&lt;b>es sehre el harâme: &lt;/b>haram ay,hürmet edilen,yasak edilen ay&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ: &lt;/b>ve degil, olmaz, olmamak, yapmamak&lt;br />&lt;b>el hedye: &lt;/b>kurbanlik hayvanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmmîne: &lt;/b>eminligine, güvenligine, güvenirligine&lt;br />&lt;b>el beyte el harâme: &lt;/b>hürmet edilen ev, yasaklarin uygulandigi ev (Beyt el Harâm, Kâbe)&lt;br />&lt;b>yebtegûne: &lt;/b>isterler&lt;br />&lt;b>fadlan: &lt;/b>fazil&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-him: &lt;/b>Rabb'lerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ridvânen: &lt;/b>ve riza&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve o zaman, ...oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>haleltum: &lt;/b>ihramdan çiktiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fastâdû (fe istâdû): &lt;/b>artik avlanin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yecrîmenne-kum: &lt;/b>ve sakin size curum yaptirmasin, sakin sizi suça sevk etmesin&lt;br />&lt;b>seneânu: &lt;/b>kin&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim, topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>en saddû-kum: &lt;/b>sizi alikoymalari&lt;br />&lt;b>an(i) el mescidi el harâmi: &lt;/b>Mescidi Haram'dan&lt;br />&lt;b>en ta'tedû: &lt;/b>zulmetmenize, haddi asmaniza, hakka tecavüz etmenize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve teâvenû: &lt;/b>ve yardimlasin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el birri: &lt;/b>birr üzerine, iyilik üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve et takvâ: &lt;/b>ve takva&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ teâvenû: &lt;/b>ve yardimlasmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el ismi: &lt;/b>günah üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el udvâni: &lt;/b>ve düsmanlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekû allâhe: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a (c.c.) karsi takvâ sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah (c.c.)&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdu el ikâbi: &lt;/b>azabi siddetli"
    <string name="sozluk.005.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>hurrimet: &lt;/b>haram kilindi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum(u): &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize, size&lt;br />&lt;b>el meytetu: &lt;/b>ölü, kesilmeksizin ölen     <string name="sozluk.005.004">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yes'elûne-ke: &lt;/b>sana soruyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ zâ uhille lehum: &lt;/b>onlara, (kendilerine) nelerin helal kilindigi&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>uhille lekum(u): &lt;/b>sizin için, size helal kilindi&lt;br />&lt;b>et tayyibâtu: &lt;/b>temiz olanlar, helal olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ allemtum: &lt;/b>ve ögrettiginiz sey&lt;br />&lt;b>min el cevârihi: &lt;/b>av avlamak için yetistirilen yirtici hayvanlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>mukellibîne: &lt;/b>\"avci hayvan\" (avci köpek) yetistirenler&lt;br />&lt;b>tuallimûnehunne: &lt;/b>onlara ögrettiniz (yetistirdiniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ) alleme-kum(u): &lt;/b>size ögrettigi seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>Allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah (c.c.)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kulû: &lt;/b>o halde, artik yiyin&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ) emsekne: &lt;/b>tutugu seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve uzkurû: &lt;/b>ve zikredin, anin&lt;br />&lt;b>isme Allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in (c.c.) ismini&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>onun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekû allâhe: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a (c.c.) karsi takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>inne Allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah (c.c.)&lt;br />&lt;b>serî'u el hisâbi: &lt;/b>hesabi çabuk gören"

    <string name="sozluk.005.011">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey!&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar, yasarken Allâh'a ulasmayi, teslim olmayi dileyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>uzkurû: &lt;/b>zikredin, anin, hatirlayin!&lt;br />&lt;b>ni'mete allâhi: &lt;/b>Allâh'in (c.c.) nimetini&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>iz hemme: &lt;/b>yeltendigi zaman, hamlettigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmun: &lt;/b>bir kavim, bir topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>en yebsutû: &lt;/b>uzatmaya&lt;br />&lt;b>ileykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>eydiye-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin elleri, ellerini&lt;br />&lt;b>fe keffe: &lt;/b>o zaman men etti, çekti&lt;br />&lt;b>eydiye-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin elleri, ellerini&lt;br />&lt;b>an-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekû Allâhe: &lt;/b>ve Allâh'a karsi takvâ sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ Allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allâh'a (cc.)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o halde, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>li yetevekkeli: &lt;/b>tevekkül etsinler!&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"

    <string name="sozluk.005.013">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe bimâ nakdi-him: &lt;/b>ve de onlarin bozmalarindan dolayi, sebebi ile&lt;br />&lt;b>mîsâka-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin misâklari, misâklarini&lt;br />&lt;b>leannâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari lanetledik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cealnâ: &lt;/b>ve yaptik, kildik&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalplerini&lt;br />&lt;b>kâsiyeten: &lt;/b>kaskati, karanlik, afetlerle dolu&lt;br />&lt;b>yuharrifûne: &lt;/b>tahrif ederler, mânâlarini bozarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el kelime: &lt;/b>kelime&lt;br />&lt;b>an mevâdii-hi: &lt;/b>onu yerlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nesû: &lt;/b>ve unuttular&lt;br />&lt;b>hazzan: &lt;/b>bir pay, bir hisse (bir ögüt)&lt;br />&lt;b>min mâ zukkirû bi hi: &lt;/b>onunla uyarildiklari seyden (nasihat edilen, hatirlatilan)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tezâlu: &lt;/b>ve zail olmaz, sürekli, devamli olur, devam eder&lt;br />&lt;b>tettaliu: &lt;/b>muttali olursun, maruz kalirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ hâinetin: &lt;/b>hiyanete&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ kalîlen: &lt;/b>çok azi hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>fa'fu an-hum: &lt;/b>yine de onlari affet&lt;br />&lt;b>vasfah: &lt;/b>ve musamaha göster, hosgör&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allâh (c.c.)&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhibbu: &lt;/b>sever&lt;br />&lt;b>el muhsinîne: &lt;/b>muhsinleri"

    <string name="sozluk.005.026">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inne-hâ: &lt;/b>artik muhakkak ki o (orasi)&lt;br />&lt;b>muharremetun: &lt;/b>haram kilinmis&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>erbaîne seneten: &lt;/b>kirk sene&lt;br />&lt;b>yetîhûne fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde saskin dolasacaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lâ te'se: &lt;/b>artik yeise kapilma, üzülme, müteessir olma&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el kavmi: &lt;/b>kavme&lt;br />&lt;b>el fâsikîne: &lt;/b>fâsiklar"
    <string name="sozluk.005.027">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve utlu aleyhim: &lt;/b>ve, onlara tilavet et, oku!&lt;br />&lt;b>nebee ibney âdeme: &lt;/b>Hz. Adem'in iki oglunun haberini, kissasini&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hakk ile&lt;br />&lt;b>iz karrabâ kurbânen: &lt;/b>ikisini Allâh'a yaklastiracak birer kurban sunduklari zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>fe tukubbile: &lt;/b>o zaman kabul edilir&lt;br />&lt;b>min ehadi himâ: &lt;/b>ikisinin birinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yutekabbel: &lt;/b>ve kabul edilmez&lt;br />&lt;b>min el âhari: &lt;/b>digerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle le aktulenne-ke: &lt;/b>seni mutlaka öldürecegim dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>yetekabbelu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allâh (c.c.) kabul eder&lt;br />&lt;b>min el muttekîne: &lt;/b>takvâ sahiplerinden"
    <string name="sozluk.005.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>le in besadte: &lt;/b>gerçekten eger sen uzatirsan&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyye: &lt;/b>bana&lt;br />&lt;b>yede-ke: &lt;/b>senin elin, elin&lt;br />&lt;b>li taktule-nî: &lt;/b>beni öldürmek için&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ene bi bâsitin: &lt;/b>ben uzatacak degilim&lt;br />&lt;b>yediye ileyke: &lt;/b>elimi sana&lt;br />&lt;b>li aktule-ke: &lt;/b>seni öldürmek için&lt;br />&lt;b>innî ehâfu Allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben Allâh (c.c.)'dan korkarim&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe el âlemîne: &lt;/b>âlemlerin Rabb'i"
