    <string name="sozluk.006.154">"&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>âteynâ: &lt;/b>biz verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsa: &lt;/b>Musa (A.S)&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>tamâmen: &lt;/b>tamamlayici olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ellezî: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ahsene: &lt;/b>ahsen olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tafsîlen: &lt;/b>ve ayri ayri açiklayan&lt;br />&lt;b>li kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huden: &lt;/b>hidayete erdiren&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmeten: &lt;/b>ve rahmet olan&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi likâi: &lt;/b>kavusmaya, ulasmaya&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-him: &lt;/b>Rab'leri&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inanirlar, îmân ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.006.155">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hâza: &lt;/b>ve bu&lt;br />&lt;b>kitâbun: &lt;/b>kitaptir&lt;br />&lt;b>enzelnâ-hu: &lt;/b>onu biz indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>mubârakun: &lt;/b>mübarek&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>ittebiû-hu: &lt;/b>ona tâbî olun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekû: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>turhamûne: &lt;/b>rahmet olunursunuz

    <string name="sozluk.007.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ faalû: &lt;/b>yaptiklari zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>fâhiseten: &lt;/b>kötü, çirkin bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>veced-nâ: &lt;/b>biz bulduk&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhâ: &lt;/b>onun üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>âbâe-nâ: &lt;/b>atalarimizi, babalarimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>emere-nâ: &lt;/b>bize emretti&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ye'muru: &lt;/b>emretmez&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el fahsâi: &lt;/b>fuhsu, kötülügü, çirkinligi&lt;br />&lt;b>e tekûlûne: &lt;/b>... mi söylüyorsunuz?&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>bir seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmiyorsunuz (bilmediginiz)"

    <string name="sozluk.007.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ferîkan: &lt;/b>bir grup, bir kisim&lt;br />&lt;b>hadâ: &lt;/b>hidayete erdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>ferîkan: &lt;/b>bir grup, bir kismi&lt;br />&lt;b>hakka: &lt;/b>hak etti, hak oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim ed dalâletu: &lt;/b>üzerlerine dalâlet&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum ettehazû es seyâtîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar seytani ... edindiler&lt;br />&lt;b>evliyâe: &lt;/b>velîler, dostlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yahsebûne: &lt;/b>ve zannederler, zannediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin oldugunu, kendilerinin oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>muhtedûne: &lt;/b>hidayete ermis olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.031">&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ benî âdeme: &lt;/b>ey Âdemogullari&lt;br />&lt;b>huzû: &lt;/b>aliniz&lt;br />&lt;b>zînete-kum: &lt;/b>ziynetleriniz, süsleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>inde: &lt;/b>yaninda&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli: &lt;/b>her, hepsi, bütünü&lt;br />&lt;b>mescidin: &lt;/b>namaz kilinan yer, mescid&lt;br />&lt;b>kulû: &lt;/b>yeyiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve isrebû: &lt;/b>ve içiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tusrifû: &lt;/b>ve israf etmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuhibbu: &lt;/b>sevmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el musrifîne: &lt;/b>müsrifler, israf edenler
    <string name="sozluk.007.032">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de (ki)&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>harrame: &lt;/b>haram kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>zînete allâhi elletî: &lt;/b>Allah'in ziyneti ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>ahrace: &lt;/b>çikardi&lt;br />&lt;b>li ibâdi-hi: &lt;/b>kullari için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve et tayyibâti: &lt;/b>ve temiz, helâl olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min er rizki: &lt;/b>riziktan&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de (ki)&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>îmân edenler, âmenû olan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayatinda&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlisaten: &lt;/b>has, özellikle&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme el kiyâmeti: &lt;/b>kiyâmet günü&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>nufassilu el âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetleri ayri ayri açikliyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim için&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>biliyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>harrame: &lt;/b>haram kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbiye: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>el fevâhise: &lt;/b>kötülükler, günahlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ zahere: &lt;/b>açikta olan sey&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ batane: &lt;/b>gizli olan sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el isme: &lt;/b>ve günah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el bagye: &lt;/b>ve haddi asma, isyan, zulüm&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayri el hakki: &lt;/b>haksiz yere&lt;br />&lt;b>en tusrikû: &lt;/b>ortak kosmaniz, sirk kosmaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lem yunezzil: &lt;/b>indirmedigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>sultânen: &lt;/b>bir sultan, huccet, bir delil&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en tekûlû: &lt;/b>ve söylemeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lâ ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmediginiz bir seyi"

    <string name="sozluk.007.038">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle edhulû: &lt;/b>girin dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içine, arasina&lt;br />&lt;b>umemin: &lt;/b>ümmetler, topluluklar&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>oldu, olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>halet: &lt;/b>gelip geçti&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-kum: &lt;/b>sizden öncekilerden, sizden önceki&lt;br />&lt;b>min el cinni: &lt;/b>cinlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el insi: &lt;/b>ve insanlar(dan)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî en nâri: &lt;/b>atesin içinde, ateste&lt;br />&lt;b>kullemâ: &lt;/b>her defasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>dehalet: &lt;/b>girdi, dahil oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>ummetun: &lt;/b>ümmet, topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>leanet: &lt;/b>lânetledi&lt;br />&lt;b>uhte-hâ: &lt;/b>kardesleri&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ eddârakû: &lt;/b>ard arda biraraya geldikleri zaman, gelince&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlet: &lt;/b>dedi (dediler)&lt;br />&lt;b>uhrâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin sonrakileri&lt;br />&lt;b>li ûlâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin öncekileri için&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>hâulâi: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>edallû-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi saptirdilar, dalâlete düsürdüler, dalâlette biraktilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>âti-him: &lt;/b>onlara ver&lt;br />&lt;b>azâben: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>di'fen: &lt;/b>iki misli, iki kat&lt;br />&lt;b>min en nâri: &lt;/b>atesten&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>li kullin: &lt;/b>herkes için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>di'fun: &lt;/b>iki misli, iki kat&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>siz bilmezsiniz"

    <string name="sozluk.007.042">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olan, îmân eden kimseler (hayatta iken Allah'a ulasmayi dileyenler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve salih amel isleyenler (nefs tezkiyesi yapanlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ nukellifu: &lt;/b>sorumlu tutmayiz&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsen: &lt;/b>nefs, kisi, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, yalniz, ...’den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>vus'a-hâ: &lt;/b>onun gücü, kapasitesi&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbu el cenneti: &lt;/b>cennet ehli, halki&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidûne: &lt;/b>ebedî kalanlar, kalacak olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.043">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve neza'nâ: &lt;/b>ve çekip aldik&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sudûri-him: &lt;/b>onlarin gögüslerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...den&lt;br />&lt;b>gillin: &lt;/b>kin, adavet, haset, ..... gibi nefsin kalbinin afetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>tecrî: &lt;/b>akar&lt;br />&lt;b>min tahti-him: &lt;/b>onlarin altlarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>el enhâru: &lt;/b>nehirler&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>el hamdu: &lt;/b>hamd&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi ellezî: &lt;/b>Allah'a ki O&lt;br />&lt;b>hedâ-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi hidayete ulastirdi, bizi hidayet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>li hâzâ: &lt;/b>buna&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kun-nâ: &lt;/b>ve biz olmadik, olmazdik&lt;br />&lt;b>li nehtediye: &lt;/b>bizim hidayete ermemiz&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>en hedâ-na allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in bizi hidayete erdirmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekad: &lt;/b>andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>câet: &lt;/b>geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>rusulu: &lt;/b>Resûller, elçiler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimizin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>nûdû: &lt;/b>nida olunurlar (seslenilirler)&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmak (mastar eki)&lt;br />&lt;b>tilkum: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>el cennetu: &lt;/b>cennet&lt;br />&lt;b>ûristumû-hâ: &lt;/b>ona varis kilindiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>sey ile, sebebiyle, dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapmis olduklariniz"
    <string name="sozluk.007.044">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nâdâ: &lt;/b>ve seslendiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbu el cenneti: &lt;/b>cennet ehli, halki&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbe en nâri: &lt;/b>ates ehli, halki&lt;br />&lt;b>en kad veced-nâ: &lt;/b>biz bulduk&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ vâade-nâ: &lt;/b>biz vaadettigi seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkan: &lt;/b>hak olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece, artik, ... de&lt;br />&lt;b>hel: &lt;/b>mi, mu?&lt;br />&lt;b>vecedtum: &lt;/b>siz buldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ vaade: &lt;/b>vaad ettigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkan: &lt;/b>hak olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>neam: &lt;/b>evet&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ezzene: &lt;/b>o zaman açikça bildirdi, ilân etti, seslendi&lt;br />&lt;b>muezzinun: &lt;/b>müezzin, ilân eden, seslenmekle görevli kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>en lâ'netu allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in lâneti olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalimlerin üzerine"
    <string name="sozluk.007.045">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yasuddûne: &lt;/b>alikoyarlar, mani olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolundan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yebgûne-hâ: &lt;/b>ve onun ... olmasini isterler&lt;br />&lt;b>ivecen: &lt;/b>egrilik, egri, kusurlu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el âhirati: &lt;/b>ahireti&lt;br />&lt;b>kâfirûne: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.046">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve beyne-humâ: &lt;/b>ve ikisi arasinda (vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>hicâbun: &lt;/b>bir perde (duvar)&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el a'râfi: &lt;/b>A'raf (cennet-cehennem arasindaki yüksek tepelerin) üstünde (arf: yüksek tepe, a’raf: yüksek tepeler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ricâlun: &lt;/b>adamlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'rifûne: &lt;/b>tanirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kullen: &lt;/b>hepsini&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sîmâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari simalari ile, simalarindan, yüzlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nâdev: &lt;/b>ve nida ettiler, seslendiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbe el cenneti: &lt;/b>cennet halkina, ehline&lt;br />&lt;b>en selâmun aleykum: &lt;/b>selâmlanmak sizin üzerinize olsun, selâm sizin üzerinize olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yedhulû-hâ: &lt;/b>henüz oraya dahil olmadilar, girmediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yatme'ûne: &lt;/b>ümit ederler, dilerler, isterler"

    <string name="sozluk.007.054">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu ellezî: &lt;/b>Allah'tir ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka: &lt;/b>yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gök katlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sitteti eyyâmin: &lt;/b>alti günde&lt;br />&lt;b>summe istevâ: &lt;/b>sonra istiva etti&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el arsi: &lt;/b>arsa&lt;br />&lt;b>yugsî: &lt;/b>örtülür&lt;br />&lt;b>el leyle: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>en nehâre: &lt;/b>gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>yatlubu-hu: &lt;/b>onu talep eder, takip eder&lt;br />&lt;b>hasîsen: &lt;/b>süratli, devamli&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es semse: &lt;/b>ve günes&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kamere: &lt;/b>ve ay&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en nucûme: &lt;/b>ve yildizlar&lt;br />&lt;b>musahharâtin: &lt;/b>musahhar, emre âmade, boyun egmislerdir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi emri-hi: &lt;/b>onun emrine&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ: &lt;/b>degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu el halku: &lt;/b>yaratmak onundur (ona mahsustur)&lt;br />&lt;b>vel emru: &lt;/b>ve emir&lt;br />&lt;b>tebârake allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah sani yücedir, mukaddestir, mübarektir&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu el âlemîne: &lt;/b>âlemlerin Rabbi"

    <string name="sozluk.007.065">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ilâ âdin: &lt;/b>ve Ad’a, Ad kavmine&lt;br />&lt;b>ehâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kardesi&lt;br />&lt;b>hûden: &lt;/b>Hud (as)&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ kavmi: &lt;/b>ey kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>u'budû allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a kul olun&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min ilâhin: &lt;/b>bir ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>gayru-hu: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe: &lt;/b>hâlâ ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tettekûne: &lt;/b>takva sahibi olmazsiniz, olmayacaksiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.007.066">&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>el meleu ellezîne: &lt;/b>ileri gelen kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler, küfredenler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kavminden, kendi kavminden&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>le nerâ-ke: &lt;/b>mutlaka, gerçekten seni görüyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sefâhetin: &lt;/b>bir sefihligin (aptalligin) içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve innâ: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>le nezunnu-ke: &lt;/b>biz seni mutlaka, kesinlikle zannediyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>min el kâzibîne: &lt;/b>yalancilardan

    <string name="sozluk.007.084">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emtar-nâ: &lt;/b>ve yagmur yagdirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>matarâ: &lt;/b>(azab) yagmur&lt;br />&lt;b>fenzur (fe unzur): &lt;/b>artik bak&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âkibetu el mucrimîne: &lt;/b>mücrimlerin akibeti, suçlularin sonu
    <string name="sozluk.007.085">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ilâ medyene: &lt;/b>ve Medyen'e&lt;br />&lt;b>ehâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kardesi&lt;br />&lt;b>suaybâ: &lt;/b>Suayb&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ kavmi: &lt;/b>ey kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>u'budû allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a kul olun&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min ilâhin: &lt;/b>bir ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>gayru-hu: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>câet-kum: &lt;/b>size geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyinetun: &lt;/b>bir beyyine, bir delil, ispat edici bir açiklama&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe evfû: &lt;/b>artik vefa edin, yapin&lt;br />&lt;b>el keyle: &lt;/b>ölçü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mîzâne: &lt;/b>ve mizan, tarti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tebhasû: &lt;/b>eksiltmeyin, hakkini vermemezlik yapmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>esyâe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin esyalari (sahip olduklari seyler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tufsidû: &lt;/b>ve fesat çikartmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>islâhi-hâ: &lt;/b>onun islâh olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlikum hayrun: &lt;/b>iste bu hayirlidir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntum mu'minîne: &lt;/b>eger müminler, inananlar iseniz"
    <string name="sozluk.007.086">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tak'udû: &lt;/b>ve oturmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kulli sirâtin: &lt;/b>her yola, tüm yollarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>tû'idûne: &lt;/b>vaad ediyorsunuz (negatif vaad), tehdit ediyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tasuddûne: &lt;/b>ve mani oluyorsunuz, engelliyorsunuz, men ediyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>an sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolundan&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>âmene: &lt;/b>inandi, amenu oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tebgûne-hâ: &lt;/b>ve onda ariyorsunuz, istiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ivecen: &lt;/b>egrilik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve uzkurû: &lt;/b>ve hatirlayin&lt;br />&lt;b>iz kuntum kalîlen: &lt;/b>siz az idiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kessere-kum: &lt;/b>sonra sizi çogaltti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve unzurû: &lt;/b>ve bakin (ibret alin)&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âkibetu: &lt;/b>son, sonuç&lt;br />&lt;b>el mufsidîne: &lt;/b>fesat çikaranlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.087">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in kâne: &lt;/b>ve eger olursa, ... ise&lt;br />&lt;b>tâifetun: &lt;/b>bir taife, grup, kisim&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden, içinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ellezî: &lt;/b>... ki ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ursiltu: &lt;/b>gönderildim&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tâifetun: &lt;/b>ve bir taife, grup, kisim&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yu'minû: &lt;/b>inanmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe usbirû: &lt;/b>o zaman sabredin&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>yahkume allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah hükmünü verir&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-nâ: &lt;/b>aramizda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve O&lt;br />&lt;b>hayru el hâkimîn: &lt;/b>hüküm verenlerin en hayirlisi"
    <string name="sozluk.007.088">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>el meleu: &lt;/b>ileri gelenler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne estekberû: &lt;/b>kibirlenen kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kavminden, kendi kavminden&lt;br />&lt;b>le nuhrice-enne-ke: &lt;/b>seni mutlaka çikaracagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ suaybu: &lt;/b>ey Suayb (as)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseleri&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-ke: &lt;/b>seninle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>min karyeti-nâ: &lt;/b>sehrimizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya, yahut, ya da&lt;br />&lt;b>le te'ûdu-enne: &lt;/b>mutlaka dönersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî milleti-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim milletimize, dinimize&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>e ve lev: &lt;/b>ve ... ise de mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>kun-nâ: &lt;/b>biz olduk&lt;br />&lt;b>kârihîne: &lt;/b>hoslanmayanlar, kerih görenler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.089">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kad ifterey-nâ: &lt;/b>iftira etmis oluruz&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>keziben: &lt;/b>yalanla&lt;br />&lt;b>in udnâ: &lt;/b>eger dönersek&lt;br />&lt;b>fî milleti-kum: &lt;/b>sizin milletinize (dîninize)&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman, ... olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>neccey-nâ allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah bizi kurtardi&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ yekûnu: &lt;/b>ve olamaz, olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bizim, bizim için&lt;br />&lt;b>en neûde: &lt;/b>geri dönmemiz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>oraya&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, yalniz, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>en yesâe allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in dilemesi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>vesia: &lt;/b>kapsadi, içine aldi, ihata etti, kusatti&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>kulle sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmen: &lt;/b>ilimle&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>tevekkel-nâ: &lt;/b>biz tevekkül ettik, güvendik&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ iftah: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz aç, ayir&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim aramizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve beyne kavmi-nâ: &lt;/b>ve kavmimizin arasini&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ente: &lt;/b>ve sen&lt;br />&lt;b>hayru el fâtihîne: &lt;/b>hüküm verenlerin, fethedenlerin, fatihlerin, açanlarin en hayirlisi"
    <string name="sozluk.007.090">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>el meleu: &lt;/b>ileri gelenler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler, kâfir oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>min kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kavminden, kendi kavminden&lt;br />&lt;b>le in itteba'tum: &lt;/b>eger gerçekten tâbî olursaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>suayben: &lt;/b>Suayb'a&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-kum: &lt;/b>muhakkak, mutlaka siz&lt;br />&lt;b>izen: &lt;/b>o taktirde, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>le hâsirûne: &lt;/b>mutlaka hüsrana ugrayan kimseler, nefslerini hüsrana düsürenler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.091">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ehazet-hum: &lt;/b>bunun üzerine, böylece onlari aldi (helâk etti), yakaladi&lt;br />&lt;b>er recfetu: &lt;/b>siddetli bir sarsinti&lt;br />&lt;b>fe asbehû: &lt;/b>bunun üzerine, böylece oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>fî dâri-him: &lt;/b>kendi yurtlarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>câsimîne: &lt;/b>diz üstü çöküp kalan kimseler

    <string name="sozluk.007.093">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe tevellâ: &lt;/b>o zaman yüz çevirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ kavmi: &lt;/b>ey kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>lekad: &lt;/b>andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>eblagtu-kum: &lt;/b>size teblig ettim, ulastirdim&lt;br />&lt;b>risâlâti: &lt;/b>risaleler, elçiye verilip gönderilenler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nesahtu: &lt;/b>ve nasihat ettim (ögüt verdim)&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>fe keyfe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik nasil, niçin&lt;br />&lt;b>âsâ: &lt;/b>ben üzülürüm&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kavmin kâfirîne: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kavme (kâfir kavme)
    <string name="sozluk.007.094">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve olmadi (yoktur)&lt;br />&lt;b>ersel-nâ: &lt;/b>gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî karyetin: &lt;/b>bir beldeye, ülkeye&lt;br />&lt;b>min nebiyyin: &lt;/b>bir peygamber&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>yalniz, ancak, ...’den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ehaz-nâ: &lt;/b>aldik, ugrattik&lt;br />&lt;b>ehle-hâ: &lt;/b>onun halkini&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el be'sâi: &lt;/b>siddetli fakirlik, sikinti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ed darrâi: &lt;/b>ve siddetli darlik, zarar, hastalik, zorluk&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yaddarraûne: &lt;/b>yalvarip yakarirlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.095">"&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>beddel-nâ: &lt;/b>degistirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>mekâne es seyyieti: &lt;/b>kötülügün yerini&lt;br />&lt;b>el hasenete: &lt;/b>iyilik&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>öyle ki, ... olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>afev: &lt;/b>çogaldilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>messe: &lt;/b>isabet etti, dokundu&lt;br />&lt;b>âbâe-nâ: &lt;/b>atalarimiz, babalarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ed darrâu: &lt;/b>siddetli darlik, zarar, hastalik, zorluk&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es serrâu: &lt;/b>ve hayir, surur, ferahlik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ehaz-nâ-hum: &lt;/b>böylece onlari aldik, yakaladik, yok ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>bagteten: &lt;/b>ansizin, aniden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yes'urûne: &lt;/b>farkina varmazlar (suurunda degiller)"
    <string name="sozluk.007.096">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>(lev) enne: &lt;/b>olsalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ehle el kurâ: &lt;/b>o ülkelerin halki&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>inandilar, âmenû oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekav: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>le fetah-nâ: &lt;/b>elbette açardik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>berekâtin: &lt;/b>bolluk, bereketler&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ehaz-nâ-hum: &lt;/b>böylece biz onlari aldik, yakaladik (cezalandirdik)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle, ...dan dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû yeksibûne: &lt;/b>kazanmis olduklari

    <string name="sozluk.007.099">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe eminû: &lt;/b>yoksa emin mi oldular?&lt;br />&lt;b>mekra allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in tuzagi, hilesi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lâ ye'menu: &lt;/b>artik emin olamaz&lt;br />&lt;b>mekra allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in tuzagi, hilesi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...’den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavmu: &lt;/b>kavim, topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>el hâsirûne: &lt;/b>hüsranda olan kimseler, hüsranda olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.100">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e ve lem yehdi: &lt;/b>ve hidayete erdirmez mi&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseleri&lt;br />&lt;b>yerisûne el arda: &lt;/b>yeryüzüne varis olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>...’den sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ehli-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ehli, halki&lt;br />&lt;b>en lev nesâu: &lt;/b>eger dilemis olsaydik, dileseydik&lt;br />&lt;b>esab-nâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlara musibet isabet ettirdik, cezalandirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zunûbi-him: &lt;/b>günahlari sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve natbeu: &lt;/b>ve tabederiz, damgalariz, mühürleriz&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>kalplerinin üzerini&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hum: &lt;/b>böylece, artik onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yesmeûne: &lt;/b>isitmezler (isitemezler)"
    <string name="sozluk.007.101">"&lt;br />&lt;b>tilke el kurâ: &lt;/b>ülkeler iste bunlar&lt;br />&lt;b>nakussu: &lt;/b>anlatiyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>min enbâi-hâ: &lt;/b>onlarin haberlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>câet-hum: &lt;/b>onlara geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>rusulu-hum: &lt;/b>resûlleri&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el beyyinâti: &lt;/b>beyineler, belgeler ile, ispat vesikalari ve mucizelerle&lt;br />&lt;b>fe mâ kânû: &lt;/b>fakat ... olmadilar&lt;br />&lt;b>li yu'minû: &lt;/b>îmân ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanladiklari sey sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>böylece, iste&lt;br />&lt;b>yatbau allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah tabeder (açilamaz damga vurur), mühürler&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kulûbi: &lt;/b>kalplerinin üzerini&lt;br />&lt;b>el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler, kâfirler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.102">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ veced-nâ: &lt;/b>ve biz bulmadik&lt;br />&lt;b>li ekseri-him: &lt;/b>onlarin çogunu&lt;br />&lt;b>min ahdin: &lt;/b>ahde vefa edenlerden, ahdlerine vefa eder&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve sadece, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>veced-nâ: &lt;/b>biz bulduk&lt;br />&lt;b>eksere-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>le fâsikîne: &lt;/b>gerçekten fasik kimseler, fasiklar
    <string name="sozluk.007.103">"&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>bir zaman sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>beas-nâ: &lt;/b>biz beas ettik, gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di-him: &lt;/b>onlardan sonra, onlarin arkasindan&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (as)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimiz ile, mucizelerimizle&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ fir'avne: &lt;/b>firavuna&lt;br />&lt;b>ve melâi-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun önde gelenleri, ileri gelenleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe zalemû: &lt;/b>fakat zulmettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>fe unzur: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra bak&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil, ne sekilde&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âkibetu: &lt;/b>akibet, son&lt;br />&lt;b>el mufsidîne: &lt;/b>fesat çikaranlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.104">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (as)&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ fir'avnu: &lt;/b>ey firavun&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>resûlun: &lt;/b>bir resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi el âlemîn: &lt;/b>âlemlerin Rabbinden"

    <string name="sozluk.007.131">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câet-hum el hasenetu: &lt;/b>onlara hasene, iyilik geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bizim&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzihi: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>tusib-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet eder&lt;br />&lt;b>seyyietun: &lt;/b>bir kötülük&lt;br />&lt;b>yettayyerû: &lt;/b>ugursuz sayarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (as)’i&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men mea-hu: &lt;/b>ve onunla beraber olan kimseler, beraberindekiler&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ: &lt;/b>degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>fakat, ama&lt;br />&lt;b>tâiru-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ugursuzlugu&lt;br />&lt;b>inde allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>lâkinne: &lt;/b>fakat, lâkin&lt;br />&lt;b>eksere-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmezler, bilmiyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.132">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>mehmâ: &lt;/b>ne, her ne, ne olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>te'ti-nâ: &lt;/b>sen bize getirirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>min âyetin: &lt;/b>bir âyet, bir mucize&lt;br />&lt;b>li teshare-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi büyülemek (sihir yapmak) için&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, olsa bile, gene de&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ nahnu: &lt;/b>biz degiliz&lt;br />&lt;b>leke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mu'minîne: &lt;/b>îmân edenler, inanacak olanlar"

    <string name="sozluk.007.146">"&lt;br />&lt;b>se asrifu: &lt;/b>çevirecegim, uzaklastiracagim&lt;br />&lt;b>an âyâtî: &lt;/b>âyetlerimden&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>yetekebberûne: &lt;/b>kibirlenirler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayri el hakki: &lt;/b>haksiz yere&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger, ... olsa bile&lt;br />&lt;b>yerev: &lt;/b>görseler&lt;br />&lt;b>kulle: &lt;/b>bütün, hepsini&lt;br />&lt;b>âyetin: &lt;/b>âyet&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yu'minu: &lt;/b>inanmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>yerev: &lt;/b>görseler&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîle er rusdi: &lt;/b>irsad yolu&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yettehizû-hu: &lt;/b>onu edinmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîlen: &lt;/b>yol&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>yerev: &lt;/b>görseler&lt;br />&lt;b>sebile el gayyi: &lt;/b>gayy yolu&lt;br />&lt;b>yettehizû-hu sebîlen: &lt;/b>onu yol edinirler&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin, ..... olmasi sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kânû: &lt;/b>ve oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>gâfilîne: &lt;/b>gâfiller"
    <string name="sozluk.007.147">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve likâi: &lt;/b>ve karsilasma, kavusma, ulasma&lt;br />&lt;b>el âhirati: &lt;/b>sonraki gün (hayatta iken ruhun Allah'a ulasmasi günü)&lt;br />&lt;b>habitat: &lt;/b>heba oldu, bosa gitti&lt;br />&lt;b>a'mâlu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin amelleri&lt;br />&lt;b>hel yuczevne: &lt;/b>onlar cezalandirilir mi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>baska, hariç, ...’den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kânû: &lt;/b>olduklari sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.148">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vettehaze (ve ittehaze): &lt;/b>ve edindiler&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmu mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (as)'in kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di-hi: &lt;/b>ondan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>min huliyyi-him: &lt;/b>kendilerinin süs ve ziynet esyalarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>iclen: &lt;/b>bir buzagi&lt;br />&lt;b>ceseden: &lt;/b>ceset, cansiz cisim, heykel&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun var&lt;br />&lt;b>huvârun: &lt;/b>bögürme sesi çikaran, bögüren&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem yerev: &lt;/b>görmüyorlar mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hu: &lt;/b>onun, ... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yukellimu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarla konusmuyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yehdî-him: &lt;/b>ve onlari hidayet etmiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîlen: &lt;/b>yol&lt;br />&lt;b>ittehazû-hu: &lt;/b>onu (ilâh) edindiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kânû: &lt;/b>ve oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalimler, zulmedenler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.149">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lemmâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>sukita fî eydî-him: &lt;/b>ellerinin arasina düsürüldü (akli basina geldi, yanildigini anladi, pisman oldu)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve raev: &lt;/b>ve gördüler&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>(kendilerinin), ... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmus&lt;br />&lt;b>dallû: &lt;/b>dalâlete düstüler&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>le in: &lt;/b>elbette, gerçekten eger&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yerham-nâ: &lt;/b>bize merhamet etmezse&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yagfir-lenâ: &lt;/b>ve bize magfiret eder&lt;br />&lt;b>le nekûnenne (le nekûne enne): &lt;/b>muhakkak biz oluruz&lt;br />&lt;b>min el hâsirîne: &lt;/b>hüsrana düsenlerden
    <string name="sozluk.007.150">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lemmâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman, olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>recea mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (as) döndü&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ kavmi-hî: &lt;/b>kavmine&lt;br />&lt;b>gadbâne: &lt;/b>öfkeli, kizgin&lt;br />&lt;b>esifen: &lt;/b>üzüntülü, mahzun&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi'se mâ: &lt;/b>ne kötü&lt;br />&lt;b>haleftumû-nî: &lt;/b>benim yerime geçtiniz, bana halef oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'dî: &lt;/b>...’den sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>e aciltum: &lt;/b>acele mi ettiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>emre rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbinizin emri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve elka el elvâha: &lt;/b>levhalari birakti (atti)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ehaze: &lt;/b>ve aldi, tuttu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi re'si: &lt;/b>basini&lt;br />&lt;b>ahî-hi: &lt;/b>onun kardesi, kardesi&lt;br />&lt;b>yecurru-hu: &lt;/b>onu çekiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona, kendisine&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle ibne umme: &lt;/b>dedi, anne oglu, annem oglu&lt;br />&lt;b>inne el kavme istad'afû-nî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki bu kavim beni hakir gördü, güçsüz, zayif buldu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâdû: &lt;/b>ve neredeyse, az kalsin&lt;br />&lt;b>yaktulûne-nî: &lt;/b>beni öldürüyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lâ tusmit: &lt;/b>artik yüzlerini güldürme, sevindirme&lt;br />&lt;b>biyel a'dâe (biye el a'dâe): &lt;/b>benimle o düsmanlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tec'al-nî: &lt;/b>ve beni kilma&lt;br />&lt;b>mea el kavmi ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalim kavimle beraber, birlikte"
    <string name="sozluk.007.151">&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbigfirlî (rabbi igfir-lî): &lt;/b>Rabbim beni magfiret et&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li ahî: &lt;/b>ve kardesimi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve edhil-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bizi dahil et&lt;br />&lt;b>fî rahmeti-ke: &lt;/b>senin rahmetinin içine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ente: &lt;/b>ve sen&lt;br />&lt;b>erhamu er râhimîne: &lt;/b>rahmet edenlerin en çok rahmet edenisin

    <string name="sozluk.007.155">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vahtâra (ve ahtâra): &lt;/b>ve seçti&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (as)&lt;br />&lt;b>kavme-hu: &lt;/b>onun kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>seb'îne: &lt;/b>70&lt;br />&lt;b>raculen: &lt;/b>adam&lt;br />&lt;b>li mîkâti-nâ: &lt;/b>belirledigimiz vakit için (bulusma zamanimiz)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>fakat ... olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>ehazet-hum er recfetu: &lt;/b>onlari siddetli bir sarsinti aldi, yakaladi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>lev si'te: &lt;/b>eger, sayet sen dileseydin, isteseydin&lt;br />&lt;b>ehlekte-hum: &lt;/b>onlari helâk ettin&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iyyâye: &lt;/b>ve beni&lt;br />&lt;b>e tuhliku-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi helâk mi edeceksin (biz senin tarafindan helâk mi edilecegiz)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle, dolayisiyla, dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>feala es sufehâu: &lt;/b>sefihlerin, akilsizlarin yaptiklari&lt;br />&lt;b>min-nâ: &lt;/b>bizden, içimizden&lt;br />&lt;b>in hiye illâ: &lt;/b>o sadece, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>fitnetu-ke: &lt;/b>senin imtihanin&lt;br />&lt;b>tudillu: &lt;/b>dalâlette birakirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ile&lt;br />&lt;b>men tesâu: &lt;/b>diledigin kimse, diledigini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tehdî: &lt;/b>ve hidayete erdirirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>men tesâu: &lt;/b>diledigin kimse, diledigini&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>veliyyu-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim velîmizsin, dostumuzsun&lt;br />&lt;b>fagfir lenâ (fe igfir lenâ): &lt;/b>artik bize magfiret et&lt;br />&lt;b>verhamnâ (ve irham-nâ): &lt;/b>ve bize merhamet et&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ente: &lt;/b>ve sen&lt;br />&lt;b>hayru el gâfirîne: &lt;/b>magfiret edenlerin en hayirlisisin"
    <string name="sozluk.007.156">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vektub (ve uktub): &lt;/b>ve yaz&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bize&lt;br />&lt;b>fî hâzihi ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>bu dünyada&lt;br />&lt;b>haseneten: &lt;/b>hasene, iyilik (derecat kazandiran ameller)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve fî el âhirati: &lt;/b>ve ahirette&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>gerçekten biz&lt;br />&lt;b>hud-nâ: &lt;/b>tövbe edip döndük, yöneldik&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbî: &lt;/b>azabim&lt;br />&lt;b>usîbu: &lt;/b>isabet ettiririm&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>men esâu: &lt;/b>diledigim kimseye&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmetî: &lt;/b>ve rahmetim&lt;br />&lt;b>vesiat: &lt;/b>kapsadi, kusatti, (genistir) içine aldi&lt;br />&lt;b>kulle sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe se ektubu-hâ: &lt;/b>böylece onu yazacagim&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimselere&lt;br />&lt;b>yettekûne: &lt;/b>takva sahibi olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yu'tûne ez zekâte: &lt;/b>ve zekâti verirler&lt;br />&lt;b>vellezîne (ve ellezîne): &lt;/b>ve o kimseler ki, onlar ki&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimize&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>iman ederler, inanirlar (mü'minlerdir)"
    <string name="sozluk.007.157">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler ki, onlar ki&lt;br />&lt;b>yettebiûne: &lt;/b>uyarlar, tâbî olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûle: &lt;/b>resûle, elçiye&lt;br />&lt;b>en nebiyye el ummiyye ellezî: &lt;/b>okuma yazma bilmeyen peygamber ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>yecidûne-hu: &lt;/b>onu bulurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mektûben: &lt;/b>yazili olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>inde-hum: &lt;/b>yanlarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>fî et tevrâti: &lt;/b>Tevrat'ta&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el incîli: &lt;/b>ve Incil&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'muru-hum: &lt;/b>onlara emreder&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>irfanla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yenhâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlara yasaklar, onlari nehyeder&lt;br />&lt;b>an el munkeri: &lt;/b>münkerden, kötülükten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuhillu: &lt;/b>ve helâl kilar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum et tayyibâti: &lt;/b>onlara temiz ve güzel olanlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuharrimu: &lt;/b>ve haram kilar&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim el habâise: &lt;/b>onlara, habis olan seyleri (kötü ve pis olan seyler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yedau: &lt;/b>ve kaldirir&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>isra-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin agirligini, zorluklarini, yüklerini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el aglâle elletî: &lt;/b>ve zincirin halkalari ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>kânet: &lt;/b>oldu, olmus olan (olan)&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ellezîne: &lt;/b>böylece o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû bi-hi: &lt;/b>ona inandilar, iman ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve azzerû-hu: &lt;/b>ona saygi gösterdiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nasarû-hu: &lt;/b>ve ona yardim ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittebeû en nûre ellezî: &lt;/b>ve o nura tâbî oldular ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-hu: &lt;/b>onunla birlikte, beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum el muflihûne: &lt;/b>onlar felâha (kurtulusa) erenlerdir"
    <string name="sozluk.007.158">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ en nâsu: &lt;/b>ey insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>resûlu allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>ileykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan ellezî: &lt;/b>hepinize ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona ait, onun&lt;br />&lt;b>mulku es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalarin mülkü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ilâhe: &lt;/b>ilâh yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ huve: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhyî: &lt;/b>o diriltir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yumîtu: &lt;/b>ve o öldürür&lt;br />&lt;b>fe âminû bi allâhi: &lt;/b>öyleyse Allah'a îmân edin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûli-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>en nebiyyi el ummiyyi ellezî: &lt;/b>ümmî peygamber ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minu: &lt;/b>inanir, iman eder&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kelimâti-hî: &lt;/b>ve kelimelerine, onun sözlerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittebiû-hu: &lt;/b>ve ona tâbî olun&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki siz, böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tehtedûne: &lt;/b>hidayete erersiniz, eresiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.007.159">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min kavmi mûsâ: &lt;/b>ve Musa (as)'in kavminden&lt;br />&lt;b>ummetun: &lt;/b>bir ümmet, bir topluluk (vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>yehdûne: &lt;/b>hidayete erdirir, ulastirir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>Hakk'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi-hi: &lt;/b>ve onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'dilûne: &lt;/b>adaletli davranirlar, adaletle hükmederler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.160">"&lt;br />&lt;b>katta'nâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve biz onlari ayirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>isnetey asrate: &lt;/b>on iki&lt;br />&lt;b>esbâtan: &lt;/b>sibt’lar, sibt nesil, kol, grup&lt;br />&lt;b>umemen: &lt;/b>topluluk, ümmet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve evhay-nâ: &lt;/b>ve biz vahyettik&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (as)'a&lt;br />&lt;b>iz isteskâ-hu: &lt;/b>ondan su istedigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmu-hu: &lt;/b>onun kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>en idrib: &lt;/b>(vurmak) vurmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi asâ-ke: &lt;/b>senin asan ile (asasi ile)&lt;br />&lt;b>el hacer: &lt;/b>tas&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inbeceset: &lt;/b>hemen fiskirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>isnetâ asrate: &lt;/b>on iki&lt;br />&lt;b>aynen: &lt;/b>pinar&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>alime: &lt;/b>bildi&lt;br />&lt;b>kullu unâsin: &lt;/b>bütün insanlar, her grup insan&lt;br />&lt;b>mesrabe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin (kendilerinin) içecegi yer&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zallelnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz gölgeledik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerini&lt;br />&lt;b>el gamame: &lt;/b>bulut&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enzelnâ: &lt;/b>ve indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim el menne: &lt;/b>onlara kudret helvasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es selvâ: &lt;/b>ve bildircin&lt;br />&lt;b>kulû: &lt;/b>yeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>min tayyibâti: &lt;/b>helâl olanlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ razaknâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi riziklandirdigimiz seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ zâlemû-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bize zulmetmediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular, ... idi&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>kendi nefslerine (kendilerine)&lt;br />&lt;b>yazlimûne: &lt;/b>zulmediyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.161">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz kîle lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlara ... denilmisti&lt;br />&lt;b>uskunû: &lt;/b>oturun, yerlesin&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzihi el karyete: &lt;/b>bu sehir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kulû: &lt;/b>ve yeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>haysu: &lt;/b>neresi, nereden, o yerden&lt;br />&lt;b>si'tum: &lt;/b>dilediginiz, istediginiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kûlû: &lt;/b>ve deyin, söyleyin&lt;br />&lt;b>hittatun: &lt;/b>af dileyerek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve udhulû el bâbe: &lt;/b>ve kapidan girin (dahil olun)&lt;br />&lt;b>succeden: &lt;/b>secde ederek&lt;br />&lt;b>nagfir-lekum: &lt;/b>biz sizi magfiret edelim&lt;br />&lt;b>hatîâti-kum: &lt;/b>sizin hatalarinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>se nezîdu el muhsinîne: &lt;/b>muhsinlere arttiracagiz"
    <string name="sozluk.007.162">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe beddele: &lt;/b>böylece degistirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne zalemû: &lt;/b>onlar ki zulmettiler, zulmedenler&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>kavlen gayra ellezî: &lt;/b>ondan baska bir söz&lt;br />&lt;b>kîle: &lt;/b>söylenen&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ersel-nâ: &lt;/b>bunun üzerine biz gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>riczen: &lt;/b>bir azap&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yazlimûne: &lt;/b>zulmediyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.007.163">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ves'el-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlara sor&lt;br />&lt;b>an el karyeti elletî: &lt;/b>beldeden ki; o&lt;br />&lt;b>kânet: &lt;/b>idi, oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>hâdirate el bahri: &lt;/b>deniz kenarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>iz ya'dûne: &lt;/b>haddi asiyorlardi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es sebti: &lt;/b>cumartesi gününde (onlarin yasak uygulama gününde)&lt;br />&lt;b>iz te'tî-him: &lt;/b>onlara geldigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hîtânu-hum: &lt;/b>baliklari&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>sebti-him: &lt;/b>cumartesi günü (onlarin yasak uygulama günü)&lt;br />&lt;b>surraan: &lt;/b>akin akin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yevme: &lt;/b>ve o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yesbitune: &lt;/b>yasak uygulamama (günü)&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ te'tî-him: &lt;/b>onlara gelmiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>neblû-hum: &lt;/b>onlari imtihan ediyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sey sebebiyle, dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yefsukûne: &lt;/b>fiska düsüyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.164">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz kâlet: &lt;/b>ve dedigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ummetun: &lt;/b>bir ümmet, topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>lime: &lt;/b>niçin&lt;br />&lt;b>teizûne: &lt;/b>ögüt veriyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmen: &lt;/b>bir kavme&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu muhliku-hum: &lt;/b>Allah'in onlari (kendilerini) helâk edecegi kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya, ya da&lt;br />&lt;b>muazzibu-hum: &lt;/b>onlara (kendilerine) azab edecegi kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>azâben sedîdâ: &lt;/b>siddetli bir azap&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ma'ziraten: &lt;/b>bir mazeret olsun, bir özür olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lealle-hum: &lt;/b>ve umulur ki böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yettekûne: &lt;/b>takva sahibi olurlar"

    <string name="sozluk.007.168">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve katta'nâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari ayri ayri böldük, ayirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>umemâ: &lt;/b>ümmetler, topluluklar&lt;br />&lt;b>min hum es sâlihûne: &lt;/b>onlardan (bir kismi) salihler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlardan (bir kismi)&lt;br />&lt;b>dûne zâlike: &lt;/b>bunlardan baska, bunlarin disinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve belev-nâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve biz onlari imtihan ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hasenâti: &lt;/b>iyilikle, pozitif derece kazandiran ameller ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es seyyiâti: &lt;/b>ve kötülük, negatif derece kazandiran ameller&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki, böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yerciûne: &lt;/b>dönerler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.169">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe halefe: &lt;/b>artik halef oldu, yerine geçti&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di-him: &lt;/b>onlardan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>halfun: &lt;/b>sonraki nesil&lt;br />&lt;b>verisû el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitaba varis oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'huzûne: &lt;/b>alirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>arada: &lt;/b>dünya mali&lt;br />&lt;b>hâze el ednâ: &lt;/b>bu degersiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yekûlûne: &lt;/b>ve derler&lt;br />&lt;b>se yugferu lenâ: &lt;/b>yakinda bize magfiret edilecek (günahlarimiz sevaba çevrilecek)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in ye'ti-him: &lt;/b>ve eger onlara gelse&lt;br />&lt;b>aradun: &lt;/b>dünya mali&lt;br />&lt;b>misli-hu: &lt;/b>onun kadar, bir misli daha&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'huzû-hu: &lt;/b>onu alirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem yu'haz: &lt;/b>alinmadi mi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine, onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>mîsâku el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitabin misaki&lt;br />&lt;b>en lâ yekûlû: &lt;/b>söylememeleri&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ el hakka: &lt;/b>haktan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve deresû: &lt;/b>ve okudular, ögrendiler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun içindeki seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ed dâru el âhiratu: &lt;/b>ve ahiret yurdu&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler için&lt;br />&lt;b>yettekûne: &lt;/b>takva sahibi olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe lâ ta'kilûne: &lt;/b>hâlâ akil etmez misiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.007.170">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler ki, onlar ki&lt;br />&lt;b>yumessikûne: &lt;/b>simsiki sarilirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitaba&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ekâmû es salâte: &lt;/b>ve namazi ikame ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ nudîu: &lt;/b>zayi etmeyiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ecre el muslihîne: &lt;/b>salihlerin ecrini
