    <string name="sozluk.007.172">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz ehaze: &lt;/b>ve çikardigi, aldigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>min benî âdeme: &lt;/b>Âdemogullarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>min zuhûri-him: &lt;/b>onlarin sirtlarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>zurriyyete-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin zürriyetlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eshede-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari sahit tuttu&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ enfusi-him: &lt;/b>nefslerinin (kendilerinin) üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>e lestu: &lt;/b>ben degil miyim?&lt;br />&lt;b>bi rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>belâ: &lt;/b>evet (negatif soruya pozitif cevap verilirken kullanilir)&lt;br />&lt;b>sehid-nâ: &lt;/b>biz sahit olduk&lt;br />&lt;b>en tekûlû: &lt;/b>demeniz, demenize karsi (dememeniz için)&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme el kiyâmeti: &lt;/b>kiyâmet günü&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz, gerçekten biz&lt;br />&lt;b>kun-nâ: &lt;/b>biz olduk, ... idik&lt;br />&lt;b>an hâzâ: &lt;/b>bundan&lt;br />&lt;b>gâfilîne: &lt;/b>gâfiller, habersiz olanlar
    <string name="sozluk.007.173">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya, yahut, yoksa, ya da, ve de&lt;br />&lt;b>tekûlû: &lt;/b>dersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>esreke: &lt;/b>sirk kostu&lt;br />&lt;b>âbâu-nâ: &lt;/b>babalarimiz, atalarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kun-nâ: &lt;/b>ve biz olduk&lt;br />&lt;b>zurriyyeten: &lt;/b>bir nesil&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di-him: &lt;/b>onlardan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe tuhliku-nâ: &lt;/b>o zaman, hal böyle iken bizi helâk mi edeceksin?&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle, ...’den dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>feale: &lt;/b>yapti&lt;br />&lt;b>el mubtilûne: &lt;/b>bâtilla amel edenler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.174">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezâlike: &lt;/b>ve iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>nufassilu el âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetleri ayri ayri açikliyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lealle-hum: &lt;/b>ve umulur ki, böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yerciûne: &lt;/b>dönerler, rücu ederler
    <string name="sozluk.007.175">&lt;br />&lt;b>vetlu (ve utlu): &lt;/b>ve tilâvet et, oku, anlat&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>nebee: &lt;/b>haber&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>âtey-nâ-hu: &lt;/b>biz ona verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>fenseleha (fe inseleha): &lt;/b>sonra o ayrildi&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe etbea-hu es seytânu: &lt;/b>seytan onu kendine tâbi kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kâne: &lt;/b>böylece oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>min el gâvîne: &lt;/b>zarar görenlerden, azginlardan
    <string name="sozluk.007.176">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, sayet&lt;br />&lt;b>si'nâ: &lt;/b>biz diledik&lt;br />&lt;b>le rafa'nâ-hu: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette onu yükselttik (yükseltirdik)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne-hu: &lt;/b>ve fakat o&lt;br />&lt;b>ahlede: &lt;/b>meyletti&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ el ardi: &lt;/b>arza, dünyaya&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittebea: &lt;/b>ve tâbi oldu, uydu&lt;br />&lt;b>hevâ-hu: &lt;/b>hevasina, nefsinin afetlerine&lt;br />&lt;b>fe meselu-hu: &lt;/b>böylece, artik onun durumu, hali&lt;br />&lt;b>ke meseli el kelbi: &lt;/b>köpegin misali, durumu, hali gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>tahmil: &lt;/b>hamle yaparsin&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>yelhes: &lt;/b>solur&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya, ya da, olsa da&lt;br />&lt;b>tetruk-hu: &lt;/b>onu kendi haline terk edersin, birakirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>yelhes: &lt;/b>solur&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>o, iste o, iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>meselu el kavmi ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kavmin hali ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>faksusil kasasa &lt;br>(fe uksusi el kasasa): &lt;/b>artik bu kisasi anlat&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yetefekkerûne: &lt;/b>tefekkür ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.177">&lt;br />&lt;b>sâe: &lt;/b>ne kötü&lt;br />&lt;b>meselen: &lt;/b>misali, durumu, hali&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavmu ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kavim ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyati-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>ve nefslerine, kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yazlimûne: &lt;/b>zulmediyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.007.178">&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimi&lt;br />&lt;b>yehdi allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah hidayete erdirir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe huve el muhtedî: &lt;/b>o takdirde, artik o hidayete ermistir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim, kimi&lt;br />&lt;b>yudlil: &lt;/b>dalâlette birakir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ulâike: &lt;/b>o takdirde, artik iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum el hâsirûne: &lt;/b>onlar hüsrana ugrayanlardir (nefslerini hüsrana düsürenlerdir).
    <string name="sozluk.007.179">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>zere'nâ: &lt;/b>yarattik, hazirladik&lt;br />&lt;b>li cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennemi&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîran: &lt;/b>çok&lt;br />&lt;b>min el cinni: &lt;/b>cinlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el insi: &lt;/b>ve insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlarin vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbun: &lt;/b>kalpler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yefkahûne: &lt;/b>fikih edemezler, idrak etmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>a'yunun: &lt;/b>gözler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yubsirûne: &lt;/b>görmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>âzânun: &lt;/b>kulaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yesmeûne: &lt;/b>isitmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ke el en'âmi: &lt;/b>hayvanlar gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>bel hum: &lt;/b>hayir onlar, hatta onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>edallu: &lt;/b>daha çok dalâlette&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum el gâfilûne: &lt;/b>onlar gâfil olanlar, gâfiller"
    <string name="sozluk.007.180">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'indir&lt;br />&lt;b>el esmâu el husnâ: &lt;/b>en güzel isimler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ud'u-hu: &lt;/b>artik ona dua edin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zerû ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseleri terket&lt;br />&lt;b>yulhidûne: &lt;/b>saptiriyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî esmâi-hi: &lt;/b>onun isimlerinde, isimleri hakkinda, konusunda&lt;br />&lt;b>se yuczevne: &lt;/b>yakinda cezalandirilacaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>o seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.181">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mim-men (min men): &lt;/b>ve o kimselerden&lt;br />&lt;b>halâk-nâ: &lt;/b>biz yarattik&lt;br />&lt;b>ummetun: &lt;/b>bir ümmet, topluluk (vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>yehdûne: &lt;/b>hidayete erdirirler, ulastirirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>Hakk'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi-hi: &lt;/b>ve onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'dilûne: &lt;/b>adaletli davranirlar, adaletle hükmederler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.182">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vellezine (ve ellezîne): &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ayâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>se nestedricu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin derecelerini yavas yavas azaltacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>min haysu: &lt;/b>bir yerden&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmezler (bilemezler)"
    <string name="sozluk.007.183">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve umlî: &lt;/b>ve uzatirim, mühlet veririm&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>keydî: &lt;/b>benim tuzagim (hilem)&lt;br />&lt;b>metînun: &lt;/b>çok çetin, çok kuvvetli, zordur
    <string name="sozluk.007.184">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e ve: &lt;/b>ve ... mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yetefekkerû: &lt;/b>tefekkür etmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>yoktur, olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sâhibi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin sahibinde, onlarin arkadasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>min cinnetin: &lt;/b>delilikten (bir sey)&lt;br />&lt;b>in huve illâ: &lt;/b>o ancak ...'dir&lt;br />&lt;b>nezîrun: &lt;/b>bir nezir, uyarici&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînun: &lt;/b>apaçik, açikça"
    <string name="sozluk.007.185">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e ve lem yanzurû: &lt;/b>bakmiyorlar mi, bakmazlar mi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ...de, hakkinda, ...’a&lt;br />&lt;b>melekûti: &lt;/b>nizam, saltanat, idare, mülkiyet, sunnetullah&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>gökler, semalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ halaka allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in yarattigi seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...den, ...dan&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'in: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>en asâ: &lt;/b>ihtimal olmasi, olasilik olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>en yekûne: &lt;/b>olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>kad ikterebe: &lt;/b>çok yakin olmus olan, çok yaklasmis olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ecelu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ecelleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe bi eyyi: &lt;/b>artik hangi&lt;br />&lt;b>hadîsin: &lt;/b>söz&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de-hu: &lt;/b>ondan sonra (bundan sonra)&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inanirlar (mü'min olurlar)"
    <string name="sozluk.007.186">"&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse, kim, kimi&lt;br />&lt;b>yudlili allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah dalâlette birakir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lâ: &lt;/b>artik yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>hâdiye: &lt;/b>hidayete erdiren kimse, hidayetçi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yezeru-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari birakir, terkeder&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>tugyâni-him: &lt;/b>azginliklari, isyanlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'mehûne: &lt;/b>sasirirlar, saskin halde olurlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.187">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yes'elûne-ke: &lt;/b>sana soruyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an es sâati: &lt;/b>o saatten, o saat hakkinda, saatini, vaktini&lt;br />&lt;b>eyyâne: &lt;/b>ne zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>mursâ-hâ: &lt;/b>karar kilinmasi, onun vuku bulmasi, meydana gelmesi, olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece, yalnizca&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmu-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ilmi&lt;br />&lt;b>inde rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbimin yaninda, Rabbimin katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yucellî-hâ: &lt;/b>onu açiga çikarmaz, açiklayamaz&lt;br />&lt;b>li vakti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun vaktini, zamanini&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ huve: &lt;/b>ondan baskasi&lt;br />&lt;b>sekulet: &lt;/b>agir siddetli (olay)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>göklerde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ te'tî-kum: &lt;/b>size gelmez&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ bagteten: &lt;/b>ansizin olmaktan baska bir sekilde (ancak, öyle ki ansizin gelir)&lt;br />&lt;b>yes'elûne-ke: &lt;/b>sana soruyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keenne-ke: &lt;/b>sanki sen&lt;br />&lt;b>hafiyyun: &lt;/b>gizli olarak bilen (gizliden haberi olan)&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan, onu&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece, yanlizca&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmu-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ilmi&lt;br />&lt;b>inde allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in indinde, katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>eksere en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlarin çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmezler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.188">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ emliku: &lt;/b>ben malik degilim (güce sahip degilim)&lt;br />&lt;b>li nefsî: &lt;/b>nefsim için, kendim için, kendime&lt;br />&lt;b>nef'an: &lt;/b>bir fayda vermek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ darran: &lt;/b>ve darlik, zarar vermemek&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ mâ sae allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in dilemesi hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev kuntu: &lt;/b>ve eger ben olsaydim&lt;br />&lt;b>a'lemu el gaybe: &lt;/b>gaybi biliyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>le isteksertu: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka çogaltirim&lt;br />&lt;b>min el hayri: &lt;/b>hayirdan, hayri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ messeniye es sûu: &lt;/b>bana bir kötülük dokunmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>in ene illâ: &lt;/b>ben ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>nezîrun: &lt;/b>bir nezir, uyarici&lt;br />&lt;b>ve besîrun: &lt;/b>ve bir müjdeleyici&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim için&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inanirlar, mü'min olurlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.189">"&lt;br />&lt;b>huve ellezî: &lt;/b>o ki, ... yapan odur&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka-kum: &lt;/b>sizi yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>min nefsin: &lt;/b>bir nefsten&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhidetin: &lt;/b>bir tek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ceale: &lt;/b>ve kildi, yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>zevce-hâ: &lt;/b>onun esini&lt;br />&lt;b>li yeskune: &lt;/b>meyletmesi, sükûn bulmasi, tatmin olmasi için&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhâ: &lt;/b>ona, onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>böylece, ... oldugu zaman, olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>tegassâ-hâ: &lt;/b>onu (sarilip) örttü&lt;br />&lt;b>hamelet: &lt;/b>yüklendi (hamile kaldi)&lt;br />&lt;b>hamlen: &lt;/b>bir yük (rahimdeki bebek)&lt;br />&lt;b>hafîfen: &lt;/b>hafif olarak (ilk devresindeki asilanmis hücre)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe merret: &lt;/b>artik dolasti, yürüdü&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>böylece, ... oldugu zaman, olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>eskalet: &lt;/b>agirlasti, agir oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>deavâ allâhe: &lt;/b>ikisi Allah'a dua etti&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-humâ: &lt;/b>ikisinin Rabbi&lt;br />&lt;b>le in: &lt;/b>eger gerçekten ... olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>âteyte-nâ: &lt;/b>sen bize ver&lt;br />&lt;b>sâlihan: &lt;/b>salih olan, salih (bir evlât)&lt;br />&lt;b>le nekûnenne: &lt;/b>mutlaka oluruz&lt;br />&lt;b>min es sâkirîne: &lt;/b>sükredenlerden"
    <string name="sozluk.007.190">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>böylece ... oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>âtâ-humâ: &lt;/b>ikisine verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>sâlihan: &lt;/b>salih olan, salih (bir evlât)&lt;br />&lt;b>cealâ: &lt;/b>(ikisi) kildilar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>surakâe: &lt;/b>ortaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-mâ: &lt;/b>o seyler hakkinda, o seylerle&lt;br />&lt;b>âtâ-humâ: &lt;/b>ikisine verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe teâlâ allâhu: &lt;/b>halbuki, oysa Allah âlîdir, yücedir&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>yusrikûne: &lt;/b>ortak, sirk kosuyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.007.191">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e yusrikûne: &lt;/b>sirk (ortak) mi kosuyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyi, seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yahluku: &lt;/b>yaratamayan&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar kendileri&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhlekûne: &lt;/b>yaratiliyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.007.192">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yestetîûne: &lt;/b>ve güç yetiremezler&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>nasran: &lt;/b>bir yardim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ: &lt;/b>ve olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>onlar nefslerine (kendilerine)&lt;br />&lt;b>yansurûne: &lt;/b>yardim ederler
    <string name="sozluk.007.193">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in ted'û-hum: &lt;/b>ve eger onlari çagirirsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ el hudâ: &lt;/b>hidayete&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yettebiû-kum: &lt;/b>size uymazlar, tâbî olmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâun: &lt;/b>birdir, esittir&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>e deavtumû-hum: &lt;/b>onlari davet mi ettiniz, çagirdiniz mi &lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>entum sâmitûne: &lt;/b>siz sessiz kaldiniz, çagirmadiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.007.194">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ellezîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ted'ûne: &lt;/b>dua edersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ibâdun: &lt;/b>kullar&lt;br />&lt;b>emsâlu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>fed'û-hum (fe ud'û-hum): &lt;/b>öyleyse onlari çagirin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe li yestecibû: &lt;/b>o zaman icabet etsinler&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntum: &lt;/b>eger siz ... iseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>sâdikîne: &lt;/b>sadiklar, dogru sözlüler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.195">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e lehum: &lt;/b>onlarin var mi&lt;br />&lt;b>erculun: &lt;/b>ayaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>yemsûne: &lt;/b>yürürler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>em lehum: &lt;/b>veya, ya da, yoksa onlarin var mi&lt;br />&lt;b>eydin: &lt;/b>eller&lt;br />&lt;b>yabtisûne bihâ: &lt;/b>onunla tutarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>em lehum: &lt;/b>veya, ya da, yoksa onlarin var mi&lt;br />&lt;b>a'yunun: &lt;/b>gözler&lt;br />&lt;b>yubsirûne bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla görürler&lt;br />&lt;b>em lehum: &lt;/b>veya, ya da, yoksa onlarin var mi&lt;br />&lt;b>âzânun: &lt;/b>kulaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>yesmeûne bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla isitirler&lt;br />&lt;b>kul ud'û: &lt;/b>de ki davet edin, çagirin&lt;br />&lt;b>surekâe-kum: &lt;/b>ortaklarinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>kîdû-ni: &lt;/b>bana tuzak kurun&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tunzirûne: &lt;/b>göz açtirmayin, bekletmeyin, firsat vermeyin, mühlet vermeyin"
    <string name="sozluk.007.196">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>veliyyiye allâhu ellezine: &lt;/b>benim velîm Allah'tir ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>nezzele el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitabi indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve O&lt;br />&lt;b>yetevelle es sâlihîne: &lt;/b>salihlere velîlik yapar (dost olur)"
    <string name="sozluk.007.197">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ted'ûne: &lt;/b>siz dua ediyorsunuz, çagiriyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni-hi: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yestetîûne: &lt;/b>güç yetiremezler, muktedir degiller&lt;br />&lt;b>nasra-kum: &lt;/b>size yardima&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ: &lt;/b>ve olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>nefslerine, kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>yensurûne: &lt;/b>yardim ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.198">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in ted'û-hum: &lt;/b>ve eger onlari çagirirsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ el hudâ: &lt;/b>hidayete, Allah'a ulasmaya&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yesmeû: &lt;/b>isitmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve terâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari görürsün&lt;br />&lt;b>yenzurûne: &lt;/b>bakarlar, bakiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yubsirûne: &lt;/b>görmezler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.199">"&lt;br />&lt;b>huzil afve (huz el afve): &lt;/b>affi ahzet, af yolunu tut, affi benimse, affi kendine usül edin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve'mur (ve u'mur): &lt;/b>ve emret&lt;br />&lt;b>bil urfi (bi el urfi): &lt;/b>irfan ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve a'rid: &lt;/b>ve yüz çevir&lt;br />&lt;b>anil câhilîne (an el câhilîne): &lt;/b>cahillerden"
    <string name="sozluk.007.200">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve immâ: &lt;/b>ve ama, fakat ... olursa&lt;br />&lt;b>yenzeganne-ke: &lt;/b>sana bir vesvese gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>min es seytâni: &lt;/b>seytandan&lt;br />&lt;b>nezgun: &lt;/b>bir vesvese, dürtü&lt;br />&lt;b>festeiz (fe isteiz): &lt;/b>o zaman, hemen sigin&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>semîun: &lt;/b>en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.007.201">"&lt;br />&lt;b>innellezînettekav &lt;br>(inne ellezîne ittekav): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki takva sahibi olan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ messe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara dokundugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>tâifun: &lt;/b>gözü bürüyen bir vesvese, musîbet&lt;br />&lt;b>min es seytâni: &lt;/b>seytandan&lt;br />&lt;b>tezekkerû: &lt;/b>Allah'i tezekkür ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe izâ-hum: &lt;/b>iste o zaman onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mubsirûne: &lt;/b>basar edenler, gören kimseler"
    <string name="sozluk.007.202">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ihvânu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin kardesleri&lt;br />&lt;b>yemuddûne-hum: &lt;/b>onlari sürüklerler (uzatirlar, çekerler)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el gayyi: &lt;/b>gayyin içine (cehenneme)&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuksirûne: &lt;/b>vazgeçmezler
    <string name="sozluk.007.203">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ lem te'ti-him: &lt;/b>ve onlara getirmedigin zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-âyetin: &lt;/b>bir âyeti&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâctebeyte-hâ &lt;br>(lev lâ ictebeyte-hâ): &lt;/b>eger, sâyet, keske onu toplasan (düzsen, uydursan) olmaz mi&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>ettebiu: &lt;/b>ben tâbî olurum, uyarim&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yûhâ: &lt;/b>vahyolunan seye, ne vahyolunuyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyye: &lt;/b>bana&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbimden&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>besâiru: &lt;/b>basiretler&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huden: &lt;/b>ve bir hidayet, hidayete erdiren (Allah'a ulastiran)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmetun: &lt;/b>ve bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim için&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inanirlar, mü'min olurlar (kalplerine îmân yazilmis olanlar)"
    <string name="sozluk.007.204">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ kurie el kur'ânu: &lt;/b>ve Kur'ân okundugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>festemiû (fe istemiû): &lt;/b>artik dinleyin&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ensitû: &lt;/b>ve susun&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>turhamûne: &lt;/b>rahmet olunursunuz, rahmete kavusturulursunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.007.205">&lt;br />&lt;b>vezkur (ve uzkur): &lt;/b>ve zikret&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-ke: &lt;/b>Rabbini&lt;br />&lt;b>fî nefsi-ke: &lt;/b>nefsinde, kendi kendine&lt;br />&lt;b>tedarruan: &lt;/b>yalvararak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hîfeten: &lt;/b>ve korkarak, ürpererek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve dûne el cehri: &lt;/b>ve sesli olmayarak (açikça olmayarak), sessizce&lt;br />&lt;b>min el kavli: &lt;/b>sözden, sözün&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el guduvvi: &lt;/b>sabahleyin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el âsâli: &lt;/b>ve aksamlari (ikindi aksam arasi zaman)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tekun: &lt;/b>ve sen olma&lt;br />&lt;b>min el gâfilîne: &lt;/b>gâfillerden, gaflete düsenlerden
    <string name="sozluk.007.206">&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ellezîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar, o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>inde rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbinin katinda, yaninda, huzurunda&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yestekbirûne: &lt;/b>kibirlenmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>an ibadeti-hi: &lt;/b>ona kul olmaktan (ona ibadet etmekten)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yusebbihûne-hu: &lt;/b>ve onu tesbih ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehu: &lt;/b>ve ona&lt;br />&lt;b>yescudûne: &lt;/b>secde ederler
    <string name="sozluk.008.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yes'elûne-ke: &lt;/b>sana sorarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an el enfâli: &lt;/b>ganimetlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>kul el enfâlu: &lt;/b>de ki, ganimetler&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in&lt;br />&lt;b>ve er resûli: &lt;/b>ve resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ittekû allâhe: &lt;/b>artk Allah'a karsi takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve aslihû: &lt;/b>ve düzeltin, islâh edin&lt;br />&lt;b>zâte: &lt;/b>sahip olunan hal, durum&lt;br />&lt;b>beyni-kum: &lt;/b>sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve etîû allâhe: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a itaat edin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûle-hû: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntum: &lt;/b>eger siz iseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler, kalbine îmân yazilmis kimseler"
    <string name="sozluk.008.002">"&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>amma, lâkin, gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minûne ellezîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler onlardir ki&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ zukirallâhu (zukire allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah zikredildigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>vecilet: &lt;/b>ürperdi, titredi, cezbelendi&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ tuliyet: &lt;/b>ve okundugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtu-hu: &lt;/b>onun âyetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>zâdet-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin artirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>îmânen: &lt;/b>îmân&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ rabbi-him: &lt;/b>ve Rab'lerine&lt;br />&lt;b>yetevekkelûne: &lt;/b>tevekkül ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.008.003">&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler ki, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yukîmûne es salâte: &lt;/b>namazi ikame ederler (kilarlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mimmâ: &lt;/b>ve seyden, seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>razaknâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari riziklandirdik (rizik olarak verdik)&lt;br />&lt;b>yunfikûne: &lt;/b>infâk ederler
    <string name="sozluk.008.004">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'minler&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkâ: &lt;/b>gerçek, hak&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için, onlarin&lt;br />&lt;b>deracâtun: &lt;/b>dereceler (vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>inde rabbi-him: &lt;/b>Rab'lerinin yaninda (katinda)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve magfiratun: &lt;/b>ve magfiret (vardir) (günahlarin sevaba çevrilmesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rizkun kerîmun: &lt;/b>ve kerim bir rizik (vardir)"
    <string name="sozluk.008.005">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâ: &lt;/b>durum, ..... gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>ahrace-ke: &lt;/b>seni çikardi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>min beyti-ke: &lt;/b>senin evinden&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hakli sebeble, hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>ferîkan: &lt;/b>bir grup, bir kisim&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>le kârihûne: &lt;/b>kesinlikle kerih görenler isteksiz olanlar, hoslanmayanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.008.006">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yucadilûne-ke: &lt;/b>seninle mücâdele ediyorlar, tartisiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el hakki: &lt;/b>hak konusunda&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de mâ: &lt;/b>o seyden sonra, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>tebeyyene: &lt;/b>açiga çikti, zahir oldu, belli oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>ke ennemâ: &lt;/b>sanki, tipki, gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>yusâkûne: &lt;/b>sürükleniyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ el mevti: &lt;/b>ölüme&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yanzurûne: &lt;/b>bakiyorlar (göz göre göre)"
    <string name="sozluk.008.007">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz yaidu-kum allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah size vaadediyordu&lt;br />&lt;b>ihdâ et tâifeteyni: &lt;/b>iki taifeden (topluluktan) biri&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hâ: &lt;/b>onun oldugu, olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve teveddûne: &lt;/b>ve temenni ediyorsunuz, diliyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>enne: &lt;/b>oldugunu, olmasini&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra: &lt;/b>baska, diger, ... olmayan&lt;br />&lt;b>zâti es sevketi: &lt;/b>silâh sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>tekûnu: &lt;/b>olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yurîdu allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah istiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>en yuhikka el hakka: &lt;/b>hakkin gerçeklesmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kelimâti-hî: &lt;/b>onun kelimeleri, sözleri ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yaktaa (en yaktaa): &lt;/b>ve kesiyor (kesilmesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>dâbira el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirlerin arkasi, neslin devami
    <string name="sozluk.008.008">&lt;br />&lt;b>li yuhikka el hakka: &lt;/b>hakkin gerçeklesmesi için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yubtile el bâtile: &lt;/b>ve bâtilin iptal olmasi, yok olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve olsa (da)&lt;br />&lt;b>kerihe: &lt;/b>kerih gördü, istemedi&lt;br />&lt;b>el mucrimûne: &lt;/b>mücrimler, günahkârlar
    <string name="sozluk.008.009">&lt;br />&lt;b>iz testegîsûne: &lt;/b>yardim istediginiz zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe istecâbe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece icabet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>ennî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>mumiddu-kum: &lt;/b>size yardim eden&lt;br />&lt;b>bi elfin: &lt;/b>bin (tane) ile&lt;br />&lt;b>min el melâiketi: &lt;/b>meleklerden, meleklerle&lt;br />&lt;b>murdifîne: &lt;/b>birbirini izleyen, arka arkaya gelen
    <string name="sozluk.008.010">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ceale-hu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah onu yapmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>sadece, ancak, ...den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>busrâ: &lt;/b>bir müjde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li tatmainne: &lt;/b>ve tatmin olmasi için&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-kum: &lt;/b>kalpleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ en nasru: &lt;/b>ve yardim, nusret yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>sadece, ancak, ...den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>min indi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in katindan&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>azîz, üstün, izzet sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hikmet sahibidir, hüküm sahibidir"
    <string name="sozluk.008.011">&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>idi, olmustu, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>yugassî-kum: &lt;/b>sizi bürüyor, kapliyor&lt;br />&lt;b>en nuâse: &lt;/b>uyuklama hali&lt;br />&lt;b>emeneten: &lt;/b>emin olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan, onun tarafindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yunezzilu: &lt;/b>ve indiriyor&lt;br />&lt;b>aley-kum: &lt;/b>size, sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâen: &lt;/b>su&lt;br />&lt;b>li yutahhira-kum: &lt;/b>sizi temizlemek için, sizin temizlenmeniz için&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuzhibe: &lt;/b>ve giderir&lt;br />&lt;b>an-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ricze es seytâni: &lt;/b>seytanin murdarligi, vesvesesi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li yarbita alâ: &lt;/b>ve rabt etmek, baglamak için&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbi-kum: &lt;/b>kalpleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yusebbite: &lt;/b>ve sabit kilar, saglamlastirir, sebat ettirir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>el akdâme: &lt;/b>ayaklar
    <string name="sozluk.008.012">"&lt;br />&lt;b>iz yuhî: &lt;/b>vahyetmisti&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ el melâiketi: &lt;/b>meleklere&lt;br />&lt;b>ennî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-kum: &lt;/b>sizinle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>fe sebbitû ellezîne: &lt;/b>artik sebat verin, destek olun o kimselere&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>inananlar, âmenû olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>se ulkî: &lt;/b>ilka edecegim, atacagim, verecegim&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi: &lt;/b>kalplerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>kâfir olan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>er ru'be: &lt;/b>korku&lt;br />&lt;b>fadribû (fe idribû): &lt;/b>artik vurun&lt;br />&lt;b>fevka: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>el a'nâki: &lt;/b>boyunlar&lt;br />&lt;b>vadribû (ve idribû): &lt;/b>ve vurun&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, onlarin&lt;br />&lt;b>kulle: &lt;/b>tüm, bütün, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>benânin: &lt;/b>parmaklar, parmak uçlari"
    <string name="sozluk.008.013">"&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin olmalari sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>sâkku allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a karsi geldiler (sâkî oldular)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûle-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yusâkiki allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a karsi gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûle-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inne allâhe: &lt;/b>bundan sonra, o taktirde,muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdu el ikâbi: &lt;/b>azabi siddetli"
    <string name="sozluk.008.014">&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlikum: &lt;/b>iste bu, iste böyle, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>fe zûkû-hu: &lt;/b>artik onu tadin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>li el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirler için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbe en nâri: &lt;/b>atesin azabi
    <string name="sozluk.008.015">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey! (seslenme edati)&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar, Allah'a ulasmayi dileyen kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ lekîtum: &lt;/b>karsilastiginiz zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>kâfir olan kimselerle&lt;br />&lt;b>zahfen: &lt;/b>toplu olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lâ tuvellûhum(u) el edbâra: &lt;/b>artik onlara arkanizi dönmeyin (kaçmayin)"
    <string name="sozluk.008.016">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yuvelli-him: &lt;/b>onlara döndürür (döner)&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme izin: &lt;/b>izin günü, o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>dubura-hu: &lt;/b>arkasini&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>muteharrifen: &lt;/b>tekrar (harbe hazirlik için) dönen&lt;br />&lt;b>li kitâlin: &lt;/b>savasmak için&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>mutehayyizen: &lt;/b>dahil olan, katilan, katilmak üzere olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ fietin: &lt;/b>bir gruba&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kad: &lt;/b>böylece, artik olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>bâe: &lt;/b>ugradi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gadabin: &lt;/b>bir gazap&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve me'vâ-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun barinma yeri, onun mekâni&lt;br />&lt;b>cehennemu: &lt;/b>cehennem&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi'se el masîru: &lt;/b>ve o ne kötü varis (dönüs) yeri"
    <string name="sozluk.008.017">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lem taktulû-hum: &lt;/b>oysa, halbuki onlari siz öldürmediniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat, ama Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>katele-hum: &lt;/b>onlari öldürdü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ rameyte: &lt;/b>ve sen atmadin&lt;br />&lt;b>iz rameyte: &lt;/b>sen attigin zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve fakat, ama Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ramâ: &lt;/b>atti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li yubliye el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>ve mü'minleri imtihan etmek için&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan (kendisinden)&lt;br />&lt;b>belâen: &lt;/b>bir belâ, bir imtihan&lt;br />&lt;b>hasenen: &lt;/b>ahsen, güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>semî'un: &lt;/b>en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.008.018">&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlikum: &lt;/b>iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>mûhinu: &lt;/b>bosa çikaran, zayiflatan, bozan&lt;br />&lt;b>keydi el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirlerin tuzagi, hilesi
    <string name="sozluk.008.019">"&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, sayet&lt;br />&lt;b>testeftihû: &lt;/b>zafer (fetih) istiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kad: &lt;/b>böylece, olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>câe-kum el fethu: &lt;/b>fetih size geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in tentehû: &lt;/b>ve eger vazgeçerseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe huve: &lt;/b>artik o&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirlidir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in teûdû: &lt;/b>ve eger dönerseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>naud: &lt;/b>biz döneriz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve len tugniye: &lt;/b>ve asla fayda vermez&lt;br />&lt;b>an-kum: &lt;/b>sizden, size&lt;br />&lt;b>fietu-kum: &lt;/b>toplulugunuz, gurubunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>bir sey (hiç bir sekilde)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve olsa bile&lt;br />&lt;b>kesuret: &lt;/b>çok oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>mea el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minlerle beraber"
    <string name="sozluk.008.020">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>etîu allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a itaat edin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûle-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tevellev: &lt;/b>ve yüz çevirmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tesmeûne: &lt;/b>siz isitiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.008.021">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tekûnû: &lt;/b>ve siz olmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>ke ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>semi'nâ: &lt;/b>biz isittik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yesmeûne: &lt;/b>isitmezler"
    <string name="sozluk.008.022">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>serre ed devâbbi: &lt;/b>hayvanlarin en serlisi&lt;br />&lt;b>inde allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>es summu: &lt;/b>sagir&lt;br />&lt;b>el bukmu: &lt;/b>dilsiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne lâ ya'kilûne: &lt;/b>onlar akil etmeyenler"
    <string name="sozluk.008.023">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>alime allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah bildi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-him: &lt;/b>onlarin içinde, onlarda&lt;br />&lt;b>hayran: &lt;/b>bir hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>le esmea-hum: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka onlara isittirirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>esmea-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isittirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>le tevellev: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka yüz çevirirler, dönerler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'ridûne: &lt;/b>yüz çeviren kimseler"
    <string name="sozluk.008.024">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû istecîbû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar icabet edin&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li er resûli: &lt;/b>ve resûle&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ deâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi davet ettigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>li-mâ: &lt;/b>seylere&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhyî-kum: &lt;/b>size hayat verecek (verir)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve i'lemû: &lt;/b>ve bilin&lt;br />&lt;b>enne allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'in ... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>yehûlu: &lt;/b>girer&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne: &lt;/b>arasina&lt;br />&lt;b>el mer'i: &lt;/b>kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kalbi-hî: &lt;/b>ve onun kalbi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne-hu: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhserûne: &lt;/b>hasrolunacaksiniz, toplanacaksiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.008.025">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekû: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olun, sakinin&lt;br />&lt;b>fitneten: &lt;/b>fitne, imtihan&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tusîbenne: &lt;/b>isabet etmez&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne zalemû: &lt;/b>zulmeden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>hâssaten: &lt;/b>sadece, has, özel&lt;br />&lt;b>ve a'lemû: &lt;/b>ve biliniz&lt;br />&lt;b>enne allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'in, ... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdu el ikâbi: &lt;/b>azabi çok siddetli"
    <string name="sozluk.008.026">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izkurû: &lt;/b>ve hatirlayin&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>kalîlun: &lt;/b>az&lt;br />&lt;b>mustad'afûne: &lt;/b>güçsüz, aciz, hakir görülen kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>tehâfûne: &lt;/b>korkuyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>... olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>yetehattafe-kum en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlarin sizi kiskivrak tutmasi, yakalamasi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe âvâ-kum: &lt;/b>o zaman sizi barindirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eyyede-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizi destekledi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi nasri-hî: &lt;/b>onun yardimi ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve razaka-kum: &lt;/b>ve size riziklar verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min et tayyibâtî: &lt;/b>temiz, helal seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>teskurûne: &lt;/b>sükredersiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.008.027">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>inanan, âmenû olan, Allah'a ulasmayi dileyen kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tehûnû allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a ihanet etmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve er resûle: &lt;/b>ve resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tehûnû: &lt;/b>ve ihanet ediyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>emânâti-kum: &lt;/b>emanetlerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>biliyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.008.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve i'lemû: &lt;/b>ve biliniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ennemâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>emvâlu-kum: &lt;/b>mallariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve evlâdu-kum: &lt;/b>ve evlâtlariniz, çocuklariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fitnetun: &lt;/b>fitne, imtihandir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>inde-hu: &lt;/b>onun yaninda, katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ecrun: &lt;/b>bir ücret, bedel vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmun: &lt;/b>azim, büyük, yüce"
    <string name="sozluk.008.029">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey, onlar ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>inanan, âmenû olan, Allah'a ulasmayi dileyen kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>tetteku allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a (karsi) takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>yec'al: &lt;/b>kilar, yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, sizi&lt;br />&lt;b>furkânen: &lt;/b>bir furkan (hak ve bâtili ayirma özelligi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yukeffir: &lt;/b>ve örter&lt;br />&lt;b>an-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>seyyiâti-kum: &lt;/b>sizin günahlarinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yagfir-lekum: &lt;/b>ve size magfiret eder&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>zu el fadli el azîmi: &lt;/b>büyük fazl sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.008.030">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz yemkuru: &lt;/b>ve tuzak (pusu) kuruyorlardi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-ke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>kâfir olan kimseler, inkâr eden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>li yusbitû-ke: &lt;/b>seni tutuklamak, baglamak için&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>yaktulû-ke: &lt;/b>seni öldürürler&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhricû-ke: &lt;/b>seni sürgün ederler, çikarirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yemkurûne: &lt;/b>ve hile, tuzak kuruyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yemkuru allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah tuzak kurar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>hayru el mâkirîne: &lt;/b>tuzak kuranlarin en hayirlisidir
    <string name="sozluk.008.031">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iza tutlâ: &lt;/b>ve tilâvet edildigi, okundugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtu-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>semi'nâ: &lt;/b>biz isittik&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger, olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>nesâu: &lt;/b>dileriz&lt;br />&lt;b>le kul-nâ: &lt;/b>elbette biz söyledik (söylerdik)&lt;br />&lt;b>misle: &lt;/b>benzerini, onun gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>in….. (illâ): &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>in….. (illâ): &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>esâtîru el evvelîne: &lt;/b>evvelkilerin masali (yazdiklari, satira döktükleri asilsiz seyler)"
    <string name="sozluk.008.032">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz: &lt;/b>ve olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû allâhumme: &lt;/b>onlar \"Allah'im\" dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>idi, oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>huve el hakka: &lt;/b>o hak, gerçek&lt;br />&lt;b>min indi-ke: &lt;/b>senin katindan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe emtir: &lt;/b>o zaman yagdir&lt;br />&lt;b>aleynâ: &lt;/b>üzerimize&lt;br />&lt;b>hicâraten: &lt;/b>tas&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>gökten, semadan&lt;br />&lt;b>ev i'ti-nâ: &lt;/b>veya bize getir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi azâbin elîmin: &lt;/b>aci azabi"
    <string name="sozluk.008.033">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kâne allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah olmadi, degildir&lt;br />&lt;b>li yuazzibe-hum: &lt;/b>onlari azaplandiracak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ente: &lt;/b>ve sen&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-him: &lt;/b>onlarin içinde, arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kâne allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah olmadi, degildir&lt;br />&lt;b>muazzibe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara azap veren, azaplandiran&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yestagfirûne: &lt;/b>magfiret dilerler, diliyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.008.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ lehum: &lt;/b>ve niçin, neden onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ: &lt;/b>olmasin&lt;br />&lt;b>yuazzibe-hum allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah onlari azaplandirir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yasuddûne: &lt;/b>men ediyorlar, engel oluyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an el mescidi el harâmi: &lt;/b>Mescid-i Haram'dan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kânû: &lt;/b>olmadi, degil&lt;br />&lt;b>evliyâe-hû: &lt;/b>onun dostlari&lt;br />&lt;b>in ... illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>evliyâu-hû: &lt;/b>onun dostlari&lt;br />&lt;b>el muttakûne: &lt;/b>takva sahipleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve fakat, ama, lâkin&lt;br />&lt;b>eksere-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmezler"
    <string name="sozluk.008.035">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne: &lt;/b>ve olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>salâtu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ibadetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>inde el beyti: &lt;/b>beytin yaninda&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...den baska, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>mukâen: &lt;/b>islik çalarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tasdiyeten: &lt;/b>ve alkislayarak, el çirparak&lt;br />&lt;b>fe zûkû: &lt;/b>o halde, artik tadin&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbe: &lt;/b>azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sey(ler) sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>tekfurûne: &lt;/b>inkâr ediyorsunuz
    <string name="sozluk.008.036">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>yunfikûne: &lt;/b>infâk ederler, verirler&lt;br />&lt;b>emvâle-hum: &lt;/b>mallarini&lt;br />&lt;b>li yesuddû: &lt;/b>men etmek, alikoymak için&lt;br />&lt;b>an sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolundan (Sirati Mustakîm'den)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe se-yunfikûne-hâ: &lt;/b>böylece, bu sekilde onu infak ederler, verirler&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>tekûnu: &lt;/b>olacak&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>hasraten: &lt;/b>hasret, pismanlik, üzüntü&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yuglebûne: &lt;/b>yenilecek, bozguna ugratilacak, onlara gâlip olunacak, maglup olacaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>ve inkâr eden kimseler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehenneme&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhserûne: &lt;/b>hasrolunacaklar, toplanacaklar"
    <string name="sozluk.008.037">"&lt;br />&lt;b>li yemîze allâhu el habîse: &lt;/b>Allah'in murdari, pisi ayirt etmesi için&lt;br />&lt;b>min et tayyibi: &lt;/b>temizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yec'ale: &lt;/b>ve kilar, yapar, koyar&lt;br />&lt;b>el habîse: &lt;/b>murdar, pis&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'da-hu: &lt;/b>onun bir kismini&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ba'din (ba'da-hu alâ ba'din): &lt;/b>bir kisminin üzerine (birbirinin üzerine)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yerkume-hu: &lt;/b>öyle ki, böylece onu (onlari) üst üste koyup yigin yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>hepsi, tamami&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yec'ale-hu: &lt;/b>böylece onu kilar, yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennemde&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum el hâsirûne: &lt;/b>onlar hüsrana ugrayanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.008.038">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimselere, kâfirlere&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>yentehû: &lt;/b>vazgeçerler, nihayet verirler&lt;br />&lt;b>yugfer lehum: &lt;/b>onlar magfiret edilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey, seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>kad selefe: &lt;/b>geçmistir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>yeûdû: &lt;/b>dönerler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kad: &lt;/b>o zaman olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>madat: &lt;/b>geçmiste oldu, mazi oldu, önceden vuku buldu&lt;br />&lt;b>sunnetu el evvelîne: &lt;/b>öncekilerin sünneti, Allah'in geçmistekilere uyguladigi Ilâhî kanun, sünnet"
    <string name="sozluk.008.039">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâtilû-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarla savasin&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tekûne: &lt;/b>olmasin (kalmasin)&lt;br />&lt;b>fitnetun: &lt;/b>fitne&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yekûne ed dînu: &lt;/b>ve dîn olur, olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>kullu-hu: &lt;/b>onun hepsi, tamami, bütünü&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in, Allah'a ait, Allah için&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in intehev: &lt;/b>bundan sonra eger vazgeçerlerse&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inne allâhe: &lt;/b>o taktirde, muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'melûne: &lt;/b>yaparlar, yapiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>basîrun: &lt;/b>en iyi görendir"

    <string name="sozluk.008.041">"&lt;br />&lt;b>va'lemû (ve i'lemû): &lt;/b>ve biliniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ennemâ: &lt;/b>... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>ganimtum: &lt;/b>ganimet aldiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>enne: &lt;/b>... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in&lt;br />&lt;b>humuse-hu: &lt;/b>onun beste biri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lir resûli (ve li er resûli): &lt;/b>ve resûlün&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li zîl kurbâ (ve li zî el kurbâ): &lt;/b>ve yakinlarinin, yakinlik sahibi olanlarin, akrabalarin&lt;br />&lt;b>vel yetâmâ (ve el yetâmâ): &lt;/b>ve yetimler&lt;br />&lt;b>vel mesâkîni (ve el mesâkîni): &lt;/b>ve yoksullar, miskinler&lt;br />&lt;b>vebnis sebîli (ve ibne es sebîli): &lt;/b>ve yolculukta olanlar, yolda kalanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntum: &lt;/b>eger siz, iseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>âmentum: &lt;/b>îmân ettiniz, inandiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>enzel-nâ: &lt;/b>indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ abdi-nâ: &lt;/b>kulumuza&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme el furkâni: &lt;/b>furkan günü (hak ve bâtilin ayrildigi gün), ayrilma günü&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>itteka: &lt;/b>karsilasti&lt;br />&lt;b>el cem'âni: &lt;/b>iki toplum, iki ordu&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine, ...e&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>hersey&lt;br />&lt;b>kadîrun: &lt;/b>kaadir, gücü yeten"

    <string name="sozluk.008.049">"&lt;br />&lt;b>iz yekûlu: &lt;/b>diyorlardi&lt;br />&lt;b>el munâfikûne: &lt;/b>münafiklar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>kalplerinde vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>maradun: &lt;/b>hastalik&lt;br />&lt;b>garra: &lt;/b>aldatti, kandirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>hâulâi: &lt;/b>bunlar&lt;br />&lt;b>dînu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin dîni, kendilerinin dîni&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yetevekkel: &lt;/b>tevekkül eder&lt;br />&lt;b>alâllâhi (alâ allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inne allâhe: &lt;/b>o zaman,o takdirde muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>azîz, izzet sahibi, üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakim, hüküm ve hikmet sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.008.050">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev terâ: &lt;/b>ve görseydin&lt;br />&lt;b>iz yeteveffâ: &lt;/b>vefat ettirirken, öldürürken&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>el melâiketu: &lt;/b>melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>yadribûne: &lt;/b>vururlar&lt;br />&lt;b>vucûhe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin yüzlerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve edbâra-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin arkalarina&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zûkû: &lt;/b>ve tadin&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbe el harîki: &lt;/b>yakici azabi
    <string name="sozluk.008.051">&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu, iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>sey sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kaddemet: &lt;/b>takdim etti (önceden yapti)&lt;br />&lt;b>eydî-kum: &lt;/b>elleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zallâmin: &lt;/b>zulmeden, zulmedici&lt;br />&lt;b>li el abîdi: &lt;/b>kullar için, kullara
    <string name="sozluk.008.052">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ke de'bi: &lt;/b>adetleri gibi, adet haline getirdikleri durum gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>âli: &lt;/b>ailesi, yakinlari&lt;br />&lt;b>fir'avne: &lt;/b>firavun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önceki&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in âyetlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ehaze-hum allâhu: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece Allah onlari aldi (yakaladi)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zunûbi-him: &lt;/b>günahlarindan dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kaviyyun: &lt;/b>güçlü, kuvvetli&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdu: &lt;/b>siddetli&lt;br />&lt;b>el ikâbi: &lt;/b>azap"
    <string name="sozluk.008.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enne: &lt;/b>sebebiyle, ...dan dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yeku: &lt;/b>degildir, olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>mugayyiren: &lt;/b>degistiren, degistirici&lt;br />&lt;b>ni'meten: &lt;/b>nimet&lt;br />&lt;b>en'ame-hâ: &lt;/b>onu nimetlendirdi, onu nimet olarak verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavme&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar (... olmadikça)&lt;br />&lt;b>yugayyirû: &lt;/b>degistirirler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enfusi-him: &lt;/b>kendilerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>semîun: &lt;/b>en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.008.054">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>de'bi: &lt;/b>adet, gelenek, hal, durum&lt;br />&lt;b>âli: &lt;/b>aile (grup, topluluk, ordu)&lt;br />&lt;b>fir'avne: &lt;/b>firavun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-him: &lt;/b>Rab'lerinin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ehlek-nâ-hum: &lt;/b>böylece biz onlari helâk ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zunûbi-him: &lt;/b>günahlarindan dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve agrak-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bogduk&lt;br />&lt;b>âle: &lt;/b>aile (grup, topluluk, ordu)&lt;br />&lt;b>fîr'avne: &lt;/b>firavun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kullun: &lt;/b>ve hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular, idiler&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalimler"
    <string name="sozluk.008.055">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>serre ed devâbbi: &lt;/b>(yürüyen) hayvanlarin en serlisi&lt;br />&lt;b>inde allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah’in katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hum: &lt;/b>artik onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inanmazlar"
    <string name="sozluk.008.056">&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>âhedte: &lt;/b>sen ahd aldin, anlasma yaptin&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yenkudûne: &lt;/b>bozarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ahde-hum: &lt;/b>ahdlerini, akidlerini, sözlesmelerini&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulli merratin: &lt;/b>her defasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yettekûne: &lt;/b>takva sahibi degiller (olmazlar)

    <string name="sozluk.008.060">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eiddû: &lt;/b>ve hazirlayin&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>mâsteta'tum (mâ isteta'tum): &lt;/b>gücünüz ne kadar yeterse&lt;br />&lt;b>min kuvvetin: &lt;/b>kuvvetten, güçten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min ribâti el hayli: &lt;/b>ve baglanan (savas için beslenen) atlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>turhibûne: &lt;/b>korkutun&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>aduvve allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in düsmanlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve aduvve-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin düsmanlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âharîne: &lt;/b>ve digerleri&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni-him: &lt;/b>onlardan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ta'lemûne-hum: &lt;/b>siz onlari bilmezsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu-hum: &lt;/b>onlari bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve ne&lt;br />&lt;b>tunfikû: &lt;/b>infâk edersiniz, verirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>bir sey, bir seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîlillâhi (fî sebîli allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>yuveffe: &lt;/b>vefa edilir, ödenir&lt;br />&lt;b>ileykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tuzlemûne: &lt;/b>zulmedilmezsiniz, haksizliga ugratilmazsiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.008.061">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>cenehû: &lt;/b>meylettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>li es selmi: &lt;/b>teslime (barisa)&lt;br />&lt;b>fecnah (fe icnah): &lt;/b>o zaman (sen de) meylet&lt;br />&lt;b>lehâ: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tevekkel: &lt;/b>ve tevekkül et, güven&lt;br />&lt;b>alâllâhi (alâ allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>huve es semîu: &lt;/b>O en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>el alîmu: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"

    <string name="sozluk.008.066">"&lt;br />&lt;b>el'âne: &lt;/b>simdi&lt;br />&lt;b>haffefe allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah hafifletti&lt;br />&lt;b>an-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alime: &lt;/b>ve bildi&lt;br />&lt;b>enne: &lt;/b>... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-kum: &lt;/b>sizde&lt;br />&lt;b>da'fen: &lt;/b>zaaf, zayiflik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in: &lt;/b>ve eger, sayet&lt;br />&lt;b>yekun: &lt;/b>olur&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>mietun: &lt;/b>yüz (kisi)&lt;br />&lt;b>sâbiratun: &lt;/b>sabirli, sabreden&lt;br />&lt;b>yaglibû: &lt;/b>gâlip gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>mieteyni: &lt;/b>iki yüz (kisi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in yekun: &lt;/b>ve eger, sayet olursa&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>elfun: &lt;/b>bin (kisi)&lt;br />&lt;b>yaglibû: &lt;/b>gâlip gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>elfeyni: &lt;/b>iki bin (kisi)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi iznillâhi (bi izni allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in izni ile&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>mea es sâbirîne: &lt;/b>sabredenlerle beraber"
    <string name="sozluk.008.067">&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kâne: &lt;/b>olmadi, olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>li nebiyyin: &lt;/b>bir nebî, peygamber için&lt;br />&lt;b>en yekûne: &lt;/b>olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun&lt;br />&lt;b>esrâ: &lt;/b>esirler&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>yushine &lt;br>(ishan): &lt;/b>agir basar, düsmani kesin yener, kesin zafer kazanir &lt;br>: (sahenat, kalinlasmak, kuvvetlenmek)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>turîdûne: &lt;/b>siz istiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>arada ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya mali&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdu: &lt;/b>ister&lt;br />&lt;b>el âhirate: &lt;/b>ahiret, sonraki (hayat)&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>azîz, yüce, izzet sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîm, hüküm ve hikmet sahibi

    <string name="sozluk.008.069">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kulû: &lt;/b>artik yeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden, seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ganimtum: &lt;/b>ganimet aldiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>halâlen: &lt;/b>helâl olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>tayyiben: &lt;/b>temiz olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>vettekullâhe (ve ittekullâhe): &lt;/b>ve Allah'a karsi takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>Gafur,magrifet eden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>Rahîm olan, rahmet nuru gönderen"
    <string name="sozluk.008.070">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ en nebiyyu: &lt;/b>ey peygamber&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>li men: &lt;/b>o kimselere, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>fî eydî-kum: &lt;/b>ellerinizdeki, elinizin altinda (yaninizda)&lt;br />&lt;b>min el esrâ: &lt;/b>esirlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemi allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi-kum: &lt;/b>kalplerinizde vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>hayran: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'ti-kum: &lt;/b>size verilir&lt;br />&lt;b>hayran: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>uhize: &lt;/b>alinan&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yagfir lekum: &lt;/b>ve size magfiret eder&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>Gafur, magfiret eden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>Rahîm olan, rahmet nuru gönderen"
    <string name="sozluk.008.071">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger,sayet&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdû: &lt;/b>isterler&lt;br />&lt;b>hiyânete-ke: &lt;/b>sana ihanet etmek&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kad: &lt;/b>bu sekilde ... oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>hânu allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a ihanet ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe emkene: &lt;/b>o zaman imkân verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîm, hüküm ve hikmet sahibi"

    <string name="sozluk.009.011">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>tâbû: &lt;/b>tövbe ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ekâmus salâte: &lt;/b>ve namazi ikâme ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âtuz zekâte: &lt;/b>ve zekâti verdiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ihvânu-kum: &lt;/b>artik sizin kardeslerinizdir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ed dîni: &lt;/b>dînde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nufassilu el âyâti: &lt;/b>ve âyetleri ayri ayri açikliyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim için&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilirler"
    <string name="sozluk.009.012">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>nekesû: &lt;/b>ihlâl ettiler, bozdular&lt;br />&lt;b>eymâne-hum: &lt;/b>yeminlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di ahdi-him: &lt;/b>ahdlerinden sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ve taanû: &lt;/b>ve ayipladilar, yerdiler, dil uzattilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî dîni-kum: &lt;/b>sizin dîniniz hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kâtilû: &lt;/b>o zaman savasin, öldürün&lt;br />&lt;b>eimmete el kufri: &lt;/b>küfrün liderleri, önderleri&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak onlar, çünkü onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ eymâne: &lt;/b>yeminleri yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlarin&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yentehûne: &lt;/b>vazgeçerler"
    <string name="sozluk.009.013">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ: &lt;/b>olmaz mi, öyle degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>tukâtilûne: &lt;/b>savasirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmen: &lt;/b>bir kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>nekesû: &lt;/b>nakseden, ihlâl eden, bozan&lt;br />&lt;b>eymâne-hum: &lt;/b>yeminlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hemmû: &lt;/b>ve hamle ettiler, yeltendiler, kalkistilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ihrâcir resûli: &lt;/b>resûlü çikarmaya&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bedeû-kum: &lt;/b>sizinle (savasa) basladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>evvele merratin: &lt;/b>ilk defa&lt;br />&lt;b>e tahsevne-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan korkuyor musunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fallâhu (fe allâhu): &lt;/b>oysa, halbuki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ehakku: &lt;/b>daha hak sahibidir&lt;br />&lt;b>en tahsev-hu: &lt;/b>ondan korkulmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntum: &lt;/b>eger iseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"
    <string name="sozluk.009.014">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâtilû-hum: &lt;/b>onlarla savasin&lt;br />&lt;b>yuazzibhum allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah onlari azaplandirir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi eydî-kum: &lt;/b>sizin ellerinizle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuhzi-him: &lt;/b>ve onlari alçaltir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yansur-kum: &lt;/b>ve yardim eder size&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yesfi: &lt;/b>ve sifa verir, ferahlandirir&lt;br />&lt;b>sudûre: &lt;/b>gögüsler&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmin: &lt;/b>kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"
    <string name="sozluk.009.015">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuzhib: &lt;/b>ve giderir&lt;br />&lt;b>gayza: &lt;/b>öfke, gayz&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yetûbu allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah tövbeyi kabul eder&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>...e&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîm, hükmün ve hikmet sahibi
    <string name="sozluk.009.016">"&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa&lt;br />&lt;b>hasibtum: &lt;/b>siz hesap ettiniz, zannettiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>en tutrekû: &lt;/b>terkedileceginizi, birakilacaginizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lemmâ: &lt;/b>ve baska disinda, buna ragmen&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemi allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne câhedû: &lt;/b>cihad eden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yettehizû: &lt;/b>ve ittihaz etmezler (edinmezler)&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baskasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ resûli-hî: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlünün disinda, onun resûlünden baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>ve mü'minlerin disinda, mü'minlerden baska&lt;br />&lt;b>velîceten: &lt;/b>dost, sirdas&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>habîrun: &lt;/b>haberdar, haberi olan&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yaptiginiz seylerden"
    <string name="sozluk.009.017">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kâne: &lt;/b>olmaz, olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>li el musrikîne: &lt;/b>müsrikler için&lt;br />&lt;b>en ya'murû: &lt;/b>imar etmeleri&lt;br />&lt;b>mesâcide allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in mescidleri&lt;br />&lt;b>sâhidîne: &lt;/b>sahitler&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ enfusi-him: &lt;/b>kendi nefsleri üzerine, kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kufri: &lt;/b>küfre, inkâra&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>habitat: &lt;/b>bosa gitti, heba oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>a'mâlu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin amelleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve fî en nâri: &lt;/b>ve atesin içinde, ateste&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidûne: &lt;/b>ebedî kalacak olanlar"

    <string name="sozluk.009.025">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lekad: &lt;/b>andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>nasarakum allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah size yardim etti&lt;br />&lt;b>fî mevâtine: &lt;/b>savas yerlerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîratin: &lt;/b>çok&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yevme huneynin: &lt;/b>ve Huneyn günü&lt;br />&lt;b>iz a'cebet-kum: &lt;/b>sizin hosunuza gittigi halde&lt;br />&lt;b>kesretu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin çoklugunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lem tugni: &lt;/b>sonra kâfi gelmedi&lt;br />&lt;b>an-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>bir sey (bir fayda)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve dâkat aleykum: &lt;/b>ve size dar geldi, aciz kaldiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardu: &lt;/b>yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ rahubet: &lt;/b>genis olmasina ragmen&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>velleytum: &lt;/b>siz dönüp gittiniz, kaçtiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>mudbirîne: &lt;/b>arkalarina dönen kimseler"

    <string name="sozluk.009.029">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâtilû: &lt;/b>savasin&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne lâ yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inanmayan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ bi el yevmi el âhiri: &lt;/b>ve ahir gününe (inanmayan)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yuharrimûne: &lt;/b>ve haram etmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ harrame allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in haram kildigi seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûlu-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yedînûne: &lt;/b>ve dîn edinmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>dîne el hakki: &lt;/b>hak dîni&lt;br />&lt;b>min ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimselerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtû el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap verilenler&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ yu'tû el cizyete: &lt;/b>cizye (vergi) verene kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>an yedin: &lt;/b>ellerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>sâgirûne: &lt;/b>küçük düsenler, alçalmis kimseler, boyun egenler"
    <string name="sozluk.009.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlet el yahûdu: &lt;/b>ve yahudiler dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>uzeyrun ibnu allâhi: &lt;/b>Üzeyir Allah'in oglu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlet en nasârâ: &lt;/b>ve nasraniler dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>el mesîhu ibnu allâhi: &lt;/b>Mesih, Allah'in oglu&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>kavlu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin söyledikleri&lt;br />&lt;b>bi efvâhi-him: &lt;/b>agizlari ile&lt;br />&lt;b>yudâhiûne: &lt;/b>benzetiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kavle: &lt;/b>söylediklerini&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>daha önceden&lt;br />&lt;b>kâtele-hum allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah onlari öldürsün (kahretsin)&lt;br />&lt;b>ennâ: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'fekûne: &lt;/b>döndürülüyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.009.031">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ittehazû: &lt;/b>edindiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ahbâra-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin âlimleri, din adamlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ruhbâne-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin rahipleri&lt;br />&lt;b>erbâben: &lt;/b>Rab'ler&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mesîha ibne meryeme: &lt;/b>ve Meryem oglu Mesih'i&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ umirû: &lt;/b>ve emrolunmadilar&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...’den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>li ya'budû: &lt;/b>kul olmalari&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhen: &lt;/b>ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhiden: &lt;/b>tek olan, bir olan&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ilâhe: &lt;/b>ilâh yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ huve: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>subhâne-hu: &lt;/b>o noksan sifatlardan münezzehtir&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>yusrikûne: &lt;/b>sirk kosuyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.009.032">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdûne: &lt;/b>istiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>en yutfîû: &lt;/b>söndürmek&lt;br />&lt;b>nûra allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in nurunu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi efvâhi-him: &lt;/b>agizlari ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ye'ba allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah istemez&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...’den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>en yutimme: &lt;/b>tamamlamak&lt;br />&lt;b>nûra-hu: &lt;/b>onun nuru, nurunu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve ise de&lt;br />&lt;b>kerihe el kâfirûne: &lt;/b>kâfirler kerih gördüler"

    <string name="sozluk.009.035">&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhmâ: &lt;/b>kizdirilir&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhâ: &lt;/b>üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>fî nâri cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennem atesi içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>fe tukvâ: &lt;/b>böylece daglanir, kizgin demir cilde yapistirilir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>cibâhu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin alinlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cunûbu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin yanlari, bögürleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zuhûru-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin sirtlari, arkalari&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>keneztum: &lt;/b>biriktirdiniz, topladiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>li enfusi-kum: &lt;/b>kendi nefsleriniz için, kendiniz için&lt;br />&lt;b>fe zûkû: &lt;/b>böylece tadin&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>teknizûne: &lt;/b>biriktiriyorsunuz

    <string name="sozluk.009.037">"&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>en nesîu: &lt;/b>unutma, terketme, erteleme&lt;br />&lt;b>ziyâdetun: &lt;/b>arttirmaktir, ziyade etmektir, artistir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el kufri: &lt;/b>inkârda, küfürde&lt;br />&lt;b>yudallu: &lt;/b>saptirilir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>kâfirler, inkâr eden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhillûne-hu: &lt;/b>onu helâl yapiyorlar, sayiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmen: &lt;/b>bir yil&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuharrimûne-hu: &lt;/b>ve onu haram kiliyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmen: &lt;/b>bir yil&lt;br />&lt;b>li yuvâtiû: &lt;/b>uygun hale gelmesi için, uymasi için&lt;br />&lt;b>iddete: &lt;/b>adet&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ harrame allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in haram kildigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yuhillû: &lt;/b>böylece helâl sayiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ harrame allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in haram kildigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>zuyyine: &lt;/b>süslendi, güzel gösterildi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>sûu: &lt;/b>kötülük, kötü&lt;br />&lt;b>a'mâli-him: &lt;/b>onlarin amelleri&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yehdî: &lt;/b>hidayete erdirmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavme el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfir kavmi"

    <string name="sozluk.009.040">"&lt;br />&lt;b>illa: &lt;/b>.. disinda, ...'den baska, ancak, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>tensurû-hu: &lt;/b>ona yardim edersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kad: &lt;/b>o zaman olur, olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>nasara-hu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah ona yardim etti&lt;br />&lt;b>iz ahrace-hu: &lt;/b>onu çikardigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>sâniye isneyni: &lt;/b>iki (kisi)nin ikincisi&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>humâ: &lt;/b>ikisi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el gâri: &lt;/b>magarada&lt;br />&lt;b>iz yekûlu: &lt;/b>demisti&lt;br />&lt;b>li sâhibi-hi: &lt;/b>arkadasina&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tahzen: &lt;/b>mahzun olma, üzülme&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-nâ: &lt;/b>bizimle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>fe enzele allâhu: &lt;/b>o zaman Allah indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>sekînete-hu: &lt;/b>sekînetini&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>onun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eyyede-hu: &lt;/b>ve onu destekledi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi cunûdin: &lt;/b>bir ordu ile&lt;br />&lt;b>lem terev-hâ: &lt;/b>onu görmediniz, göremediniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ceale: &lt;/b>ve kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>kelimete: &lt;/b>söz&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>es suflâ: &lt;/b>sefil, sufli, adi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kelimetu allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'in kelimesi&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye el ulyâ: &lt;/b>o çok yücedir, en üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>azîz, çok yüce, üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîm, hüküm ve hikmet sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.009.041">"&lt;br />&lt;b>infirû: &lt;/b>sefere (Allah yolunda cihada) çikin (nefer olun, asker olun)&lt;br />&lt;b>hifâfen: &lt;/b>hafif olarak (süvari)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sikâlen: &lt;/b>ve agir olarak (piyade)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve câhidû: &lt;/b>ve cihad edin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi emvâli-kum: &lt;/b>mallariniz ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enfusi-kum: &lt;/b>ve nefsleriniz, canlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlikum: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmis olursunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.009.042">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lev kâne: &lt;/b>eger olsaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>aradan: &lt;/b>dünya mali, yarar, ganimet&lt;br />&lt;b>karîben: &lt;/b>yakin bir zamanda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve seferen: &lt;/b>ve bir sefer&lt;br />&lt;b>kâsiden: &lt;/b>kolay, rahat&lt;br />&lt;b>le ittebeû-ke: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka sana tâbî olurlardi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>beudet: &lt;/b>uzak geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>es sukkatu: &lt;/b>mesakkatli, yorucu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve se-yahlifûne: &lt;/b>ve yemin edecekler&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>lev isteta'nâ: &lt;/b>sâyet güç yetirseydik&lt;br />&lt;b>le harac-nâ: &lt;/b>elbette biz çikardik&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-kum: &lt;/b>sizinle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhlikûne: &lt;/b>helâk ediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>nefslerini, kendilerini&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir, biliyor&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>le kâzibûne: &lt;/b>gerçekten yalancilar"
    <string name="sozluk.009.043">"&lt;br />&lt;b>afâ allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah affetti&lt;br />&lt;b>anke: &lt;/b>seni&lt;br />&lt;b>lime: &lt;/b>niye, neden&lt;br />&lt;b>ezinte: &lt;/b>izin verdin&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ yetebeyyene leke: &lt;/b>sana belli oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne sadakû: &lt;/b>sadik olan kimseler, sadik olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ta'leme el kâzibîne: &lt;/b>ve yalancilari (bilirsin) ögrenirsin"
    <string name="sozluk.009.044">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yeste'zinu-ke: &lt;/b>senden izin istemezler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne yu'minûne: &lt;/b>îmân eden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el yevmi el âhiri: &lt;/b>ve ahir güne, sonraki güne (ölmeden evvel Allah'a ulasma gününe)&lt;br />&lt;b>en yucâhidû: &lt;/b>cihad etmeleri&lt;br />&lt;b>bi emvâli-him: &lt;/b>mallari ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enfusi-him: &lt;/b>ve nefsleri, canlari&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilendir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el muttakîne: &lt;/b>takva sahiplerini"
    <string name="sozluk.009.045">"&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, yalniz&lt;br />&lt;b>yeste'zinuke: &lt;/b>senden izin ister&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne lâ yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inanmayan kimseler, inanmayanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el yevmi el âhiri: &lt;/b>ve ahir güne&lt;br />&lt;b>vertâbet (ve irtâbet): &lt;/b>ve süpheye düstü&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hum: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî raybi-him: &lt;/b>süpheleri içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>yeteraddedûne: &lt;/b>tereddüt ederler, bocalarlar"

    <string name="sozluk.009.063">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem ya'lemû: &lt;/b>bilmiyorlar mi&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hu: &lt;/b>onun ... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhâdidi allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a muhalefet ve niza ederse, haddi asarsa&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûle-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>enne: &lt;/b>mutlaka ... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona, onun için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>nâre cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennem atesi&lt;br />&lt;b>hâliden: &lt;/b>ebediyyen kalacak olan&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike el hizyu el azîmu: &lt;/b>iste bu en büyük rüsvalik, rezilliktir"
    <string name="sozluk.009.064">&lt;br />&lt;b>yahzeru el munâfikûne: &lt;/b>münafiklar korkuyorlar, çekiniyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>en tunezzele: &lt;/b>indirilmesinden&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>sûretun: &lt;/b>bir sure&lt;br />&lt;b>tunebbiu-hum: &lt;/b>onlara haber verir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>kalplerinde olan&lt;br />&lt;b>kul istehziû: &lt;/b>de ki alay edin&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>muhricun: &lt;/b>açiga çikarandir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ tahzerûne: &lt;/b>çekindiginiz sey

    <string name="sozluk.009.067">"&lt;br />&lt;b>el munâfikûne: &lt;/b>münafik erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el munâfikâtu: &lt;/b>ve münafik kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'du-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin bazisi, bir kismi&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'din &lt;br>(ba'du-hum min ba'din): &lt;/b>bir kismindan &lt;br>: (birbirinden)&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'murûne: &lt;/b>emrederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el munkeri: &lt;/b>inkari, kötülügü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yenhevne: &lt;/b>ve nehyederler, yasaklarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>iyilikten, irfandan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yakbidûne: &lt;/b>ve sikarlar, simsiki tutarlar, cimrilik ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>eydiye-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin elleri, ellerini&lt;br />&lt;b>nesû allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'i unuttular&lt;br />&lt;b>fe nesiye-hum: &lt;/b>böylece (o da) onlari unuttu&lt;br />&lt;b>inne el munâfikîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak münafiklar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum el fâsikûne: &lt;/b>onlar fasiklardir"
