    <string name="sozluk.009.079">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yelmizûne: &lt;/b>ayipliyorlar, küçük görüyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el muttavviîne: &lt;/b>zengin olanlar (zekâttan fazla olarak gönüllü teberruda bulunan kisiler)&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es sadakâti: &lt;/b>sadakalar konusunda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne lâ yecidûne: &lt;/b>ve bulamayan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ cuhde-hum: &lt;/b>cehdlerinden, emek ve çabalarindan, gayretlerinden baska&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yesharûne: &lt;/b>böylece alay ediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, onlarla&lt;br />&lt;b>sehire allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah alay etti&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, onlarla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlar için, onlara vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun elîmun: &lt;/b>elîm (aci) azap"
    <string name="sozluk.009.080">"&lt;br />&lt;b>istagfir: &lt;/b>magfiret dile, iste&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ testagfir: &lt;/b>magfiret dileme&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>in testagfir: &lt;/b>eger magfiret dilersen&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>seb'îne: &lt;/b>yetmis&lt;br />&lt;b>merraten: &lt;/b>kere&lt;br />&lt;b>fe len yagfirallâhu: &lt;/b>artik Allah asla magfiret etmez&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ... olmasi sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'i&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûli-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yehdî: &lt;/b>ulastirmaz, hidayete erdirmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavme el fâsikîne: &lt;/b>fasiklar kavmi, fasik kavim"
    <string name="sozluk.009.081">"&lt;br />&lt;b>feriha: &lt;/b>ferahladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>el muhallefûne: &lt;/b>geri kalanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mak'adi-him: &lt;/b>kalip oturmalari ile&lt;br />&lt;b>hilâfe: &lt;/b>muhalefet ederek&lt;br />&lt;b>resuli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kerihû: &lt;/b>ve kerih gördüler, istemediler&lt;br />&lt;b>en yucâhidû: &lt;/b>cihad etmek&lt;br />&lt;b>bi emvâli-him: &lt;/b>mallari ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enfusi-him: &lt;/b>ve nefsleri, canlari&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tenfirû: &lt;/b>sefere (cihada) çikmayiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el harri: &lt;/b>sicakta, sicak havada&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>nâru cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennem atesi&lt;br />&lt;b>eseddu: &lt;/b>daha siddetli&lt;br />&lt;b>harran: &lt;/b>sicak&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger, keske&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yefkahûne: &lt;/b>idrak ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.009.082">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe li yadhakû: &lt;/b>artik gülsünler&lt;br />&lt;b>kalîlen: &lt;/b>az&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li yebkû: &lt;/b>ve aglasinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîran: &lt;/b>çok&lt;br />&lt;b>cezâen: &lt;/b>ceza, bedel (negatif veya pozitif karsilik) olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyler dolayisiyla, sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû yeksibûne: &lt;/b>kazanmis olduklari
    <string name="sozluk.009.083">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman, o taktirde, bundan sonra eger&lt;br />&lt;b>recea-ke allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah seni döndürdü&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ tâifetin: &lt;/b>bir topluluga&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe iste'zenû-ke: &lt;/b>artik, o taktirde, bundan sonra, o zaman senden izin isterler&lt;br />&lt;b>li el hurûci: &lt;/b>(cihada) çikmak için&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kul: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra, o zaman, o taktirde de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>len tahrucû: &lt;/b>asla çikamazsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>maiye: &lt;/b>benimle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>ebeden: &lt;/b>ebediyyen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve len tukâtilû: &lt;/b>ve asla savasamazsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>maiye: &lt;/b>benimle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>aduvven: &lt;/b>düsman&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-kum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki siz, çünkü siz&lt;br />&lt;b>radîtum: &lt;/b>siz razi oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kuûdi: &lt;/b>oturmaya (cihaddan geri kalmaya)&lt;br />&lt;b>evvele: &lt;/b>ilk&lt;br />&lt;b>merratin: &lt;/b>defa&lt;br />&lt;b>fak'udû: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde, bundan sonra, artik oturun (cihaddan geri kalin)&lt;br />&lt;b>mea el hâlifîne: &lt;/b>geri kalanlarla beraber"
    <string name="sozluk.009.084">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tusalli: &lt;/b>ve namaz kilma&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ehadin: &lt;/b>birisi için, birisinin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâte: &lt;/b>öldü&lt;br />&lt;b>ebeden: &lt;/b>ebediyyen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tekum: &lt;/b>ve sen durma&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kabri-hi: &lt;/b>onun kabrinde, kabri basinda&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar, çünkü onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'i&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûli-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâtû: &lt;/b>ve öldüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fâsikûne: &lt;/b>fasiklar, fiskta olanlar"

    <string name="sozluk.009.087">&lt;br />&lt;b>radû: &lt;/b>razi oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>bi en yekûnû: &lt;/b>ile olmaya&lt;br />&lt;b>mea: &lt;/b>beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>el havâlifi: &lt;/b>(savasa katilmayip) geri kalanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tubia: &lt;/b>ve tabedildi, mühürlendi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kalplerinin üzeri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hum: &lt;/b>böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yefkahûne: &lt;/b>fikih edemezler, idrak edemezler, anlayamazlar

    <string name="sozluk.009.091">&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degildir, yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ed duafâi: &lt;/b>zayiflar, kuvvetsizler, güçsüzler üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ: &lt;/b>ve yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el merdâ: &lt;/b>hastalarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ alâ: &lt;/b>ve yoktur üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne lâ yecidûne: &lt;/b>bulamayan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yunfikûne: &lt;/b>infâk edecek, verecek sey&lt;br />&lt;b>haracun: &lt;/b>zorluk, günah&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ nasahû: &lt;/b>nasihat edip, ögüt vererek sadik kaldiklari taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûli-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ alâ el muhsinîne: &lt;/b>muhsinler üzerine yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...den, ...dan&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîlin: &lt;/b>(aleyhlerinde) bir yol&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>magfiret eden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>rahmet nuru gönderen
    <string name="sozluk.009.092">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ alâ ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimselerin üzerine yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ mâ etev-ke: &lt;/b>sana geldikleri zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>li tahmile-hum: &lt;/b>onlari tasiman, bindirip sevketmen için&lt;br />&lt;b>kulte: &lt;/b>sen dedin&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ecidu: &lt;/b>bulamiyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ahmilu-kum: &lt;/b>sizi tasiyacak, sizi bindirecek sey&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>tevellev: &lt;/b>döndüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve a'yunu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin gözleri&lt;br />&lt;b>tefîdu: &lt;/b>bosaldi, akti (göz yasi)&lt;br />&lt;b>min ed dem'i: &lt;/b>kandan&lt;br />&lt;b>tefîdu min ed dem'i: &lt;/b>kanli gözyasi (çok üzüntü ile akan yaslar)&lt;br />&lt;b>hazenen: &lt;/b>hüzünlenerek&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ yecidû (en lâ yecidû): &lt;/b>bulamamasi&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yunfikûne: &lt;/b>infâk edecek sey"

    <string name="sozluk.009.094">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'tezirûne: &lt;/b>özür beyan ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>ileykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ reca'tum: &lt;/b>siz geri döndügünüz zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ta'tezirû: &lt;/b>özür beyan etmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>len nu'mine: &lt;/b>asla inanmiyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>nebbe ene allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah bana haber verdi, bildirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min ahbâri-kum: &lt;/b>sizin haberlerinizden (haberlerinizi), durumunuzdan (durumunuzu)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve se yerâ allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah görecek&lt;br />&lt;b>amele-kum: &lt;/b>sizin amellerinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûlu-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>tureddûne: &lt;/b>döndürüleceksiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ: &lt;/b>...e&lt;br />&lt;b>âlimil gaybi: &lt;/b>gaybi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sehâdetî: &lt;/b>ve görünen&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yunebbiu-kum: &lt;/b>böylece size haber verecek&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.009.095">"&lt;br />&lt;b>se yahlifûne: &lt;/b>yemin edecekler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ inkalebtum: &lt;/b>(geri) döndügünüz zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>li tu'ridû: &lt;/b>yüz çevirirsiniz diye&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe a'ridû: &lt;/b>artik yüz çevirin&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar, çünkü onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ricsun: &lt;/b>murdar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mevâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin barinacagi yer&lt;br />&lt;b>cehennemu: &lt;/b>cehennem&lt;br />&lt;b>cezâen: &lt;/b>ceza olarak, bedel olarak, negatif veya pozitif karsilik olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ kânû: &lt;/b>olduklari seyler sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>yeksibûne: &lt;/b>kesbederler, kazanirlar"
    <string name="sozluk.009.096">&lt;br />&lt;b>yahlifûne: &lt;/b>yemin ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>li terdav: &lt;/b>sizin razi olmaniz için&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in: &lt;/b>o zaman, olsa bile eger&lt;br />&lt;b>terdav: &lt;/b>razi olursunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yerdâ: &lt;/b>razi olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>an el kavmi el fâsikîne: &lt;/b>fasiklar kavminden, fasik kavimden
    <string name="sozluk.009.097">"&lt;br />&lt;b>el a'râbu: &lt;/b>bedevî (göçebe) Araplar&lt;br />&lt;b>eseddu: &lt;/b>daha siddetlidir&lt;br />&lt;b>kufran: &lt;/b>küfür, inkâr bakimindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nifâkan: &lt;/b>ve nifak bakimindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ecderu: &lt;/b>ve daha yatkin&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ (en lâ)ya'lemû: &lt;/b>bilmemeleri, bilmemeye&lt;br />&lt;b>hudûde: &lt;/b>sinirlari&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey, seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>enzele allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in indirdigi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ resûli-hi: &lt;/b>resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîm (hüküm ve hikmet sahibi)"

    <string name="sozluk.009.108">&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tekum: &lt;/b>ikâme etme (namaz kilma), bulunma&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>ebeden: &lt;/b>ebediyyen&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>mescidun: &lt;/b>bir mescid&lt;br />&lt;b>ussise: &lt;/b>tesis edildi, kuruldu&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ et takvâ: &lt;/b>takva üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>min evveli yevmin: &lt;/b>ilk günden&lt;br />&lt;b>ehakku: &lt;/b>daha çok haktir, daha uygun, daha lâyik&lt;br />&lt;b>en tekûme: &lt;/b>senin ikâme etmen (namaza durman), bulunman&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun içinde, orada&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun içinde, orada (vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>ricâlun: &lt;/b>adamlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhibbûne: &lt;/b>severler&lt;br />&lt;b>en yetetahherû: &lt;/b>temizlenmek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhibbu el muttahhirîne: &lt;/b>temizlenenleri sever
    <string name="sozluk.009.109">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe men: &lt;/b>o kimse mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>essese: &lt;/b>tesis etti, kurdu&lt;br />&lt;b>bunyâne-hu: &lt;/b>binasinin temelini kuran&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ takvâ: &lt;/b>takva üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ridvânin: &lt;/b>ve riza&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>em men: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa o kimse (mi)&lt;br />&lt;b>essese: &lt;/b>tesis etti, kurdu&lt;br />&lt;b>bunyâne-hu: &lt;/b>binasinin temelini kuran&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ sefâ: &lt;/b>kenar üzerine, kenarina&lt;br />&lt;b>curufin: &lt;/b>curuf, sellerin getirip yigdigi çamur, çürük, yikilan toprak, çamur yigini&lt;br />&lt;b>hârin: &lt;/b>kayan, düsen, devrilen&lt;br />&lt;b>fenhâra (fe inhâra): &lt;/b>böylece yikilir, göçer&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla birlikte, beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>fî nâri cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennem atesinin içine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yehdî: &lt;/b>hidayete erdirmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavme ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalimler kavmi, toplulugu, zalim kavim"
    <string name="sozluk.009.110">&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yezâlu: &lt;/b>zail olmaz, devam eder&lt;br />&lt;b>bunyânu-hum ellezî: &lt;/b>onlarin binasi ki onu&lt;br />&lt;b>benev: &lt;/b>insa ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>rîbeten: &lt;/b>bir süphe, bir nifak olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kalplerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, yalniz, oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>en tekattaa: &lt;/b>parçalanmak&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîm, hüküm ve hikmet sahibi
    <string name="sozluk.009.111">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe isterâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah satin aldi&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin nefslerini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emvâle-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin mallarini&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enne: &lt;/b>...’den dolayi, ... verilecek karsilik&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara, onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>el cennete: &lt;/b>cennet&lt;br />&lt;b>yukâtilûne: &lt;/b>savasirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda, Allah yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yaktulûne: &lt;/b>böylece öldürürler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuktelûne: &lt;/b>ve öldürülürler&lt;br />&lt;b>va'den: &lt;/b>vaad&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>onun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkan: &lt;/b>hak olan&lt;br />&lt;b>fî et tevrâti: &lt;/b>Tevrat'ta&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el incîli: &lt;/b>ve Incil&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kur'âni: &lt;/b>ve Kur'ân&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kimdir, kim vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>evfâ bi ahdi-hi: &lt;/b>ahdine vefa etti, ahdini daha iyi ifa etti, yerine getirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe istebsirû: &lt;/b>artik sevinin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi bey'i-kum: &lt;/b>alisverisiniz ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî bâya'tum: &lt;/b>ki o yaptiginiz alisveris&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zâlike: &lt;/b>ve iste&lt;br />&lt;b>huve el fevzu el azîmu: &lt;/b>bu büyük mükâfattir"
    <string name="sozluk.009.112">"&lt;br />&lt;b>et tâibûne: &lt;/b>tövbe edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>el âbidûne: &lt;/b>Allah'a kul olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el hâmidûne: &lt;/b>hamdedenler&lt;br />&lt;b>es sâihûne: &lt;/b>oruç tutanlar, Allah yolunda seyahat edenler (savasmak için, Allah'in ismini duyurmak için, yeryüzünü ibretle gezip tefekkür etmek için)&lt;br />&lt;b>er râkiûne: &lt;/b>rükû edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>es sâcidûne: &lt;/b>secde edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>el âmirûne: &lt;/b>emredenler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>iyilikle, irfan ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en nâhûne: &lt;/b>ve nehyedenler, yasaklayanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an el munkeri: &lt;/b>münkerden, kötülükten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hâfizûne: &lt;/b>ve muhafaza edenler, koruyanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>li hudûdi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in hudutlarini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bessiri el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>ve mü'minleri müjdele"
    <string name="sozluk.009.113">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kâne: &lt;/b>olmadi, olmaz, olamaz&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nebiyyi: &lt;/b>bir nebi, bir peygamberler için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>ve âmenû olanlar (ölmeden önce Allah'a ulasmayi dileyen kimseler)&lt;br />&lt;b>en yestagfirû: &lt;/b>magfiret dilemesi&lt;br />&lt;b>li el musrikîne: &lt;/b>müsrikler için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev kânû: &lt;/b>olsalar bile&lt;br />&lt;b>ulî kurbâ: &lt;/b>akraba, yakinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>...den sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ tebeyyene: &lt;/b>belli olan, açiga çikan sey, durum&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak onlar, çünkü onlar, onlarin, ... oldugu&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbu el cahîmi: &lt;/b>cehennem ehli, cehennem halki"
    <string name="sozluk.009.114">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne istigfâru: &lt;/b>ve bagislanma, magfiret dilemesi olmaz, olamaz&lt;br />&lt;b>ibrâhîme: &lt;/b>Ibrâhîm&lt;br />&lt;b>li ebî-hi: &lt;/b>babasi için&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>yalniz, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>an mev'idetin: &lt;/b>vaadden, vaadedilenden dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>vaade-hâ: &lt;/b>ona vaadetti&lt;br />&lt;b>iyyâ-hu: &lt;/b>yalniz ona&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>artik, olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>tebeyyene: &lt;/b>açiga çikti, belli oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hu: &lt;/b>onun, ... oldugu&lt;br />&lt;b>aduvvun: &lt;/b>düsman&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>teberree: &lt;/b>uzaklasti, berî oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ibrâhîme: &lt;/b>muhakkak Ibrâhîm&lt;br />&lt;b>le evvâhun: &lt;/b>muhakkak, gerçekten çok üzülen, yüregi çok sizlayan, çok yalvaran&lt;br />&lt;b>halîmun: &lt;/b>çok merhametli ve çok yumusak kalpli"
    <string name="sozluk.009.115">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah olmadi, degildir&lt;br />&lt;b>li yudille: &lt;/b>saptiracak, dalâlette birakacak&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmen: &lt;/b>bir kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>iz hedâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari hidayete erdirdigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>yubeyyine: &lt;/b>açiklanir, belli olur&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yettekûne: &lt;/b>takva sahibi olacaklari seyler (sakinmalari gerekecek seyler)&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>süphesiz Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"

    <string name="sozluk.009.118">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ es selâseti: &lt;/b>ve üç (kisi) de&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne hullifû: &lt;/b>geri birakilan kisiler&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>hatta&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ dâkat aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara dar gelmisti&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardu: &lt;/b>yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ rahubet: &lt;/b>genis olmasina ragmen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve dâkat: &lt;/b>ve dar geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>enfusu-hum: &lt;/b>nefsleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zannû: &lt;/b>ve anladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>en lâ melcee: &lt;/b>siginak olmadigini&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>onlara, kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>tâbe aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin tövbelerini kabul etti&lt;br />&lt;b>li yetûbû: &lt;/b>tövbeleri kabul edilerek yeniden Allah'a dönsünler (ruhlarini yeniden Allah'a ulastirsinlar) diye&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>huve et tevvâbur rahîmu: &lt;/b>O tövbeleri kabul edendir, rahmet nuru gönderendir"

    <string name="sozluk.009.121">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yunfikûne: &lt;/b>ve infâk etmezler, vermezler (ki)&lt;br />&lt;b>nefakaten: &lt;/b>bir nafaka&lt;br />&lt;b>sagîraten: &lt;/b>küçük&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ: &lt;/b>ve olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>kebîraten: &lt;/b>büyük&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yaktaûne: &lt;/b>geçmezler (ki)&lt;br />&lt;b>vâdien: &lt;/b>bir vadi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...’den baska, olmaz, olmasin&lt;br />&lt;b>kutibe: &lt;/b>yazildi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara, onlar için, onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>lî yeczîye-hum allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in onlari cezalandirmasi, mükâfatlandirmasi için &lt;br> (cezalandirma; negatif veya pozitif karsilik verme) &lt;br />&lt;b>ahsene: &lt;/b>en güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kânû: &lt;/b>olduklari seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorlar"

    <string name="sozluk.009.125">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emmâ: &lt;/b>ve fakat, ama&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne fî kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>kalplerinde ... olan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>maradun: &lt;/b>hastalik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe zâdet-hum: &lt;/b>böylece onlarin arttirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ricsen: &lt;/b>murdarlik, nifak, süphe, küfür&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ ricsi-him: &lt;/b>murdarliklarina, pisliklerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâtû: &lt;/b>ve öldüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kâfirûne: &lt;/b>kâfirler

    <string name="sozluk.009.127">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve îzâ mâ unzilet: &lt;/b>ve bir sey indirildigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>sûretun: &lt;/b>bir sure, bir sure olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>nazara: &lt;/b>bakti, bakar&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'du-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin bazilari&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ ba'din &lt;br>(ba'du-hum ilâ ba'din): &lt;/b>bazisina &lt;br>: (onlar birbirlerine)&lt;br />&lt;b>hel yerâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi gören var mi&lt;br />&lt;b>min ehadin: &lt;/b>biri, bir kimse, birisi&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>insarafû: &lt;/b>döndüler (dönerler, giderler)&lt;br />&lt;b>sarafa allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah çevirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalplerini&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ... olmalari sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmun: &lt;/b>bir kavim, topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yefkahûne: &lt;/b>fikih etmezler"

    <string name="sozluk.010.016">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger, sayet&lt;br />&lt;b>sâe allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah dileseydi&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ televtu-hu: &lt;/b>onu okumazdim&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ edrâ-kum: &lt;/b>ve size bildirmezdim&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kad: &lt;/b>halbuki olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>lebistu: &lt;/b>kaldim, bulundum&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-kum: &lt;/b>sizin içinizde&lt;br />&lt;b>umuran: &lt;/b>bir ömür&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-hî: &lt;/b>ondan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>hâlâ&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ta'kilûne: &lt;/b>akil etmiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.010.017">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe men: &lt;/b>artik, kim&lt;br />&lt;b>azlemu: &lt;/b>daha zalim&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmen ifterâ: &lt;/b>iftira edenden&lt;br />&lt;b>alâllâhi (alâ allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>keziben: &lt;/b>yalan olarak, yalanla&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebe: &lt;/b>yalanladi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-hî: &lt;/b>onun âyetlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak o&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuflihu: &lt;/b>felâha, kurtulusa erdirmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el mucrimûne: &lt;/b>mücrimleri"
    <string name="sozluk.010.018">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ya'budûne: &lt;/b>ve kulluk ediyorlar, ibadet ediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lâ yedurru-hum: &lt;/b>onlara zarar vermeyen sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yenfeu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlara yarar, fayda, menfaat vermiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yekûlûne: &lt;/b>ve derler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâulâi: &lt;/b>bunlar&lt;br />&lt;b>sufeâu-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim sefaatçilerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>inde allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in katinda, yaninda&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>e tunebbiûne âllâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a haber mi veriyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>sey(ler)i&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilmiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>göklerde, semalarda bulunan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ: &lt;/b>ve olmayan&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yerde, yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>subhâne-hu: &lt;/b>o sübhandir, o münezzehtir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve teâlâ: &lt;/b>ve yücedir&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>yusrikûne: &lt;/b>sirk kosuyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.010.019">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne en nâsu: &lt;/b>ve insanlar olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ummeten: &lt;/b>bir ümmet(ten)&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhideten: &lt;/b>tek, bir&lt;br />&lt;b>fahtelefû (fe ihtelefû): &lt;/b>bundan sonra ihtilâfa, (anlasmazliga) düstüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ kelimetun: &lt;/b>bir kelime, söz olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>sebekat: &lt;/b>geçti, geçmis&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbike: &lt;/b>senin Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>le kudiye: &lt;/b>mutlaka vuku bulurdu, olurdu, hüküm verilirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin aralarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-mâ: &lt;/b>o seyde&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>yahtelifûne: &lt;/b>ihtilâfa düsüyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.010.020">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yekûlûne: &lt;/b>ve derler&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olmaz miydi&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>âyetun: &lt;/b>bir âyet (mucize, delil)&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-hi: &lt;/b>onun Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kul: &lt;/b>o zaman de&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ el gaybu: &lt;/b>sadece, yalniz gayb&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'indir, Allah'a aittir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe entezirû: &lt;/b>artik bekleyin&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ben&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-kum: &lt;/b>sizinle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>min el muntezirîne: &lt;/b>bekleyenlerden"
    <string name="sozluk.010.021">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ ezak-nâ en nâse: &lt;/b>ve insanlara tattirdigimiz zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmeten: &lt;/b>bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>...'den sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>darrâe: &lt;/b>bir sikinti, bir darlik, bir zarar&lt;br />&lt;b>messet-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlarin&lt;br />&lt;b>mekrun: &lt;/b>bir düzen, bir tuzak&lt;br />&lt;b>fî âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimiz hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>kul allâhu: &lt;/b>de ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>esrau: &lt;/b>daha hizli&lt;br />&lt;b>mekren: &lt;/b>bir düzen, bir tuzak kurmak&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>rusule-nâ: &lt;/b>resûllerimiz, elçilerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>yektubûne: &lt;/b>yazarlar, yaziyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyi, seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>temkurûne: &lt;/b>tuzaklar (düzenler) kuruyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.010.022">"&lt;br />&lt;b>huve ellezî: &lt;/b>odur&lt;br />&lt;b>yuseyyiru-kum: &lt;/b>sizi gezdirir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el berri: &lt;/b>karada&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el bahri: &lt;/b>ve denizde&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>a kadar, hatta&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldugunuz zaman, siz idiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el fulki: &lt;/b>gemide, gemilerde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cereyne: &lt;/b>ve aktilar, gittiler (yüzdüler)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlarla&lt;br />&lt;b>bi rîhin: &lt;/b>bir rüzgâr ile&lt;br />&lt;b>tayyibetin: &lt;/b>temiz, hos, güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ferihû: &lt;/b>ve ferahladilar (sevinçliydiler)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>câet-hâ: &lt;/b>ona geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>rîhun: &lt;/b>bir rüzgâr&lt;br />&lt;b>âsifun: &lt;/b>firtina&lt;br />&lt;b>ve câe-hum el mevcu: &lt;/b>ve onlara dalga geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>min kulli mekânin: &lt;/b>her taraftan, her mekândan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zannû: &lt;/b>ve zannettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>uhîta: &lt;/b>kusatildi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlarla&lt;br />&lt;b>deavû allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a dua ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>muhlisîne: &lt;/b>muhlisler olarak, halis kilarak&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu ed dîne: &lt;/b>dîni ona&lt;br />&lt;b>le in: &lt;/b>eger olursa mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>enceyte-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi kurtar&lt;br />&lt;b>min hâzihi: &lt;/b>bundan&lt;br />&lt;b>le nekûnenne: &lt;/b>biz mutlaka oluruz&lt;br />&lt;b>min es sâkirîne: &lt;/b>sükredenlerden"
    <string name="sozluk.010.023">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>ama, olunca, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>encâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari kurtardi&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ hum: &lt;/b>o zaman onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yebgûne: &lt;/b>azginlik yaparlar, haddi asarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayri el hakki: &lt;/b>haksiz yere&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ en nâsu: &lt;/b>ey insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece, yalniz, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>bagyu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin azginliginiz&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ enfusi-kum: &lt;/b>nefslerinizin üzerine size, kendinize&lt;br />&lt;b>metâ el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayatinin metai, mali&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ileynâ: &lt;/b>bize&lt;br />&lt;b>merciu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin dönüsünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe nunebbiu-kum: &lt;/b>o zaman size haber verecegiz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>oldugunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.010.024">"&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece, yalniz, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>meselu el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayatinin meselesi, örnegi, durumu&lt;br />&lt;b>ke mâin: &lt;/b>su gibidir&lt;br />&lt;b>enzel-nâ-hu: &lt;/b>onu biz indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>gökten, semadan&lt;br />&lt;b>fahteleta (fe ihteleta): &lt;/b>o zaman karisir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>nebâtu el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünün, arzin bitkisi&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden, seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'kulu en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlar yerler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el en'âmu: &lt;/b>ve hayvanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ izâ: &lt;/b>hatta olunca, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ehazet el ardu: &lt;/b>yeryüzü aldi&lt;br />&lt;b>zuhrufe-hâ: &lt;/b>onun güzelligi, onun güzellesmesi (son derece güzel ve parlak olmasi)&lt;br />&lt;b>vezzeyyenet: &lt;/b>ve süslendi, güzellesti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zanne: &lt;/b>ve zannederler&lt;br />&lt;b>ehlu-hâ: &lt;/b>onun sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlar ..... olduklarini&lt;br />&lt;b>kâdirûne: &lt;/b>kadir olan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhâ: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>etâ-hâ: &lt;/b>ona geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>emru-nâ: &lt;/b>emrimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>leylen: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>ev nehâren: &lt;/b>veya gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ceal-nâ-hâ: &lt;/b>böylece onu kildik (yaptik)&lt;br />&lt;b>hasîden: &lt;/b>hasat ederek, kökünden kopararak&lt;br />&lt;b>ke en: &lt;/b>gibi olur (oldu)&lt;br />&lt;b>lem tagne: &lt;/b>olmamis (zenginlesmemis)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el emsi: &lt;/b>dün&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>onun gibi, iste böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>nufassilu el âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetleri ayri ayri açikliyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim için&lt;br />&lt;b>yetefekkerûne: &lt;/b>tefekkür ediyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.010.025">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yed'û: &lt;/b>davet eder&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ dâri es selâmi: &lt;/b>teslim yurduna, selâm yurduna&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yehdî: &lt;/b>ve ulastirir&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ sirâtin: &lt;/b>yola&lt;br />&lt;b>mustekîmin: &lt;/b>istikamet üzere olan, Allah'a götüren"
    <string name="sozluk.010.026">&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler için (vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>ahsenû: &lt;/b>ahsen olanlar, daha güzel olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el husnâ: &lt;/b>güzellik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zîyâdetun: &lt;/b>ve onun ziyadesi, daha fazlasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yerheku: &lt;/b>ve kaplamaz, bürümez&lt;br />&lt;b>vucûhe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin yüzleri&lt;br />&lt;b>katerun: &lt;/b>ne bir kararti, korku, keder, sikinti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ zilletun: &lt;/b>ve ne de bir zillet, hakirlik, küçük düsme (yoktur)&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbu el cenneti: &lt;/b>cennet halkidir&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidûne: &lt;/b>devamli kalanlardir
    <string name="sozluk.010.027">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne kesebû: &lt;/b>ve kazanan kimselerin&lt;br />&lt;b>es seyyiâti: &lt;/b>seyyiat, derecat kaybettiren ameller, günahlar&lt;br />&lt;b>cezâu: &lt;/b>cezasi, karsiligi&lt;br />&lt;b>seyyietin: &lt;/b>bir kötülügün, derecat kaybettiren amellerin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi misli-hâ: &lt;/b>onun bir misli iledir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve terheku-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari kaplar, bürür&lt;br />&lt;b>zilletun: &lt;/b>bir zillet, hakirlik, küçük düsme&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için (onlarin) yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan, Allah'a karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>min âsimin: &lt;/b>bir koruyucu&lt;br />&lt;b>ke ennemâ: &lt;/b>ancak sanki, gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>ugsîyet: &lt;/b>büründü, kaplandi&lt;br />&lt;b>vucûhu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin yüzleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kita'an: &lt;/b>parça(lar)&lt;br />&lt;b>min el leyli: &lt;/b>geceden&lt;br />&lt;b>muzlimen: &lt;/b>bir karanlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbu en nâri: &lt;/b>ates halkidir&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidûne: &lt;/b>devamli kalanlar, kalacak olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.010.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yevme: &lt;/b>ve o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>nahsuru-hum: &lt;/b>onlari toplayacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>topluca, hepsi, bütünü&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>nekûlu: &lt;/b>diyecegiz&lt;br />&lt;b>lillezîne (li ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimselere, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>esrakû: &lt;/b>sirk kostular&lt;br />&lt;b>mekâne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin yeriniz, yerlerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve surakâu-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin sirk, ortak kostuklariniz (Allah'a ortak ettikleriniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe zeyyel-nâ: &lt;/b>böylece biz ayirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin aralari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>surakâu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin sirk kostuklari, ortak kostuklari&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kuntum: &lt;/b>siz olmadiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>iyyâ-nâ: &lt;/b>sadece bize&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'budûne: &lt;/b>kulluk edersiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.010.029">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kefâ: &lt;/b>artik yeterli, kâfidir&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>sehîden: &lt;/b>sahit olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim aramizda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve beyne-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>in kun-nâ: &lt;/b>biz olduk&lt;br />&lt;b>an ibâdeti-kum: &lt;/b>sizin ibadetinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>le gâfilîne: &lt;/b>mutlaka, gerçekten habersiz, gâfil olanlar
    <string name="sozluk.010.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>teblû: &lt;/b>imtihan&lt;br />&lt;b>kullu nefsin: &lt;/b>her nefs, bütün nefsler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ eslefet: &lt;/b>geçmiste yaptiklariyla (selef olan seyler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ruddû: &lt;/b>ve döndürüldüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâllâhi (ilâ allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>mevlâ-hum el hakki: &lt;/b>onlarin mevlâsi Hakk'tir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve dalle: &lt;/b>ve uzaklasti&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kânû: &lt;/b>olduklari seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>yefterûne: &lt;/b>iftira ediyorlar, uyduruyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.010.031">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yerzuku-kum: &lt;/b>sizlere rizik verir, sizi riziklandirir&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>göklerden, semadan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>em men: &lt;/b>veya kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yemliku: &lt;/b>gücü yeter, sahip olur, melik olur&lt;br />&lt;b>es sem'a: &lt;/b>isitme (duyusu)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ebsâre: &lt;/b>ve görme hassasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhricu: &lt;/b>çikarir&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayye: &lt;/b>diri, canli&lt;br />&lt;b>min el meyyiti: &lt;/b>ölüden, cansizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuhricu: &lt;/b>ve çikarir&lt;br />&lt;b>meyyite: &lt;/b>ölü&lt;br />&lt;b>min el hayyi: &lt;/b>diriden, canlidan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yudebbiru el emre: &lt;/b>isleri düzenleyip, idare eder, yürütür&lt;br />&lt;b>fe se yekûlûne: &lt;/b>o zaman diyecekler, derler&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kul: &lt;/b>öyleyse de&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe lâ tettekûne: &lt;/b>hâlâ, takva sahibi olmayacak misiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.010.032">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o halde, öyleyse, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlikum: &lt;/b>iste bu, iste o&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'tir&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakku: &lt;/b>Hakk'tir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe mâzâ: &lt;/b>o halde nedir&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakki: &lt;/b>Hakk&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ ed dalâlu: &lt;/b>dalâletten baska&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ennâ: &lt;/b>artik nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>tusrafûne: &lt;/b>çevriliyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.010.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkat: &lt;/b>gerçeklesmistir, hak oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>kelimetu: &lt;/b>sözü, kelimesi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâllezîne (alâ ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimselere&lt;br />&lt;b>fesekû: &lt;/b>fasik oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>süphesiz onlar, muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inanmazlar"
    <string name="sozluk.010.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>hel: &lt;/b>var mi&lt;br />&lt;b>min surakâi-kum : &lt;/b>sizin sirk kostuklarinizdan, ortaklarinizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yebdeu: &lt;/b>örneksiz, ilk defa yaratir&lt;br />&lt;b>el halka: &lt;/b>yaratma, halketme&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yuîdu-hu: &lt;/b>onu iade eder, geri döndürür, döndürecek&lt;br />&lt;b>kulillâhu (kul allâhu): &lt;/b>de ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yebdeu: &lt;/b>örneksiz ilk defa yaratir&lt;br />&lt;b>el halka: &lt;/b>yaratma, halketme&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yuîdu-hu: &lt;/b>onu iade eder, geri döndürür, döndürecek&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ennâ: &lt;/b>öyleyse nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>tu'fekûne: &lt;/b>döndürülüyorsunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.010.036">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve degil, olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>yettebiu: &lt;/b>tâbî oluyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ekseru-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...den baska, sadece, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>zannen: &lt;/b>zanna&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ez zanne: &lt;/b>süphesiz zan&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yugnî: &lt;/b>fayda vermez, bir sey kazandirmaz (gani yapmaz)&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...den&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakki: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilendir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>yef'alûne: &lt;/b>onlarin yaptiklarini"

    <string name="sozluk.010.051">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e summe: &lt;/b>sonra mi&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ vakaa: &lt;/b>o sey vuku buldu, tahakkuk etti (vuku bulan sey)&lt;br />&lt;b>âmentum: &lt;/b>âmenû oldunuz, iman ettiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>âl'âne: &lt;/b>simdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kad: &lt;/b>ve oldu, olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>testa'cilûne: &lt;/b>acele istiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.010.052">&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>kîle: &lt;/b>denildi&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne zalemû: &lt;/b>zulmedenlere&lt;br />&lt;b>zûkû: &lt;/b>tadin&lt;br />&lt;b>azâb: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>el huldi: &lt;/b>sürekli, daimî, (hâlidîne) ebedî&lt;br />&lt;b>hel: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>tuczevne: &lt;/b>cezalandirilacaksiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sey ile&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>teksibûne: &lt;/b>kazaniyorsunuz
    <string name="sozluk.010.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yestenbiûne-ke: &lt;/b>ve senden haber soracaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>e hakkun: &lt;/b>bu gerçek mi, hak midir&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>î ve rabbî: &lt;/b>evet Rabbime andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>le hakkun: &lt;/b>kesin olarak haktir (gerçektir)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ entum: &lt;/b>ve siz degilsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mu'cizîne: &lt;/b>aciz birakan kimseler"
    <string name="sozluk.010.054">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>enne: &lt;/b>gerçekten, muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>li kulli nefsin: &lt;/b>her nefs için, her nefsin, ona ait, onun&lt;br />&lt;b>zalemet: &lt;/b>zulmetti&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde ne varsa&lt;br />&lt;b>le iftedet: &lt;/b>mutlaka feda ederdi (etti)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eserrû: &lt;/b>ve gizlediler, gizlice içlerinde hissettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>en nedâmete: &lt;/b>pismanliklari&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>reevu el azâbe: &lt;/b>azabi görünce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kudiye: &lt;/b>ve hükmedildi&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>aralarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kisti: &lt;/b>adaletle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuzlemûne: &lt;/b>zulmedilmezler (haksizliga ugratilmazlar)

    <string name="sozluk.010.072">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>tevelleytum: &lt;/b>yüz çevirirsiniz, dönersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe mâ se'eltu-kum: &lt;/b>o zaman sizden istemem, istemedim&lt;br />&lt;b>min ecrin: &lt;/b>ücretten, bir ücret&lt;br />&lt;b>in ecriye: &lt;/b>(eger varsa) benim ecrim, ücretim&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>yalniz, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a ait&lt;br />&lt;b>ve umirtu: &lt;/b>ve emrolundum&lt;br />&lt;b>en ekûne: &lt;/b>olmakla&lt;br />&lt;b>min el muslimîne: &lt;/b>(Allah'a) teslim olanlardan"
    <string name="sozluk.010.073">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kezzebû-hu: &lt;/b>fakat onu yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe necceynâ-hu: &lt;/b>sonra biz onu kurtardik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim, kimse(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-hu: &lt;/b>onunla beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el fulki: &lt;/b>gemide&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cealnâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari kildik (yaptik)&lt;br />&lt;b>halâife: &lt;/b>halifeler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve agraknâ: &lt;/b>ve suda bogduk&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanlayan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>fanzur (fe unzur): &lt;/b>artik bak&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âkibetu el munzerîne: &lt;/b>uyarilanlarin sonu (akibeti)

    <string name="sozluk.011.008">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le in: &lt;/b>ve eger, gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>ahharnâ: &lt;/b>biz erteledik, tehir ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum el azâbe: &lt;/b>onlardan azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ ummetin: &lt;/b>bir ümmete (bir topluma)&lt;br />&lt;b>ma'dûdetin: &lt;/b>sayili (bir zaman), belli bir müddet&lt;br />&lt;b>le yekûlunne: &lt;/b>muhakkak derler ki&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>nedir&lt;br />&lt;b>yahbisu-hu: &lt;/b>onu (hapseden), tutan, men eden&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ: &lt;/b>degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme ye'tî-him: &lt;/b>onlara geldigi gün&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>masrûfen: &lt;/b>çevrilecek, uzaklastirilacak&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hâka: &lt;/b>ve kusatti&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kânû: &lt;/b>olduklari sey&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>yestehziûne: &lt;/b>alay ediyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.011.009">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le: &lt;/b>ve elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>ezaknâ el insâne: &lt;/b>insana tattirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min-nâ: &lt;/b>bizden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmeten: &lt;/b>bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>neza'nâ-hâ: &lt;/b>onu biz çekip aldik&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>le yeûsun: &lt;/b>mutlaka (tamamen) ümitsiz olur&lt;br />&lt;b>kefûrun: &lt;/b>nankör olur"

    <string name="sozluk.011.024">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mesele: &lt;/b>durum, hal, örnek&lt;br />&lt;b>el ferîkayni: &lt;/b>iki grup, iki topluluk&lt;br />&lt;b>ke el a'mâ: &lt;/b>âmâ, kör olan kimse (göremeyen) gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el esammi: &lt;/b>ve sagir olan kimse (isitmeyen)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el basîri: &lt;/b>ve gören (basar hassasi çalisan)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es semîi: &lt;/b>ve isiten (sem'î hassasi çalisan)&lt;br />&lt;b>hel yesteviyâni: &lt;/b>ikisi esit (müsavi) mi&lt;br />&lt;b>meselen: &lt;/b>durum, hal, örnek&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe lâ tezekkerûne: &lt;/b>hâlâ tezekkür etmez misiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.011.025">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>erselnâ: &lt;/b>biz gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>nûhan: &lt;/b>Nuh'u&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>kendi (onun) kavmine&lt;br />&lt;b>in-nî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ben&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>nezîrun: &lt;/b>bir uyariciyim&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînun &lt;br>(ebâne): &lt;/b>ifadesi açik ve kesin olan, fasih konusan, açiklayan, açikça ifade eden kisi &lt;br>: (açik konustu, kesin ifade etti)"

    <string name="sozluk.011.027">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kâle el meleu: &lt;/b>o zaman ileri gelenler dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kavminden&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ nerâ-ke: &lt;/b>biz, seni görmüyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ beseren: &lt;/b>beserden baska&lt;br />&lt;b>misle-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ nerâ-ke: &lt;/b>ve görmüyoruz seni&lt;br />&lt;b>ittebea-ke: &lt;/b>sana tâbî oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>illellezîne (illâ ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimselerden baska&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>erâzilu-nâ: &lt;/b>bizden asagi (fakir, zayif ve aciz)&lt;br />&lt;b>bâdiye: &lt;/b>basit olan, düsünmeden olan&lt;br />&lt;b>er re'yi: &lt;/b>görüs, rey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ nerâ: &lt;/b>ve biz görmüyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizi (sizin için)&lt;br />&lt;b>aleynâ: &lt;/b>bizim üzerimizde&lt;br />&lt;b>min fadlin: &lt;/b>bir ihsan, üstünlük olarak, üstün, bir fazl&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>bilâkis, aksine&lt;br />&lt;b>nezunnu-kum: &lt;/b>sizi zannediyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>kâzibîne: &lt;/b>yalanlayanlar, yalancilar"
    <string name="sozluk.011.028">&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ kavmi: &lt;/b>ey kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>e raeytum: &lt;/b>sizin reyiniz, görüsünüz mü&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntu: &lt;/b>eger ben isem&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ beyyinetin: &lt;/b>bir beyyine, kesin, delil üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbimden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âtâ-nî: &lt;/b>ve bana verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmeten: &lt;/b>bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>min indi-hî: &lt;/b>onun katindan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ummiyet: &lt;/b>gizli tutuldu (saklandi)&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>nulzimu-kum-(û)-hâ: &lt;/b>sizi ona mecbur tutalim (zorlayalim) (elzem, mecbur, gerekli)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>lehâ: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>kârihûne: &lt;/b>kerih görenler, hoslanmayanlar

    <string name="sozluk.011.045">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nâdâ: &lt;/b>ve seslendi&lt;br />&lt;b>nûhun: &lt;/b>Nuh&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-hu: &lt;/b>Rabbine&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kâle: &lt;/b>o zaman dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>innebnî (inne ibnî): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki benim oglum&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>ehlî: &lt;/b>benim ailem&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve süphesiz ki&lt;br />&lt;b>va'de-ke: &lt;/b>senin vaadin&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakku: &lt;/b>haktir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ente: &lt;/b>ve sen&lt;br />&lt;b>ahkem: &lt;/b>en iyi hüküm veren&lt;br />&lt;b>el hâkimîne: &lt;/b>hüküm verenler"

    <string name="sozluk.011.063">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ kavmi: &lt;/b>ey kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>e raeytum: &lt;/b>gördünüz mü, sizin görüsünüz (bu) mu&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntu alâ: &lt;/b>sâyet ben üzerinde isem&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyinetin: &lt;/b>açik bir belge, beyyine, delil&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbimden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âtâ-nî: &lt;/b>ve bana verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan, kendinden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmeten: &lt;/b>bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>fe men: &lt;/b>o zaman kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yansuru-nî: &lt;/b>bana yardim eder&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan (azabindan), Allah'a karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>in asaytu-hu: &lt;/b>eger ona isyan edersem&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o halde, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>tezîdûne-nî: &lt;/b>bana artirirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra: &lt;/b>baska&lt;br />&lt;b>tahsîrin: &lt;/b>hayirdan uzaklasma"
    <string name="sozluk.011.064">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yâ kavmi: &lt;/b>ve ey kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzihî: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>nâkatu allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in (disi) devesi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>âyeten: &lt;/b>bir âyet, delil, mucize&lt;br />&lt;b>fe zerû-hâ: &lt;/b>onu serbest birakin&lt;br />&lt;b>te'kul: &lt;/b>yesin&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ardi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in arzinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ temessû-hâ: &lt;/b>ve ona dokunmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sûin: &lt;/b>kötülükle&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ye'huze-kum: &lt;/b>aksi halde, o taktirde sizi alir (olur)&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun karîbun: &lt;/b>yakin bir azap"

    <string name="sozluk.011.082">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>artik oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câe: &lt;/b>geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>emru-nâ: &lt;/b>emrimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>cealnâ: &lt;/b>biz kildik, yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>âliye-hâ: &lt;/b>onu en yüksek&lt;br />&lt;b>sâfile-hâ &lt;br>(ceale âliye-hâ sâfile-hâ): &lt;/b>onu en alçak &lt;br>: (onun altini üstüne getirdi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emtar-nâ: &lt;/b>ve yagdirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhâ: &lt;/b>onun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>hicâraten: &lt;/b>taslar&lt;br />&lt;b>min siccîlin: &lt;/b>siccilden (pisirilip sertlestirilmis kerpiçten yapilmis)&lt;br />&lt;b>mendûdin: &lt;/b>dizilip hazirlanmis, istif edilmis (veya ardarda gelen)

    <string name="sozluk.011.084">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ilâ medyene: &lt;/b>ve Medyen kavmine&lt;br />&lt;b>ehâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kardesi&lt;br />&lt;b>suayben: &lt;/b>Suayb&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ kavmi: &lt;/b>ey kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>u'budû allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a kul olun&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min ilâhin: &lt;/b>bir ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>gayru-hu: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tenkusû: &lt;/b>ve eksiltmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>el mikyâle: &lt;/b>ölçek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mîzâne: &lt;/b>ve tarti, mizan&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>gerçekten, muhakkak ben&lt;br />&lt;b>erâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi görüyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hayrin: &lt;/b>hayirda (refah ve bollukta)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in-nî: &lt;/b>ve gerçekten, muhakkak ben&lt;br />&lt;b>ehâfu: &lt;/b>korkuyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbe: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>yevmin muhîtin: &lt;/b>ihata eden (kusatan) gün"
    <string name="sozluk.011.085">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yâ kavmi: &lt;/b>ve ey kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>evfû: &lt;/b>ifa edin (yerine getirin)&lt;br />&lt;b>el mikyâle: &lt;/b>ölçek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mîzâne: &lt;/b>ve tarti, mizan&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kisti: &lt;/b>adalet ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tebhasû en nâse: &lt;/b>ve insanlara eksiltmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>esyâe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin esyalari (seyleri), haklari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ ta'sev: &lt;/b>ve karisiklik, bozgunculuk yapmayin, fesat çikarmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>mufsidîne: &lt;/b>fesat çikaranlar"

    <string name="sozluk.011.105">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'ti: &lt;/b>gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tekellemu: &lt;/b>konusmaz (konusamaz)&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsun: &lt;/b>bir kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, baska, olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni-hî: &lt;/b>onun izni&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan bir kismi&lt;br />&lt;b>sakiyyun: &lt;/b>sâkîdir (bedbaht) (cehennemde kalacaklar)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve saîdun: &lt;/b>ve saiddir (mutlu) (cennette kalacak lar)"
    <string name="sozluk.011.106">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe emmâ: &lt;/b>ama, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne sekû: &lt;/b>sâkî olanlar, mutsuz olanlar, bed- baht olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî en nâri: &lt;/b>ates içinde, ateste&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>zefîrun: &lt;/b>sesli nefes verme, inilti, hizli soluk soluga nefes almak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sehîkun: &lt;/b>ve nefesin içeri çekilip, siddetli ve kötü bir sesle çikmasi
    <string name="sozluk.011.107">"&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidîne: &lt;/b>ebedî kalanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>onun içinde, orada&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ dâmeti: &lt;/b>devam ettikçe, durdugu müddetçe&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâtu: &lt;/b>gökler, semalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardu: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzü, arz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, baska, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ sâe: &lt;/b>diledigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe'âlun: &lt;/b>yapandir&lt;br />&lt;b>li-mâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdu: &lt;/b>diler"
    <string name="sozluk.011.108">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emmâ: &lt;/b>ve fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne suidû: &lt;/b>mutlu olanlar, said olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el cenneti: &lt;/b>cennette&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidîne: &lt;/b>ebedî kalanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>onun içinde, orada&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ dâmeti: &lt;/b>devam ettikçe, durdugu müddetçe&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâtu: &lt;/b>gökler, semalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardu: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzü, arz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>baska, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ sâe: &lt;/b>diledigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>atâen: &lt;/b>lütuf, bagis, ihsan olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra: &lt;/b>olmayan&lt;br />&lt;b>meczûzin &lt;br>(gayre meczûzin): &lt;/b>kesinti, kesilmis &lt;br>: (kesintisiz, devamli, kesilmeyen)
    <string name="sozluk.011.109">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ teku: &lt;/b>sen olma&lt;br />&lt;b>fî miryetin: &lt;/b>süphe içinde, kusku içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden (dolayi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'budu: &lt;/b>ibadet ediyor, kulluk ediyor, tapiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>hâulâi: &lt;/b>bunlar, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ya'budûne: &lt;/b>onlarin taptiklari sey, ibadet ettikleri sey&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, baska&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâ: &lt;/b>gibi, nasil ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'budu: &lt;/b>ibadet ediyor, kulluk ediyor, tapiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>âbâu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin atalari, babalari&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in-nâ: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak biz&lt;br />&lt;b>le muveffû-hum: &lt;/b>elbette onlara ödeyen (vefa eden)&lt;br />&lt;b>nasîbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin nasipleri&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra menkûsin: &lt;/b>eksiltmeksizin (tenkis etmeksizin)"
    <string name="sozluk.011.110">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>âteynâ: &lt;/b>biz verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (a.s)'a&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>fahtulife (fe ihtulife): &lt;/b>bundan sonra ihtilâfa (anlasmazliga) düstüler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev lâ: &lt;/b>ve olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>kelimetun: &lt;/b>bir söz, bir kelime&lt;br />&lt;b>sebekat: &lt;/b>geçti (söylendi)&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>le kudiye: &lt;/b>mutlaka hüküm verilmis olurdu&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne-hum: &lt;/b>ve gerçekten, muhakkak onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>le fî sekkin: &lt;/b>kesin, ciddî, bir tereddüt (süphe) içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>murîbun &lt;br>(rayb): &lt;/b>tatmin etmeyen, kanaat hasil etmeyen, süphe veren &lt;br>: (süphe)"

    <string name="sozluk.011.120">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kullen: &lt;/b>ve hepsini, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>nakussu: &lt;/b>anlattik, naklettik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>min enbâi: &lt;/b>haberlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>er rusuli: &lt;/b>resûller&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>nusebbitu: &lt;/b>sabitlestiririz, saglamlastiririz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>fuâde-ke: &lt;/b>senin kalbindeki idrak hassasini (fizigin ötesine açik idrak)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve câe-ke: &lt;/b>ve sana geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî hâzihi: &lt;/b>bunda&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakku: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mev'izatun: &lt;/b>ve ögüt&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zikrâ: &lt;/b>ve zikir&lt;br />&lt;b>li el muminîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler için, mü'minlere"
    <string name="sozluk.011.121">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kul: &lt;/b>ve de (ki)&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>...e&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne lâ yu'minû: &lt;/b>mü'min olmayan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>a'melû: &lt;/b>yapin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ mekâneti-kum: &lt;/b>bulundugunuz hal, yapmakta oldugunuz seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>in-nâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>âmilûne: &lt;/b>yapanlar, amel edenler"

    <string name="sozluk.012.004">&lt;br />&lt;b>iz kâle: &lt;/b>dedigi zaman, demisti&lt;br />&lt;b>yûsufu: &lt;/b>Yusuf&lt;br />&lt;b>li ebî-hi: &lt;/b>babasina&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ ebeti: &lt;/b>ey baba, babacigim&lt;br />&lt;b>in-nî: &lt;/b>muhakkak, gerçekten ben&lt;br />&lt;b>raeytu: &lt;/b>gördüm&lt;br />&lt;b>ehade asera: &lt;/b>on bir (11)&lt;br />&lt;b>kevkeben: &lt;/b>yildiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es semse: &lt;/b>ve günes&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kamere: &lt;/b>ve ay&lt;br />&lt;b>raeytu-hum: &lt;/b>onlari gördüm&lt;br />&lt;b>lî: &lt;/b>bana&lt;br />&lt;b>sâcidîne: &lt;/b>secde edenler

    <string name="sozluk.012.023">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve râvedet-hu &lt;br>(râvede): &lt;/b>ve ondan murat almak istedi, onunla olmak istedi &lt;br>: (beraber olmak istedi)&lt;br />&lt;b>elletî: &lt;/b>ki o (bayan için)&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>fî beyti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun evinde&lt;br />&lt;b>an nefsi-hî: &lt;/b>onun nefsinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve gallekat: &lt;/b>ve simsiki kapadi&lt;br />&lt;b>el ebvâbe: &lt;/b>kapilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlet: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>heyte: &lt;/b>hadi gel&lt;br />&lt;b>leke: &lt;/b>senin için, sana, sen&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>maâza allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a siginirim&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak o&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>benim Rabbim, benim efendim, beni besleyip koruyanim&lt;br />&lt;b>ahsene: &lt;/b>en güzel sekilde&lt;br />&lt;b>mesvâye: &lt;/b>benim yerlesme yerim&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuflihu: &lt;/b>felâha, kurtulusa ermez&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâlimûne: &lt;/b>zalimler"
    <string name="sozluk.012.024">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>hemmet: &lt;/b>arzuladi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hemme: &lt;/b>ve arzuladi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onu (bayani)&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>sâyet, eger olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>en raâ: &lt;/b>görmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>burhâne: &lt;/b>delilik&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-hi: &lt;/b>Rabbinin&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>li nasrife: &lt;/b>çevirmemiz, uzaklastirmamiz için&lt;br />&lt;b>anhu es sûe: &lt;/b>onu kötülükten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el fahsâe: &lt;/b>ve fuhus&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>min ibâdi-nâ: &lt;/b>kullarimizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>el muhlesîne: &lt;/b>muhlis olanlar

    <string name="sozluk.012.039">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ sâhibeyis sicni: &lt;/b>ey zindan arkadaslarim&lt;br />&lt;b>e erbâbun: &lt;/b>Rab'ler mi&lt;br />&lt;b>muteferrikûne: &lt;/b>ayri ayri, birçok (tefrik edilmis olanlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>emillâhu (emi allâhu): &lt;/b>yoksa, Allah mi&lt;br />&lt;b>el vâhidu: &lt;/b>bir tek olan, tek&lt;br />&lt;b>el kahhâru: &lt;/b>kahhar olan (tutan, yakalayan, hakim ve gâlip olan)"
    <string name="sozluk.012.040">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'budûne: &lt;/b>siz tapiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni-hi: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, yalniz&lt;br />&lt;b>esmâen: &lt;/b>isimler&lt;br />&lt;b>semmeytumû-hâ: &lt;/b>onu isimlendirdiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âbâu-kum: &lt;/b>ve atalariniz, babalariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ enzele allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah indirmedi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>min sultânin: &lt;/b>(delilden) bir delil&lt;br />&lt;b>in el hukmu: &lt;/b>hüküm ise&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>yalniz, sadece, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'indir, Allah'a aittir&lt;br />&lt;b>emere: &lt;/b>emretti&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ (en lâ) ta'budû: &lt;/b>kul olmamaniz, kulluk etmemeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>disinda, ...den baskasina&lt;br />&lt;b>iyyâ-hu: &lt;/b>yalniz o&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dînu el kayyimu: &lt;/b>kayyum (Âdem (a.s)'dan kiyâmete kadar devam edecek olan) dîn &lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat, ama&lt;br />&lt;b>eksere en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlarin çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmezler, bilmiyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.012.041">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ sâhibeyi es sicni: &lt;/b>ey zindan arkadaslarim&lt;br />&lt;b>emmâ ehadu-kumâ: &lt;/b>ama, fakat, bu durumda sizin ikinizden biri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yeskî: &lt;/b>bundan sonra sâkilik yapacak (içecek, sarap sunacak)&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-hu: &lt;/b>rabbine, efendisine&lt;br />&lt;b>hamren: &lt;/b>sarap, üzüm&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emmâ el âharu: &lt;/b>ve (ama) fakat digeri, digerine gelince&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yuslebu: &lt;/b>asilacak&lt;br />&lt;b>fe te'kulu et tayru: &lt;/b>sonra, böylece, kus(lar) yiyecek&lt;br />&lt;b>min ra'si-hi: &lt;/b>onun basindan&lt;br />&lt;b>kudiye: &lt;/b>olmustur, bitirilmistir, kesinlesmistir (kesinlestirilmistir)&lt;br />&lt;b>el emru: &lt;/b>emir, is, hüküm&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>testeftiyâni: &lt;/b>ikinizin tabirini, fetvasini, açiklamasini istediginiz"
    <string name="sozluk.012.042">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>lillezî (li ellezî): &lt;/b>o kimseye&lt;br />&lt;b>zanne: &lt;/b>zannetti, bildi&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hu: &lt;/b>onun oldugu&lt;br />&lt;b>nâcin: &lt;/b>kurtulan kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>min humâ: &lt;/b>ikisinden&lt;br />&lt;b>uzkur-ni: &lt;/b>beni zikret, hatirla, an&lt;br />&lt;b>inde rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>efendinin yaninda&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ensâhu: &lt;/b>o zaman, fakat ona unutturdu&lt;br />&lt;b>es seytânu: &lt;/b>seytan&lt;br />&lt;b>zikre: &lt;/b>hatirlama, anma&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-hi: &lt;/b>onun efendisi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lebise: &lt;/b>böylece kaldi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es sicni: &lt;/b>zindanda&lt;br />&lt;b>bid'a: &lt;/b>birkaç&lt;br />&lt;b>sinîne: &lt;/b>seneler"

    <string name="sozluk.012.047">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>tezreûne: &lt;/b>ekin ekersiniz, ekin&lt;br />&lt;b>seb'a: &lt;/b>yedi (7)&lt;br />&lt;b>sinîne: &lt;/b>seneler&lt;br />&lt;b>deeben: &lt;/b>âdetiniz üzere, devam ederek, eskisi gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ hasadtum: &lt;/b>hasat ettiklerinizi, biçtiginiz seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe zerû-hu: &lt;/b>sonra onu (onlari) birakin&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sunbuli-hi: &lt;/b>kendi basaginda&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>kalîlen: &lt;/b>az&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>sey(ler)den&lt;br />&lt;b>te'kulûne &lt;br>(min mâ te'kulûne): &lt;/b>yiyorsunuz &lt;br>: (yediginiz seylerden)"
    <string name="sozluk.012.048">"&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>bir süre sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'tî: &lt;/b>gelecek, gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>...dan sonra, arkasindan&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>seb'un: &lt;/b>yedi (7)&lt;br />&lt;b>sidâdun: &lt;/b>siddetli, kuvvetli, zor&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'kulne: &lt;/b>yiyecekler, yerler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kaddemtum: &lt;/b>önceden sakladiginiz, takdim ettiginiz, hazirladiginiz seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>lehunne: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>disinda, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>kalîlen: &lt;/b>azi&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>sey(ler)den&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhsinûne: &lt;/b>biriktiriyorsunuz, sakliyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.012.049">"&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'tî: &lt;/b>gelecek&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>...dan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>âmun: &lt;/b>sene, yil&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onda, içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>yugâsu en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlara yardim edilecek, yardim görecekler, yagmur verilecek, verimli, bol mahsullü olacak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve fî-hi: &lt;/b>ve onda (o yilda)&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'sirûne: &lt;/b>meyvelerin suyunu sikacaklar,"
    <string name="sozluk.012.050">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kale el meliku'tû-nî: &lt;/b>ve Melik, hükümdar “bana getirin” dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>böylece, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câe-hu er resûlu: &lt;/b>ona resûl, ulak, haberci, elçi geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>kale irci': &lt;/b>dedi \"dön\"&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>efendine&lt;br />&lt;b>fe es'el-hu: &lt;/b>böylece, o zaman ona sor&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>nedir&lt;br />&lt;b>bâlu en nisveti: &lt;/b>o kadinlarin durumu, hali&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâtî kattane: &lt;/b>kesenler (kadinlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>eydiyehunne: &lt;/b>ellerini&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>bi keydihinne: &lt;/b>onlarin (kadinlarin) hilelerini&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilendir"
    <string name="sozluk.012.051">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>nedir&lt;br />&lt;b>hatbukunne: &lt;/b>üzerinde konusma yaptiginiz konu, konustugunuz konu, mesele&lt;br />&lt;b>iz râvedtunne yûsufe: &lt;/b>Yusuf'u elde etmek istediginiz zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>an nefsi-hi: &lt;/b>onun nefsinden&lt;br />&lt;b>kulne: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâse: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah için&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ alimnâ: &lt;/b>biz bilmedik, görmedik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>onda&lt;br />&lt;b>min sûin: &lt;/b>(kötülükten) bir kötülük&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlet imraetu el azîzi: &lt;/b>azîzin hanimi dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>el âne: &lt;/b>simdi&lt;br />&lt;b>hashasa el hakku: &lt;/b>hak (gizli iken sonradan) ortaya çikti&lt;br />&lt;b>ene: &lt;/b>ben&lt;br />&lt;b>râvedtu-hu: &lt;/b>onu elde etmeye çalistim, murat almak istedim&lt;br />&lt;b>an nefsi-hi: &lt;/b>onun nefsinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne-hu: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak o&lt;br />&lt;b>le min es sâdikîne: &lt;/b>elbette dogru söyleyenlerden, sadiklardan"
    <string name="sozluk.012.052">"&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>li ya'leme: &lt;/b>bilmesi içindir&lt;br />&lt;b>ennî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ben&lt;br />&lt;b>lem ehun-hu: &lt;/b>ona ihanet etmedim&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el gaybi: &lt;/b>yoklugunda, giyabinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yehdî: &lt;/b>hidayete erdirmez, basariya ulastirmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>keyde el hâinîne: &lt;/b>ihanet edenlerin tuzagi, hilesi"
    <string name="sozluk.012.053">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ uberriu: &lt;/b>ve temize çikaramam&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsî: &lt;/b>nefsimi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne en nefse: &lt;/b>muhakkak nefs&lt;br />&lt;b>le emmâretun: &lt;/b>mutlaka emreder&lt;br />&lt;b>bis sûi: &lt;/b>sûi olani, serri, kötülügü, kötülük ile&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ rahime: &lt;/b>Rahîm esmasiyla tecelli ettigi kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>magfiret edendir, günahlari sevaba çevirendir&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>Rahîm esmasiyla tecelli edendir, rahmet nuru gönderendir, merhamet edendir
    <string name="sozluk.012.054">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>el meliku'tûnî: &lt;/b>melik, hükümdar “bana getirin”&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>estahlis-hu: &lt;/b>onu seçtim, (bana) has kildim&lt;br />&lt;b>li nefsî: &lt;/b>kendim için&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kelleme-hu: &lt;/b>onunla konustu&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>inneke el yevme: &lt;/b>muhakkak sen bugün&lt;br />&lt;b>ledey-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim yanimizda&lt;br />&lt;b>mekînun: &lt;/b>yüksek mevki sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>emînun: &lt;/b>güvenilir, emin"
    <string name="sozluk.012.055">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle ic'al-ni: &lt;/b>beni (sorumlu) kil dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>hazâin el ardi: &lt;/b>bu yerin hazineleri&lt;br />&lt;b>in-ni: &lt;/b>muhakkak ben&lt;br />&lt;b>hafîzun: &lt;/b>iyi koruyan&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.012.056">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezâlike: &lt;/b>ve iste böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>mekkennâ: &lt;/b>yerlestirdik, mevki sahibi yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>li yûsufe: &lt;/b>Yusuf'u&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>yetebevveu: &lt;/b>konaklar, yerlesir&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>oradan, orada&lt;br />&lt;b>haysu: &lt;/b>yer, yerde&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>nusîbu: &lt;/b>isabet ettiririz, göndeririz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi rahmeti-nâ: &lt;/b>rahmetimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>men nesâu: &lt;/b>diledigimiz kimseye&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ nudîu: &lt;/b>ve zayi etmeyiz, kayba ugratmayiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ecre el muhsinîne: &lt;/b>muhsinlerin ecrini, ücretini, karsiligini"
    <string name="sozluk.012.057">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le ecrul âhirati: &lt;/b>ve mutlaka, ahiretin ecri (mükâfati)&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirlidir&lt;br />&lt;b>lillezîne (li ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimseler için&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olan, (yasarken) Allah'a ulasmayi dileyen kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kânû: &lt;/b>ve oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yettekûne: &lt;/b>takva sahibi olurlar"
    <string name="sozluk.012.058">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve câe: &lt;/b>ve geldi(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ihvetu yûsufe: &lt;/b>Yusuf'un kardesleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe dehalû: &lt;/b>böylece, ve girdiler&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona, onun yanina&lt;br />&lt;b>fe arafe-hum: &lt;/b>hemen onlari tanidi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>munkirûne: &lt;/b>tanimayanlar (taniyamayanlar)"
    <string name="sozluk.012.059">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lemmâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>cehheze-hum: &lt;/b>onlara hazirladi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi cehâzi-him: &lt;/b>zahiri yüklerini&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle'tûnî: &lt;/b>bana getirin dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ahin: &lt;/b>kardesinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin&lt;br />&lt;b>min ebî-kum: &lt;/b>sizin babanizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ terevne: &lt;/b>görmüyor musunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ennî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ben&lt;br />&lt;b>ûfî el keyle: &lt;/b>ölçmeyi tam ifa ederim, yaparim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ene: &lt;/b>ve ben&lt;br />&lt;b>hayru: &lt;/b>en hayirlisi&lt;br />&lt;b>el munzilîne: &lt;/b>agirlayanlar, ikram edenler"

    <string name="sozluk.012.076">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>bedee: &lt;/b>basladi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ev'iyeti-him: &lt;/b>onlarin heybeleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kable: &lt;/b>önce&lt;br />&lt;b>viâi: &lt;/b>kap, heybe&lt;br />&lt;b>ahî-hi: &lt;/b>kardesinin&lt;br />&lt;b>summestahracehâ (summe- istahrace-hâ): &lt;/b>sonra onu çikardi&lt;br />&lt;b>min viâi ahî-hi: &lt;/b>kardesinin heybesinden&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kidnâ &lt;br>(keyd): &lt;/b>düzen hazirladik &lt;br>: (hile, düzen, tedbir)&lt;br />&lt;b>li yûsufe: &lt;/b>Yusuf için&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kâne: &lt;/b>olmadi, olmazdi&lt;br />&lt;b>li ye'huze: &lt;/b>alikoymasi, tutmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ehâ-hu: &lt;/b>kardesini&lt;br />&lt;b>fî dîni el meliki: &lt;/b>melikin dîninde, milletinde, kurallarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...den baska, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>en yesâallâhu(yesâu allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah'in dilemesi&lt;br />&lt;b>nerfeu: &lt;/b>yükseltiriz&lt;br />&lt;b>deracâtin: &lt;/b>dereceler&lt;br />&lt;b>men nesâu: &lt;/b>diledigimiz kimseye&lt;br />&lt;b>ve fevka: &lt;/b>ve üstünde&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli: &lt;/b>bütün, her&lt;br />&lt;b>zî ilmin: &lt;/b>ilim sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>daha iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.012.077">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>in yesrik: &lt;/b>eger çalmissa&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kad: &lt;/b>olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>seraka: &lt;/b>çaldi&lt;br />&lt;b>ahun: &lt;/b>kardesi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>fe eserra-hâ: &lt;/b>onu sakli tuttu, gizledi&lt;br />&lt;b>yûsufu: &lt;/b>Yusuf&lt;br />&lt;b>fî nefsi-hî: &lt;/b>nefsinde, kendi içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yubdi-hâ: &lt;/b>ve onu açiklamadi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>serrun: &lt;/b>ser, kötü, fena&lt;br />&lt;b>mekânen: &lt;/b>konum, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>a'lemu: &lt;/b>daha iyi, çok iyi bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>dolayisiyla, o sey sebebiyle, o seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>tasifûne: &lt;/b>anlatiyorsunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.012.095">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>tallâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a yemin olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-ke: &lt;/b>muhakkak, gerçekten sen&lt;br />&lt;b>le fî: &lt;/b>içindesin&lt;br />&lt;b>dalâlike: &lt;/b>senin dalâletin (dogru olan seyden uzakligin, sapman)&lt;br />&lt;b>el kadîmi: &lt;/b>eski"

    <string name="sozluk.013.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>elif, lâm, mîm, râ: &lt;/b>hurûfu mukattaa; mukattaa harfleridir.     <string name="sozluk.013.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu ellezî: &lt;/b>Allah o ki&lt;br />&lt;b>rafea es semavâti: &lt;/b>gökleri yükseltti&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayri: &lt;/b>olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>amedin: &lt;/b>direkler&lt;br />&lt;b>terevne-hâ: &lt;/b>onu görüyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>summe istevâ: &lt;/b>sonra istiva etti&lt;br />&lt;b>alâl arsi (alâ el arsi): &lt;/b>arsin üzerine, arsa&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sehhara: &lt;/b>ve emri altina aldi&lt;br />&lt;b>es semse: &lt;/b>günes&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kamere: &lt;/b>ve ay&lt;br />&lt;b>kullun: &lt;/b>hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>yecrî: &lt;/b>akar gider (hareket eder)&lt;br />&lt;b>li ecelin: &lt;/b>bir süreye (zamana) kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>musemmen: &lt;/b>belirlenmis (isimlendirilmis)&lt;br />&lt;b>yudebbiru el emre: &lt;/b>isleri düzenleyip dizayn eder, idare eder&lt;br />&lt;b>yufassilu el âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetleri ayri ayri açiklar&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki siz, böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi likâi: &lt;/b>mülâki olmaya, ulasmaya&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbinize&lt;br />&lt;b>tûkinûne: &lt;/b>kesin inanirsiniz, yakîn hasil edersiniz
    <string name="sozluk.013.003">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>medde: &lt;/b>uzatti, yaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>el arda: &lt;/b>yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ceale: &lt;/b>ve kildi, yapti (yaratti)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>ravâsiye: &lt;/b>daglar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enhâren: &lt;/b>ve nehirler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min kulli: &lt;/b>ve hepsinden&lt;br />&lt;b>es semerâti: &lt;/b>ürünler, meyveler&lt;br />&lt;b>ceale: &lt;/b>kildi (yaratti)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>zevceynisneyni &lt;br>(zevceyni) &lt;br>(isneyni): &lt;/b>ikili (zit cinsten esler) bir çift &lt;br>: (zit cinsli bir çift (disi+erkek)) &lt;br>: (iki, ikili)&lt;br />&lt;b>yugsi: &lt;/b>örter&lt;br />&lt;b>el leyl: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>en nehâre: &lt;/b>gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zâlike: &lt;/b>bunda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>le âyâtin: &lt;/b>elbette âyetler&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim için&lt;br />&lt;b>yetefekkerûne: &lt;/b>tefekkür ederler

    <string name="sozluk.013.016">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalarin (göklerin) Rabbi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>kulillâhu (kul allâhu): &lt;/b>\"Allah'tir\" de&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>e fettehaztum: &lt;/b>artik siz, ...mi edindiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni-hi: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>evliyâe: &lt;/b>evliya, velîler, dostlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yemlikûne: &lt;/b>yapamaz, gücü yetmez, malik degil&lt;br />&lt;b>li enfusi-him: &lt;/b>kendileri için&lt;br />&lt;b>nef'an: &lt;/b>bir yarar, fayda, menfaat&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ darren: &lt;/b>ve zarar vermez&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>hel yestevi: &lt;/b>bir mi, bir olur mu?&lt;br />&lt;b>el a'mâ: &lt;/b>âmâ olan, görmeyen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el basîru: &lt;/b>ve gören&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya&lt;br />&lt;b>hel testevî: &lt;/b>bir mi, bir olur mu?&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zulumâtu: &lt;/b>karanliklar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en nûru: &lt;/b>ve nur&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya&lt;br />&lt;b>cealû: &lt;/b>kildilar, yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>surakâe: &lt;/b>ortaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>halakû: &lt;/b>yarattilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>halki-hi: &lt;/b>onun yaratmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>tesâbehe: &lt;/b>birbirine benzedi, benzer göründü&lt;br />&lt;b>el halku: &lt;/b>yaratma&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>kulillâhu (kul allâhu): &lt;/b>\"Allah\" de&lt;br />&lt;b>hâliku: &lt;/b>yaratan&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>hersey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>el vâhidu: &lt;/b>ek (bir tane)&lt;br />&lt;b>el kahhâru: &lt;/b>kahhar olan, kahreden, en kuvvetli olan, herseye gücü yeten"
    <string name="sozluk.013.017">&lt;br />&lt;b>enzele: &lt;/b>indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>gökten&lt;br />&lt;b>mâen: &lt;/b>su&lt;br />&lt;b>fe sâlet: &lt;/b>böylece akti&lt;br />&lt;b>evdiyetun: &lt;/b>vadiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kaderi-hâ: &lt;/b>miktarinca, ona takdir edilen miktar kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>fahtemele (fe ihtemele): &lt;/b>böylece yüklendi, götürdü, tasidi&lt;br />&lt;b>es seylu: &lt;/b>sel&lt;br />&lt;b>zebeden: &lt;/b>köpük&lt;br />&lt;b>râbiyen: &lt;/b>üste çikan, kabaran&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mim-mâ: &lt;/b>ve seyden, seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>yûkidûne: &lt;/b>atese tutulurlar, yakilirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona, üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>fî en nâri: &lt;/b>ates içinde, ateste&lt;br />&lt;b>ibtigâe: &lt;/b>istedi&lt;br />&lt;b>hilyetin: &lt;/b>süs esyasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>metâin: &lt;/b>meta, esya&lt;br />&lt;b>zebedun: &lt;/b>köpük&lt;br />&lt;b>mislu-hu: &lt;/b>onun misali, onun gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yadribu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah örnek verir&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakka: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el bâtile: &lt;/b>ve bâtil&lt;br />&lt;b>fe emmâ: &lt;/b>ama, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zebedu: &lt;/b>köpük&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yezhebu: &lt;/b>fakat, sonra gider&lt;br />&lt;b>cufâen: &lt;/b>çözülüp dagilarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emmâ: &lt;/b>ve ama, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey, seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>yenfau en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlara yarar saglar, faydasi olur&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yemkusu: &lt;/b>böylece durur, kalir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>arzda, yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yadribu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah örnek verir&lt;br />&lt;b>el emsâle: &lt;/b>örnekler, misaller
