    <string name="sozluk.013.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>böyle, böylece, öyle&lt;br />&lt;b>erselnâ-ke: &lt;/b>seni gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ummetin: &lt;/b>bir ümmetin içine&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>halet: &lt;/b>gelip geçti&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>umemun: &lt;/b>ümmetler&lt;br />&lt;b>li tetluve: &lt;/b>okuman için&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki onu&lt;br />&lt;b>evhaynâ: &lt;/b>biz vahyettik&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum yekfurûne: &lt;/b>ve onlar inkâr ederler, ediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bir rahmâni: &lt;/b>Rahmân'i&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>benim Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ilâhe: &lt;/b>ilâh yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ huve: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>tevekkeltu: &lt;/b>ben tevekkül ettim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ileyhi: &lt;/b>ve ona&lt;br />&lt;b>metâbi: &lt;/b>benim tövbem, dönüsüm (tövbesi kabul edilmis olarak dönüsüm)"
    <string name="sozluk.013.031">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev enne: &lt;/b>ve eger gerçekten olsaydi bile&lt;br />&lt;b>kur'ânen: &lt;/b>Kur'ân&lt;br />&lt;b>suyyirat: &lt;/b>yürüttü&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>el cibâlu: &lt;/b>daglar&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya, yahut&lt;br />&lt;b>kuttiat: &lt;/b>yarildi (parçalandi)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardu: &lt;/b>arz, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya, yahut&lt;br />&lt;b>kullime: &lt;/b>konusturuldu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevtâ: &lt;/b>ölüler&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>fakat, ama&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in, Allah'a ait&lt;br />&lt;b>el emru: &lt;/b>emir, isler&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>bütün, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe lem: &lt;/b>hâlâ olmadi mi&lt;br />&lt;b>yey’esi: &lt;/b>ümidini kesiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah diler&lt;br />&lt;b>le hedâ en nâse: &lt;/b>elbette insanlari hidayete erdirir&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>tümünü, hepsini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yezâlu: &lt;/b>ve zail olmaz, devam eder&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler, kafir olan kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>tusîbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet eder&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>sanaû: &lt;/b>yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>kâriatun: &lt;/b>büyük bir musîbet (ceza), felâket&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>tehullu: &lt;/b>gelir, iner, girer, hulul eder&lt;br />&lt;b>karîben: &lt;/b>yakin&lt;br />&lt;b>min dâri-him: &lt;/b>yurtlarindan, evlerinden (yurtlarina, evlerine)&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'tiye: &lt;/b>gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>va'du allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in vaadi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuhlifu el mîâde: &lt;/b>vaadinden dönmez"
    <string name="sozluk.013.032">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>istuhzie: &lt;/b>alay edildi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi rusulin: &lt;/b>resûller ile&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-ke: &lt;/b>senden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>emleytu: &lt;/b>ben mühlet (süre) verdim&lt;br />&lt;b>lillezîne (li ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimselere&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler, kafir oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ehaztu-hum: &lt;/b>onlari helâk ettim, aldim, yakaladim&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra, o zaman, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>ikâbi: &lt;/b>ikabim, cezam (azabim)
    <string name="sozluk.013.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe men: &lt;/b>artik kim, ... mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>kâimun: &lt;/b>kaim olan, her yapilan isin basinda bulunan, daima haberdar olan, herseyi derecelendiren&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli: &lt;/b>hepsi, bütün&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsin: &lt;/b>nefs&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ kesebet: &lt;/b>kazandigi seylere&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cealû: &lt;/b>ve kildilar&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>surakâe: &lt;/b>ortaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>semmû-hum: &lt;/b>onlari isimlendirin (onlari isimleri ile davet edin)&lt;br />&lt;b>em tunebbiûne-hu: &lt;/b>yoksa ona haber mi veriyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilmiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>arzda, yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zâhirin: &lt;/b>zahir olan&lt;br />&lt;b>min el kavli: &lt;/b>sözden, sözün&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>zuyyine: &lt;/b>süslü gösterildi&lt;br />&lt;b>lillezîne (li ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimselere, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler, kafir oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>mekru-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin hileleri, tuzaklari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve suddû: &lt;/b>ve men edilldiler, saptirildilar&lt;br />&lt;b>an es sebîli: &lt;/b>yoldan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men yudlili allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah kimi saptirirsa, dalâlette birakirsa&lt;br />&lt;b>fe mâ lehu: &lt;/b>artik onun için yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min hâdin: &lt;/b>bir hidayet eden, hidayetçi"
    <string name="sozluk.013.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun: &lt;/b>bir azap&lt;br />&lt;b>fîl hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayatinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le azâbu el âhirati: &lt;/b>ve elbette ahiretin azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>esakku: &lt;/b>daha güç, daha mesakkatli&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlar için yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>min vâkin: &lt;/b>koruyucu(lardan bir koruyucu)"

    <string name="sozluk.013.042">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kad: &lt;/b>ve olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>mekere: &lt;/b>hile, tuzak kurdu&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önceki kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>oysa Allah'a aittir&lt;br />&lt;b>el mekru: &lt;/b>hile&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>tümü, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ teksibu: &lt;/b>kazandigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>kullu: &lt;/b>her, hepsi, bütün&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsin: &lt;/b>nefs&lt;br />&lt;b>ve se ya'lemu: &lt;/b>ve yakinda bilecek&lt;br />&lt;b>el kuffâru: &lt;/b>kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>li men: &lt;/b>kimin&lt;br />&lt;b>ukbe ed dâri: &lt;/b>yurdun sonu"
    <string name="sozluk.013.043">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yekûlu: &lt;/b>ve derler, diyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler, kâfir olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>leste: &lt;/b>sen degilsin&lt;br />&lt;b>murselen: &lt;/b>resûl olarak gönderilmis&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>kefâ bi: &lt;/b>kâfi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>sehîden: &lt;/b>sahit olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>beynî: &lt;/b>benimle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve beyne-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>inde-hu: &lt;/b>onun yaninda, indinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmu el kitâbi: &lt;/b>kitabin ilmi
    <string name="sozluk.014.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>elif lâm râ: &lt;/b>elif lâm râ. Hurûfu mukattaa; mukattaa harfleridir. Kur'ân-i Kerim'de bazi surelerin basinda zikredilen özel (anlamli) harflerdir.&lt;br />&lt;b>kitâbun: &lt;/b>bir kitaptir&lt;br />&lt;b>enzelnâ-hu: &lt;/b>onu indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>li tuhrice en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlari çikarman için&lt;br />&lt;b>min ez zulûmâti: &lt;/b>zulmetten, karanliklardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ en nûri: &lt;/b>nura&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni: &lt;/b>izni ile&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-him: &lt;/b>Rab'lerinin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ sirâti: &lt;/b>yola&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzi: &lt;/b>azîz olan, izzet sahibi olan&lt;br />&lt;b>el hamîdi: &lt;/b>kendisine hamdedilen"
    <string name="sozluk.014.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>o ki&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onundur&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyler, ne varsa&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>göklerde, semalarda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve seyler, ne varsa&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yerde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve veylun: &lt;/b>ve vay haline, yaziklar olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>li el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler, kâfirler için, kâfirlere&lt;br />&lt;b>min azâbin: &lt;/b>(azaplardan bir) azap&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdin: &lt;/b>siddetli
    <string name="sozluk.014.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yestehibbûne: &lt;/b>tercih ederler, severler&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayâte ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayatini&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el âhireti: &lt;/b>ahirete&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yasuddûne: &lt;/b>ve alikoyarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>an sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolundan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yebgûne-hâ: &lt;/b>ve onu isterler&lt;br />&lt;b>ivecen: &lt;/b>egrilik&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>dalâlin: &lt;/b>dalâlet&lt;br />&lt;b>baîdin: &lt;/b>uzak"
    <string name="sozluk.014.004">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ erselnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz göndermedik&lt;br />&lt;b>min resûlin: &lt;/b>resûlden (resûl olarak), bir resul&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ &lt;br>(mâ ... min ... illâ): &lt;/b>ancak, disinda &lt;br>: (hiçbir ... yoktur)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi lisâni: &lt;/b>lisani ile&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kavmi, kendi kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>li yubeyyine: &lt;/b>anlatmasi için, beyan etsin, açiklasin diye&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>yudillu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah dalâlette birakir&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimseyi, diledigini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yehdî: &lt;/b>ve hidayete erdirir, ulastirir&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzu: &lt;/b>izzet sahibi, azîz olandir&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakîmu: &lt;/b>hikmet sahibidir, hüküm sahibidir
    <string name="sozluk.014.005">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>erselnâ: &lt;/b>biz gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (a.s)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizle, mucizelerimizle, delillerimizle&lt;br />&lt;b>en ahric: &lt;/b>çikarmak&lt;br />&lt;b>kavme-ke: &lt;/b>senin kavmin&lt;br />&lt;b>min ez zulumâti: &lt;/b>karanliklardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ en nûri: &lt;/b>nura&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zekkir-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlara hatirlat, onlari zikrettir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi eyyâmi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in günlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zâlike: &lt;/b>bunda&lt;br />&lt;b>le âyâtin: &lt;/b>elbette âyetler vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>li kulli: &lt;/b>hepsi için&lt;br />&lt;b>sabbârin: &lt;/b>sabredenler&lt;br />&lt;b>sekûrin: &lt;/b>sükredenler"
    <string name="sozluk.014.006">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz kâle: &lt;/b>ve demisti&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (a.s)&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>kavmine&lt;br />&lt;b>uzkurû: &lt;/b>hatirlayin, zikredin&lt;br />&lt;b>ni'mete allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in ni'metlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size, sizin üzerinizde&lt;br />&lt;b>iz encâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi kurtarmisti&lt;br />&lt;b>min âli fir'avne: &lt;/b>firavunun ailesinden&lt;br />&lt;b>yesûmûne-kum: &lt;/b>sizi zorluyorlar, maruz birakiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>sûe el azâbi: &lt;/b>kötü azaba, azabin en kötüsüne&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuzebbihûne: &lt;/b>ve bogazliyorlar (öldürüyorlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>ebnâe-kum: &lt;/b>sizin ogullariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yestahyûne: &lt;/b>ve canli birakiyorlar (sag)&lt;br />&lt;b>nisâe-kum: &lt;/b>hanimlarinizi, kadinlarinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve fî zâlikum: &lt;/b>ve bunlarda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>belâun: &lt;/b>bir imtihan&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmun: &lt;/b>azîm, büyük"
    <string name="sozluk.014.007">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz teezzene: &lt;/b>ve bildirmisti, duyurmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>le in: &lt;/b>eger gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>sekertum: &lt;/b>sükrettiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>le ezîdenne-kum: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette size artiririm&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le in: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>kefertum: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiniz, küfredenlerden oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbî: &lt;/b>benim azabim&lt;br />&lt;b>le sedîdun: &lt;/b>mutlaka çok siddetli, siddetli

    <string name="sozluk.014.009">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem ye'ti-kum: &lt;/b>size gelmedi mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>nebeu ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimselerin haberi&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-kum: &lt;/b>sizden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmi nûhin: &lt;/b>Nuh'un kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âdin: &lt;/b>ve Ad kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve semûde: &lt;/b>ve Semud kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di-him: &lt;/b>onlardan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemu-hum: &lt;/b>onlari bilmez&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baskasi&lt;br />&lt;b>câet-hum: &lt;/b>onlara geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>rusulu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin resûlleri&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el beyyinâti: &lt;/b>beyyinelerle (delillerle)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe reddû: &lt;/b>döndürdüler, götürdüler&lt;br />&lt;b>eydiye-hum: &lt;/b>ellerini&lt;br />&lt;b>fî efvâhi-him: &lt;/b>agizlarina&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak biz&lt;br />&lt;b>kefernâ: &lt;/b>inkâr ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ ursiltum: &lt;/b>gönderildiginiz seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve innâ: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak biz&lt;br />&lt;b>le fî sekkin: &lt;/b>mutlaka süphe içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>ted'ûne-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi davet ediyorsun&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>murîbin: &lt;/b>tatmin etmeyen, süpheli olan, tereddüt edilen"
    <string name="sozluk.014.010">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlet: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>rusulu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin resûlleri&lt;br />&lt;b>e fî allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah hakkinda mi&lt;br />&lt;b>sekkun: &lt;/b>bir süphe&lt;br />&lt;b>fâtiri es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalari yaratan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arzi, yeryüzünü&lt;br />&lt;b>yed'û-kum: &lt;/b>sizi davet ediyor&lt;br />&lt;b>li yagfira: &lt;/b>magfiret etmek için&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizi&lt;br />&lt;b>min zunûbi-kum: &lt;/b>günahlarinizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuahhira-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizi tehir ediyor, erteliyor, mühlet veriyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ ecelin: &lt;/b>bir zamana kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>musemmen: &lt;/b>belirli&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>in entum: &lt;/b>siz, eger iseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>beserun: &lt;/b>bir beser&lt;br />&lt;b>mislu-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>turîdûne: &lt;/b>istiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>en tesuddû-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi men etmek, alikoymak&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>sey(ler)den&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, idi&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'budu: &lt;/b>ibadet ediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âbâu-nâ: &lt;/b>babalarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe'tû-nâ: &lt;/b>öyleyse bize getirin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sultânin: &lt;/b>bir delil, bir sultan, bir mucize&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînin: &lt;/b>beyan olunan, apaçik, açiklanmis, açikça"
    <string name="sozluk.014.011">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlet: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>rusulu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin resûlleri&lt;br />&lt;b>in nahnu: &lt;/b>biz sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ (in ... illâ): &lt;/b>ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>beserun: &lt;/b>beser, insan&lt;br />&lt;b>mislu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve fakat Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yemunnu: &lt;/b>lütufta bulunur, ni'metlendirir&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>min ibâdi-hi: &lt;/b>kullarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne: &lt;/b>ve olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bizim&lt;br />&lt;b>en ne'tiye-kum: &lt;/b>size bizim getirmemiz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sultânin: &lt;/b>bir delil, bir mucize&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...den baska, olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in izni&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>fel yetevekkeli (fe li yetevekkeli): &lt;/b>artik tevekkül etsinler&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"

    <string name="sozluk.014.019">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem tere: &lt;/b>görmüyor musun&lt;br />&lt;b>enne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka: &lt;/b>yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>gökleri, semalari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>in yese': &lt;/b>eger o dilerse&lt;br />&lt;b>yuzhib-kum: &lt;/b>sizi giderir, yokeder&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ye'ti: &lt;/b>ve getirir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi halkin: &lt;/b>bir yaratma ile, halketme ile&lt;br />&lt;b>cedîdin: &lt;/b>yeni"
    <string name="sozluk.014.020">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve degildir&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu, bu&lt;br />&lt;b>alâllâhi (alâ allahi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>bi azîzin: &lt;/b>güç, zor, büyük (bir is)"
    <string name="sozluk.014.021">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve berazû: &lt;/b>ve çiktilar&lt;br />&lt;b>li allahi: &lt;/b>Allah'a, Allah'in huzuruna&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe kâle: &lt;/b>o zaman, ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ed duafâu: &lt;/b>zayiflar, güçsüzler&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne istekberû: &lt;/b>kibirlenen kimselere&lt;br />&lt;b>in-nâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>kunnâ: &lt;/b>biz olduk&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>tebean: &lt;/b>tâbî&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hel: &lt;/b>artik, su an, simdi, mi&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>mugnûne: &lt;/b>giderenler, uzaklastiranlar&lt;br />&lt;b>annâ: &lt;/b>bizden&lt;br />&lt;b>min azâbi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in azabindan&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>bir seyden, bir seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger, sâyet ... olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>hedâ-nâ allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah bizi hidayete erdirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>le hedeynâ-kum: &lt;/b>elbette biz sizi hidayete erdirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâun: &lt;/b>esittir, birdir&lt;br />&lt;b>aleynâ: &lt;/b>bize göre, bizim için&lt;br />&lt;b>e cezi'nâ: &lt;/b>feryat mi ettik, sabretmedik mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>em sabernâ: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya, (... olsa da, ... olmasa da) sabir mi ettik?&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lenâ: &lt;/b>bize yoktur, bizim için yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min mahîsin: &lt;/b>kaçacak yer"
    <string name="sozluk.014.022">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle es seytânu: &lt;/b>ve seytan dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kudiye el emru: &lt;/b>emir yerine getirildi, tamamlandi&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>vaade-kum: &lt;/b>size vaadetti&lt;br />&lt;b>va'de el hakki: &lt;/b>hakkin vaadi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve vaadtu-kum: &lt;/b>ve size vaadettim&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ahleftu-kum: &lt;/b>size verdigim sözden hilâf ettim (vaadimden döndüm)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne: &lt;/b>ve olmadi, yoktu&lt;br />&lt;b>liye: &lt;/b>benim&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinizde&lt;br />&lt;b>min sultânin: &lt;/b>yaptirim gücü, bir sultan, bir kuvvet, bir güç&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ en: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>deavtu-kum: &lt;/b>sizi davet ettim&lt;br />&lt;b>fe istecebtum: &lt;/b>böylece siz icabet ettiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>lî: &lt;/b>bana&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lâ telûmû-nî: &lt;/b>artik beni kinamayin, levmetmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lûmû: &lt;/b>ve kinayin, levmedin&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-kum: &lt;/b>sizin nesflerinizi (kendinizi)&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>ene: &lt;/b>ben&lt;br />&lt;b>bi musrihi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin yardimciniz (size yardim eden)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ entum: &lt;/b>ve siz degilsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi musrihiyye: &lt;/b>benim yardimcim (bana yardim eden)&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ben&lt;br />&lt;b>kefertu: &lt;/b>inkâr ettim&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>esraktumû-ni: &lt;/b>beni ortak kosmaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki zalimler&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara vardir, onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun elîmun: &lt;/b>aci azap"
    <string name="sozluk.014.023">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve udhile: &lt;/b>ve dahil edilirler, konulurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>ölmeden önce Allah'a ulasmayi dileyenler, âmenû olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve nefsi islâh edici amel isleyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>cennâtin: &lt;/b>cennetler&lt;br />&lt;b>tecrî: &lt;/b>akar&lt;br />&lt;b>min tahti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun altindan&lt;br />&lt;b>el enhâru: &lt;/b>nehirler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidîne: &lt;/b>ebedî kalirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni: &lt;/b>izni ile&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-him,: &lt;/b>Rab'lerinin&lt;br />&lt;b>tahiyyetu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin tahiyyeleri (temennileri, iltifatlari, dualari, esenlik dilekleri)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>selâmun: &lt;/b>selâmdir"

    <string name="sozluk.014.037">"&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ben&lt;br />&lt;b>eskentu: &lt;/b>yerlestirdim, iskân ettim&lt;br />&lt;b>min zurriyyetî: &lt;/b>zürriyetimden&lt;br />&lt;b>bi vâdin: &lt;/b>bir vadiye&lt;br />&lt;b>gayri: &lt;/b>olmayan&lt;br />&lt;b>zî zer'in: &lt;/b>ekine sahip&lt;br />&lt;b>inde: &lt;/b>yaninda&lt;br />&lt;b>beyti-ke el muharrami: &lt;/b>senin Beyt-i Haram'in&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>li yukîmu es salâte: &lt;/b>(namazi ikame etmek için) namazi ikame etsinler&lt;br />&lt;b>fec'al (fe ic'al): &lt;/b>böylece kil, yap&lt;br />&lt;b>ef'ideten: &lt;/b>gönül (kalp)&lt;br />&lt;b>min en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>tehvî: &lt;/b>sen meylettir&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>verzuk-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari riziklandir&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semerâti: &lt;/b>ürünlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki onlar, böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yeskurûne: &lt;/b>sükrederler"

    <string name="sozluk.014.039">"&lt;br />&lt;b>el hamdu li allâhi: &lt;/b>hamd Allah'a aittir, hamd Allah'adir, Allah'a mahsustur&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>vehebe: &lt;/b>bagisladi, hibe etti&lt;br />&lt;b>lî: &lt;/b>bana&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>el kiberi: &lt;/b>ihtiyarlik (ihtiyarlik hali)&lt;br />&lt;b>ismâîle: &lt;/b>Ismail&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ishâka: &lt;/b>ve Ishak&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>benim Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>le semîu ed duâi: &lt;/b>duayi mutlaka isitendir"
    <string name="sozluk.014.040">"&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbic'alnî (rabbi ic'al-nî): &lt;/b>Rabbim beni kil&lt;br />&lt;b>mukîme: &lt;/b>ikame eden&lt;br />&lt;b>es salâti: &lt;/b>namaz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min zurriyyetî: &lt;/b>ve zürriyetimden, zürriyetimi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tekabbel: &lt;/b>ve kabul et&lt;br />&lt;b>duâi: &lt;/b>duami"
    <string name="sozluk.014.041">"&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>igfir-lî: &lt;/b>beni magfiret et&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li vâlideyye: &lt;/b>ve, annemi ve babami&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>ve mü'minleri&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûmu: &lt;/b>yapilir (ikame edilir)&lt;br />&lt;b>el hisâbu: &lt;/b>hesap"
    <string name="sozluk.014.042">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tahsebenne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve Allah'i sanma, zannetme&lt;br />&lt;b>gâfilen: &lt;/b>gâfil, bilmeyen&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'melu: &lt;/b>yapiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâlimûne: &lt;/b>zalimler&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece, yalniz&lt;br />&lt;b>yuahhiru-hum: &lt;/b>onlari tehir eder (erteler)&lt;br />&lt;b>li yevmin: &lt;/b>o güne&lt;br />&lt;b>teshasu: &lt;/b>(gördügü seyin dehsetinden) açik kalir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onda (o günde)&lt;br />&lt;b>el ebsâru: &lt;/b>gözler"
    <string name="sozluk.014.043">"&lt;br />&lt;b>muhtiîne: &lt;/b>hizla gidenler, kosanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mukniî: &lt;/b>kaldiranlar, dik tutanlar (gözleri bir seye dogru devamli bakar sekilde)&lt;br />&lt;b>ruûsi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin baslari, baslarini&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yerteddu: &lt;/b>dönmez, dönemez, çevrilmez&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhim: &lt;/b>onlara, kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>tarfu-hum,: &lt;/b>onlarin bakislari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ef'idetu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>hevâun: &lt;/b>heva (hevesler), nefsin afetleri (vardir)"
    <string name="sozluk.014.044">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enzir: &lt;/b>ve uyar&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'tî-him: &lt;/b>onlara gelecek&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbu: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yekûlu: &lt;/b>o zaman der, söyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne zalemû: &lt;/b>zulmeden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ahhir-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi ertele, tehir et&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ ecelin: &lt;/b>bir süreye kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>karîbin: &lt;/b>yakin&lt;br />&lt;b>nucib: &lt;/b>icabet edelim&lt;br />&lt;b>da'vete-ke: &lt;/b>senin davetine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nettebii: &lt;/b>ve biz tâbî olalim&lt;br />&lt;b>er rusule: &lt;/b>resûllere&lt;br />&lt;b>e ve lem tekûnû: &lt;/b>ve, siz olmadiniz mi, siz degil misiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>aksemtum: &lt;/b>yemin ettiniz (kasem ettiniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min zevâlin: &lt;/b>bir zeval, zail olma, gitme (yer degistirme: bir yerden bir yere gitme, dünya yurdundan ahiret yurduna intikal etme)"
    <string name="sozluk.014.045">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sekentum: &lt;/b>ve siz yerlestiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî mesâkini: &lt;/b>meskenlere&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne zalemû enfuse-hum: &lt;/b>nefslerine zulmeden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tebeyyene: &lt;/b>ve beyan edildi (açiklandi)&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil (neler)&lt;br />&lt;b>fealnâ: &lt;/b>yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlara, onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve darabnâ: &lt;/b>ve (misal) verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>el emsâle: &lt;/b>misaller, örnekler
    <string name="sozluk.014.046">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kad: &lt;/b>ve olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>mekerû: &lt;/b>(hile) tuzak kurdular&lt;br />&lt;b>mekre-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin hileleri, tuzaklari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inde allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'in indindedir (katindadir, bilgisi vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>mekru-hum,: &lt;/b>onlarin tuzaklari, hileleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in kâne: &lt;/b>ve olsa bile&lt;br />&lt;b>mekru-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin tuzaklari, hileleri&lt;br />&lt;b>li tezûle: &lt;/b>zail olmasi, yok edecek olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan (onunla)&lt;br />&lt;b>el cibâlu: &lt;/b>daglar"
    <string name="sozluk.014.047">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tahsebenne allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'i sakin sanma, zannetme&lt;br />&lt;b>muhlife: &lt;/b>sözünde hilâf bulunan, vaadini yerine getirmeyen&lt;br />&lt;b>va'di-hi: &lt;/b>O'nun (Allah'in) vaadi&lt;br />&lt;b>rusule-hu: &lt;/b>onun resûlleri&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>azîzdir, yücedir&lt;br />&lt;b>zuntikâmin (zu intikâmin): &lt;/b>intikam sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.014.048">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>tubeddelu: &lt;/b>degistirilir, bir halden (sekilden) bir baska hale (sekle) döndürülür&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardu: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra: &lt;/b>baska&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardi: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es semâvâtu: &lt;/b>ve semalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve berazû: &lt;/b>ve ortaya çiktilar&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a (huzuruna)&lt;br />&lt;b>el vâhidi: &lt;/b>bir (tek) olan, vahid olan&lt;br />&lt;b>el kahhâri: &lt;/b>kahhar olan, kahretmeye gücü yeten"
    <string name="sozluk.014.049">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tere: &lt;/b>ve sen görürsün&lt;br />&lt;b>el mucrimîne: &lt;/b>mücrimler, suçlular&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme izin: &lt;/b>izin günü&lt;br />&lt;b>mukarranîne: &lt;/b>birbirine baglanmis olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>el asfâdi &lt;br>(el safedu): &lt;/b>bukagi, kelepçeler, zincir &lt;br>: (kelepçe)
    <string name="sozluk.014.050">&lt;br />&lt;b>serâbîlu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin gömlekleri&lt;br />&lt;b>min katirânin: &lt;/b>katrandan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tagsâ: &lt;/b>ve kaplar, sarar&lt;br />&lt;b>vucûhe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin yüzleri&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâru: &lt;/b>ates
    <string name="sozluk.014.051">"&lt;br />&lt;b>li yecziye allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in karsiligini (ceza veya mükâfat) vermesi içindir&lt;br />&lt;b>kulle: &lt;/b>hepsi, bütünü, tamami&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsin: &lt;/b>nefs&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kesebet,: &lt;/b>kazandigi seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>serîu el hisâbi: &lt;/b>hesabi çabuk gören"
    <string name="sozluk.014.052">"&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>belâgun: &lt;/b>bir bildiridir, duyurudur, tebligdir&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li yunzerû: &lt;/b>ve uyarilsinlar diye&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li ya'lemû: &lt;/b>ve bilsinler diye&lt;br />&lt;b>ennemâ: &lt;/b>sadece, yalniz, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhun: &lt;/b>bir ilâhtir&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhidun: &lt;/b>vahid, tek (bir tane)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li yezzekkere: &lt;/b>ve tezekkür etsinler diye&lt;br />&lt;b>ulû el elbâbi: &lt;/b>ulûl'elbâb, sirlarin sahipleri"
    <string name="sozluk.015.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>elif lâm râ: &lt;/b>elif, lâm, râ. (Hurûfu mukattaa; mukattaa harfleridir.     <string name="sozluk.015.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>rubemâ: &lt;/b>ihtimal ki&lt;br />&lt;b>yeveddu: &lt;/b>isterler, temenni (ederler) edecekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>ise, olsa, keske&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>muslimîne: &lt;/b>müslüman, teslim olanlar
    <string name="sozluk.015.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>zer-hum: &lt;/b>onlari birak, terket&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'kulû: &lt;/b>yesinler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yetemetteû: &lt;/b>ve metalansinlar, refah içerisinde yasasinlar, faydalansinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yulhi-him: &lt;/b>ve onlari mesgul etsin, oyalasin&lt;br />&lt;b>el emelu: &lt;/b>emel, ümit&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>sevfe: &lt;/b>yakinda olacak&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilirler, bilecekler"

    <string name="sozluk.015.014">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve olsa, olsa bile&lt;br />&lt;b>fetahnâ: &lt;/b>biz açtik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>bâben: &lt;/b>bir kapi&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>zallû: &lt;/b>devam ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun içine, orada&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'rucûne: &lt;/b>yükselirler"

    <string name="sozluk.015.019">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>medednâ-hâ: &lt;/b>biz onu uzattik (yaydik)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve elkaynâ: &lt;/b>ve biz koyduk, biraktik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>revâsiye: &lt;/b>büyük daglar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enbetnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz nebat (bitkiler) yetistirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>min kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyden&lt;br />&lt;b>mevzûnin: &lt;/b>mevzun, birbiriyle orantili, ölçülü"
    <string name="sozluk.015.020">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cealnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz kildik, yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>meâyise: &lt;/b>geçim kaynaklari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kimse, kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>lestum: &lt;/b>siz degilsiniz, siz olmadiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona, onun için&lt;br />&lt;b>bi râzikîne: &lt;/b>rizik vericiler, riziklandiranlar
    <string name="sozluk.015.021">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve yoktur (eger var ise, ancak ...dir)&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>bir seyden, bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...den baska, olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>inde-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim katimizda, yanimizda&lt;br />&lt;b>hazâinu-hu: &lt;/b>onun hazineleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ nunezzilu-hu: &lt;/b>ve onu indirmeyiz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...den baska, olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kaderin: &lt;/b>bir kader ile, takdir edilmis miktarda&lt;br />&lt;b>ma'lûmin: &lt;/b>malûm, bilinen, belli"
    <string name="sozluk.015.022">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve erselnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>er riyâha: &lt;/b>rüzgârlar&lt;br />&lt;b>levâkiha: &lt;/b>(yagmur) yüklü (yagmur bulutlari tasiyan)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe enzelnâ: &lt;/b>böylece indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâen: &lt;/b>su&lt;br />&lt;b>fe eskaynâ-kumû-hu: &lt;/b>böylece onunla sizi suladik [sizi suladigimiz onu (o suyu) indirdik]&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve degilsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hâzinîne: &lt;/b>hazineler olusturan
    <string name="sozluk.015.023">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve innâ: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak biz&lt;br />&lt;b>le nahnu: &lt;/b>mutlaka biz, sadece (kesinlikle) biz&lt;br />&lt;b>nuhyî: &lt;/b>hayat veririz, yasatiriz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve numîtu: &lt;/b>ve öldürürüz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nahnu: &lt;/b>ve biziz&lt;br />&lt;b>el vârisûne: &lt;/b>varisler
    <string name="sozluk.015.024">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>alimnâ: &lt;/b>biz bildik (biliyorduk, biliyoruz)&lt;br />&lt;b>el mustakdimîne: &lt;/b>evvelkiler (kadim olanlar, öncekiler)&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>alimnâ: &lt;/b>biz bildik (biliyorduk, biliyoruz)&lt;br />&lt;b>el muste'hirîne: &lt;/b>sonrakiler (tehir olanlar)"
    <string name="sozluk.015.025">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>yahsuru-hum: &lt;/b>onlari hasreder (huzurunda toplar)&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak o&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîmdir, hikmet sahibidir, hüküm sahibidir&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>alîmdir, en iyi bilendir

    <string name="sozluk.015.061">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câe: &lt;/b>geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>âle lûtin: &lt;/b>Lut'un ailesi&lt;br />&lt;b>el murselûne: &lt;/b>elçiler, gönderilmis olan resûller"
    <string name="sozluk.015.062">&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-kum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki siz&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmun: &lt;/b>bir kavimsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>munkerûne: &lt;/b>taninmayan (yabanci)
    <string name="sozluk.015.063">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir, bilâkis&lt;br />&lt;b>ci'nâ-ke: &lt;/b>sana getirdik, geldik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>sey ile&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>yemterûne: &lt;/b>süphe ediyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.015.064">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eteynâ-ke: &lt;/b>ve biz sana getirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile, hakki&lt;br />&lt;b>ve innâ: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>sâdikûne: &lt;/b>sadiklar, dogruyu söyleyenler

    <string name="sozluk.016.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>yunezzilu: &lt;/b>indirir&lt;br />&lt;b>el melâikete: &lt;/b>melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi er rûhi: &lt;/b>ruh ile&lt;br />&lt;b>min emri-hi: &lt;/b>onun emrinden&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzere, e&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimse(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>min ibâdi-hi: &lt;/b>kullarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>en enzirû: &lt;/b>uyarmalari (için), uyarsinlar diye&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hu: &lt;/b>onun ... oldugu&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ilâhe: &lt;/b>ilâh yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ene: &lt;/b>ben&lt;br />&lt;b>fettekû-ni (fe ittekû-ni): &lt;/b>öyleyse, bana karsi takva sahibi olun (ruhunuzu ölmeden evvel bana ulastirin)

    <string name="sozluk.016.005">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>el en'âme: &lt;/b>hayvanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka-hâ: &lt;/b>onu yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>onda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>dif'un: &lt;/b>isitici özelligi olan (soguktan korunmak için kullanilan sey)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve menâfiu: &lt;/b>ve menfaatler, faydalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min-hâ: &lt;/b>ve ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>te'kulûne: &lt;/b>yersiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.016.006">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekum: &lt;/b>ve sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>içinde, onlarda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>cemâlun: &lt;/b>güzellik&lt;br />&lt;b>hîne: &lt;/b>o zaman, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>turîhûne: &lt;/b>(hayvanlari) aksamleyin otlaktan döndürüyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hîne: &lt;/b>ve o zaman, oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>tesrahûne: &lt;/b>(hayvanlari) otlatmaya çikariyorsunuz
    <string name="sozluk.016.007">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tahmilu: &lt;/b>ve tasirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>eskâle-kum: &lt;/b>agirliklariniz, agir esyalariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ beledin: &lt;/b>bir beldeye (sehire)&lt;br />&lt;b>lem tekûnû: &lt;/b>siz olmazsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bâligî-hi: &lt;/b>ona erisirsiniz, ulasirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, baska, olmadan&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sikki: &lt;/b>mesakkat ile, yorgunlukla&lt;br />&lt;b>el enfusi: &lt;/b>nefsler, kendileri&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>le raûfun: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka rauftur (sefkatli, çok merhametli)&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>rahîmdir (merhametli, rahmet nuru gönderen)
    <string name="sozluk.016.008">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hayle: &lt;/b>ve atlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el bigâle: &lt;/b>ve katirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hamîre: &lt;/b>ve merkepler&lt;br />&lt;b>li terkebû-hâ: &lt;/b>onlara binmeniz için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zîneten: &lt;/b>ve süs olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yahluku: &lt;/b>ve yaratir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lâ ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmediginiz seyler"
    <string name="sozluk.016.009">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a aittir, Allah'in üzerinedir 2 - kasdu es sebîli&lt;br />&lt;b>kasdu es sebîli: &lt;/b>sebîlin (yolun) tayini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min-hâ: &lt;/b>ve ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>câirun: &lt;/b>(haktan) sapanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>sâe: &lt;/b>diledi&lt;br />&lt;b>le hedâ-kum: &lt;/b>elbette hidayete erdirirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ecmaîne: &lt;/b>hepsini, tümünü, topluca"
    <string name="sozluk.016.010">"&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o, o ...'dir&lt;br />&lt;b>enzele: &lt;/b>indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâen: &lt;/b>su&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>sarâbun: &lt;/b>içilen sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min-hu: &lt;/b>ve ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>secerun: &lt;/b>agaç, yesillik, otlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>içinde, orada, arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>tusîmûne &lt;br>(esâme): &lt;/b>hayvanlari otlatirsiniz (otlatmak için salarsiniz) &lt;br>: (hayvanlari otlatmak için saldi)"
    <string name="sozluk.016.011">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yunbitu: &lt;/b>bitirir, yetistirir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>bihi ez zer'a: &lt;/b>onunla ekin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ez zeytûne: &lt;/b>ve zeytinler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en nahîle: &lt;/b>ve hurmaliklar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el a'nâbe: &lt;/b>ve üzümler, baglar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min kulli es semerâti: &lt;/b>ve meyvelerin (ürünlerin) her türlüsünden, bütün ürünlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak, süphesiz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zâlike: &lt;/b>bunda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>le âyeten: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette âyet (delil)&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>bir kavim için, bir topluluk için&lt;br />&lt;b>yetefekkerûne: &lt;/b>tefekkür ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.016.012">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sehhara lekum: &lt;/b>ve sizin emrinize verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>el leyle: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en nehâre: &lt;/b>ve gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es semse: &lt;/b>ve günes&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kamere: &lt;/b>ve kamer (ay)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en nucûmu: &lt;/b>ve yildizlar&lt;br />&lt;b>musahharâtun: &lt;/b>emrine verilmis olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi emri-hi: &lt;/b>onun emriyle&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zâlike: &lt;/b>bunda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>le âyâtin: &lt;/b>âyetler&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>kavim için, topluluk için&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'kilûne: &lt;/b>akil ediyorlar, akil ederler"

    <string name="sozluk.016.014">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>sahhara: &lt;/b>emrinize verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>el bahra: &lt;/b>deniz&lt;br />&lt;b>li te'kulû: &lt;/b>yemeniz için&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>lahmen: &lt;/b>et&lt;br />&lt;b>tariyyen: &lt;/b>taze&lt;br />&lt;b>ve testahricû: &lt;/b>ve çikarirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>hilyeten: &lt;/b>süs esyasi (inci)&lt;br />&lt;b>telbesûne-hâ: &lt;/b>onu takarsiniz, giyersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve terâ el fulke: &lt;/b>ve gemileri görürsün&lt;br />&lt;b>mevâhira: &lt;/b>denizi yararak giden&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onda, onun içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li tebtegû: &lt;/b>ve ibtiga etmeniz (istemeniz) için&lt;br />&lt;b>min fadli-hi: &lt;/b>onun fazlindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lealle-kum: &lt;/b>ve umulur ki siz, böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>teskurûne: &lt;/b>sükredersiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.016.015">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve elkâ: &lt;/b>ve birakti, koydu, atti, olusturdu&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ravâsiye: &lt;/b>daglar&lt;br />&lt;b>en temîde: &lt;/b>sarsilmasi (sarsilmamasi)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-kum: &lt;/b>sizinle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enhâran: &lt;/b>ve nehirler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve subulen: &lt;/b>ve yollar&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki, böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tehtedûne: &lt;/b>yol bulursunuz (menzillerinize ulasirsiniz), hidayete erersiniz
    <string name="sozluk.016.016">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâmâtin: &lt;/b>ve alâmetler, isaretler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi en necmi: &lt;/b>ve yildiz ile&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yehtedûne: &lt;/b>yol bulurlar, hidayete ererler
    <string name="sozluk.016.017">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, hâlâ&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yahluku: &lt;/b>yaratir&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yahluku: &lt;/b>yaratmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe lâ tezekkerûne: &lt;/b>artik, hâlâ tezekkür etmez misiniz?
    <string name="sozluk.016.018">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger, sâyet&lt;br />&lt;b>teuddû: &lt;/b>adeten, adet adet (tane tane) sayarsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ni'mete allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in ni'metleri&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tuhsû-hâ: &lt;/b>onu hesaplayamazsiniz, sayamazsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le gafûrun: &lt;/b>magfiret eden, bagislayan&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>rahîmdir (rahmet nurunu gönderendir)"
    <string name="sozluk.016.019">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ tusirrûne: &lt;/b>gizledikleriniz, sirlariniz, sakladiginiz seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ tu'linûne: &lt;/b>ve alenî olan, açikladiginiz seyler"
    <string name="sozluk.016.020">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vellezîne (ve ellezîne): &lt;/b>ve o kimseler ki, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yed'ûne: &lt;/b>dua ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yahlukûne: &lt;/b>yaratamazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar, kendileri&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhlekûne: &lt;/b>yaratilirlar (yaratilmis olanlar)"

    <string name="sozluk.016.022">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin ilâhiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhun: &lt;/b>ilâhtir&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhidun: &lt;/b>bir, tek, bir tek&lt;br />&lt;b>fellezîne (fe ellezîne): &lt;/b>böylece, artik, hâlâ o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yu'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'min olmazlar, inanmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el âhirati: &lt;/b>ahirete (ruhu ölmeden evvel Allah'a ulastirmaya)&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>munkiratun: &lt;/b>inkârcidir, inkâr edicidir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mustekbirûne: &lt;/b>büyüklenenler, kibirlenen kimseler"
    <string name="sozluk.016.023">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ cereme: &lt;/b>süphe yok, süphesiz&lt;br />&lt;b>enne allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'in ... olduguna&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yusirrûne: &lt;/b>gizledikleri, sirlari, sakladiklari seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ yu'linûne: &lt;/b>ve açikladiklari (alenî olan) seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuhibbu: &lt;/b>sevmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el mustekbirîne: &lt;/b>büyüklenenler, kibirlenen kimseler"
    <string name="sozluk.016.024">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ kîle: &lt;/b>ve denildigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>mâzâ: &lt;/b>ne&lt;br />&lt;b>enzele: &lt;/b>indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>esâtîru: &lt;/b>(satirlar), asilsiz sözler, masallar&lt;br />&lt;b>el evvelîne: &lt;/b>evvelkiler, daha önce geçmis olanlar
    <string name="sozluk.016.025">&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için, bunun için, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yahmilû: &lt;/b>yüklenirler, tasirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>evzâre-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kendi yükleri, kendi günahlari&lt;br />&lt;b>kâmileten: &lt;/b>tam, tamami&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme el kiyâmeti: &lt;/b>kiyâmet günü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min evzâri: &lt;/b>ve yüklerden, agirliklardan, günahlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>yudillûne-hum: &lt;/b>onlari saptirirlar (dalâlette birakirlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayri ilmin: &lt;/b>bir ilmi (ilimleri) olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ: &lt;/b>(öyle) degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>sâe: &lt;/b>kötü (ne kadar kötü)&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yezirûne: &lt;/b>yüklendikleri sey
    <string name="sozluk.016.026">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kad mekere: &lt;/b>hile yapmislardi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önceki kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe etâllâhu: &lt;/b>böylece Allah getirdi, yikti, harap etti&lt;br />&lt;b>bunyâne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin binalari&lt;br />&lt;b>min el kavâidi: &lt;/b>temellerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe harra: &lt;/b>böylece çöktü&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerlerine&lt;br />&lt;b>es sakfu: &lt;/b>tavan&lt;br />&lt;b>min fevki-him: &lt;/b>üstlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve etâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlara geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbu: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>min haysu: &lt;/b>bir yerden&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yes'urûne: &lt;/b>farkinda olmazlar"
    <string name="sozluk.016.027">&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme el kiyâmeti: &lt;/b>kiyâmet günü&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhzî-him: &lt;/b>onlari zelil edecek, rezil rüsva edecek, alçaltacak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yekûlu: &lt;/b>ve diyecek&lt;br />&lt;b>eyne: &lt;/b>nerede&lt;br />&lt;b>surakâiye: &lt;/b>ortaklarim&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz idiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>tusâkkûne: &lt;/b>ayriliyorsunuz, ayriliklara düsüyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-him: &lt;/b>onlar için, onlar hakkinda, onlar ugruna&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtû el ilme: &lt;/b>ilim verilen&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>el hizye: &lt;/b>alçaklik, rezillik&lt;br />&lt;b>el yevme: &lt;/b>bugün, o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sûe: &lt;/b>ve kötülük, azab&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirlerin üzerine
    <string name="sozluk.016.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>teteveffâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari vefat ettirir&lt;br />&lt;b>el melâiketu: &lt;/b>melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlimî: &lt;/b>zalim olanlar, zulmedenler&lt;br />&lt;b>enfusi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin nefsleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>elkavû: &lt;/b>(attilar) cevap verdiler&lt;br />&lt;b>es seleme: &lt;/b>teslim olmak&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kunnâ: &lt;/b>biz olmadik&lt;br />&lt;b>na'melu: &lt;/b>yapiyoruz (yapariz), amel ederiz&lt;br />&lt;b>min sûin: &lt;/b>(kötülüklerden) bir kötülük&lt;br />&lt;b>belâ: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>innâllahe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.016.029">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fedhulû (fe udhulû): &lt;/b>haydi, artik girin&lt;br />&lt;b>ebvâbe: &lt;/b>kapilar&lt;br />&lt;b>cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennem&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidîne: &lt;/b>ebedî olanlar, ebediyyen kalanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lebi'se: &lt;/b>artik, iste ne kötü&lt;br />&lt;b>mesvâ: &lt;/b>yerlesme (ikamet) yeri, kalinan yer&lt;br />&lt;b>el mutekebbirîne: &lt;/b>kibirlenenler, büyüklük taslayanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.016.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kîle: &lt;/b>ve denildi&lt;br />&lt;b>mâzâ: &lt;/b>ne&lt;br />&lt;b>enzele: &lt;/b>indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>hayran: &lt;/b>hayir, güzellikler&lt;br />&lt;b>lillezîne (li ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimselere&lt;br />&lt;b>ahsenû: &lt;/b>ahsen olanlar, iradesini Allah'a teslim edenler, daimî zikrin sahipleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fî hâzihi ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>bu dünyada vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>haseneten: &lt;/b>iyilikler, güzellikler, sevaplar, Allah'in ikramlari, pozitif dereceler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le dâru el âhirati: &lt;/b>ve elbette ahiret yurdu&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayirlidir, daha hayirlidir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le ni'me: &lt;/b>ve elbette ne güzeldir&lt;br />&lt;b>dâru el muttekîne: &lt;/b>takva sahiplerinin, muttakilerin yurdu"
    <string name="sozluk.016.031">&lt;br />&lt;b>cennâtu: &lt;/b>cennetler&lt;br />&lt;b>adnin: &lt;/b>Adn (Adn Cennetleri)&lt;br />&lt;b>yedhulûne-hâ: &lt;/b>ona girerler, dahil olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>tecrî: &lt;/b>akar&lt;br />&lt;b>min tahti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun altindan&lt;br />&lt;b>el enhâru: &lt;/b>nehirler&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada, onun içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yesâûne: &lt;/b>onlarin diledikleri seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yeczîllâhu (yeczî allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah mükâfatlandirir (cezalandirir, karsiligini verir)&lt;br />&lt;b>el muttekîne: &lt;/b>takva sahipleri

    <string name="sozluk.016.046">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'huze-hum: &lt;/b>onlari alir, yakalar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî tekallubi-him: &lt;/b>onlar dönüp dolasirlarken&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece (ve)&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ hum: &lt;/b>onlar degillerdir, olmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'cizîne: &lt;/b>aciz birakanlar"

    <string name="sozluk.016.048">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e ve lem yerev: &lt;/b>ve onlar görmüyorlar mi (görmediler mi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ mâ halaka allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in yarattigi seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>herhangi bir seyi, herseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>yetefeyyeu &lt;br>(fâe) &lt;br>(tefeyyee): &lt;/b>bir taraftan bir tarafa meyleder (döner) &lt;br>: (döndü) &lt;br>: (döndü, meyletti)&lt;br />&lt;b>zilâlu-hu: &lt;/b>onun gölgesi&lt;br />&lt;b>an el yemîni: &lt;/b>sagdan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es semâili: &lt;/b>ve sol&lt;br />&lt;b>succeden li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a secde ederek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar (olarak)&lt;br />&lt;b>dâhirûne: &lt;/b>zelil olanlar, tâbî olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.016.049">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>yescudu: &lt;/b>secde ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalarda olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ fî el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzünde olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min dâbbetin: &lt;/b>dabbelerden (yürüyen canlilardan)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el melâiketu: &lt;/b>ve melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yestekbirûne: &lt;/b>büyüklenmezler, kibirlenmezler"
    <string name="sozluk.016.050">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yehâfûne: &lt;/b>(onlar) korkarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-hum: &lt;/b>Rab'lerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>min fevki-him: &lt;/b>onlarin (kendi) üstlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yef'alûne: &lt;/b>ve yaparlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yu'merûne: &lt;/b>emrolunduklari sey(ler)i"
    <string name="sozluk.016.051">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlallâhu (ve kâle allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tettehizû: &lt;/b>edinmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâheyni isneyni: &lt;/b>iki ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece, yalniz&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhun: &lt;/b>ilâhtir&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhidun: &lt;/b>tek, bir tane&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, öyleyse, o halde&lt;br />&lt;b>iyyâ-ye: &lt;/b>yalniz ben, sadece ben&lt;br />&lt;b>ferhabûni : &lt;/b>artik korkun
    <string name="sozluk.016.052">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehu: &lt;/b>ve onun&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalarda olan seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehu ed dînu: &lt;/b>ve dîn onundur&lt;br />&lt;b>vâsiben: &lt;/b>devamli, sürekli, her zaman, daima&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe gayrallâhi (gayra allâhi): &lt;/b>öyleyse, hâlâ Allah'tan baskasi mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>tettekûne: &lt;/b>korkuyorsunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.016.071">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>faddale: &lt;/b>üstün kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'da-kum: &lt;/b>sizin bir kisminiz&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ba'din: &lt;/b>bir kismi üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>fî er rizki: &lt;/b>rizikta, rizik konusunda&lt;br />&lt;b>femâllezîne (fe mâ ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimseler degiller&lt;br />&lt;b>fuddilû: &lt;/b>üstün kilindilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi râddî: &lt;/b>verme (iade etme) hususunda&lt;br />&lt;b>rizki-him: &lt;/b>onlarin riziklarini&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ mâ meleket eymâne-hum &lt;br>(meleke): &lt;/b>onlarin ellerinin altinda olanlara &lt;br>: (sahip oldu)&lt;br />&lt;b>eymâne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin elleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hum: &lt;/b>oysa, halbuki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onda, o konuda (bu konuda)&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâun: &lt;/b>esittir, birdir&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe bi ni'meti allâhi: &lt;/b>artik, Allah'in ni'metini mi&lt;br />&lt;b>yechadûne: &lt;/b>bilerek inkâr ediyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.016.072">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ceale: &lt;/b>kildi, halketti&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min enfusi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin nefslerinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ezvâcen: &lt;/b>esler, zevceler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ceale: &lt;/b>ve kildi, halketti&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min ezvâci-kum: &lt;/b>sizin eslerinizden, zevcelerinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>benîne: &lt;/b>ogullar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hafedeten: &lt;/b>ve torunlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve razaka-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizi riziklandirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min et tayyibâti: &lt;/b>temiz, helâl olanlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe bi el bâtili: &lt;/b>hâlâ bâtila mi&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inaniyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi ni'meti allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'in ni'metini&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yekfurûne: &lt;/b>inkâr ediyor"

    <string name="sozluk.016.088">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler, örttüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve saddû: &lt;/b>ve men ettiler, engellediler&lt;br />&lt;b>an sebîlillâhi (sebîli allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in yolundan&lt;br />&lt;b>zidnâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlara arttirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>azâben: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>fevka el azâbi: &lt;/b>azap üstüne&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>seyden dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yufsidûne: &lt;/b>fesat çikarirlar"
    <string name="sozluk.016.089">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yevme: &lt;/b>ve o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>neb'asu: &lt;/b>göndeririz, beas ederiz, vazifeli kilariz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli: &lt;/b>bütün, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>ummetin: &lt;/b>ümmetler&lt;br />&lt;b>sehîden: &lt;/b>bir sahit&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>min enfusi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kendilerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ci'nâ: &lt;/b>ve getirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-ke sehîden: &lt;/b>seni sahit olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>hâulâi: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nezzel-nâ: &lt;/b>ve biz indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>tibyânen: &lt;/b>beyan eden (açiklayan)&lt;br />&lt;b>li kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huden: &lt;/b>ve hidayete erdiren&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmeten: &lt;/b>ve rahmet olan (rahmet nuru gönderen), rahmet olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve busrâ: &lt;/b>ve müjde olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>li el muslimîne: &lt;/b>müslümanlara, müslümanlar (teslim olanlar) için"
    <string name="sozluk.016.090">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'muru: &lt;/b>emreder&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el adli: &lt;/b>adaletle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ihsâni: &lt;/b>ve ihsan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve îtâi: &lt;/b>ve verme(k)&lt;br />&lt;b>zî el kurbâ: &lt;/b>yakinlara, akrabalara&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yenhâ: &lt;/b>ve yasaklar, nehyeder&lt;br />&lt;b>an el fahsâi: &lt;/b>fuhus (yalan, iftira, zina)dan, kötülüklerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el munkeri: &lt;/b>ve fenalik, kötülük, çirkin seyler, Allah'in yasakladigi seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el bagyi: &lt;/b>ve zulüm, azginlik, taskinlik, hakka tecavüz&lt;br />&lt;b>yeizu-kum: &lt;/b>size ögüt veriyor&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tezekkerûne: &lt;/b>tezekkür edersiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.016.091">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve evfû: &lt;/b>ve yerine getirin, ifa edin, vefa edin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ahdi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in ahdine (ahdini)&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ahedtum: &lt;/b>siz ahid yaptiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tenkudû: &lt;/b>ve siz bozmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>eymâne: &lt;/b>yeminler&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>tevkîdi-hâ: &lt;/b>onu pekistiriyorsunuz, onu saglamlastiriyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kad: &lt;/b>ve olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>cealtum: &lt;/b>siz kildiniz (yaptiniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>kefîlen: &lt;/b>kefil&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ tef'alûne: &lt;/b>yaptiginiz seyleri, ne yaptiginizi"
    <string name="sozluk.016.092">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tekûnû: &lt;/b>ve siz olmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>kelletî (ke elletî): &lt;/b>o kimse (kadin) gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>nekadat: &lt;/b>çözdü, açti&lt;br />&lt;b>gazle-hâ: &lt;/b>egrilmis ipini&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>sonradan&lt;br />&lt;b>kuvvetin: &lt;/b>kuvvetli, kuvvetle&lt;br />&lt;b>enkâsen: &lt;/b>bükülmüs ipin tekrar çözülüp açilmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>tettehizûne: &lt;/b>ediniyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>eymâne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin yeminleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>dehalan: &lt;/b>hile, tuzak, aldatma&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-kum: &lt;/b>aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>en tekûne: &lt;/b>olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ummetun: &lt;/b>bir ümmet&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>erbâ &lt;br>(rabâ): &lt;/b>daha çok artmasi, daha çok olmasi &lt;br>: (artti, ziyade oldu)&lt;br />&lt;b>min ummetin: &lt;/b>bir ümmetten&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>ancak, oysa&lt;br />&lt;b>yeblû-kum allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah sizi imtihan eder&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le yubeyyinenne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak beyan edecek, açiklayacak&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme el kiyâmeti: &lt;/b>kiyâmet günü&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kuntum: &lt;/b>oldugunuz seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda, o konuda&lt;br />&lt;b>tahtelifûne: &lt;/b>siz ihtilâfa düsüyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.016.093">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev sâe allâhu: &lt;/b>ve eger Allah dileseydi&lt;br />&lt;b>le ceale-kum: &lt;/b>elbette sizi kildi (kilardi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ummeten: &lt;/b>bir ümmet&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhideten: &lt;/b>bir tek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>yudillu: &lt;/b>saptirir, dalâlette birakir&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yehdî: &lt;/b>ve hidayete erdirir&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le tus'elunne: &lt;/b>ve elbette sorulacaksiniz, sorgulanacaksiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.016.106">"&lt;br />&lt;b>men kefere: &lt;/b>kim inkâr ederse&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'i&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>...'den sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>îmâni-hî: &lt;/b>kendi îmâni, onun îmâni&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>men ukrihe: &lt;/b>kim zorlanirsa, mecbur edilirse&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kalbu-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun kalbi&lt;br />&lt;b>mutmainnun: &lt;/b>tatmin olmus&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el îmâni: &lt;/b>îmân ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>fakat, ama, ve de&lt;br />&lt;b>men seraha: &lt;/b>kim açarsa, serhederse&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el kufri: &lt;/b>küfre&lt;br />&lt;b>sadran: &lt;/b>gögüs&lt;br />&lt;b>fe aleyhim: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik onlara, onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>gadabun: &lt;/b>bir gazap&lt;br />&lt;b>minallâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin vardir, onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun azîmun: &lt;/b>büyük azap"
    <string name="sozluk.016.107">&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin olmalarindan dolayi, sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>istehebbû: &lt;/b>sevgiyle istediler (çok sevdiler)&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayâte ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayati&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el âhirati: &lt;/b>ahirete&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve Allah’in ... olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yehdî: &lt;/b>hidayete erdirmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavme el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfir kavim
    <string name="sozluk.016.108">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, o kimseler ki&lt;br />&lt;b>tabe allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah mühürledi, tabetti&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kalplerinin üzerini, kalplerini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sem'i-him: &lt;/b>ve onlarin isitme hassalari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ebsâri-him: &lt;/b>ve onlarin görme hassalari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ulâike: &lt;/b>ve iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum el gâfilûne: &lt;/b>onlar gâfil olanlardir, gâfillerdir"
    <string name="sozluk.016.109">&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ cereme: &lt;/b>süphesiz, süphe yok&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ... olduguna&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el âhirati: &lt;/b>ahirette&lt;br />&lt;b>hum el hâsirûne: &lt;/b>onlar hüsranda olanlar, hüsrana düsenler

    <string name="sozluk.016.112">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve darabe allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah misal verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>meselen: &lt;/b>bir misal, örnek&lt;br />&lt;b>karyeten: &lt;/b>bir sehir (halki)&lt;br />&lt;b>kânet: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âmineten: &lt;/b>güvenlik içinde, emin&lt;br />&lt;b>mutmainneten: &lt;/b>tatmin olmus, huzurlu&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'tî-hâ: &lt;/b>ona gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>rizku-hâ: &lt;/b>onun rizki&lt;br />&lt;b>ragaden: &lt;/b>bol bol&lt;br />&lt;b>min kulli mekânin: &lt;/b>her yerden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe keferet: &lt;/b>fakat inkâr etti, nankörlük etti&lt;br />&lt;b>bi en'umi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in ni'metleri (ni'metlendirmesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ezâka-hâ allâhu: &lt;/b>bundan sonra Allah ona tattirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>libâse el cûi: &lt;/b>açlik elbisesi, açligi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el havfi: &lt;/b>ve korku&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>dolayisiyla, sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yasnaûne &lt;br>(sanaa): &lt;/b>yapiyorlar &lt;br>: (yapti, meydana getirdi)"

    <string name="sozluk.017.024">&lt;br />&lt;b>vahfid (ve ihfid): &lt;/b>ve (yere) indir, (kanat) ger&lt;br />&lt;b>lehumâ: &lt;/b>onlara, o ikisine&lt;br />&lt;b>cenâha: &lt;/b>kanat&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zulli: &lt;/b>yumusak olarak, alçaltarak (zelil olarak), tevazu ile&lt;br />&lt;b>min er rahmeti: &lt;/b>rahmetten, merhametten, merhamet ederek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kul: &lt;/b>ve de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-erham-humâ: &lt;/b>Rabbim!     <string name="sozluk.017.025">"&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>a'lemu: &lt;/b>en iyi bilir, daha iyi bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>o seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî nufûsi-kum: &lt;/b>nefslerinizde olani (niyetinizi)&lt;br />&lt;b>in tekûnû: &lt;/b>eger olursaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>sâlihîne: &lt;/b>salihler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece, o takdirde&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu (olur), ..idi, ..dir&lt;br />&lt;b>li el evvâbîne &lt;br> &lt;br>(evvâb) &lt;br>(evvâbîn): &lt;/b>evvab olanlar için, (ona) yönelip tövbe ederek ulasanlar için, çok tövbe edenler için &lt;br>: (çok tövbe eden) &lt;br>: (çok tövbe edenler)&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûran: &lt;/b>magfiret edici, bagislayici"

    <string name="sozluk.017.046">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cealnâ: &lt;/b>ve kildik&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>olarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ekinneten: &lt;/b>ekinnet, idrak etme engeli&lt;br />&lt;b>en yefkahû-hu: &lt;/b>onu fikih etmeleri, anlamalari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve fî âzâni-him: &lt;/b>ve onlarin kulaklarinda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>vakran: &lt;/b>vakra, isitme engeli&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ zekerte: &lt;/b>ve sen zikrettigin zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-ke: &lt;/b>Rabbini&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el kur'âni: &lt;/b>Kur'ân'da&lt;br />&lt;b>vahde-hu: &lt;/b>onun tekligini, tek olusunu&lt;br />&lt;b>vellev: &lt;/b>döndüler&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>edbâri-him: &lt;/b>arkalarina&lt;br />&lt;b>nufûran: &lt;/b>nefretle"
    <string name="sozluk.017.047">"&lt;br />&lt;b>nahnu: &lt;/b>biz&lt;br />&lt;b>a'lemu: &lt;/b>çok iyi biliriz&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>yestemiûne: &lt;/b>dinlerler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>ona, onu&lt;br />&lt;b>iz yestemiûne: &lt;/b>dinliyorlarken&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana, seni&lt;br />&lt;b>ve iz hum necvâ: &lt;/b>ve onlar fisildastilar, gizli gizli konustular&lt;br />&lt;b>iz yekûlu: &lt;/b>dedikleri zaman, diyerek&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâlimûne: &lt;/b>zalimler&lt;br />&lt;b>in tettebiûne: &lt;/b>eger siz tâbî oluyorsaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>raculen: &lt;/b>bir adam&lt;br />&lt;b>meshûran: &lt;/b>büyülenmis"
    <string name="sozluk.017.048">&lt;br />&lt;b>unzur: &lt;/b>bak&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>darabû: &lt;/b>(misal) getirdiler, vurguladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>leke: &lt;/b>sana, senin için&lt;br />&lt;b>el emsâle: &lt;/b>örnekler, misaller, benzetmeler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>dallû: &lt;/b>dalâlette kaldilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lâ yestetîûne: &lt;/b>artik güç yetiremezler, güçleri yetmez&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîlen: &lt;/b>bir yol

    <string name="sozluk.017.067">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ messe-kum: &lt;/b>ve size dokundugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ed durru: &lt;/b>bir zarar, bir sikinti, bir darlik, bir tehlike&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el bahri: &lt;/b>denizde&lt;br />&lt;b>dalle: &lt;/b>sapti, gitti&lt;br />&lt;b>men ted'ûne: &lt;/b>çagirdiginiz, davet ettiginiz, dua ettikleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ iyyâ-hu: &lt;/b>sadece o hariç, ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ: &lt;/b>böylece, oldugu zaman, olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>neccâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi kurtardik&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ el berri: &lt;/b>karaya&lt;br />&lt;b>a'radtum: &lt;/b>yüz çevirdiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu, ...'dir&lt;br />&lt;b>el insânu: &lt;/b>insan&lt;br />&lt;b>kefûren: &lt;/b>çok nankör"
    <string name="sozluk.017.068">&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe emintum: &lt;/b>yoksa, öyleyse emin mi oldunuz?&lt;br />&lt;b>en yahsife: &lt;/b>yere geçirmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-kum: &lt;/b>sizi&lt;br />&lt;b>cânibe: &lt;/b>taraf&lt;br />&lt;b>el berri: &lt;/b>kara&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>yursile: &lt;/b>gönderir&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>hâsiben: &lt;/b>tas yagdiran firtina&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tecidû: &lt;/b>bulamazsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum vekîlen: &lt;/b>sizin için bir vekil

    <string name="sozluk.018.018">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tahsebu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari sanirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>eykâzan: &lt;/b>uyanik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum rukûdun: &lt;/b>ve onlar uykudadir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nukallibu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari çeviririz, döndürürüz&lt;br />&lt;b>zâte el yemîni: &lt;/b>sag taraf&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zâte es simâli: &lt;/b>ve sol taraf&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kelbu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin köpegi (Ashabi Kehf'in köpegi)&lt;br />&lt;b>bâsitun: &lt;/b>uzatmistir, uzatmis vaziyettedir&lt;br />&lt;b>zirâayhi: &lt;/b>iki kol, ön ayaklari (hayvanlar için)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>el vasîdi: &lt;/b>magaranin giris kismi, avlu&lt;br />&lt;b>levittala'te (lev ittala'te): &lt;/b>eger sen muttali olsaydin, yakindan görseydin&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara, onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>le velleyte: &lt;/b>mutlaka sen (geri) dönerdin&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>firâran: &lt;/b>kaçarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le muli'te: &lt;/b>ve sen mutlaka dolardin&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ru'ben: &lt;/b>korku ile (korkarak)"
    <string name="sozluk.018.019">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezâlike: &lt;/b>ve böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>beasnâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari dirilttik, uyandirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>li yetesâelû: &lt;/b>karsilikli birbirlerine sorsunlar diye&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum,: &lt;/b>aralarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâilun: &lt;/b>diyen, söyleyen, konusan&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>kem lebistum: &lt;/b>ne kadar kaldiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lebisnâ: &lt;/b>biz kaldik&lt;br />&lt;b>yevmen: &lt;/b>bir gün&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'da yevmin: &lt;/b>günün bir kismi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>a'lemu: &lt;/b>en iyi, daha iyi bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ lebistum: &lt;/b>siz ne kadar kaldiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>feb'asû: &lt;/b>bundan sonra, artik gönderin&lt;br />&lt;b>ehade-kum: &lt;/b>sizden birisi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi veriki-kum: &lt;/b>sizin gümüs (paraniz) ile&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzihî: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâl medîneti: &lt;/b>sehre&lt;br />&lt;b>fe li yanzur: &lt;/b>böylece baksin&lt;br />&lt;b>eyyu-hâ: &lt;/b>hangisi&lt;br />&lt;b>ezkâ &lt;br>(zekâ): &lt;/b>daha temiz, en temiz &lt;br>: (temiz)&lt;br />&lt;b>taâmen: &lt;/b>yiyecek&lt;br />&lt;b>fel ye'tikum (fe li ye'tikum): &lt;/b>böylece getirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi rizkin: &lt;/b>bir rizik&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li yetelattaf: &lt;/b>ve dikkat etsin (en ince hususa kadar ifa etsin) tedbirli olsun, dikkatli olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yus'iranne: &lt;/b>ve sakin sezdirmesin, hissettirmesin, farkina vardirmasin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-kum: &lt;/b>sizleri, sizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ehaden: &lt;/b>birisi"
    <string name="sozluk.018.020">&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>in yazherû: &lt;/b>eger gâlip gelirse&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize, size&lt;br />&lt;b>yercumû-kum: &lt;/b>sizi taslarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>yuîdû-kum: &lt;/b>döndürürler, geri çevirirler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içine, ...e&lt;br />&lt;b>milleti-him: &lt;/b>kendi dînlerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve len tuflihû: &lt;/b>ve asla felâha eremezsiniz, kurtulusa eremezsiniz, kurtulamazsiniz &lt;br />&lt;b>izen ebeden: &lt;/b>o zaman ebediyyen

    <string name="sozluk.018.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu, ... idi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun, onun vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>semerun: &lt;/b>ürün, servet&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik, bu sebeple&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>...'e/...'a&lt;br />&lt;b>sâhibi-hi: &lt;/b>onun arkadasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhâviru-hû: &lt;/b>onunla konusuyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ene: &lt;/b>ben&lt;br />&lt;b>ekseru: &lt;/b>daha çok&lt;br />&lt;b>min-ke: &lt;/b>senden&lt;br />&lt;b>mâlen: &lt;/b>mal bakimindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eazzu: &lt;/b>ve daha azîz, daha üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>neferen: &lt;/b>fertler bakimindan"

    <string name="sozluk.018.054">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>sarraf-nâ: &lt;/b>açikladik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ...'de&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>el kur'âni: &lt;/b>Kur'ân-i Kerim&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için, insanlara&lt;br />&lt;b>min kulli: &lt;/b>hepsinden, hepsini, bütün&lt;br />&lt;b>meselin: &lt;/b>misal, mesele&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu, ...'dir&lt;br />&lt;b>el insânu: &lt;/b>insan&lt;br />&lt;b>eksere: &lt;/b>daha çok, çogunda&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'in: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>cedelen: &lt;/b>cedellesen, münakasa eden, kavga edeni"
    <string name="sozluk.018.055">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ menea: &lt;/b>ve men eden sey&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>en yu'minû: &lt;/b>mü'min olmak&lt;br />&lt;b>iz câe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara geldigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>el hudâ: &lt;/b>hidayet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yestagfirû: &lt;/b>ve magfiret dilerler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin Rab'leri&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...'den baska, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>en te'tiye-hum &lt;br />(illâ en te'tiye-hum): &lt;/b>onlara gelmesi &lt;br />: (onlara gelmemesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>sunnetu el evvelîne: &lt;/b>evvelkilerin sünneti&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'tiye-hum: &lt;/b>onlara gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbu: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>kubulen: &lt;/b>karsi karsiya kalma"

    <string name="sozluk.018.076">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>in seeltu-ke: &lt;/b>eger sana sorarsam&lt;br />&lt;b>an sey'in: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan sonra, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, o zaman, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tusâhib-nî,: &lt;/b>benimle arkadaslik etme&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustu, oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>belagte: &lt;/b>sen ulastin&lt;br />&lt;b>min ledun-nî: &lt;/b>benim yanimdan, benim tarafimdan&lt;br />&lt;b>uzren: &lt;/b>özür, kabul edilebilir sebep"
    <string name="sozluk.018.077">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fentalekâ (fe intalekâ): &lt;/b>böylece ikisi yola çiktilar&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ izâ eteyâ: &lt;/b>ikisi geldikleri zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ehle: &lt;/b>sehir halki&lt;br />&lt;b>karyetin: &lt;/b>bir karye, bir kasaba, bir ülke&lt;br />&lt;b>istat'amâ: &lt;/b>yemek istediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ehle hâ: &lt;/b>sehir halki&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ebev: &lt;/b>fakat çekindiler&lt;br />&lt;b>en yudayyifû humâ: &lt;/b>ikisini misafir etmek&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>fakat, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>vecedâ: &lt;/b>(ikisi) buldular&lt;br />&lt;b>fî hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>cidâren: &lt;/b>bir duvar&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdu: &lt;/b>istiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>en yenkadda: &lt;/b>yikilmak&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ekâme-hu: &lt;/b>o zaman onu ikâme etti, düzeltti&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>si'te: &lt;/b>sen diledin&lt;br />&lt;b>lettehazte (le ittehaze): &lt;/b>elbette edinirdin, alirdin&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ecren: &lt;/b>ecir, ücret, bedel"

    <string name="sozluk.018.100">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve aradnâ: &lt;/b>ve arz ettik, gösterdik&lt;br />&lt;b>cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennemi&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme izin: &lt;/b>izin günü, o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>li el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>inkâr edenlere, kâfirlere&lt;br />&lt;b>ardan: &lt;/b>arz ederek

    <string name="sozluk.019.021">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâliki: &lt;/b>iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-ki: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyye: &lt;/b>benim için, bana&lt;br />&lt;b>heyyinun: &lt;/b>kolay&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li nec'ale-hû: &lt;/b>ve onu kilmamiz için&lt;br />&lt;b>âyeten: &lt;/b>bir âyet&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlara&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmeten: &lt;/b>ve bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>min-nâ: &lt;/b>bizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>emren: &lt;/b>emir&lt;br />&lt;b>makdiyyen: &lt;/b>kaza edilmis, yerine getirilmis"

    <string name="sozluk.019.048">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve a'tezilu-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizden ayriliyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ ted'ûne: &lt;/b>ve sizin dua ettiginiz seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûnillâhi (dûni allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ed'û: &lt;/b>ve dua ediyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>asâ: &lt;/b>umulur ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ ekûne: &lt;/b>ben olmam&lt;br />&lt;b>bi duâi: &lt;/b>dualar ile&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>sakiyyen: &lt;/b>sâkî"
    <string name="sozluk.019.049">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ'tezele-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan ayrildigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ ya'budûne: &lt;/b>ve onlarin kul oldugu seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûnillâhi (dûni allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>vehebnâ: &lt;/b>ve hibe ettik (o istemeden) bahsettik&lt;br />&lt;b>lehû: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ishâka: &lt;/b>Ishak'i&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ya'kûbe: &lt;/b>ve Yâkub'u&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kullen: &lt;/b>ve hepsini&lt;br />&lt;b>cealnâ: &lt;/b>kildik&lt;br />&lt;b>nebiyyen: &lt;/b>nebî, peygamber"

    <string name="sozluk.019.076">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>yezîdu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah artirir&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ihtedev: &lt;/b>hidayete erdi, hidayet üzere oldu, hidayette oldu (hidayete ermis olanlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>huden: &lt;/b>hidayet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el bâkiyâtu es sâlihâtu: &lt;/b>ve bâki olan salih ameller&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>inde rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>Rabbinin katinda, indinde&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâben: &lt;/b>sevap olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hayrun: &lt;/b>ve daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>meradden: &lt;/b>dönen, karsiligi olan mükâfat
    <string name="sozluk.019.077">&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe raeyte: &lt;/b>öyleyse (hâlâ) ... sen gördün mü?&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî kefere: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseleri&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>le ûteyenne: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka verilecektir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâlen: &lt;/b>mal&lt;br />&lt;b>ve veleden: &lt;/b>ve çocuk
    <string name="sozluk.019.078">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ettalaa (e ittalaa): &lt;/b>muttali mi oldu, görüp bildi mi&lt;br />&lt;b>el gaybe: &lt;/b>gayba, bilinmeyene&lt;br />&lt;b>emittehaze (em ittehaze): &lt;/b>veya, yoksa ... mi edindi (yapti, aldi)?&lt;br />&lt;b>inde er rahmâni: &lt;/b>Rahmân'in katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ahden: &lt;/b>ahd"
    <string name="sozluk.019.079">&lt;br />&lt;b>kellâ: &lt;/b>hayir, asla, öyle degil&lt;br />&lt;b>se nektubu: &lt;/b>biz yazacagiz (yaziyoruz)&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yekûlu: &lt;/b>söyledigi seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nemuddu: &lt;/b>ve biz uzatacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun için, ona&lt;br />&lt;b>min el azâbi: &lt;/b>(azaptan) azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>medden: &lt;/b>uzatarak
    <string name="sozluk.019.080">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nerisu-hu: &lt;/b>ve ona varis olacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yekûlu: &lt;/b>söyledikleri sey(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ye'tî-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bize gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>ferden: &lt;/b>fert olarak (tek basina, hiçbir seysiz)"

    <string name="sozluk.020.013">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enahtertu-ke &lt;br>(ene ahtertu-ke): &lt;/b>ve ben seni seçtim&lt;br />&lt;b>festemi' (fe istemi'): &lt;/b>öyleyse dinle&lt;br />&lt;b>li mâ yûhâ: &lt;/b>vahyolunan seyi"

    <string name="sozluk.020.015">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>es sâate: &lt;/b>o saat, kiyâmet saati&lt;br />&lt;b>âtiyetun: &lt;/b>gelecektir&lt;br />&lt;b>ekâdu: &lt;/b>neredeyse (az kalsin) ben (kendim) olacagim&lt;br />&lt;b>uhfî-hâ: &lt;/b>onu gizleyecegim&lt;br />&lt;b>li tuczâ: &lt;/b>karsiliginin (ceza veya mükâfatin) verilmesi için&lt;br />&lt;b>kullu nefsin: &lt;/b>bütün nefsler, herkes&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>dolayisiyla, sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>tes'â: &lt;/b>çalismasi, çabalamasi, gayreti"
    <string name="sozluk.020.016">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yasuddenne-ke: &lt;/b>sakin seni alikoymasin, seni men etmesin&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>men lâ yu'minu: &lt;/b>inanmayan kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittebea: &lt;/b>ve tâbî oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>hevâ-hu: &lt;/b>hevasina, nefsinin afetlerine&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>sonra, böylece, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>terdâ: &lt;/b>helâk olursun"
