    <string name="sozluk.020.018">&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>asâye: &lt;/b>benim asamdir&lt;br />&lt;b>etevekkeu: &lt;/b>ben dayanirim, yaslanirim&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhâ: &lt;/b>onun üzerine, ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ehussu: &lt;/b>ve yaprak silkelerim&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hâ: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ganemî: &lt;/b>koyunlarim üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve liye: &lt;/b>ve benim için&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>onda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>meâribu: &lt;/b>faydalar, menfaatler&lt;br />&lt;b>uhrâ: &lt;/b>diger, daha baska
    <string name="sozluk.020.019">&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>elki-hâ: &lt;/b>onu at&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ mûsâ: &lt;/b>ey Musa

    <string name="sozluk.020.059">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>mev'idu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin bulusma zamaniniz&lt;br />&lt;b>yevmu ez zîneti: &lt;/b>ziynet (bayram) günü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en yuhsere: &lt;/b>ve toplanmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>duhan: &lt;/b>duhan, kusluk vakti"

    <string name="sozluk.020.084">&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâi: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ eserî: &lt;/b>benim izim üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve aciltu: &lt;/b>ve acele ettim&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>li terdâ: &lt;/b>senin rizan için, senin razi olman (için)

    <string name="sozluk.020.086">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece, bunun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>racea: &lt;/b>geri döndü&lt;br />&lt;b>mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa (a.s)&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>kendi kavmine&lt;br />&lt;b>gadbâne: &lt;/b>gadapla, gazabla, öfkeli olarak, öfkeyle&lt;br />&lt;b>esifen: &lt;/b>üzüntülü olarak, üzülerek&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ kavmi: &lt;/b>ey kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem: &lt;/b>olmadi mi&lt;br />&lt;b>yaid-kum: &lt;/b>size vaadetti&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>va'den: &lt;/b>vaad&lt;br />&lt;b>hasenen: &lt;/b>güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe tâle: &lt;/b>buna ragmen (süre) uzun mu&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>el ahdu: &lt;/b>ahd (süresi)&lt;br />&lt;b>em eradtum: &lt;/b>yoksa siz istediniz mi&lt;br />&lt;b>en yahille: &lt;/b>inmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize, size&lt;br />&lt;b>gadabun: &lt;/b>gadab, gazap&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>Rabbinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bu sebeple&lt;br />&lt;b>ahleftum: &lt;/b>yerine getirmediniz, döndünüz, ihtilâfa düstünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>mev'idî: &lt;/b>bana verilen vaad, benim vaadim"

    <string name="sozluk.020.111">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve aneti: &lt;/b>ve boyun egdi&lt;br />&lt;b>el vucûhu: &lt;/b>vechler, yüzler, kisiler&lt;br />&lt;b>li el hayyi: &lt;/b>hayy olana (diri, canli olana)&lt;br />&lt;b>el kayyûmi: &lt;/b>zati ile kaim olan, kayyum olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kad: &lt;/b>ve olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>hâbe: &lt;/b>heba oldu (cehennemlik oldu)&lt;br />&lt;b>men hamele: &lt;/b>yüklenen kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>zulmen: &lt;/b>zulüm

    <string name="sozluk.020.113">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezâlike: &lt;/b>ve böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>enzelnâ-hu: &lt;/b>biz onu indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>kur'ânen: &lt;/b>Kur'ân&lt;br />&lt;b>arabîyyen: &lt;/b>Arapça olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sarraf-nâ: &lt;/b>ve açikladik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onda, onun içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>min el vaîdi: &lt;/b>vaadlerden, vaadedilenleri&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki, böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yettekûne: &lt;/b>takva sahibi olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhdisu: &lt;/b>meydana getirir, olusur&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum zikren: &lt;/b>onlar için zikir, hatirlatma, ögüt, ibret"

    <string name="sozluk.020.129">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ: &lt;/b>yok, degil, olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>kelimetun: &lt;/b>bir kelime, bir söz&lt;br />&lt;b>sebekat: &lt;/b>geçti (daha önce oldu)&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>lizâmen: &lt;/b>elzem, lüzumlu, lâzimgelir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ecelun: &lt;/b>ve bir ecel, vade, müddet&lt;br />&lt;b>musemmen: &lt;/b>isimlendirilmis, belirlenmis

    <string name="sozluk.020.131">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ temuddenne: &lt;/b>ve sakin (bakislarini) uzatma&lt;br />&lt;b>ayney-ke: &lt;/b>senin iki gözün, gözlerin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ mâ mettâ'nâ: &lt;/b>metalandirdigimiz, faydalandirdigimiz sey(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>ona, onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ezvâcen: &lt;/b>zevcler, esler, siniflar, gruplar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>zehrate: &lt;/b>süs, ziynet&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayati&lt;br />&lt;b>li neftine-hum: &lt;/b>onlari fitne (imtihan) etmek için, denemek için&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onda, o konuda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rizku: &lt;/b>ve rizik&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirlidir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ebkâ: &lt;/b>ve bâkidir, devamlidir"

    <string name="sozluk.020.133">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olsa olmaz mi&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'tî-nâ bi: &lt;/b>bize getirir&lt;br />&lt;b>âyetin: &lt;/b>âyet&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-hî: &lt;/b>Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>e ve lem te'ti-him: &lt;/b>onlara gelmedi mi&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyinetu: &lt;/b>beyyine (ispat vasitalari, deliller)&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fî es suhufi: &lt;/b>sahifeler (için)de olan sey(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>el ûlâ: &lt;/b>evvelkiler"
    <string name="sozluk.020.134">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, olsa, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>ennâ (enne-nâ): &lt;/b>gerçekten biz&lt;br />&lt;b>ehleknâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari helâk ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi azâbin: &lt;/b>azap ile&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-hî: &lt;/b>ondan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka, muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olmaz mi&lt;br />&lt;b>erselte: &lt;/b>sen gönderdin&lt;br />&lt;b>ileynâ: &lt;/b>bize&lt;br />&lt;b>resûlen: &lt;/b>bir resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>nettebia: &lt;/b>tâbî oluruz&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-ke: &lt;/b>senin âyetlerin&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli: &lt;/b>önce, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>en nezille: &lt;/b>bizim zelil olmamiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nahzâ: &lt;/b>ve biz rezil, rüsva oluruz
    <string name="sozluk.020.135">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>kullun: &lt;/b>hepsi, herkes&lt;br />&lt;b>muterebbisun: &lt;/b>bekleyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>terabbesû: &lt;/b>siz bekleyin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>se ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>yakinda bileceksiniz, ögreneceksiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbu: &lt;/b>ashab, sahip, ehil olan&lt;br />&lt;b>es sirâti es seviyyi: &lt;/b>Sirati Mustakîm&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>ihtedâ: &lt;/b>hidayete erdi"
    <string name="sozluk.021.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ikterabe &lt;br>(karibun): &lt;/b>yaklasti &lt;br>: yakin&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>hisâbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin hesabi, hesap vermesi, hesap vakti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî gafletin: &lt;/b>gaflet içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'ridûne: &lt;/b>yüz çevirenler"
    <string name="sozluk.021.002">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ye'tî-him: &lt;/b>onlara gelmedi (ki)&lt;br />&lt;b>min zikrin: &lt;/b>zikirden, zikir, uyari, ihtar&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-him: &lt;/b>Rab'lerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>muhdesin: &lt;/b>yeni&lt;br />&lt;b>illâstemeûhu (illâ istemeû-hu): &lt;/b>...'den baska, ancak, sadece onu dinlediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yel'abûne: &lt;/b>oynuyorlar (alay ediyorlar)"
    <string name="sozluk.021.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lâhiyeten: &lt;/b>önem vermeyerek&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eserrû: &lt;/b>ve gizleyerek&lt;br />&lt;b>en necvellezîne (necve ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar fisildasirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>zalemû &lt;br />ellezîne zalemû: &lt;/b>zulmettiler &lt;br />: zulmedenler&lt;br />&lt;b>hel hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu mu?&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...'den baska, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>beserun: &lt;/b>bir beser&lt;br />&lt;b>mislu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, yoksa&lt;br />&lt;b>te'tûne es sihre: &lt;/b>sihre kapiliyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tubsirûne: &lt;/b>siz görüyorsunuz, görerek"

    <string name="sozluk.021.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne eydî-him: &lt;/b>onlarin elleri arasindaki, önlerindeki&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>halfe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin arkasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yesfeûne: &lt;/b>ve sefaat etmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...'den baska, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>li men irtedâ: &lt;/b>rizaya ermis kimse(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min hasyeti-hî: &lt;/b>onun hasyetinden&lt;br />&lt;b>musfikûne: &lt;/b>korkanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.021.029">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yekul: &lt;/b>derse&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>in-nî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhun: &lt;/b>ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni-hî: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>fe zâlike: &lt;/b>iste o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>neczî-hi: &lt;/b>onu cezalandiririz&lt;br />&lt;b>cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennem&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>neczî: &lt;/b>cezalandiririz&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalimler
    <string name="sozluk.021.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e ve lem yera: &lt;/b>ve görmüyorlar mi (görmediler mi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>enne es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalarin ... oldugu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>kânetâ: &lt;/b>idi, olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>ratkan: &lt;/b>bitisik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe fetaknâ-huma: &lt;/b>sonra biz ikisini ayirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cealnâ: &lt;/b>ve kildik, yarattik&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mâi: &lt;/b>sudan&lt;br />&lt;b>kulle sey'in: &lt;/b>hersey&lt;br />&lt;b>hayyin: &lt;/b>canli&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe lâ yu'minûne: &lt;/b>hâlâ inanmazlar mi"

    <string name="sozluk.021.055">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>e ci'te-nâ: &lt;/b>bize mi getirdin?&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hakki&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>min el lâibîne: &lt;/b>oyun oynayanlardan"

    <string name="sozluk.021.085">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ismâîle: &lt;/b>ve Ismail&lt;br />&lt;b>ve idrîse: &lt;/b>ve Idris&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zel kifli (za el kifli): &lt;/b>ve Zelkifli (Zulkifli)&lt;br />&lt;b>kullun: &lt;/b>hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>min es sâbirîne: &lt;/b>sabredenlerden

    <string name="sozluk.021.087">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zennûni (za en nuni): &lt;/b>ve Zennun (Yunus&lt;br />&lt;b>iz zehebe: &lt;/b>gitmisti&lt;br />&lt;b>mugâdiben: &lt;/b>gadaplanarak, öfkelenerek&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>zanne: &lt;/b>zannetti&lt;br />&lt;b>en len nakdire: &lt;/b>muktedir olamayacagiz&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>nâdâ: &lt;/b>nida etti&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ez zulumâti: &lt;/b>karanliklar içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>en lâ ilâhe: &lt;/b>ilâh olmadigini (ilâh yoktur)&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...'den baska, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>subhâne-ke: &lt;/b>sen sübhansin, herseyden münezzehsin&lt;br />&lt;b>in-nî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki, gerçekten ben&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntu: &lt;/b>ben oldum&lt;br />&lt;b>min ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalimlerden"
    <string name="sozluk.021.088">"&lt;br />&lt;b>festeceb-nâ (fe istecebnâ): &lt;/b>böylece, bunun üzerine icabet ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve necceynâ-hu: &lt;/b>ve onu kurtardik&lt;br />&lt;b>min el gammi: &lt;/b>gamdan, üzüntüden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezâlike: &lt;/b>ve iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>nunci: &lt;/b>biz kurtaririz&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"
    <string name="sozluk.021.089">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zekeriyyâ: &lt;/b>ve Zekeriya&lt;br />&lt;b>iz nâdâ: &lt;/b>nida etmisti, seslenmisti&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-hu: &lt;/b>onun Rabbi, kendi Rabbi, Rabbine&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi: &lt;/b>benim Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tezer-nî: &lt;/b>beni birakma&lt;br />&lt;b>ferden: &lt;/b>fert olarak, tek basima, yalniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ente: &lt;/b>ve sen&lt;br />&lt;b>hayru: &lt;/b>(en) hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>el vârisîne: &lt;/b>varisler, mirasçilar
    <string name="sozluk.021.090">"&lt;br />&lt;b>festeceb-nâ (fe istecebnâ): &lt;/b>ve bunun üzerine icabet ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu ve veheb-nâ: &lt;/b>ve ona hibe ettik, bagisladik, armagan ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun için, ona&lt;br />&lt;b>yahyâ: &lt;/b>Yahya&lt;br />&lt;b>ve aslah-nâ: &lt;/b>ve islâh ettik (düzelttik)&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun için, ona&lt;br />&lt;b>zevce-hu: &lt;/b>onun zevcesi, esi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>onlar oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yusâriûne: &lt;/b>yarisiyorlar, yarisirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fi el hayrâti: &lt;/b>hayirlarda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yed'ûne-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bize dua ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>ragaben: &lt;/b>ragbet ederek, arzu ederek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve reheben: &lt;/b>ve korkarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kânû: &lt;/b>ve onlar oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ hâsiîne: &lt;/b>bize husû duyanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.021.091">&lt;br />&lt;b>velletî (ve elletî): &lt;/b>ve ki o, o ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ahsanet: &lt;/b>korudu&lt;br />&lt;b>ferce-hâ: &lt;/b>onun irzi, irzini&lt;br />&lt;b>fe nefah-nâ: &lt;/b>o zaman biz üfledik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>onun içine&lt;br />&lt;b>min rûhi-nâ: &lt;/b>ruhumuzdan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cealnâ-hâ: &lt;/b>ve onu kildik&lt;br />&lt;b>vebne-hâ (ve ibne-hâ): &lt;/b>ve onun oglu&lt;br />&lt;b>âyeten: &lt;/b>bir âyet, mucize, ibret&lt;br />&lt;b>li el âlemîne: &lt;/b>âlemlere, âlemler için

    <string name="sozluk.021.111">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in edrî: &lt;/b>ve eger bilsem (ki bilmiyorum)&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hu: &lt;/b>umulur ki o, belki de o&lt;br />&lt;b>fitnetun: &lt;/b>bir fitnedir, bir imtihandir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve metâun: &lt;/b>ve bir metadir, faydalanmadir&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ hînin: &lt;/b>belli bir zamana kadar
    <string name="sozluk.021.112">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi ki&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi ihkum: &lt;/b>Rabbim hükmet&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rabbu-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bizim Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahmânu: &lt;/b>Rahmân'dir&lt;br />&lt;b>el musteânu &lt;br>(istiâne): &lt;/b>yardim istenen, istenilen &lt;br>: (yardim istedi)&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzere, ragmen&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>tasifûne: &lt;/b>siz vasiflandiriyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.022.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey!&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ittekû: &lt;/b>takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>zelzelete: &lt;/b>sarsilma, siddetli sarsinti&lt;br />&lt;b>es sâati: &lt;/b>saat&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'un: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmun: &lt;/b>büyük"
    <string name="sozluk.022.002">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>terevne-hâ: &lt;/b>onu görürsünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>tezhelu: &lt;/b>unutup birakir, ilgilenmez&lt;br />&lt;b>kullu: &lt;/b>bütün, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>murdiatin: &lt;/b>emziren kadin&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>erdaat: &lt;/b>emzirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tedau: &lt;/b>ve birakir, dogurur, düsürür&lt;br />&lt;b>kullu: &lt;/b>bütün, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>zâti: &lt;/b>sahip oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>hamlin: &lt;/b>yük&lt;br />&lt;b>hamle-hâ: &lt;/b>onu tasidi (tasidigi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve terâ: &lt;/b>ve görürsün&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>sukârâ: &lt;/b>sarhos&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar degiller&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sukârâ: &lt;/b>sarhos&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>azâballâhi (azâbe allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdun: &lt;/b>(çok) siddetli"

    <string name="sozluk.022.018">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem tera: &lt;/b>görmedin mi (görmüyor musun)?&lt;br />&lt;b>enne allâhe: &lt;/b>mutlaka Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>yescudu: &lt;/b>secde ederler, ediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun için&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalarda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men fî el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es semsu: &lt;/b>ve günes&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kameru: &lt;/b>ve ay&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en nucûmu: &lt;/b>ve yildizlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el cibâlu: &lt;/b>ve daglar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es seceru: &lt;/b>ve agaçlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ed devâbbu: &lt;/b>ve (yürüyen) hayvanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kesîrun: &lt;/b>ve çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>min en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kesîrun: &lt;/b>ve çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>hakka: &lt;/b>haketti, hak oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbu: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhinillâhu (vehene): &lt;/b>Allah zayif düsürür (alçaltir) (zayif düsürdü)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun için&lt;br />&lt;b>min mukrimin: &lt;/b>(ikram edenlerden) bir ikram eden&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yef'alu: &lt;/b>yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi seyi"

    <string name="sozluk.022.035">&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ zukire allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah zikredildigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>vecilet: &lt;/b>titrer&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sâbirîne: &lt;/b>ve sabredenler&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>...e, ...a&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ esâbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet eden seyler, musîbetler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mukîmi es salâti: &lt;/b>ve namazi ikame edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>ve seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>razaknâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari riziklandirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>yunfikûne: &lt;/b>infâk ederler

    <string name="sozluk.022.037">"&lt;br />&lt;b>len yenâle allâhe: &lt;/b>asla Allah'a ulasmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>luhûmu-hâ (lahm): &lt;/b>onlarin etleri (et)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ dimâu-hâ &lt;br />(dem): &lt;/b>ve onlarin kanlari olmaz &lt;br />: (kan)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve ancak, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>yenâlu-hu: &lt;/b>ona ulasir&lt;br />&lt;b>et takvâ: &lt;/b>takva&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>sahhara-hâ: &lt;/b>onu musahhar kildi, ona boyun egdirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>li tukebbirû allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'i tekbir etmeniz için&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ hedâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi hidayete erdirdigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bessir: &lt;/b>ve müjdele&lt;br />&lt;b>el muhsinîne: &lt;/b>muhsinler (Allah'a teslim olanlar)"
    <string name="sozluk.022.038">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yudâfiu: &lt;/b>defeder (uzaklastirir)&lt;br />&lt;b>an ellezîne: &lt;/b>kimselerden, onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar (Allah'a ulasmayi dileyenler)&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuhibbu: &lt;/b>sevmez&lt;br />&lt;b>kulle: &lt;/b>hepsi, bütün, hiçbiri&lt;br />&lt;b>havvânin: &lt;/b>hain olanlar, hainler&lt;br />&lt;b>kefûrin: &lt;/b>kâfirler"
    <string name="sozluk.022.039">&lt;br />&lt;b>uzine: &lt;/b>izin verildi&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimselere, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>yukâtelûne: &lt;/b>savasiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin olmasi sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>zulimû: &lt;/b>zulme ugradilar, zulmedildiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ nasri-him: &lt;/b>onlara yardim&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette, muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>kadîrun: &lt;/b>kaadirdir, gücü yetendir
    <string name="sozluk.022.040">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>uhricû: &lt;/b>çikarildilar&lt;br />&lt;b>min diyâri-him: &lt;/b>diyarlarindan, yurtlarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayri: &lt;/b>olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkin: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>yalniz, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>en yekûlû: &lt;/b>demeleri&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbunallâhu (rabunâ allahu): &lt;/b>bizim Rabbimiz Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev lâ: &lt;/b>ve eger olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>def'ullâhi en nâse: &lt;/b>Allah'in insanlari defetmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'da-hum bi ba'din: &lt;/b>onlari birbirleriyle, birbiriyle&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>huddimet: &lt;/b>yikildi, harap oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>savâmiu: &lt;/b>(rahiplerin) mabetleri, manastirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve biyaun: &lt;/b>ve (hristiyanlarin) kiliseleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve salavâtun: &lt;/b>ve (yahudilerin) havralari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mesâcidu: &lt;/b>ve (müslümanlarin) mescidleri&lt;br />&lt;b>yuzkeru: &lt;/b>zikredilir&lt;br />&lt;b>fîhâsmullâhi (fîhâ ismullâhi): &lt;/b>içinde Allah'in ismi&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîran: &lt;/b>çok&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le: &lt;/b>ve mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>yansurannallâhu: &lt;/b>Allah yardim eder&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kisi, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yansuru-hu: &lt;/b>ona yardim etti&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>kaviyyun: &lt;/b>kuvvetlidir, güçlüdür&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>azîzdir, yücedir"
    <string name="sozluk.022.041">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>mekkennâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlara imkân(lar) verdik (verseydik), yerlestirdik (yerlestirseydik)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ekâmû es salâte: &lt;/b>namazi ikame ettiler (ederlerdi, kilarlardi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âtevu ez zekâte: &lt;/b>ve zekâti verdiler (verirlerdi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emerû: &lt;/b>ve emrettiler (emrederlerdi)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ma'rûfi: &lt;/b>irfan ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nehev: &lt;/b>ve nehyettiler (nehyederler, yasaklarlardi)&lt;br />&lt;b>an el munkeri: &lt;/b>münkerden, inkârdan, kötülükten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a aittir&lt;br />&lt;b>âkibetu: &lt;/b>akibet, sonuc&lt;br />&lt;b>el umûri: &lt;/b>isler"
    <string name="sozluk.022.042">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>yukezzibû-ke: &lt;/b>seni yalanliyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebet: &lt;/b>yalanladi&lt;br />&lt;b>kable-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmu nûhin: &lt;/b>Nuh kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âdun: &lt;/b>ve Adn (kavmi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve semûdun: &lt;/b>ve Semud (kavmi)

    <string name="sozluk.022.045">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ke eyyin: &lt;/b>böylece niceleri gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>min karyetin: &lt;/b>ülkelerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ehleknâ-hâ: &lt;/b>onu helâk ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hiye: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlimetun: &lt;/b>zalimler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hiye: &lt;/b>artik o&lt;br />&lt;b>hâviyetun alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine çökmüs, yikilmis&lt;br />&lt;b>urûsi-hâ: &lt;/b>onun çatisi, tavani&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi'rin: &lt;/b>ve kuyu&lt;br />&lt;b>muattalatin: &lt;/b>terkedilmis, bos&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kasrin: &lt;/b>ve köskler, saraylar&lt;br />&lt;b>mesîdin: &lt;/b>yüksek bina"

    <string name="sozluk.022.047">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yesta'cilûne-ke: &lt;/b>ve senden acele (olarak) istiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el azâbi: &lt;/b>azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve len yuhlife allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah asla dönmez (mutlaka yerine getirir)&lt;br />&lt;b>va'de-hu: &lt;/b>onun vaadi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>yevmen: &lt;/b>bir gün&lt;br />&lt;b>inde: &lt;/b>yaninda, katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>elfi: &lt;/b>1000 (bin)&lt;br />&lt;b>senetin: &lt;/b>sene&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>teuddûne: &lt;/b>saydiginiz, sayiyorsunuz (adetlendiriyorsunuz)"

    <string name="sozluk.022.050">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olan, Allah'a ulasmayi dileyen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve salih amel (nefs tezkiyesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum magfiratun: &lt;/b>onlar için magfiret vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rizkun: &lt;/b>ve rizik&lt;br />&lt;b>kerîmun: &lt;/b>kerim, bol, temiz, helâl"
    <string name="sozluk.022.051">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>seav: &lt;/b>çalisti, çaba harcadi, gayret etti&lt;br />&lt;b>fî âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimiz hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>muâcizîne: &lt;/b>aciz birakanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbu el cehîmi: &lt;/b>cehennem ehlidir (halkidir)
    <string name="sozluk.022.052">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ erselnâ: &lt;/b>ve göndermedik&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-ke: &lt;/b>senden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>min resûlin: &lt;/b>resûlden, bir resul&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ nebiyyin: &lt;/b>ve bir nebî, bir peygamber yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ temennâ: &lt;/b>temenni ettigi zaman, diledigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>elka es seytânu: &lt;/b>seytan (yalan, vesvese) ilka eder, ulastirir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî umniyyeti-hî: &lt;/b>onun dileginin, temennisinin içine&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yensehu allâhu: &lt;/b>fakat Allah kaldirir, yok eder, nesheder&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>yulki: &lt;/b>ilka eder, ulastirir&lt;br />&lt;b>es seytânu: &lt;/b>seytan&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhkimu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah muhkem kilar, saglamlastirir&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-hî: &lt;/b>onun âyetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allahu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>alîm'dir, en iyi bilendir&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hikmet sahibidir"
    <string name="sozluk.022.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>li yec'ale: &lt;/b>kilmak içindir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yulki: &lt;/b>sey(ler) ilka eder, ulastirir&lt;br />&lt;b>es seytânu: &lt;/b>seytan&lt;br />&lt;b>fitneten: &lt;/b>fitne, imtihan&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler için&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kalplerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>maradun: &lt;/b>maraz, hastalik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kâsiyeti: &lt;/b>ve kasiyet, kararma&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalimler&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, gerçekten, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sikâkin: &lt;/b>ayrilik içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>baîdin: &lt;/b>uzak"
    <string name="sozluk.022.054">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li ya'leme: &lt;/b>ve bilmeleri için&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtû el ilme: &lt;/b>ilim verildi&lt;br />&lt;b>ennehu: &lt;/b>onun oldugu&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakku: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yu'minû: &lt;/b>böylece îmân ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bihî: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>fe tuhbite &lt;br>(ahbete): &lt;/b>böylece ihbat koyar &lt;br>: (ihbat koydu) &lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin kalpleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>hâdi: &lt;/b>hidayete erdiren&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar, Allah'a ulasmayi dileyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ sirâtin mustakîmin: &lt;/b>Sirati Mustakîm'e (Allah'a ulastiran yola)"
    <string name="sozluk.022.055">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yezâlu: &lt;/b>ve zail olmaz, yok olmaz (devam eder)&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî miryetin: &lt;/b>süphe içinde, süphede&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>te'tiye-hum: &lt;/b>onlara gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>es sâatu: &lt;/b>o saat (kiyâmet saati)&lt;br />&lt;b>bagteten: &lt;/b>ansizin&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'tiye-hum: &lt;/b>onlara gelir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbu: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>yevmin: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>akîmin: &lt;/b>kisir, verimsiz, hedefine ulasamamis (gün)"

    <string name="sozluk.022.057">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezzebû: &lt;/b>ve yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece, iste&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için (vardir)&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>muhînun: &lt;/b>alçaltici
    <string name="sozluk.022.058">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hâcerû: &lt;/b>hicret ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>kutilû: &lt;/b>öldürüldüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>mâtû: &lt;/b>öldüler&lt;br />&lt;b>le yerzukanne-hum: &lt;/b>mutlaka onlari riziklandiracaktir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>rizkan hasenen: &lt;/b>güzel bir rizik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le huve: &lt;/b>mutlaka, muhakkak ki odur&lt;br />&lt;b>hayru: &lt;/b>(en) hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>er râzikîne: &lt;/b>rizik verenler"
    <string name="sozluk.022.059">&lt;br />&lt;b>le yudhilenne-hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak onlari dahil edecektir&lt;br />&lt;b>mudhalen: &lt;/b>dahil edilen yer, mekân&lt;br />&lt;b>yerdavne-hu: &lt;/b>ondan razi olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilendir&lt;br />&lt;b>halîmun: &lt;/b>halimdir

    <string name="sozluk.023.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>efleha: &lt;/b>felâha erdi&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"
    <string name="sozluk.023.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî salâti-him: &lt;/b>onlarin namazlarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>hâsiûne: &lt;/b>husû duyanlar

    <string name="sozluk.023.031">"&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ense'nâ: &lt;/b>biz yarattik&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di-him: &lt;/b>onlardan sonra, onlarin arkasindan&lt;br />&lt;b>karnen: &lt;/b>bir nesil&lt;br />&lt;b>âharîne: &lt;/b>digerleri, baskalari"
    <string name="sozluk.023.032">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ersel-nâ: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece biz gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-him: &lt;/b>onlarin içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>resûlen: &lt;/b>bir resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, kendilerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>eni'budû allâhe (en u'budû): &lt;/b>Allah'a kul olsunlar diye&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min ilâhin: &lt;/b>(ilâhtan) bir ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>gayru-hu: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>e fe lâ tettekûne: &lt;/b>hâlâ takva sahibi olmayacak misiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.023.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>el meleu: &lt;/b>ileri gelenler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kavminden&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler, kâfir olan kimseler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezzebû: &lt;/b>ve yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi likâi el âhirati: &lt;/b>ahirete (Allah'a) mülâki olmayi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve etrafnâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve biz onlara refah verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayatinda&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu degildir&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>beserun: &lt;/b>bir beser, bir insan&lt;br />&lt;b>mislu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'kulu: &lt;/b>(yemek) yer&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>te'kulûne: &lt;/b>siz yiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yasrebu: &lt;/b>ve içer&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>tesrabûne: &lt;/b>siz içiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.023.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le in: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>ata'tum: &lt;/b>siz itaat edersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>beseren: &lt;/b>bir beser, bir insan&lt;br />&lt;b>misle-kum: &lt;/b>sizin gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-kum: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki siz&lt;br />&lt;b>izen: &lt;/b>o taktirde, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>hâsirûne: &lt;/b>hüsrana düsenler"
    <string name="sozluk.023.035">&lt;br />&lt;b>e yaidu-kum: &lt;/b>size vaad mi ediyor?&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-kum: &lt;/b>mutlaka siz, sizin ... olacaginiz&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>mittum: &lt;/b>siz öldünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kuntum: &lt;/b>ve siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>turâben: &lt;/b>toprak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâmen: &lt;/b>ve kemik&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-kum: &lt;/b>mutlaka siz, sizin olacaginiz&lt;br />&lt;b>muhracûne: &lt;/b>çikarilacaksiniz

    <string name="sozluk.023.066">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustur&lt;br />&lt;b>kânet: &lt;/b>idi, oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtî: &lt;/b>âyetlerim&lt;br />&lt;b>tutlâ: &lt;/b>okunuyor&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ a'kâbi-kum: &lt;/b>topuklariniz üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>tenkisûne: &lt;/b>dönüp kaçiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.023.067">&lt;br />&lt;b>mustekbirîne: &lt;/b>kibirlenenler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla, ona&lt;br />&lt;b>sâmiran: &lt;/b>gece toplanip görüsenler&lt;br />&lt;b>tehcurûne: &lt;/b>ayriliyordunuz, saçma sapan konusuyordunuz

    <string name="sozluk.023.100">"&lt;br />&lt;b>leal-lî: &lt;/b>böylece ben&lt;br />&lt;b>a'melu sâlihan: &lt;/b>salih amel (nefsi tezkiye edici amel) yaparim&lt;br />&lt;b>fîmâ: &lt;/b>içinde, o seyde, hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>terektu: &lt;/b>biraktim, terkettim&lt;br />&lt;b>kellâ: &lt;/b>hayir, asla&lt;br />&lt;b>innehâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>kelimetun: &lt;/b>bir kelimedir, sözdür&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>kâilu-hâ: &lt;/b>onun söyledigi (söz)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min verâi-him: &lt;/b>ve onlarin arkalarindan, onlarin arkasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>berzahun: &lt;/b>bir berzah, engel vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ yevmi: &lt;/b>güne kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>yub'asûne: &lt;/b>beas olunacaklar, yeniden diriltilecekler"
    <string name="sozluk.023.101">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe izâ: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>nufiha: &lt;/b>üfürüldü&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es sûri: &lt;/b>sur'un içine, sur'a&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ensâbe: &lt;/b>neseb, soy bagi yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin aralarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme izin: &lt;/b>izin günü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yetesâelûne: &lt;/b>ve birbirlerini sormazlar, sorulmazlar, soramazlar"

    <string name="sozluk.024.009">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hâmisete: &lt;/b>ve besinci&lt;br />&lt;b>enne: &lt;/b>... oldugu&lt;br />&lt;b>gadabe allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in gadabi, öfkesi, azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhâ: &lt;/b>onun üzerine, kendi üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ... ise&lt;br />&lt;b>min es sâdikîne: &lt;/b>sadiklardan, dogru söyleyenlerden"
    <string name="sozluk.024.010">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev lâ: &lt;/b>ve eger olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>fadlullâhi (fadlu allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in fazli&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmetu-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun rahmeti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>tevvâbun: &lt;/b>tövbeleri kabul eden&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakim olan, hüküm ve hikmet sahibi olan"
    <string name="sozluk.024.011">&lt;br />&lt;b>innellezîne (inne ellezîne): &lt;/b>muhakkak o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>câû: &lt;/b>geldiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el ifki: &lt;/b>ifk ile, uydurulmus iftira ile&lt;br />&lt;b>usbetun: &lt;/b>birbirine destek olan insanlar toplulugu, bir grup&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden, içinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tahsebû-hu: &lt;/b>onu zannetmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>serren: &lt;/b>bir serr&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayirdir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>li kullimriin (li kulli imriin): &lt;/b>(hepsi, herkes) herbiri için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâktesebe (mâ iktesebe): &lt;/b>kazandigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>min el ismi: &lt;/b>günahtan&lt;br />&lt;b>vellezî tevellâ (ve ellezî tevellâ): &lt;/b>ve çeviren, yöneten kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>kibra-hu: &lt;/b>onun büyügü&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun için, ona vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun azîmun: &lt;/b>büyük azap

    <string name="sozluk.024.015">"&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman, olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>telakkavne-hu: &lt;/b>onu telâkki ediyorsunuz, ögreniyorsunuz, soruyorsunuz (anlatiyorsunuz)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi elsineti-kum: &lt;/b>dillerinizle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tekûlûne: &lt;/b>ve söylüyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi efvâhi-kum: &lt;/b>agizlarinizla&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degil, yok&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin&lt;br />&lt;b>bihi: &lt;/b>onu, onun&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmun: &lt;/b>ilim, bilgi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tahsebûne-hu: &lt;/b>ve onu saniyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>heyyinen: &lt;/b>kolay, basit, önemsiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>indallâhi (inde allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmun: &lt;/b>büyük"

    <string name="sozluk.024.021">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>ey âmenû olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tettebiû: &lt;/b>tâbî olmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>hutuvâti es seytâni: &lt;/b>seytanin adimlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men yettebi': &lt;/b>ve kim tâbî olursa&lt;br />&lt;b>hutuvâti es seytâni: &lt;/b>seytanin adimlari&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak o, çünkü o&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'muru: &lt;/b>emreder&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el fahsâi: &lt;/b>fuhus ile, her çesit kötülük ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el munkeri: &lt;/b>ve münker, inkâr, Allah'in yasak ettikleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev lâ: &lt;/b>ve eger olmasa&lt;br />&lt;b>fadlullâhi (fadlu allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in fazli&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmetu-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun rahmeti&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ zekâ: &lt;/b>tezkiye olmaz, tezkiye edemez&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden, içinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>min ehadin: &lt;/b>hiç kimse, hiçbiri&lt;br />&lt;b>ebeden: &lt;/b>ebediyyen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yuzekkî: &lt;/b>temizler, tezkiye eder&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimse, diledigi&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>semî'un: &lt;/b>en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.024.022">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ ye'teli: &lt;/b>ve kusur etmesin, yemin etmesin&lt;br />&lt;b>ulû el fadli: &lt;/b>fazilet sahipleri&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden, içinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es seati: &lt;/b>ve varlikli&lt;br />&lt;b>en yu'tû: &lt;/b>vermeleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ulî el kurbâ: &lt;/b>yakinlik sahipleri, akrabalar, yakinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mesâkîne: &lt;/b>ve miskinler, yoksullar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el muhâcirîne: &lt;/b>ve muhacirler, hicret edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîlillâhi (sebîli allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>velya'fû (ve li ya'fû): &lt;/b>ve affetsinler&lt;br />&lt;b>velyasfehû (ve li yasfehû): &lt;/b>ve vazgeçsinler, hos görsünler&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ tuhibbûne: &lt;/b>sevmez misiniz?&lt;br />&lt;b>en yagfirallâhu (yagfire allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah'in magfiret etmesini&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size, sizi&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>magfiret edendir&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>rahîmdir, rahmet nuru gönderendir, Rahîm esmasiyla tecelli edendir"
    <string name="sozluk.024.023">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ellezîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yermûne: &lt;/b>(iftira) atarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el muhsanâti: &lt;/b>muhsin, iffetli, evli kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el gâfilâti: &lt;/b>gâfil olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minâti: &lt;/b>mü'min kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>luinû: &lt;/b>lânetlendiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünyada&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el âhirati: &lt;/b>ve ahiret&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlar için, vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmun: &lt;/b>azîm, büyük"
    <string name="sozluk.024.024">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>teshedu: &lt;/b>sahitlik eder, sahitlik edecek&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>elsinetu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin dilleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eydî-him: &lt;/b>ve onlarin elleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve erculu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin ayaklari&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.024.025">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme izin: &lt;/b>izin günü&lt;br />&lt;b>yuveffî-him: &lt;/b>onlara ödeyecek&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>dîne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin dînlerini, bedelini, karsiligini&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakka: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>ve bilecekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ennallâhe (enne allâhe): &lt;/b>Allah'in ... oldugu, muhakkak Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakku el mubînu: &lt;/b>hakk mübin (hakki açiklayan yerine getiren)"
    <string name="sozluk.024.026">"&lt;br />&lt;b>el habîsâtu: &lt;/b>habis kadinlar, kötü kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>li el habîsîne: &lt;/b>habis erkekler, kötü erkekler için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el habîsûne: &lt;/b>ve habis erkekler, kötü erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>li el habîsâti: &lt;/b>habis kadinlar, kötü kadinlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve et tayyibâtu: &lt;/b>ve temiz kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>li et tayyibîne: &lt;/b>temiz erkekler için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve et tayyibûne: &lt;/b>ve temiz erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>li et tayyibâti: &lt;/b>temiz kadinlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>muberraûne: &lt;/b>berî olanlar, uzak olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ: &lt;/b>sey(ler)den&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlûne: &lt;/b>diyorlar, söylüyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>magfiratun: &lt;/b>magfiret, günahlarin sevaba çevrilmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rizkun: &lt;/b>ve rizik&lt;br />&lt;b>kerîmun: &lt;/b>kerim, bol, Allah'in ikramlari"
    <string name="sozluk.024.027">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>ey âmenû olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tedhulû: &lt;/b>girmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>buyûten: &lt;/b>evler&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra: &lt;/b>baska, diger&lt;br />&lt;b>buyûti-kum: &lt;/b>sizin evleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>hatta, olmadikça&lt;br />&lt;b>teste'nisû: &lt;/b>izin isteyin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tusellimû: &lt;/b>ve selâm verin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ehli-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ehline, sahibine, halkina,&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlikum: &lt;/b>iste bu, bu&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayirlidir, hayirdir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tezekkerûne: &lt;/b>tezekkür edersiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.024.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe in: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman eger&lt;br />&lt;b>lem tecidû: &lt;/b>bulamazsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>ehaden: &lt;/b>birisi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tedhulû-hâ: &lt;/b>ona (oraya) girmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'zene: &lt;/b>izin verilir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger&lt;br />&lt;b>kîle: &lt;/b>denir&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>irciû: &lt;/b>geri dönün&lt;br />&lt;b>ferciû (fe irciû): &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde geri dönün&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>ezkâ: &lt;/b>daha temiz, daha uygun&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.024.029">"&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degildir, yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>cunâhun: &lt;/b>günah, vebal&lt;br />&lt;b>en tedhulû: &lt;/b>girmek, girmeniz&lt;br />&lt;b>buyûten: &lt;/b>evlere&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra: &lt;/b>disinda, ... olmayan&lt;br />&lt;b>meskûnetin: &lt;/b>meskun olan, oturulan evler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>metâun: &lt;/b>meta, fayda&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>tubdûne: &lt;/b>açikliyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>tektumûne: &lt;/b>ketmediyorsunuz, sakliyorsunuz, gizliyorsunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.024.055">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vaadallâhu (vaade allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah vaadetti&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne amenû: &lt;/b>Allah'a ulasmayi dileyenler, âmenû olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve salih amel (nefs tezkiyesi) islediler&lt;br />&lt;b>le yestahlifenne-hum: &lt;/b>onlari mutlaka halife tayin edecek&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâstahlefellezîne (kemâ istahlefe ellezîne): &lt;/b>halife tayin ettigimiz kimseler gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce, kendilerinden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le yumekkinenne: &lt;/b>ve mutlaka saglamlastiracak&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara, onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>dîne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin dîni&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî irtedâ: &lt;/b>ki onu seçti, razi oldu, hosnut oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le yubeddilenne-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlara mutlaka çevirecek&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>havfi-him: &lt;/b>(onlarin) korkulari&lt;br />&lt;b>emnen: &lt;/b>emniyet, güven, güvenlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'budûne-nî: &lt;/b>bana kul olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yusrikûne: &lt;/b>sirk kosmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bî sey'en: &lt;/b>bir seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>kefere: &lt;/b>örttü, inkâr etti&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el fâsikûne: &lt;/b>fasiklar"
    <string name="sozluk.024.056">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ekîmû: &lt;/b>ve ikame edin&lt;br />&lt;b>es salâte: &lt;/b>namaz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âtû: &lt;/b>ve verin&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zekâte: &lt;/b>zekât&lt;br />&lt;b>ve atîû: &lt;/b>ve itaat edin&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûle: &lt;/b>resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulurki siz, böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>turhamûne: &lt;/b>rahmet olunasiniz
    <string name="sozluk.024.057">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tahsebenne: &lt;/b>sakin zannetme&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'cizîne: &lt;/b>aciz birakicilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve me'vâhum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin barinacagi yer&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâru: &lt;/b>ates&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le bi'se: &lt;/b>ve elbette, mutlaka kötü&lt;br />&lt;b>el masîru: &lt;/b>bir dönüs (yeri)"
    <string name="sozluk.024.058">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>Ey!, Ya! (seslenme edati)&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>Allah'a ulasmayi dileyenler, âmenû olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>li yeste'zin-kum: &lt;/b>sizden izin istesinler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne meleket eymânu-kum: &lt;/b>ellerinizin altinda sahip olduklariniz (köleleriniz, cariyeleriniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yeblugû: &lt;/b>erismemis, ulasmamis&lt;br />&lt;b>el hulume: &lt;/b>bulûg çagina, erginlige&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>selâse: &lt;/b>üç&lt;br />&lt;b>merrâtin: &lt;/b>kere, defa, kez&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli: &lt;/b>öncesinden, evvel, önce&lt;br />&lt;b>salâti: &lt;/b>namaz&lt;br />&lt;b>el fecri: &lt;/b>fecr, sabah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hîne: &lt;/b>ve o vakit, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>tedaûne: &lt;/b>çikarirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>siyâbe-kum: &lt;/b>elbiseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min ez zahîrati: &lt;/b>ögle vaktinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min ba'di: &lt;/b>ve sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>salâti: &lt;/b>namaz&lt;br />&lt;b>el isâi: &lt;/b>yatsi&lt;br />&lt;b>selâsu: &lt;/b>üç&lt;br />&lt;b>avrâtin: &lt;/b>muhafazasiz, açik, sakinilmasi gereken&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degildir, yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ aleyhim: &lt;/b>ve onlara, onlarin üzerine yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>cunâhun: &lt;/b>günah, kusur&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de hunne: &lt;/b>onlardan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>tavvâfûne: &lt;/b>karsilikli dolasirlar, karsilikli tavaf ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize, size&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'du-kum alâ ba'din: &lt;/b>birbirinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yubeyyine allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah beyan ediyor, açikliyor&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>el âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hüküm ve hikmet sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.024.059">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ belegâ: &lt;/b>ve ulastigi, eristigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>el etfâlu: &lt;/b>çocuklar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden, içinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>hulume: &lt;/b>erginlik çagi, bulûg çagi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe li yeste'zinû: &lt;/b>o zaman izin istesinler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yubeyyinu allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah beyan ediyor, açikliyor&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-hi: &lt;/b>âyetlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>alîm, en iyi bilendir&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hüküm ve hikmet sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.024.060">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kavâidu: &lt;/b>ve yasli kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>minen nisâi: &lt;/b>kadinlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ellatî lâ yercûne: &lt;/b>onlar ümit etmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>nikâhan: &lt;/b>bir nikâh, evlilik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degil, yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhinne: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>cunâhun: &lt;/b>vebal, günah, kusur&lt;br />&lt;b>en yeda'ne: &lt;/b>çikarmalari&lt;br />&lt;b>siyâbehunne: &lt;/b>onlarin elbiseleri, dis giysileri&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra muteberricâtin: &lt;/b>açmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zînetin: &lt;/b>ziynetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve en yesta'fifne: &lt;/b>ve iffetli olmayi istemeleri&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayirli, daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>lehunne: &lt;/b>onlara (kadinlara), onlar için (kadinlar için)&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>semîun: &lt;/b>en iyi isiten&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilendir"

    <string name="sozluk.024.062">"&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'minler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>Allah'a ulasmayi dileyen, îmân eden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûli-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular, idiler&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-hu: &lt;/b>onunla birlikte, beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ emrin: &lt;/b>bir is üzerine, bir is için&lt;br />&lt;b>câmiin: &lt;/b>toplu olarak, toplanmis olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yezhebû: &lt;/b>gitmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar, olmadikça&lt;br />&lt;b>yeste'zinû-hu: &lt;/b>ondan izin isterler&lt;br />&lt;b>inne ellezîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yeste'zinûne-ke: &lt;/b>senden izin isterler&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne yu'minûne: &lt;/b>îmân edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûli-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>izâste'zenû-ke (izâ iste'zenû-ke): &lt;/b>senden izin istedikleri zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>li ba'di: &lt;/b>bazisi için&lt;br />&lt;b>se'ni-him: &lt;/b>onlarin isleri, halleri, durumlari&lt;br />&lt;b>fe'zen (fe ezen): &lt;/b>o zaman izin ver&lt;br />&lt;b>li men: &lt;/b>o kimseye&lt;br />&lt;b>si'te: &lt;/b>sen diledin&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>vestagfir (ve istagfir): &lt;/b>ve magfiret dile&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>gafurdur, magfiret edendir&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmun: &lt;/b>Rahîm'dir, rahmet nuru gönderendir, Rahîm esmasi ile tecelli edendir"
    <string name="sozluk.024.063">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tec'alû: &lt;/b>kilmayin, yapmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>duâe er resûli: &lt;/b>resûlün çagirmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-kum: &lt;/b>(sizin) aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi, ayni, esit&lt;br />&lt;b>duâi: &lt;/b>çagirma&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'di-kum ba'den: &lt;/b>birbirinizi&lt;br />&lt;b>kad ya'lemu: &lt;/b>biliyordu&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yetesellelûne: &lt;/b>gizlice çikarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>livâzen: &lt;/b>bir seyi siper ederek (görünmemeye çalisarak)&lt;br />&lt;b>felyahzeri (fe li yahzeri): &lt;/b>o zaman hazer etsinler, sakinsinlar, çekinsinler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne yuhâlifûne: &lt;/b>hilâfet edenler, karsi gelenler&lt;br />&lt;b>an emri-hi: &lt;/b>onun emrine&lt;br />&lt;b>en tusîbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet etmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>fitnetun: &lt;/b>bir fitne&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>yusîbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet eder&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun: &lt;/b>bir azap&lt;br />&lt;b>elîmun: &lt;/b>aci, elîm"
    <string name="sozluk.024.064">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ: &lt;/b>degil mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a aittir, Allah'in&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>göklerdeki&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzü, arz&lt;br />&lt;b>kad ya'lemu: &lt;/b>biliyordu&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yevme: &lt;/b>ve o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>yurceûne: &lt;/b>döndürülecekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>fe yunebbiu-hum: &lt;/b>o zaman onlara haber verecek&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ amilû: &lt;/b>yaptiklari seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"

    <string name="sozluk.025.005">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>esâtîru: &lt;/b>masallar, efsaneler&lt;br />&lt;b>el evvelîne: &lt;/b>evvelkiler&lt;br />&lt;b>iktetebe-hâ: &lt;/b>onu yazdirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>tumlâ: &lt;/b>imlâ ettirilen, okunan&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>bukraten: &lt;/b>sabah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve asîlen: &lt;/b>ve aksam
    <string name="sozluk.025.006">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>enzele-hu: &lt;/b>onu indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>es sirre: &lt;/b>sir, gizli&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>göklerde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ...'dir&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûran: &lt;/b>gafur olan, magfiret eden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmen: &lt;/b>rahîm olan,"
    <string name="sozluk.025.007">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ li: &lt;/b>niçin, nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûli: &lt;/b>resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'kuli: &lt;/b>yiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>et taâme: &lt;/b>yemek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yemsî: &lt;/b>ve yürür, dolasir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el esvâki: &lt;/b>çarsilarda&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olmaz miydi&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>melekun: &lt;/b>bir melek&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûne: &lt;/b>olur&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-hu: &lt;/b>onunla beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>nezîren: &lt;/b>uyarici, nezir"

    <string name="sozluk.025.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûlu: &lt;/b>resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ rabbi: &lt;/b>ey Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmî: &lt;/b>benim kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>ittehazû: &lt;/b>edindiler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>el kur'âne: &lt;/b>Kur'ân&lt;br />&lt;b>mehcûran: &lt;/b>ayrilmis, uzaklasilmis, terkedilmis olan"
    <string name="sozluk.025.031">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezâlike: &lt;/b>ve iste böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>cealnâ: &lt;/b>kildik&lt;br />&lt;b>li kulli: &lt;/b>hepsi için, hepsine&lt;br />&lt;b>nebiyyin: &lt;/b>nebî, peygamber&lt;br />&lt;b>aduvven: &lt;/b>düsman&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mucrimîne: &lt;/b>mücrimlerden,&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kefâ bi: &lt;/b>ve kâfi oldu, kâfidir&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>hâdiyen: &lt;/b>hidayete erdiren&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nasîran: &lt;/b>ve yardimci olan, yardimci olarak
    <string name="sozluk.025.032">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>kâfir olanlar, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olsaydi olmaz miydi, gerekmez miydi, degil miydi?&lt;br />&lt;b>nuzzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>el kur'ânu: &lt;/b>Kur'ân&lt;br />&lt;b>cumleten: &lt;/b>toplu olarak, bütün olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhideten: &lt;/b>bir tek, bir defa&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>böylece, iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>li nusebbite: &lt;/b>tesbit etmemiz, sabitlememiz için&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>fuâde-ke: &lt;/b>senin idrakin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rattelnâ-hu: &lt;/b>ve onu beyan ettik, yavas okuduk&lt;br />&lt;b>tertîlen: &lt;/b>yavas yavas, tertip tertip, kisim kisim tertipleyerek"

    <string name="sozluk.025.057">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ es'elu-kum: &lt;/b>sizden istemiyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>min ecrin: &lt;/b>bir ecir, ücret, karsilik&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>den baska, ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>sâe: &lt;/b>diledi&lt;br />&lt;b>en yettehize: &lt;/b>edinmek&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ rabbi-hî: &lt;/b>Rabbine (ulastiran)&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîlen: &lt;/b>bir yol"
    <string name="sozluk.025.058">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tevekkel alâ: &lt;/b>ve tevekkül et, güven, vekil tayin et&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayyi: &lt;/b>hayy olan, hayatta olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yemûtu: &lt;/b>ölmez, ölümsüz olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sebbih: &lt;/b>ve tesbih et&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hamdi-hi: &lt;/b>hamd ile onu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kefâ bi: &lt;/b>ve kâfidir, yeterlidir&lt;br />&lt;b>hî: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zunûbi: &lt;/b>günahlari&lt;br />&lt;b>ibâdi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kullari&lt;br />&lt;b>habîren: &lt;/b>haberdar olan

    <string name="sozluk.026.012">&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi: &lt;/b>Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>ehâfu: &lt;/b>korkuyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>en yukezzibû-ni: &lt;/b>beni yalanlamalari

    <string name="sozluk.026.051">"&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>natmeu: &lt;/b>umuyoruz, istiyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>en yagfira: &lt;/b>magfiret etmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bizi, bize&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>hatâyâ-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim hatalarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>en kunnâ: &lt;/b>olmus olmamiz&lt;br />&lt;b>evvele: &lt;/b>ilk, evvel&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"

    <string name="sozluk.026.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece, bunun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ersele: &lt;/b>gönderdi&lt;br />&lt;b>fir'avnu: &lt;/b>firavun&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el medâini: &lt;/b>sehirlere&lt;br />&lt;b>hâsirîne: &lt;/b>toplayicilar"

    <string name="sozluk.026.104">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzu: &lt;/b>azîz, güçlü, üstün, yüce olan&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahîmu: &lt;/b>rahîm, Rahîm esmasiyla tecelli eden

    <string name="sozluk.026.156">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ temessû-hâ: &lt;/b>ve ona dokunmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>sûin: &lt;/b>kötülük&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'huze-kum: &lt;/b>sizi alir (yakalar)&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbu: &lt;/b>bir azap&lt;br />&lt;b>yevmin: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmin: &lt;/b>büyük"

    <string name="sozluk.026.200">&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>seleknâ-hu: &lt;/b>biz onu soktuk&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içine&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbi: &lt;/b>kalpler&lt;br />&lt;b>el mucrimîne: &lt;/b>mücrimler, suçlular, günahkârlar
    <string name="sozluk.026.201">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inanmazlar, mü'min olmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar, olmadikça&lt;br />&lt;b>yeravu: &lt;/b>görürler&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbe: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>el elîme: &lt;/b>elîm, aci"

    <string name="sozluk.027.013">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câet-hum: &lt;/b>onlara geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtu-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>mubsiraten: &lt;/b>görünür halde, görünür oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>sihrun: &lt;/b>sihir, büyü&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînun: &lt;/b>apaçik

    <string name="sozluk.027.015">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>âteynâ: &lt;/b>biz verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>dâvûde: &lt;/b>Davut&lt;br />&lt;b>ve suleymâne: &lt;/b>ve Süleyman&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmen: &lt;/b>ilim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlâ: &lt;/b>ve (ikisi) dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>el hamdu: &lt;/b>hamd&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a, Allah için&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>faddale-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi üstün kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kesîrin: &lt;/b>çoguna&lt;br />&lt;b>min ibâdi-hi: &lt;/b>kullarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler, mü'min olanlar"

    <string name="sozluk.027.017">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve husire: &lt;/b>ve toplandi&lt;br />&lt;b>li suleymâne: &lt;/b>Süleyman için&lt;br />&lt;b>cunûdu-hu: &lt;/b>onun ordulari&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>el cinni: &lt;/b>cinler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el insi: &lt;/b>ve insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve et tayri: &lt;/b>ve kus(lar)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, bundan sonra, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yûzeûne: &lt;/b>düzenlendi"

    <string name="sozluk.027.036">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, bunun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câe: &lt;/b>geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>suleymâne: &lt;/b>Süleyman&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>tumiddûne-ni: &lt;/b>bana yardim ediyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>mâlin: &lt;/b>mal&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik, halbuki, oysa&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>âtâniyallâhu: &lt;/b>Allah bana verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>âtâ-kum: &lt;/b>size verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>sizler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>hediyyeti-kum: &lt;/b>hediyeleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>tefrahûne: &lt;/b>seviniyorsunuz, övünüyorsunuz

    <string name="sozluk.027.057">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>enceynâ-hu: &lt;/b>biz onu kurtardik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ehle-hû: &lt;/b>ve onun ailesi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâmraetehu (illâ emraete-hu): &lt;/b>onun hanimi hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>kaddernâ-hâ: &lt;/b>onu takdir ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>min el gâbirîne: &lt;/b>geride kalanlardan

    <string name="sozluk.027.081">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve degil&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hâdî: &lt;/b>hidayete erdiren&lt;br />&lt;b>el umyi: &lt;/b>kör&lt;br />&lt;b>an dalâleti-him: &lt;/b>onlari dalâletlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>in tusmiu: &lt;/b>eger isittirebilirsen&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minu: &lt;/b>mü'min olur, inanir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimize&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, iste&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>muslimûne: &lt;/b>teslim olanlardir"

    <string name="sozluk.028.044">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kunte: &lt;/b>ve sen olmadin, sen degildin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi cânibi: &lt;/b>tarafta, tarafinda&lt;br />&lt;b>el garbiyyi: &lt;/b>batida&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kadaynâ: &lt;/b>kada ettik, yerine getirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ mûsâ: &lt;/b>Musa'ya&lt;br />&lt;b>el emre: &lt;/b>emir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kunte: &lt;/b>ve sen olmadin, sen degildin&lt;br />&lt;b>min es sâhidîne: &lt;/b>sahitlerden"
    <string name="sozluk.028.045">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin-nâ: &lt;/b>ve lâkin biz&lt;br />&lt;b>ense'nâ: &lt;/b>insa ettik, olusturduk&lt;br />&lt;b>kurûnen: &lt;/b>nesiller&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>tetâvele: &lt;/b>uzun oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin&lt;br />&lt;b>el umuru: &lt;/b>ömürler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kunte: &lt;/b>ve sen olmadin, sen degilsin&lt;br />&lt;b>sâviyen: &lt;/b>yerlesen, ikâmet eden, uzun süre kalan&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ehli: &lt;/b>halk, sehir ehli&lt;br />&lt;b>medyene: &lt;/b>Medyen&lt;br />&lt;b>tetlû: &lt;/b>okuyorsun&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin-nâ: &lt;/b>ve lâkin biz&lt;br />&lt;b>kunnâ: &lt;/b>biz olduk, biziz&lt;br />&lt;b>mursilîne: &lt;/b>gönderenler"
    <string name="sozluk.028.046">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kunte: &lt;/b>ve sen olmadin, sen degildin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi cânibi: &lt;/b>yani, tarafi&lt;br />&lt;b>et tûri: &lt;/b>Tur (dagi)&lt;br />&lt;b>iz: &lt;/b>o zaman, ... olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>nâdey-nâ: &lt;/b>seslendik, nida ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve ancak, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmeten: &lt;/b>bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>li tunzire: &lt;/b>inzar etmen, uyarman için&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmen: &lt;/b>bir kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ etâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlara gelmedi&lt;br />&lt;b>min nezîrin: &lt;/b>(nezirlerden) bir nezir, uyarici&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablike: &lt;/b>senden önceden&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki onlar, umulur ki böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yetezekkerûne: &lt;/b>tezekkür ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.028.047">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev lâ: &lt;/b>ve olmasa&lt;br />&lt;b>en tusîbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet etmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>musîbetun: &lt;/b>musîbet&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ kaddemet: &lt;/b>takdim ettikleri sey, yaptiklari sey&lt;br />&lt;b>eydî-him: &lt;/b>onlarin elleri, elleriyle&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman, ve de&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlû: &lt;/b>söylerler, derler, diyecekler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim Rabbimiz, Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olmasa&lt;br />&lt;b>erselte: &lt;/b>sen gönderdin&lt;br />&lt;b>ileynâ: &lt;/b>bize&lt;br />&lt;b>resûlen: &lt;/b>resûl, elçi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>nettebia: &lt;/b>biz uyariz, tâbî oluruz&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-ke: &lt;/b>senin âyetlerin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nekûne: &lt;/b>ve biz oluruz&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minlerden"

    <string name="sozluk.028.061">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>vaadnâ-hu: &lt;/b>ona vaat ettik, vaadde bulunduk&lt;br />&lt;b>va'den: &lt;/b>vaad&lt;br />&lt;b>hasenen: &lt;/b>güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>lâkî-hi: &lt;/b>ona kavustu&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>metta'nâ-hu: &lt;/b>onu metalandirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>metâa: &lt;/b>meta, dünya mali&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayati&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme el kiyâmeti: &lt;/b>kiyâmet günü&lt;br />&lt;b>min el muhdarîne: &lt;/b>hazir bulundurulanlardan"
    <string name="sozluk.028.062">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yevme: &lt;/b>ve o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>yunâdî-him: &lt;/b>onlara seslenir, seslenecek, nida edecek&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlu: &lt;/b>der, diyecek&lt;br />&lt;b>eyne: &lt;/b>nerede&lt;br />&lt;b>surakâîye: &lt;/b>benim ortaklarim&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz ... oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>tez'umûne: &lt;/b>zanda bulunuyorsunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.028.080">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kale: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtû: &lt;/b>verildi&lt;br />&lt;b>el ilme: &lt;/b>ilim&lt;br />&lt;b>veyle-kum: &lt;/b>size yaziklar olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâbullâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in sevabi&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>âmene: &lt;/b>îmân etti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amile sâlihan: &lt;/b>ve salih amel (nefs tezkiyesi) yapti&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yulekkâ-hâ: &lt;/b>ve ona mülâki olmaz, kavusmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç, ancak, ...’den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>es sâbirûne: &lt;/b>sabredenler"
    <string name="sozluk.028.081">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>hasefnâ: &lt;/b>yere geçirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi dâri-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun evi, sarayi&lt;br />&lt;b>el arda: &lt;/b>yer&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kâne: &lt;/b>olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona, onu, onun&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>fietin: &lt;/b>bir topluluk, grup&lt;br />&lt;b>yansurûne-hu: &lt;/b>ona yardim ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne: &lt;/b>ve olmadi, degildir&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>el muntasirîne: &lt;/b>yardim edilenler, korunanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.028.082">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve asbeha: &lt;/b>ve sabahladi, oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>temennev: &lt;/b>temenni ettiler, dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>mekâne-hu: &lt;/b>onun yeri&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el emsi: &lt;/b>dün&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlûne: &lt;/b>derler, diyorlar(di)&lt;br />&lt;b>vey: &lt;/b>vay (hayret ifadesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ke ennehu: &lt;/b>onun gibi (bunun gibi), demek ki, öyle ki, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yebsutu: &lt;/b>genisletir&lt;br />&lt;b>er rizka: &lt;/b>rizik&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için, ...'e&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>ibâdi-hi: &lt;/b>(onun) kullari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yakdiru: &lt;/b>ve takdir eder, daraltir&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>en menne allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in ni'metlendirmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleynâ: &lt;/b>bize&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>hasefe: &lt;/b>yere geçirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>binâ: &lt;/b>bizi&lt;br />&lt;b>vey: &lt;/b>vay (hayret ifadesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ke ennehu: &lt;/b>onun gibi (bunun gibi), demek ki, öyle ki, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuflihu: &lt;/b>felâha ermez&lt;br />&lt;b>el kâfirûne: &lt;/b>kâfirler"

    <string name="sozluk.029.011">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemenne: &lt;/b>muhakkak bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemenne: &lt;/b>muhakkak bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>el munâfikîne: &lt;/b>münafiklar"

    <string name="sozluk.029.029">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-kum: &lt;/b>muhakkak siz, gerçekten siz&lt;br />&lt;b>le te'tûne: &lt;/b>mutlaka geliyorsunuz, geleceksiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>er ricâle: &lt;/b>erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve taktaûne: &lt;/b>ve kesiyorsunuz, keseceksiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>es sebîle: &lt;/b>yol&lt;br />&lt;b>ve te'tûne: &lt;/b>ve geliyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî nâdî-kum: &lt;/b>toplantilarinizda&lt;br />&lt;b>el munkere: &lt;/b>kötülük, hayasizlik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bunun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ kâne: &lt;/b>olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>cevâbe: &lt;/b>cevap&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...’den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>en kâlû'ti-nâ: &lt;/b>\"bize getir'' demek&lt;br />&lt;b>bi azâbi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>in kunte: &lt;/b>eger sen ... isen&lt;br />&lt;b>min es sâdikîne: &lt;/b>sadiklardan, dogru sözlülerden"

    <string name="sozluk.029.047">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezâlike: &lt;/b>ve iste böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>enzelnâ: &lt;/b>biz indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âteynâ: &lt;/b>biz verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'min olurlar, îmân ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bihî: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min: &lt;/b>ve ...den, dan&lt;br />&lt;b>hâulâi: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minu: &lt;/b>mü'min olur, îmân eder&lt;br />&lt;b>bihî: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yechadu: &lt;/b>bile bile inkâr etmez&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>el kâfirûne: &lt;/b>kâfirler"
    <string name="sozluk.029.048">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kunte: &lt;/b>ve sen olmadin&lt;br />&lt;b>tetlû: &lt;/b>okuyorsun&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-hi: &lt;/b>ondan önce, bundan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>min kitâbin: &lt;/b>kitaptan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tehuttu-hu: &lt;/b>ve onu yazmiyorsun&lt;br />&lt;b>bi yemîni-ke: &lt;/b>(sag) elinle&lt;br />&lt;b>izen: &lt;/b>öyleyse, o zaman, öyle olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>lertâbe (le irtâbe): &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette süphe ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>el mubtilûne: &lt;/b>bâtilda olanlar
    <string name="sozluk.029.049">"&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtun: &lt;/b>âyetler&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyinâtun: &lt;/b>beyan olunan&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ...'de&lt;br />&lt;b>sudûri: &lt;/b>gögüsler, sîneler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtû: &lt;/b>verilenler&lt;br />&lt;b>el ilme: &lt;/b>ilim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yechadu: &lt;/b>bile bile inkâr etmez&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâtinâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâlimûne: &lt;/b>zalimler, zulmedenler"
    <string name="sozluk.029.050">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olmaz mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>unzile: &lt;/b>indirildi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtun: &lt;/b>âyetler&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-hi: &lt;/b>onun Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>innema: &lt;/b>sadece, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>el âyâtu: &lt;/b>âyetler&lt;br />&lt;b>indallâhi (inde allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve innemâ: &lt;/b>ve sadece, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>ene: &lt;/b>ben&lt;br />&lt;b>nezîrun: &lt;/b>nezir, uyarici&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînun: &lt;/b>apaçik"
    <string name="sozluk.029.051">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yekfi-him: &lt;/b>ve onlara kâfi gelmiyor(gelmedi), yetmiyor(yetmedi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ennâ: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>enzelnâ: &lt;/b>biz indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>yutlâ: &lt;/b>okunur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zâlike: &lt;/b>bunda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>muhakkak, mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmeten: &lt;/b>bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zikrâ: &lt;/b>ve zikir&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>kavim için&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'min olan"
    <string name="sozluk.029.052">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>kefâ: &lt;/b>kâfi, yeterli&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>beynî: &lt;/b>benim aramda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve beyne-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>sehîden: &lt;/b>sahit olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>göklerde olani, göklerde ne varsa&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>inandilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el bâtili: &lt;/b>bâtila&lt;br />&lt;b>ve keferû: &lt;/b>ve inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>billâhi (bi allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'i&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum el hâsirûne: &lt;/b>hüsrana ugrayanlar, hüsranda olanlar"

    <string name="sozluk.029.064">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzihi: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayâtu ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayati&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>...'den baska, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>lehvun: &lt;/b>eglence&lt;br />&lt;b>ve laibun: &lt;/b>ve oyun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dâre el âhirate: &lt;/b>ahiret yurdu&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayevânu: &lt;/b>gerçek hayat&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger, sâyet, keske&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>... oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilirler"
