    <string name="sozluk.029.066">"&lt;br />&lt;b>li yekfurû: &lt;/b>inkâr etsinler, nankörlük etsinler diye&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>âteynâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlara verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li yetemettaû: &lt;/b>ve metalansinlar, faydalansinlar diye&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>fakat, ama&lt;br />&lt;b>sevfe: &lt;/b>yakinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilecekler"
    <string name="sozluk.029.067">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yerav: &lt;/b>ve görmediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ennâ: &lt;/b>... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>cealnâ: &lt;/b>biz kildik, biz yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>haramen: &lt;/b>haram, hürmet edilip yasaklanan&lt;br />&lt;b>âminen: &lt;/b>emin olan, güvenilir olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yutehattafu: &lt;/b>ve zorla kapilip götürülen, esir alinan&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>havli-him: &lt;/b>onlarin etraflarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>hâlâ&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el bâtili: &lt;/b>bâtila&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minûne: &lt;/b>inaniyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve bi ni'metillâhi (ni'meti allâhi): &lt;/b>ve Allah'in ni'metini&lt;br />&lt;b>yekfurûne: &lt;/b>inkâr ediyorlar, nankörlük ediyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.029.068">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>azlemu: &lt;/b>daha zalim&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>ifterâ: &lt;/b>iftira etti&lt;br />&lt;b>alâllâhi (alâ allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>keziben: &lt;/b>yalan olarak, yalanla&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebe: &lt;/b>tekzip etti, yalanladi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>... oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câe-hu: &lt;/b>ona geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>leyse: &lt;/b>degil, yok&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ...'de&lt;br />&lt;b>cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennem&lt;br />&lt;b>mesven: &lt;/b>barinacak yer&lt;br />&lt;b>li el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirlere, kâfirler için"
    <string name="sozluk.029.069">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>câhedû: &lt;/b>cihad edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>fînâ: &lt;/b>bizim ugrumuzda&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>nehdiyenne-hum: &lt;/b>onlari mutlaka ulastiririz&lt;br />&lt;b>subule-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim yollarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>mea: &lt;/b>beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>el muhsinîne: &lt;/b>muhsinler
    <string name="sozluk.030.001" />
    <string name="sozluk.030.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>gulibeti: &lt;/b>gâlip gelindi (maglup oldu)&lt;br />&lt;b>er rûmu: &lt;/b>Rum
    <string name="sozluk.030.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ednâ: &lt;/b>yakinda, daha yakinda&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardi: &lt;/b>bir yer&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>galebi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin yenilmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>se yaglibûne: &lt;/b>gâlip gelecekler"
    <string name="sozluk.030.004">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>bid'i: &lt;/b>birkaç (3 ila 9 arasi)&lt;br />&lt;b>sinîne: &lt;/b>seneler, yillar&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a aittir, Allah'indir&lt;br />&lt;b>emru: &lt;/b>emir&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min ba'du: &lt;/b>ve sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yevme izin: &lt;/b>ve izin günü&lt;br />&lt;b>yefrahu: &lt;/b>ferahlayacak, sevinecek&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"

    <string name="sozluk.030.025">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min: &lt;/b>ve ...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-hi: &lt;/b>onun âyetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>en tekûme: &lt;/b>vuku bulmasi, durmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâu: &lt;/b>sema, gökyüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardu: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>emiri-hi: &lt;/b>onun emri&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>deâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi çagirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>da'veten: &lt;/b>davet, bir tek davet, bir defa çagirma&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardi: &lt;/b>arz, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tahrucûne: &lt;/b>çikacaksiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.030.026">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehu: &lt;/b>ve onun&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse, kim&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>kullun: &lt;/b>bütün, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>kânitûne: &lt;/b>kanitin olanlar, saygi ile duranlar
    <string name="sozluk.030.027">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>o , ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>yebdeu: &lt;/b>(ilk defa) baslatir&lt;br />&lt;b>el halka: &lt;/b>yaratma, yaratis&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yuîdu-hu: &lt;/b>onu iade eder, eski haline döndürür&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>ehvenu: &lt;/b>daha kolay, çok kolay&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>onun üzerine, ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehu: &lt;/b>ve onun, ona ait&lt;br />&lt;b>el meselu: &lt;/b>misal, durum, özellik, sifat&lt;br />&lt;b>el a'lâ: &lt;/b>yüce&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ...'de&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzu: &lt;/b>çok yüce, üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakîmu: &lt;/b>hüküm ve hikmet sahibi"
    <string name="sozluk.030.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>darabe: &lt;/b>örnek verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size&lt;br />&lt;b>meselen: &lt;/b>misal&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>enfusi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin nefsleriniz, kendi nefsleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>hel: &lt;/b>var mi, mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>meleket: &lt;/b>malik oldu, sahip oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>eymânu-kum: &lt;/b>sag el, elleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>surakâe: &lt;/b>ortaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>razaknâ-kum: &lt;/b>size rizik verdik, riziklandirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>orada, onda&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâun: &lt;/b>esit&lt;br />&lt;b>tehâfûne-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan korkarsiniz, çekinirsiniz, sayarsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>hîfeti-kum: &lt;/b>sizin korkmaniz, çekinmeniz, saymaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>enfuse-kum: &lt;/b>sizin kendiniz, birbiriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle, bunun gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>nufassilu: &lt;/b>açikliyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>el âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetler&lt;br />&lt;b>li kavmin: &lt;/b>kavim için&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'kilûne: &lt;/b>akil ediyorlar, akil ederler"

    <string name="sozluk.030.039">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ âteytum: &lt;/b>ve sizin verdiginiz sey&lt;br />&lt;b>min riben: &lt;/b>ribadan, faizden&lt;br />&lt;b>li yerbuve: &lt;/b>artsin diye&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ...'de&lt;br />&lt;b>emvâli: &lt;/b>mallar&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yerbû: &lt;/b>artmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>indallâhi (inde allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ âteytum: &lt;/b>ve sizin verdiginiz sey&lt;br />&lt;b>min zekâtin: &lt;/b>zekâttan, zekat olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>turîdûne: &lt;/b>istersiniz, dilersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>vechallâhi (veche allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in Veçhi, Zati&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el mudifûne: &lt;/b>kat kat arttiranlar"
    <string name="sozluk.030.040">"&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhullezî (allâhu ellezî): &lt;/b>O Allah ki&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka-kum: &lt;/b>sizi yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>razaka-kum: &lt;/b>size rizik verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yumîtu-kum: &lt;/b>sizi öldürür, öldürecek&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhyî-kum: &lt;/b>sizi diriltir, diriltecek&lt;br />&lt;b>hel: &lt;/b>mi, var mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>min surakâi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin ortaklarinizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yef'alu: &lt;/b>yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>min zâlikum: &lt;/b>bundan, bunlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>bir seyden, bir sey, birini&lt;br />&lt;b>subhâne-hu: &lt;/b>o sübhandir, münezzehtir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve teâlâ: &lt;/b>ve yücedir&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ: &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>yusrikûne: &lt;/b>ortak kosuyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.030.041">"&lt;br />&lt;b>zahera: &lt;/b>zahir oldu, zuhur etti, ortaya çikti&lt;br />&lt;b>el fesâdu: &lt;/b>fesat&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el berri: &lt;/b>karada&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el bahri: &lt;/b>ve deniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>sey sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kesebet: &lt;/b>kazandi&lt;br />&lt;b>eydi: &lt;/b>eller&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>li yuzîka-hum: &lt;/b>onlara tattirilmasi için&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'dallezî (ba'de ellezi): &lt;/b>bir kismi ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>amilû: &lt;/b>yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-hum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yerciûne: &lt;/b>dönerler"
    <string name="sozluk.030.042">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>sîrû: &lt;/b>dolasin&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>fanzurû (fe unzurû): &lt;/b>öyleyse, böylece bakin, görün&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âkibetu: &lt;/b>akibet, son&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>kablu: &lt;/b>önce&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ... idi(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ekseru-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>musrikîne: &lt;/b>müsrikler, sirk kosanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.030.043">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>ekim: &lt;/b>ikame et, kiyamda tut&lt;br />&lt;b>veche-ke: &lt;/b>senin vechin, vechini&lt;br />&lt;b>li ed dîni: &lt;/b>dîn için&lt;br />&lt;b>el kayyimi: &lt;/b>kayyum, ezelden ebede kadar devam edecek&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli: &lt;/b>önceden&lt;br />&lt;b>en ye'tiye: &lt;/b>gelmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>yevmun: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ meradde: &lt;/b>reddedilmez, geri çevrilmez, döndürülmez&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun için, onu&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan, Allah'in&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme izin: &lt;/b>izin günü&lt;br />&lt;b>yassaddeûne: &lt;/b>bölük bölük ayrilirlar"
    <string name="sozluk.030.044">&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>kefere: &lt;/b>inkâr etti&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, artik, böylece, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>onun üzerine, kendi aleyhine&lt;br />&lt;b>kufru-hu: &lt;/b>onun küfrü, inkâri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>amile sâlihan: &lt;/b>salih amel (nefs tezkiyesi) yapti&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>enfusi-him: &lt;/b>kendi nefsleri&lt;br />&lt;b>yemhedûne: &lt;/b>hazirlik yaparlar
    <string name="sozluk.030.045">"&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>yecziye: &lt;/b>mükâfatlandirir&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar, Allah'a ulasmayi dileyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve salih amel, nefsi islâh edici amel yani nefs tezkiyesi yaparlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>fadli-hi: &lt;/b>onun fazli, kendi fazli&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuhibbu: &lt;/b>sevmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirler"
    <string name="sozluk.030.046">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min âyâti-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun âyetlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>en yursile: &lt;/b>göndermesi (gönderir)&lt;br />&lt;b>er riyâha: &lt;/b>rüzgârlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mubessirâtin: &lt;/b>müjdeleyiciler olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li yuzîka-kum: &lt;/b>ve size tattirmasi için (tattirir)&lt;br />&lt;b>min rahmeti-hi: &lt;/b>onun rahmetinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li tecriye: &lt;/b>ve akmasi, yüzmesi için, yüzdürür &lt;br />&lt;b>el fulku: &lt;/b>gemiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi emri-hi: &lt;/b>onun emri ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li tebtegû: &lt;/b>ve aramaniz için, istemeniz için (istersiniz)&lt;br />&lt;b>min fadli-hi: &lt;/b>onun fazlindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lealle-kum: &lt;/b>ve böylece siz, umulur ki siz&lt;br />&lt;b>teskurûne: &lt;/b>sükredersiniz
    <string name="sozluk.030.047">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>erselnâ: &lt;/b>biz gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-ke: &lt;/b>senden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>rusulen: &lt;/b>resûller&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ: &lt;/b>için, ...e&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>câû-hum bi: &lt;/b>onlara getirdiler&lt;br />&lt;b>el beyyinâti: &lt;/b>beyyineler, kesin deliller&lt;br />&lt;b>fentekamnâ (fe intekamnâ): &lt;/b>böylece, bunun üzerine intikam aldik&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ecramû: &lt;/b>suçlular, günahkârlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkan: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>aleynâ: &lt;/b>bizim üzerimize&lt;br />&lt;b>nasru: &lt;/b>yardim&lt;br />&lt;b>el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minler"
    <string name="sozluk.030.048">"&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar, o&lt;br />&lt;b>yursilu: &lt;/b>gönderir&lt;br />&lt;b>er riyâha: &lt;/b>rüzgârlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>tusîru: &lt;/b>sürükler, hareket ettirir&lt;br />&lt;b>sehâben: &lt;/b>bulutlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>yebsutu-hu: &lt;/b>onu yayar, dagitir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâi: &lt;/b>semada, gökte&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yec'alu-hu: &lt;/b>ve onu kilar, yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>kisefen: &lt;/b>kisim kisim, kisimlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>terâ: &lt;/b>görürsün&lt;br />&lt;b>el vedka: &lt;/b>yagmur&lt;br />&lt;b>yahrucu: &lt;/b>çikar&lt;br />&lt;b>min hilâli-hî: &lt;/b>onun arasindan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ esâbe: &lt;/b>isabet ettirdigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>min ibâdi-hî: &lt;/b>onun kullarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yestebsirûne: &lt;/b>sevinirler"
    <string name="sozluk.030.049">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger, oysa, öyle ki&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>en yunezzele: &lt;/b>indirilmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-hi: &lt;/b>ondan önce, ondan evvel&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>mublisîne: &lt;/b>ümitlerini kesenler
    <string name="sozluk.030.050">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fanzur (fe unzur): &lt;/b>bak&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ âsâri: &lt;/b>eserlere&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmetillâhi (rahmeti allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in rahmeti&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhyi: &lt;/b>diriltir&lt;br />&lt;b>el arda: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>mevti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ölümü&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu, iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>muhyî: &lt;/b>dirilten&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevtâ: &lt;/b>ölüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine, ...a, ...e&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>hersey&lt;br />&lt;b>kadîrun: &lt;/b>kaadir, gücü yeten"

    <string name="sozluk.030.052">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-ke: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki sen&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tusmiu: &lt;/b>duyuramazsin, isittiremezsin&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevtâ: &lt;/b>ölüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tusmiu: &lt;/b>ve duyuramazsin, isittiremezsin&lt;br />&lt;b>es summe: &lt;/b>sagirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ed duâe: &lt;/b>çagri, davet&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ vellev: &lt;/b>döndükleri zaman, dönüp gittikleri zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>mudbirîne: &lt;/b>arkalarina dönenler
    <string name="sozluk.030.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve degil&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hâdi: &lt;/b>hidayete ulastirici, hidayete erdirici&lt;br />&lt;b>el umyi: &lt;/b>kör&lt;br />&lt;b>an dalâleti-him: &lt;/b>onlarin dalâletlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>tusmiu: &lt;/b>isittirebilirsin, duyurabilirsin, duyurursun&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'minu: &lt;/b>mü'min olan, îmân eden&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimize&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hum: &lt;/b>böylece onlar, iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>muslimûne: &lt;/b>teslim olanlar, müslümanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.030.054">"&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka-kum: &lt;/b>sizi yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>min da'fin: &lt;/b>güçsüz, zayif (bir seyden)&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ceale: &lt;/b>kildi, yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>sonradan, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>da'fin: &lt;/b>güçsüz, zayif&lt;br />&lt;b>kuvveten: &lt;/b>kuvvet, güç&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ceale: &lt;/b>kildi, yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>sonradan, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>kuvvetin: &lt;/b>kuvvet, güç&lt;br />&lt;b>da'fen: &lt;/b>zayiflik, kuvvetsizlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve seybeten: &lt;/b>ve yaslilik&lt;br />&lt;b>yahluku: &lt;/b>yaratir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>el alîmu: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>el kadîru: &lt;/b>kaadir olan, gücü yeten"
    <string name="sozluk.030.055">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yevme: &lt;/b>ve o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>tekûmu: &lt;/b>olur, gerçeklesir&lt;br />&lt;b>es sâatu: &lt;/b>saat (kiyâmet saati, kiyâmetin vakti)&lt;br />&lt;b>yuksimu: &lt;/b>yemin eder&lt;br />&lt;b>el mucrimûne: &lt;/b>mücrimler, suçlular&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lebisû: &lt;/b>kalmadilar&lt;br />&lt;b>gayra: &lt;/b>baska (fazla), disinda&lt;br />&lt;b>sâatin: &lt;/b>bir saat&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>böylece, iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yu'fekûne: &lt;/b>döndürülüyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.030.056">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtû: &lt;/b>verilenler&lt;br />&lt;b>el ilme: &lt;/b>ilim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el îmâne: &lt;/b>ve îmân&lt;br />&lt;b>lekad: &lt;/b>andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>lebistum: &lt;/b>siz kaldiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ...'de&lt;br />&lt;b>kitâbi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in Kitab'i&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ yevmi: &lt;/b>güne kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>el ba'si: &lt;/b>beas edilme, yeniden dirilme&lt;br />&lt;b>fe hâzâ: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>yevmu: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>el ba'si: &lt;/b>dirilme&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne-kum: &lt;/b>ve lâkin siz, fakat siz&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz ... oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>siz bilmiyorsunuz"

    <string name="sozluk.030.058">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>darabnâ: &lt;/b>biz örnekler, misaller verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için, insanlara&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>el kur'âni: &lt;/b>Kur'ân&lt;br />&lt;b>min kulli meselin: &lt;/b>bütün meselelerden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le: &lt;/b>ve mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, olsa&lt;br />&lt;b>ci'te-hum bi: &lt;/b>onlara getirdin&lt;br />&lt;b>âyetin: &lt;/b>bir âyet&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlenne: &lt;/b>muhakkak derler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>muhakkak o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ (in ... illâ): &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>mubtilûne: &lt;/b>bâtilla ugrasan kimseler"

    <string name="sozluk.030.060">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fâsbir (fe isbir): &lt;/b>o zaman, artik, öyleyse sabret&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>va'dallâhi (va'de allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in vaadi&lt;br />&lt;b>hakkun: &lt;/b>haktir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yestehiffenneke (yestehiffe-enne-ke): &lt;/b>ve sakin seni hafiflige sürüklemesin&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yûkinûne: &lt;/b>yakîn hasil etmeyenler, kesin bilgi sahibi olmayanlar, kesin olarak inanmayanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.031.001" />

    <string name="sozluk.031.005">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ huden: &lt;/b>hidayet üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-him: &lt;/b>Rab'lerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ulâike: &lt;/b>ve iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el muflihûne: &lt;/b>felâha erenler"
    <string name="sozluk.031.006">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min: &lt;/b>ve ...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>yesterî: &lt;/b>satin alirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehve: &lt;/b>bos, lüzumsuz seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>el hadîsi: &lt;/b>söz&lt;br />&lt;b>li yudille: &lt;/b>saptirmak için&lt;br />&lt;b>an sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolundan&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayri: &lt;/b>olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmin: &lt;/b>ilim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yettehize-hâ: &lt;/b>ve onu edinirler&lt;br />&lt;b>huzuven: &lt;/b>eglence, alay konusu&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>muhînun: &lt;/b>muhin, asagilayici"
    <string name="sozluk.031.007">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ tutlâ: &lt;/b>ve okundugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtu-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>vellâ: &lt;/b>döndü (dönüp gitti)&lt;br />&lt;b>mustekbiran: &lt;/b>kibirlenerek&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmak&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yesma'-hâ: &lt;/b>onu isitmedi (isitmiyor)&lt;br />&lt;b>ke enne: &lt;/b>sanki, gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>uzuney-hi: &lt;/b>onun (iki) kulagi, kulaklari&lt;br />&lt;b>vakran: &lt;/b>vakra, isitme engeli&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>bessir-hu: &lt;/b>onu müjdele&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbin: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>elîmin: &lt;/b>elîm"
    <string name="sozluk.031.008">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve salih amel (nefs tezkiyesi) yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>cennâtun: &lt;/b>cennetler&lt;br />&lt;b>naîmi: &lt;/b>naîm (ni'metleri bol olan)"

    <string name="sozluk.032.011">&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki&lt;br />&lt;b>yeteveffâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi vefat ettirecek&lt;br />&lt;b>meleku: &lt;/b>melek&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevti: &lt;/b>ölüm&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>vukkile: &lt;/b>vekil kilindi (vekil edildi)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-kum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ rabbikum: &lt;/b>Rabbinize&lt;br />&lt;b>turceûne: &lt;/b>döndürüleceksiniz

    <string name="sozluk.033.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tevekkel: &lt;/b>ve tevekkül et&lt;br />&lt;b>alâllâhi (alâ allahi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kefâ bi: &lt;/b>ve kâfidir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>vekîlen: &lt;/b>vekil olarak"
    <string name="sozluk.033.004">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ceale allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah kilmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>li raculin: &lt;/b>bir adamda&lt;br />&lt;b>min kalbeyni: &lt;/b>iki kalp (kalpten iki tane)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, da&lt;br />&lt;b>cevfi-hî: &lt;/b>onun (gögüs) boslugu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ ceale: &lt;/b>ve kilmadi, yapmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>ezvâce-kum: &lt;/b>sizin zevceleriniz, esleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâî: &lt;/b>ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>tuzâhirûne: &lt;/b>zihar yaptiginiz (zihar yapmak: sen bana benim annemin sirti gibisin diyerek esini bosamak istemek)&lt;br />&lt;b>min hunne: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ummehâti-kum: &lt;/b>sizin anneleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ ceale: &lt;/b>ve kilmadi, yapmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>ed'iyâe-kum: &lt;/b>sizin evlâtliklariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ebnâe-kum: &lt;/b>sizin ogullariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlikum: &lt;/b>iste bu, bunlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kavlu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin sözünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi efvâhi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin agizlarinizda&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlu: &lt;/b>söyler&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakka: &lt;/b>Hakk&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>yehdî: &lt;/b>ulastirir, hidayet eder&lt;br />&lt;b>es sebîle: &lt;/b>yol"
    <string name="sozluk.033.005">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ud'û-hum: &lt;/b>onlari çagirin&lt;br />&lt;b>li âbâi-him: &lt;/b>babalarina göre (babalarinin nami ile)&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>aksatu: &lt;/b>daha adil, daha adaletli&lt;br />&lt;b>indallâhi (inde allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o taktirde, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>lem ta'lemû: &lt;/b>bilmiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>âbâe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin babalarini&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ihvânu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin kardeslerinizdir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî ed dîni: &lt;/b>dînde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mevâlî-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin dostlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve leyse: &lt;/b>ve degil, yok&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>sizin üzerinize&lt;br />&lt;b>cunâhun: &lt;/b>günah&lt;br />&lt;b>fîmâ: &lt;/b>o sey hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ahta'tum: &lt;/b>siz hata ettiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>bihî: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve ancak, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>taammedet: &lt;/b>taammüden, kasten&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin kalpleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kânallâhu (kâne allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah ... oldu, Allah ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûran: &lt;/b>gafûrdur (günahlari sevaba çevirendir)&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmen: &lt;/b>rahîmdir (rahîm esmasiyla tecelli edendir)"

    <string name="sozluk.033.019">"&lt;br />&lt;b>esihhaten &lt;br>(sehha): &lt;/b>daha cimri, çok cimri(cimrilik ederek) &lt;br />: (cimri)&lt;br />&lt;b>aleykum: &lt;/b>size, sizin üzerinize, size karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe izâ: &lt;/b>o zaman, fakat ... olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>câe: &lt;/b>geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>el havfu: &lt;/b>korku&lt;br />&lt;b>raeyte-hum: &lt;/b>onlari gördün&lt;br />&lt;b>yanzurûne: &lt;/b>bakiyorlar, bakarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>tedûru: &lt;/b>döner&lt;br />&lt;b>a'yunu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin gözleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kellezî (ke ellezî): &lt;/b>onun gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>yugsâ: &lt;/b>bayginlik çöker&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>onun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mevti: &lt;/b>ölümden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, sonra, oysa&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ zehebe: &lt;/b>gittigi zaman, gidince&lt;br />&lt;b>el havfu: &lt;/b>korku&lt;br />&lt;b>selekû-kum: &lt;/b>sizi incittiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi elsinetin: &lt;/b>dilleri ile&lt;br />&lt;b>hidâdin: &lt;/b>kirici, keskin&lt;br />&lt;b>esihhaten: &lt;/b>daha cimri, çok cimri, cimrilik ederek&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el hayri: &lt;/b>hayra karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yu'minû: &lt;/b>mü'min degiller, inanmazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, bu sebeple&lt;br />&lt;b>ahbetallâhu (ahbete allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah heba etti, yok etti&lt;br />&lt;b>a'mâle-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin amellerini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâne: &lt;/b>ve oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>alâllâhi (alâ allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>yesîran: &lt;/b>kolay"

    <string name="sozluk.033.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vezkurne (ve uzkurne): &lt;/b>ve zikredin&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yutlâ: &lt;/b>okunan sey&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>buyûti-kunne: &lt;/b>sizin evleriniz (bayanlarin evleri)&lt;br />&lt;b>min âyâtillâhi (âyâti allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah'in âyetlerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hikmeti: &lt;/b>ve hikmet&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>latîfen: &lt;/b>latîf, lütuf sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>habîran: &lt;/b>haberdar olan"
    <string name="sozluk.033.035">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>el muslimîne: &lt;/b>Islâm olan, Allah'a teslim olan, müslüman erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el muslimâti: &lt;/b>ve Islâm olan, Allah'a teslim olan, müslüman kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>ve mü'min erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mu'minâti: &lt;/b>ve mü'min kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kânitîne: &lt;/b>ve kanitin olan, husû ile baglanan erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kânitâti: &lt;/b>ve kanitin olan, husû ile baglanan kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sâdikîne: &lt;/b>ve sadik olan erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sâdikâti: &lt;/b>ve sadik olan kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sâbirîne: &lt;/b>ve sabreden erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sâbirâti: &lt;/b>ve sabreden kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hâsiîne: &lt;/b>ve husû duyan erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hâsiâti: &lt;/b>ve husû duyan kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mutesaddikîne: &lt;/b>ve sadaka veren erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mutesaddikâti: &lt;/b>ve sadaka veren kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sâimîne: &lt;/b>ve oruç tutan erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sâimâti: &lt;/b>ve oruç tutan kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hâfizîne: &lt;/b>ve muhafaza eden, koruyan erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>furûce-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin irzlari, irzlari, namuslari&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hâfizâti: &lt;/b>ve muhafaza eden, koruyan kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ez zâkirîne allâhe: &lt;/b>ve Allah'i zikreden erkekler&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîran: &lt;/b>çok&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ez zâkirâti: &lt;/b>ve zikreden kadinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>eadde: &lt;/b>hazirladi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>magfiraten: &lt;/b>magfiret (günahlarin sevaba çevrilmesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ecran: &lt;/b>ve ecir, mükâfat&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmen: &lt;/b>azîm, büyük"
    <string name="sozluk.033.036">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve olmadi, olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>li mu'minin: &lt;/b>mü'min bir erkek için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ: &lt;/b>ve yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'minetin: &lt;/b>mü'min bir kadin&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ kada allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah hükmettigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûlu-hû: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>emran: &lt;/b>emir, durum, hal&lt;br />&lt;b>en yekûne: &lt;/b>olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>el hiyeratu: &lt;/b>seçme, tercih, seçim hakki&lt;br />&lt;b>min emri-him: &lt;/b>onlarin emrinden, onlarin islerinden, kendi islerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'sillâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a asi olmak, itaat etmemek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûle-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>oldu, olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>dalle: &lt;/b>dalâlette, sapti&lt;br />&lt;b>dalâlen: &lt;/b>dalâlet, sapiklik&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînen: &lt;/b>açikça, apaçik"

    <string name="sozluk.033.050">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>en nebiyyu: &lt;/b>nebî, peygamber&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>ahlelnâ: &lt;/b>helâl />&lt;b>en yestenkiha-hâ: &lt;/b>onu nikâh etmek ister&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlisaten: &lt;/b>...'a has olarak, özel olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>leke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni: &lt;/b>baska (hariç)&lt;br     <string name="sozluk.033.051">"&lt;br />&lt;b>turcî: &lt;/b>sen ertelersin&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>tesâu: &lt;/b>sen dilersin&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hunne: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve tu'vî: &lt;/b>ve yanina alirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>tesâu: &lt;/b>sen dilersin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>ibtegayte: &lt;/b>sen istedin&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmen: &lt;/b>(min men)&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>azelte: &lt;/b>sen azlettin, biraktin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ cunâha: &lt;/b>günah yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyke: &lt;/b>senin üzerine, sana&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu, bu&lt;br />&lt;b>ednâ: &lt;/b>en yakin, en uygun&lt;br />&lt;b>en tekarra a'yunu-hunne: &lt;/b>gözleri aydin olmak (sevinmek)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yahzenne: &lt;/b>ve mahzun olmazlar, hüzünlenmezler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yardayne: &lt;/b>razi olurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>seyler ile&lt;br />&lt;b>âteyte-hunne: &lt;/b>onlara verdin&lt;br />&lt;b>kullu-hunne: &lt;/b>onlarin hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>o bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, ...'de&lt;br />&lt;b>kulûbi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin kalpleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kânallâhu (ve kâne allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah oldu, Allah ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmen: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>halîmen: &lt;/b>halim"

    <string name="sozluk.033.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey!&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular (ölmeden önce Allah'a ulasmayi     <string name="sozluk.033.060">&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>gerçekten, mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yentehi: &lt;/b>vazgeçmezler, son vermezler&lt;br />&lt;b>el munâfikûne: &lt;/b>münafiklar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar, o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kalplerinde ... var(bulunur)&lt;br />&lt;b>maradun: &lt;/b>maraz, hastalik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el murcifûne: &lt;/b>ve, yalan ve kötü haber yayanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el medîneti: &lt;/b>sehirde&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>gerçekten, mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>nugriyenne-ke: &lt;/b>mutlaka seni saldirtiriz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yucâvirûne-ke: &lt;/b>sana komsu olamazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>kalîlen: &lt;/b>az

    <string name="sozluk.033.062">"&lt;br />&lt;b>sunnete allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in sünneti, kanunu&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>konusunda, hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, o kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>halev: &lt;/b>gelip geçti&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve len tecide: &lt;/b>ve asla bulamazsin&lt;br />&lt;b>li sunneti allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in sünnetinde, kanununda&lt;br />&lt;b>tebdîlen: &lt;/b>bir degisiklik"

    <string name="sozluk.033.064">&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>leane: &lt;/b>lânetledi&lt;br />&lt;b>el kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eadde: &lt;/b>ve hazirladi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>saîran: &lt;/b>alevli ates (cehennem)
    <string name="sozluk.033.065">&lt;br />&lt;b>hâlidîne: &lt;/b>halid olanlar, kalici olanlar, kalacak olanlardir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>ebeden: &lt;/b>ebediyyen&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yecidûne: &lt;/b>bulamazlar&lt;br />&lt;b>veliyyen: &lt;/b>bir velî, bir dost&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ: &lt;/b>ve yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>nasîran: &lt;/b>yardimci

    <string name="sozluk.033.067">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-nâ: &lt;/b>Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>ata'nâ: &lt;/b>itaat ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>sâdete-nâ: &lt;/b>sâdatlarimiz, dînde ileri gelenlerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kuberâe-nâ: &lt;/b>ve büyüklerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, bu sebeple&lt;br />&lt;b>edallûnâ: &lt;/b>bizi saptirdilar&lt;br />&lt;b>es sebîlen: &lt;/b>yol, Senin yolun (Sirati Mustakîm)"

    <string name="sozluk.034.011">"&lt;br />&lt;b>eni'mel (en i'mel): &lt;/b>yap!&lt;br />&lt;b>sâbigâtin: &lt;/b>bedeni örten uzun, genis zirh&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kaddir: &lt;/b>ve takdir et, dizayn et&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es serdi: &lt;/b>örgü seklinde, iç içe halkalar halinde (zincir seklinde)&lt;br />&lt;b>va'melû sâlihan: &lt;/b>ve salih amel (zikirle nefs tezkiyesi) yapin&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>sey(leri)&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>basîrun: &lt;/b>gören"
    <string name="sozluk.034.012">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için, ...'e ait&lt;br />&lt;b>suleymâne: &lt;/b>Süleyman&lt;br />&lt;b>er rîha: &lt;/b>rüzgâr&lt;br />&lt;b>guduvvu-hâ: &lt;/b>onun sabah gidisi&lt;br />&lt;b>sehrun: &lt;/b>bir ay&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ravâhu-hâ: &lt;/b>ve onun aksam dönüsü&lt;br />&lt;b>sehrun: &lt;/b>bir ay&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eselnâ: &lt;/b>ve akittik&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ayne: &lt;/b>pinar, kaynak&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitri: &lt;/b>erimis bakir madeni&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min el cinni: &lt;/b>ve cinlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'melu: &lt;/b>yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne yedeyhi: &lt;/b>elleri arasinda, elinin altinda, önünde&lt;br />&lt;b>bi izni: &lt;/b>izni ile&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-hî: &lt;/b>onun Rabbi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yezig: &lt;/b>çikar, sapar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>an emri-nâ: &lt;/b>emrimizden&lt;br />&lt;b>nuzik-hu: &lt;/b>ona tattiririz&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbi: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>es saîri: &lt;/b>alevli ates, cehennem atesi"

    <string name="sozluk.034.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ erselnâ-ke: &lt;/b>ve seni göndermedik&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, ...’den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>kâffeten: &lt;/b>bütün, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>besîran: &lt;/b>müjdeleyici&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nezîran: &lt;/b>ve nezir, uyarici&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>eksera: &lt;/b>daha çok, çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmiyorlar"

    <string name="sozluk.034.043">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ tutlâ: &lt;/b>ve okundugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtu-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyinâtin: &lt;/b>apaçik, açikça&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu degil&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>raculun: &lt;/b>bir adam&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdu: &lt;/b>ister, istiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>yasudde-kum: &lt;/b>sizi engeller, mani olur, men eder&lt;br />&lt;b>amma (an-mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>... oldu, ... idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'budu: &lt;/b>tapiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âbâu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin babalariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ifkun: &lt;/b>yalan, iftira&lt;br />&lt;b>mufteren: &lt;/b>iftira, uydurulmus&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler, kâfir oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakki: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>... oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câe-hum: &lt;/b>onlar geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>in (in ... illâ): &lt;/b>eger (sadece)&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ (in ... illâ): &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>sihrun: &lt;/b>sihir, büyü&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînun: &lt;/b>apaçik"
    <string name="sozluk.034.044">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ âteynâ-hum: &lt;/b>biz onlara vermedik&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den, ...'dan&lt;br />&lt;b>kutubin: &lt;/b>kitaplar&lt;br />&lt;b>yedrusûne-hâ: &lt;/b>onu tedris ederler, okuyup çalisirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ erselnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz göndermedik&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>kable-ke: &lt;/b>senden önce&lt;br />&lt;b>min nezîrin: &lt;/b>bir nezir, uyarici"
    <string name="sozluk.034.045">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kezzebe: &lt;/b>ve tekzip etti, yalanladi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ belegû: &lt;/b>ve erismediler&lt;br />&lt;b>mi'sâre: &lt;/b>onda bir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ âteynâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlara verdiklerimiz, verdigimiz seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, buna ragmen, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>tekzip ettiler, yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>rusulî: &lt;/b>resûllerimi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, buna ragmen, bundan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>nekîri: &lt;/b>inkârim, cezam"
    <string name="sozluk.034.046">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de ki, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>eizu-kum: &lt;/b>size vaazediyorum, ögüt veriyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhidetin: &lt;/b>tek, bir tane&lt;br />&lt;b>en: &lt;/b>olmak, yapmak&lt;br />&lt;b>tekûmû: &lt;/b>kalkin&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah için&lt;br />&lt;b>mesnâ: &lt;/b>ikiser ikiser&lt;br />&lt;b>ve furâdâ: &lt;/b>ve fertler (olarak), teker teker&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>tetefekkerû: &lt;/b>tefekkür edin, düsünün&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>degil, yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sâhibi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin sahibiniz, arkadasiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>...'den&lt;br />&lt;b>cinnetin: &lt;/b>cinnet, delilik&lt;br />&lt;b>in (in ... illâ): &lt;/b>eger (sadece)&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ (in ... illâ): &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>nezîrun: &lt;/b>nezir, uyarici&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne yedey: &lt;/b>ellerinin arasinda, önünde, gelecek olan&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbin: &lt;/b>bir azap&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdin: &lt;/b>siddetli, kuvvetli"

    <string name="sozluk.035.008">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, iste, böylece, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>zuyyine: &lt;/b>süslendi, güzel gösterildi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>sûu: &lt;/b>kötü&lt;br />&lt;b>ameli-hi: &lt;/b>onun ameli&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>raâ-hu: &lt;/b>onu gördü&lt;br />&lt;b>hasenen: &lt;/b>güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, iste, böylece, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yudillu: &lt;/b>dalâlette birakir&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yehdî: &lt;/b>ve hidayete erdirir&lt;br />&lt;b>men yesâu: &lt;/b>diledigi kisi, diledigi kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, iste, böylece, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tezheb: &lt;/b>gitmesin, olmasin&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsu-ke: &lt;/b>senin nefsin&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara, onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>haserâtin: &lt;/b>hasretler, hüzünler&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>yesneûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.035.009">"&lt;br />&lt;b>vallâhu (ve allâhu): &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>onlar, o (ki o)&lt;br />&lt;b>ersele: &lt;/b>gönderdi&lt;br />&lt;b>er rîâha: &lt;/b>rüzgâr(lar)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>tusîru: &lt;/b>hareket ettirir&lt;br />&lt;b>sehâben: &lt;/b>bulutlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>suknâ-hu: &lt;/b>onu sevkederiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ beledin: &lt;/b>beldeye&lt;br />&lt;b>meyyitin: &lt;/b>ölü&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylelikle&lt;br />&lt;b>ahyeynâ: &lt;/b>diriltiriz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>el arda: &lt;/b>yeryüzü, arz, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'de: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>mevti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ölümü&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle, iste bunun gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>en nusûru: &lt;/b>nüsur, yeniden dirilip yayilma"
    <string name="sozluk.035.010">"&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>yurîdu: &lt;/b>istiyor&lt;br />&lt;b>el izzete: &lt;/b>izzet&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, iste&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a ait&lt;br />&lt;b>el izzetu: &lt;/b>izzet&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>hepsi, bütün, tamamen&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>yes'adu: &lt;/b>yükselir, erisir&lt;br />&lt;b>el kelimu: &lt;/b>söz, kelime&lt;br />&lt;b>et tayyibu: &lt;/b>temiz, güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el amelu es sâlihu: &lt;/b>ve salih amel (nefs tezkiyesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>yerfeu-hu: &lt;/b>onu yükseltir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yemkurûne: &lt;/b>hile yaparlar, tuzak kurarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>es seyyiâti: &lt;/b>kötülükler, günahlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara, onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdun: &lt;/b>siddetli&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mekru: &lt;/b>ve hile, düzen&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>yebûru: &lt;/b>helâk olur, bosa gider"

    <string name="sozluk.035.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min en nâsi: &lt;/b>ve insanlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ed devâbbi: &lt;/b>ve davarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el en'âmi: &lt;/b>ve hayvanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>muhtelifun: &lt;/b>muhtelif, çesitli&lt;br />&lt;b>elvânu-hu: &lt;/b>onun renkleri&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle, bunun gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>sadece, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>yahsâllâhe (yahsâ allâhe): &lt;/b>Allah'a (karsi) husû duyarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min ibâdi-hi: &lt;/b>kullarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>el ulemâu: &lt;/b>ulemalar, âlimler&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>azîzun: &lt;/b>üstün ve güçlü olan&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>gafûr, magfiret eden, günahlari sevaba çeviren"

    <string name="sozluk.035.043">"&lt;br />&lt;b>istikbâran: &lt;/b>büyüklenerek, kibirlenerek kötülük düzenlediler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>arzda, yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mekre es seyyii: &lt;/b>ve kötülük düzeni, kötü hile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yahîku: &lt;/b>ve isabet etmez, ulasmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mekru es seyyii: &lt;/b>ve kötülük düzeni, kötü hile&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>...'e&lt;br />&lt;b>ehli-hi: &lt;/b>onun sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>hel: &lt;/b>mi, mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>yanzurûne: &lt;/b>gözlüyorlar (bekliyorlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>sunnete: &lt;/b>sünnet, kanun&lt;br />&lt;b>el evvelîne: &lt;/b>evvelkiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra, halbuki&lt;br />&lt;b>len tecide: &lt;/b>asla bulamazsin&lt;br />&lt;b>li sunnetillâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in sünnetinde&lt;br />&lt;b>tebdîlen: &lt;/b>bedel, degisiklik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve len tecide: &lt;/b>ve asla bulamazsin&lt;br />&lt;b>li sunnetillâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in sünnetinde&lt;br />&lt;b>tahvîlen: &lt;/b>tahvil, dönüsüm, degisme"
    <string name="sozluk.035.044">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yesîrû &lt;br>(e lem yanzurû): &lt;/b>ve gezmediler, dolasmadilar &lt;br>: (bakmadilar mi?)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yanzurû: &lt;/b>bakarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âkibetu: &lt;/b>akibet, son, sonuç&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kânû: &lt;/b>ve ... oldular, ... idiler&lt;br />&lt;b>esedde: &lt;/b>daha çok, siddetli&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>kuvveten: &lt;/b>kuvvet, güç&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne: &lt;/b>ve olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lî yu'cize-hu: &lt;/b>onu aciz birakacak&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>bir sey(den)&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalarda, göklerde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ fî el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arzda, yeryüzünde yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>... oldu, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmen: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>kadîran: &lt;/b>kaadir olan, gücü yeten"
    <string name="sozluk.035.045">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, sayet, ... olsaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>yuâhizu: &lt;/b>muaheze eder, sorgular&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâse: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kesebû: &lt;/b>kazandilar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ terake: &lt;/b>terketmedi, birakmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ zahri-hâ: &lt;/b>onun sirtinda, onun üstünde&lt;br />&lt;b>min dâbbetin: &lt;/b>bir dabbe, yürüyen bir canli&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve lâkin&lt;br />&lt;b>yuahhiru-hum: &lt;/b>onlari tehir eder, erteler&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ ecelin: &lt;/b>bir zamana kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>musemmen: &lt;/b>isimlendirilmis, belirlenmis&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câe: &lt;/b>geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>ecelu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin eceli, onlarin zamaninin sonu&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>innallâhe (inne allâhe): &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>... oldu, ... idi, ...dir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ibâdi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kullarini, kullarini&lt;br />&lt;b>basîran: &lt;/b>gören

    <string name="sozluk.036.027">&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle, nedeniyle&lt;br />&lt;b>gafera: &lt;/b>magfiret etti, günahlari sevaba çevirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>lî: &lt;/b>bana, beni&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbî: &lt;/b>benim Rabbim&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ceale-nî: &lt;/b>ve beni kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>min el mukremîne: &lt;/b>ikram edilenlerden
    <string name="sozluk.036.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ enzelnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz indirmedik&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ kavmi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kavmi üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di-hi: &lt;/b>ondan sonra, onun arkasindan&lt;br />&lt;b>min cundin: &lt;/b>bir ordu&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan, gökten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kunnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz olmadik&lt;br />&lt;b>munzilîne: &lt;/b>indirenler (indiriciler)"
    <string name="sozluk.036.029">&lt;br />&lt;b>in ... illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>kânet: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>sayhaten: &lt;/b>bir sayha, siddetli ses dalgasi&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhideten: &lt;/b>tek, bir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hum hâmidûne: &lt;/b>onlar sönenler, sönen kimseler
    <string name="sozluk.036.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ hasreten: &lt;/b>yazik, yaziklar olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el ibâdi: &lt;/b>kullara&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ye'tî-him: &lt;/b>onlara gelmedi&lt;br />&lt;b>min resûlin: &lt;/b>bir resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ kânû: &lt;/b>olmus olmadilar (ancak), ... olmasinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi yestehziûne: &lt;/b>onunla alay ediyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.036.031">&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem yerav: &lt;/b>görmediler mi&lt;br />&lt;b>kem: &lt;/b>nice, kaç&lt;br />&lt;b>ehleknâ: &lt;/b>biz helâk ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>kable-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>min el kurûni: &lt;/b>ayni asrin insanlarindan, nesillerden&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ... oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhim lâ yerciûne: &lt;/b>onlara dönmezler
    <string name="sozluk.036.032">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>kullun: &lt;/b>hepsi, herkes&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ: &lt;/b>... oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîun: &lt;/b>toplanma&lt;br />&lt;b>ledeynâ: &lt;/b>huzurumuzda&lt;br />&lt;b>muhdarûne: &lt;/b>hazir bulundurulanlar
    <string name="sozluk.036.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âyetun: &lt;/b>ve bir âyet, mucize, delil&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardu: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü, yer, toprak&lt;br />&lt;b>el meytetu: &lt;/b>ölü&lt;br />&lt;b>ahyeynâ-hâ: &lt;/b>biz onu dirilttik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ahracnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz çikarttik&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>habben: &lt;/b>taneler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ye'kulûne: &lt;/b>yerler"
    <string name="sozluk.036.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cealnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz kildik, yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>cennâtin: &lt;/b>bahçeler&lt;br />&lt;b>min nahîlin: &lt;/b>hurmaliklardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve a'nâbin: &lt;/b>ve üzüm (baglari)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve feccernâ: &lt;/b>ve fiskirttik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>min el uyûni: &lt;/b>pinarlardan, pinarlar"
    <string name="sozluk.036.035">"&lt;br />&lt;b>li ye'kulû: &lt;/b>yesinler diye&lt;br />&lt;b>min semeri-hi: &lt;/b>onun ürününden, meyvelerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>âmilet-hu: &lt;/b>onu yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>eydî-him: &lt;/b>(onlarin) elleri&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o halde, hâlâ&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yeskurûne: &lt;/b>sükretmiyorlar, sükretmezler"
    <string name="sozluk.036.036">"&lt;br />&lt;b>subhânellezî (subhâne ellezî): &lt;/b>o sübhandir, herseyden münezzehtir&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka: &lt;/b>yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>el ezvâce: &lt;/b>çiftler, esler&lt;br />&lt;b>kulle-hâ: &lt;/b>onun hepsi, hersey&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>tunbitu: &lt;/b>yetistirir&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardu: &lt;/b>arz, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min enfusi-him: &lt;/b>ve onlarin nefslerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>ve seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmezler, bilmiyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.036.037">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âyetun: &lt;/b>ve bir âyet, delil, mucize, ibret&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>el leylu: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>neslehu: &lt;/b>siyiririz, çekip aliriz&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>en nehâra: &lt;/b>gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>... oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>muzlimûne: &lt;/b>karanlikta kalan kimseler, karanlikta kalanlar
    <string name="sozluk.036.038">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es semsu: &lt;/b>ve günes&lt;br />&lt;b>tecrî: &lt;/b>akar, gider&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için, ...'e, ...'de&lt;br />&lt;b>mustekarrin: &lt;/b>karar kilinmis, kararlastirilmis, istikrarli kilinan (yörüngesi)&lt;br />&lt;b>lehâ: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>takdîru: &lt;/b>takdir&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzi: &lt;/b>azîz olan, güçlü ve üstün olan&lt;br />&lt;b>el alîmi: &lt;/b>alîm olan, en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.036.039">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kamera: &lt;/b>ve kamer, ay&lt;br />&lt;b>kaddernâ-hu: &lt;/b>biz ona takdir ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>menâzile: &lt;/b>menziller&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>... oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>âde: &lt;/b>döndü&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>el urcûni: &lt;/b>hurma salkiminin dali&lt;br />&lt;b>el kadîmi: &lt;/b>eski (kurumus)

    <string name="sozluk.036.044">"&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmeten: &lt;/b>bir rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>min-nâ: &lt;/b>bizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve metâan: &lt;/b>ve metalanma, faydalanma&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ: &lt;/b>...'e kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>hînin: &lt;/b>belli bir zaman"
    <string name="sozluk.036.045">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman, olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>kîle: &lt;/b>denildi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>ittekû: &lt;/b>sakinin, takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ beyne eydî-kum: &lt;/b>elleriniz arasindaki, önünüzdeki seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ halfe-kum: &lt;/b>ve arkanizdaki seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>turhamûne: &lt;/b>rahmet olunursunuz
    <string name="sozluk.036.046">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ te'tî-him: &lt;/b>ve onlara gelmedi&lt;br />&lt;b>min âyetin: &lt;/b>bir âyet&lt;br />&lt;b>min âyâti: &lt;/b>âyetlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin Rabbi&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>mu'ridîne: &lt;/b>yüz çevirenler"
    <string name="sozluk.036.047">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ kîle: &lt;/b>ve denildigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>enfikû: &lt;/b>infâk edin, verin&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>razaka-kum allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in sizi riziklandirdigi&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler, kâfirler&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimselere&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>îmân edenler, âmenû olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>e nut'imu: &lt;/b>biz mi doyuracagiz, biz mi yedirecegiz&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>olsaydi, eger&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâullâhu (yesâu allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah diler&lt;br />&lt;b>at'ame-hu: &lt;/b>onu doyurur&lt;br />&lt;b>in entum: &lt;/b>siz ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ (in ... illâ): &lt;/b>ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>fî dalâlin: &lt;/b>dalâlet içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînin: &lt;/b>apaçik"
    <string name="sozluk.036.048">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yekûlûne: &lt;/b>ve derler&lt;br />&lt;b>metâ: &lt;/b>ne zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>el va'du: &lt;/b>vaad&lt;br />&lt;b>in kuntum: &lt;/b>eger siz ... iseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>sâdikîne: &lt;/b>dogru sözlüler, dogru söyleyenler"
    <string name="sozluk.036.049">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yenzurûne: &lt;/b>gözlemiyorlar, beklemiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>sayhaten: &lt;/b>sayha, siddetli ses dalgasi&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhideten: &lt;/b>bir, tek&lt;br />&lt;b>te'huzu-hum: &lt;/b>onlari alacak, yakalayacak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yahissimûne: &lt;/b>çekisirler, tartisirlar"

    <string name="sozluk.036.051">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nufiha: &lt;/b>ve üfürüldü&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es sûri: &lt;/b>sur'a&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>iste o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>... oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min el ecdâsi: &lt;/b>kabirlerden, mezarlarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ rabbi-him: &lt;/b>Rab'lerine&lt;br />&lt;b>yensilûne: &lt;/b>kosarlar"
    <string name="sozluk.036.052">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>veyle-nâ: &lt;/b>yaziklar olsun bize, eyvahlar olsun bize&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>bease-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi beas etti, kaldirdi, diriltti&lt;br />&lt;b>min merkadi-nâ: &lt;/b>uykuya birakildigimiz yerden, mezarlarimizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ vaade: &lt;/b>vaadettigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahmânu: &lt;/b>Rahmân'in&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sadaka: &lt;/b>ve dogru söylemis&lt;br />&lt;b>el murselûne: &lt;/b>gönderilen resûller"
    <string name="sozluk.036.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>in (in ... illâ): &lt;/b>eger, ... ise (ancak)&lt;br />&lt;b>kânet: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ (in ... illâ): &lt;/b>ancak, ...'den baska, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>sayhaten: &lt;/b>sayha, siddetli ses dalgasi&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhideten: &lt;/b>bir, tek&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, iste o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>... oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîun: &lt;/b>toplu olarak, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>ledey-nâ: &lt;/b>huzurumuzda&lt;br />&lt;b>muhdarûne: &lt;/b>hazir bulunanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.036.054">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, iste&lt;br />&lt;b>el yevme: &lt;/b>o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tuzlemu: &lt;/b>zulmedilmez&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsun: &lt;/b>nefs, kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tuczevne: &lt;/b>ve karsilik görmezsiniz, cezalandirilmazsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, hariç, ...'den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz ... oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz, amel ediyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.036.055">&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ashâbe: &lt;/b>sahip, ehil, halk&lt;br />&lt;b>el cenneti: &lt;/b>cennet&lt;br />&lt;b>el yevme: &lt;/b>bu gün, o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>sugulin: &lt;/b>mesguliyet&lt;br />&lt;b>fâkihûne: &lt;/b>memnun, hosnut, zevkli, zevk-ü sefada olanlar
    <string name="sozluk.036.056">&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ezvâcu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin esleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zilâlin: &lt;/b>gölgeliklerde&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el erâiki: &lt;/b>tahtlar üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>muttekiûne: &lt;/b>yaslanmis olanlar
    <string name="sozluk.036.057">&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>fîhâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>fâkihetun: &lt;/b>yemis, meyve&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ yeddeûne: &lt;/b>istedikleri seyler
    <string name="sozluk.036.058">"&lt;br />&lt;b>selâmun: &lt;/b>selâm&lt;br />&lt;b>kavlen: &lt;/b>söz&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbin: &lt;/b>Rab'lerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>rahîmin: &lt;/b>rahmet nuru gönderen"
    <string name="sozluk.036.059">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve imtâzû: &lt;/b>ve ayrilin, çekilin&lt;br />&lt;b>el yevme: &lt;/b>bu gün, o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey! (seslenme edati)&lt;br />&lt;b>el mucrimûne: &lt;/b>mücrimler, günahkârlar
    <string name="sozluk.036.060">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e lem a'had: &lt;/b>ahd almadim mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>ileykum: &lt;/b>size, sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ benî âdeme: &lt;/b>ey Âdemogullari&lt;br />&lt;b>en lâ ta'budû: &lt;/b>kul olmamaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>es seytâne: &lt;/b>seytan&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için, size&lt;br />&lt;b>aduvvun: &lt;/b>düsman&lt;br />&lt;b>mubinun: &lt;/b>apaçik"
    <string name="sozluk.036.061">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eni'budûnî (en i'budû-nî): &lt;/b>ve bana kul olmaniz&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>sirâtun mustakîmun: &lt;/b>Sirati Mustakîm, Allah'a yönelmis yol, Allah'a götüren yol"
    <string name="sozluk.036.062">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>edalle: &lt;/b>dalâlette birakti, saptirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>cibillen: &lt;/b>insanlar, halk, cemaat&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîran: &lt;/b>çok, çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi?&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, hâlâ&lt;br />&lt;b>lem tekûnû: &lt;/b>olmuyorsunuz, olmazsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'kilûne: &lt;/b>akil ediyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.036.063">&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzihî: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>cehennem: &lt;/b>cehennem&lt;br />&lt;b>elletî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz ... oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>tûadûne: &lt;/b>size vaadediliyor
    <string name="sozluk.036.064">&lt;br />&lt;b>islev-hâ: &lt;/b>ona yaslanin&lt;br />&lt;b>el yevme: &lt;/b>bu gün, o gün&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>sey sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz ... oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>tekfurûne: &lt;/b>inkâr ediyorsunuz

    <string name="sozluk.037.017">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âbâu-nâ: &lt;/b>ve babalarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>el evvelûne: &lt;/b>evvelkiler
    <string name="sozluk.037.018">&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>neam: &lt;/b>evet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve entum: &lt;/b>ve siz&lt;br />&lt;b>dâhirûne: &lt;/b>zelil olanlar, hor ve hakir olanlar

    <string name="sozluk.037.070">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>âsâri-him: &lt;/b>onlarin izleri&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhraûne: &lt;/b>kosuyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.037.071">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>dalle: &lt;/b>dalâlette oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>kable-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>ekseru: &lt;/b>çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>el evvelîne: &lt;/b>evvelkiler
    <string name="sozluk.037.072">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>erselnâ: &lt;/b>biz gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî him: &lt;/b>onlarin arasina, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>munzirîne: &lt;/b>nezirler, uyaricilar
    <string name="sozluk.037.073">&lt;br />&lt;b>fanzur (fe unzur): &lt;/b>o zaman, artik, bak&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âkibetu: &lt;/b>akibet, son&lt;br />&lt;b>el munzerîne: &lt;/b>uyarilanlar

    <string name="sozluk.037.126">&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rabbe: &lt;/b>ve Rab&lt;br />&lt;b>âbâi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin babalariniz, atalariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>el evvelîne: &lt;/b>evvelkiler
    <string name="sozluk.037.127">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>bunun üzerine, böylece, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû-hu: &lt;/b>onu yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>bunun üzerine, böylece, bu sebeple&lt;br />&lt;b>inne hum: &lt;/b>muhakkak onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>muhdarûne: &lt;/b>hazir bulundurulacak olanlar

    <string name="sozluk.038.024">"&lt;br />&lt;b>bi suâli: &lt;/b>istemekle, isteyerek&lt;br />&lt;b>na'ceti-ke: &lt;/b>senin koyunun&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ niâci-hi: &lt;/b>onun (kendi) koyunlarina&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve gerçekten, muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîren: &lt;/b>çok&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>el huletâi: &lt;/b>ortaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>gerçekten, muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>yebgî: &lt;/b>haksizlik ediyor, hakka tecavüz ediyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'du-hum alâ ba'din: &lt;/b>birbirlerine&lt;br />&lt;b>illellezîne (illâ ellezîne): &lt;/b>o kimseler hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular (Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilûs sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve salih amel (nefs tezkiyesi) yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kalîlun: &lt;/b>ve az&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>ne kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zanne: &lt;/b>ve zannetti&lt;br />&lt;b>dâvûdu: &lt;/b>Davut&lt;br />&lt;b>ennemâ: &lt;/b>oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>fetennâ-hu: &lt;/b>onu imtihan ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>bunun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>istagfere: &lt;/b>magfiret istedi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbe-hu: &lt;/b>onun Rabbi, Rabbine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve harre: &lt;/b>ve secdeye kapandi&lt;br />&lt;b>râkian: &lt;/b>rükû ederek, husû ile egilerek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enâbe: &lt;/b>ve yöneldi, (hitaben Allah'a ulasti)"
    <string name="sozluk.038.025">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>gafernâ lehu: &lt;/b>ona magfiret ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve gerçekten, muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>inde-nâ: &lt;/b>katimizda, yanimizda&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>zulfâ: &lt;/b>mertebe, yakinlik, yüksek makam&lt;br />&lt;b>ve husne: &lt;/b>ve güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>meâbin: &lt;/b>siginak

    <string name="sozluk.038.027">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ halaknâ: &lt;/b>ve biz yaratmadik&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâe: &lt;/b>sema, gökyüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-humâ: &lt;/b>ikisi arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>bâtilen: &lt;/b>bâtil, bos&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu, iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>zannu: &lt;/b>zan&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler, küfrettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>veylun: &lt;/b>vay haline, yaziklar olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne: &lt;/b>kimselere, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâri: &lt;/b>ates
    <string name="sozluk.038.028">"&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya, hem de, ya da, hiç&lt;br />&lt;b>nec'alu: &lt;/b>biz, kildik, yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve amilû es sâlihâti: &lt;/b>ve salih amel, nefs tezkiyesi yaptilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi, ayni, bir, esit&lt;br />&lt;b>el mufsidîne: &lt;/b>fesat çikaranlar, bozgunculuk yapanlar gibi,&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya, hem de, ya da&lt;br />&lt;b>nec'alu: &lt;/b>kildik, yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>el muttekîne: &lt;/b>muttekiler, takva sahipleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi, ayni, bir, esit&lt;br />&lt;b>el fuccâri: &lt;/b>facirler, cehennemlikler"

    <string name="sozluk.039.005">&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka: &lt;/b>yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>yukevviru: &lt;/b>örter, sarar&lt;br />&lt;b>el leyle: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>en nehâri: &lt;/b>gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yukevviru: &lt;/b>ve örter, sarar, çevirir&lt;br />&lt;b>en nehâre: &lt;/b>gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>el leyli: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>ve sehhare: &lt;/b>ve musahhar kildi, emre amade kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>es semse: &lt;/b>günes&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kamere: &lt;/b>ve ay&lt;br />&lt;b>kullun: &lt;/b>hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>yecrî: &lt;/b>akar, gider&lt;br />&lt;b>li ecelin: &lt;/b>ecele, bir süreye&lt;br />&lt;b>musemmen: &lt;/b>belirlenmis&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ: &lt;/b>degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzu: &lt;/b>azîz (yüce ve üstün)&lt;br />&lt;b>el gaffâru: &lt;/b>gaffar (çok magfiret eden) olan
    <string name="sozluk.039.006">"&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka-kum: &lt;/b>sizi yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsin: &lt;/b>nefs&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhidetin: &lt;/b>bir, tek&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ceale: &lt;/b>kildi, yapti, yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>zevce-hâ: &lt;/b>onun esi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enzele: &lt;/b>ve indirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>el en'âmi: &lt;/b>dört ayakli hayvanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>semâniyete: &lt;/b>sekiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ezvâcin: &lt;/b>zevceler, esler&lt;br />&lt;b>yahluku-kum: &lt;/b>sizi yaratir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>butûni: &lt;/b>batinlar, karinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ummehâti-kum: &lt;/b>sizin anneleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>halkan: &lt;/b>yaratma, yaratis, yaratilis&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'di: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>halkin: &lt;/b>yaratma, yaratis, yaratilis&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>zulumâtin: &lt;/b>karanliklar&lt;br />&lt;b>selâsin: &lt;/b>üç&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlikum: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona ait, onun&lt;br />&lt;b>el mulku: &lt;/b>mülk, idare&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ: &lt;/b>yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhe: &lt;/b>ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, buna ragmen&lt;br />&lt;b>ennâ: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>tusrafûne: &lt;/b>döndürülüyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.039.007">"&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>tekfurû: &lt;/b>inkâr ediyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ganiyyun: &lt;/b>gani, zengin, ihtiyaci olmayan&lt;br />&lt;b>an-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yerdâ: &lt;/b>ve razi olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>ibâdi-hi: &lt;/b>onun kullari&lt;br />&lt;b>el kufre: &lt;/b>küfür, inkâr&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve eger, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>teskurû: &lt;/b>sükredersiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>yerda-hu: &lt;/b>ondan razi olur&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ teziru: &lt;/b>ve yüklenmez, tasimaz&lt;br />&lt;b>vâziretun: &lt;/b>yük tasiyan, günahkâr&lt;br />&lt;b>vizra: &lt;/b>agirlik, yük, günah&lt;br />&lt;b>uhrâ: &lt;/b>diger&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbinize&lt;br />&lt;b>merciu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin merciiniz, dönüs yeriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>yunebbiu-kum: &lt;/b>size haber verir&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>siz yapiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>inne-hu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>çok iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zâti: &lt;/b>sahip&lt;br />&lt;b>es sudûr: &lt;/b>sineler, gögüsler"

    <string name="sozluk.039.019">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>hakka: &lt;/b>hak oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona, onun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>kelimetu: &lt;/b>kelime&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbi: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>tunkizu: &lt;/b>kurtarirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâri: &lt;/b>ates

    <string name="sozluk.039.036">&lt;br />&lt;b>e leyse: &lt;/b>degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kâfin: &lt;/b>kâfi&lt;br />&lt;b>abde-hu: &lt;/b>onun kulu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuhavvifûne-ke: &lt;/b>ve seni korkutuyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar ile&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>dûni-hi: &lt;/b>ondan baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yudlili: &lt;/b>dalâlette birakir&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, o taktirde, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lehu: &lt;/b>onun için yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>hâdin: &lt;/b>hidayete erdiren, mürsid, hidayetçi

    <string name="sozluk.039.038">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le: &lt;/b>ve mutlaka, gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>seelte-hum: &lt;/b>onlara sordun&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka: &lt;/b>yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, sühpesiz&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlunne: &lt;/b>derler&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>raeytum: &lt;/b>siz gördünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>seyler&lt;br />&lt;b>ted'ûne: &lt;/b>siz tapiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>dûni: &lt;/b>disinda, baska&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>sâyet, eger&lt;br />&lt;b>erâde-niye: &lt;/b>benim için diledi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bi durrin: &lt;/b>darligi, zarari&lt;br />&lt;b>hel: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>hunne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kâsifâtu: &lt;/b>gideren&lt;br />&lt;b>durri-hi: &lt;/b>onun zarari&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>ya da, veya&lt;br />&lt;b>erâde-nî: &lt;/b>benim için diledi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile, ... i&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmetin: &lt;/b>rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>hel: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>hunne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mumsikâtu: &lt;/b>tutanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmeti-hî: &lt;/b>onun rahmeti&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>hasbiyallâhu (hasbiye allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah bana yeter&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>yetevekkelu: &lt;/b>tevekkül eder&lt;br />&lt;b>el mutevekkilûne: &lt;/b>tevekkül edenler"
    <string name="sozluk.039.039">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmi: &lt;/b>kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>i'melû: &lt;/b>yapin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üstünde, de&lt;br />&lt;b>mekâneti-kum: &lt;/b>bulundugunuz mekân&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>âmilun: &lt;/b>yapan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>sevfe: &lt;/b>yakinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>bileceksiniz"

    <string name="sozluk.039.041">&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak biz&lt;br />&lt;b>enzelnâ: &lt;/b>indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakki: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>ihtedâ: &lt;/b>hidayette oldu, hidayete erdi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsi-hi: &lt;/b>(onun) kendi nefsi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>dalle: &lt;/b>dalâlete düstü, dalâlette kaldi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>ancak, yalniz, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>yadillu: &lt;/b>dalâlette olur&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhâ: &lt;/b>kendi aleyhine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ ente: &lt;/b>ve sen degilsin&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara, onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>bi vekîlin: &lt;/b>vekil
    <string name="sozluk.039.042">&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yeteveffâ: &lt;/b>vefat ettirir, öldürür&lt;br />&lt;b>el enfuse: &lt;/b>nefsler veya fizik vücutlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hîne: &lt;/b>o vakit, esnasinda, aninda&lt;br />&lt;b>mevti-hâ: &lt;/b>onun ölümü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve elletî: &lt;/b>ve o ki&lt;br />&lt;b>lem temut: &lt;/b>ölmedi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>menâmi-hâ: &lt;/b>onun uykusu&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>yumsiku: &lt;/b>tutar&lt;br />&lt;b>elletî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>kadâ: &lt;/b>takdir etti&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhe: &lt;/b>onun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevte: &lt;/b>ölüm&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yursilu: &lt;/b>ve gönderir&lt;br />&lt;b>el uhrâ: &lt;/b>digeri&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ ecelin: &lt;/b>ecele kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>musemmen: &lt;/b>belirlenmis, tayin edilmis&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zâlike: &lt;/b>bunda&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtin: &lt;/b>âyetler, deliller, ibretler&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmin: &lt;/b>kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>yetefekkerûne: &lt;/b>tefekkür ediyorlar (eden)
