    <string name="sozluk.039.049">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>messe: &lt;/b>dokundu&lt;br />&lt;b>el insâne: &lt;/b>insan&lt;br />&lt;b>durrun: &lt;/b>zarar, ziyan&lt;br />&lt;b>deâ-nâ: &lt;/b>bize dua etti&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>havvelnâ-hu: &lt;/b>ona verdik, ona lütfettik (gönderdik)&lt;br />&lt;b>ni'meten: &lt;/b>ni'met&lt;br />&lt;b>min-nâ: &lt;/b>bizden&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>innemâ: &lt;/b>ancak, yalniz, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtîtu-hu: &lt;/b>ona verildi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ilmin: &lt;/b>ilim üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir, fakat, bilâkis&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>fitnetun: &lt;/b>fitne, imtihan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve fakat, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>eksere-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin çogu&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmezler"
    <string name="sozluk.039.050">&lt;br />&lt;b>kad: &lt;/b>olmustu&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle-hâ: &lt;/b>onu dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ agnâ: &lt;/b>fayda vermedi&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>idiler, oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yeksibûne: &lt;/b>kazaniyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.039.051">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>esâbe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>seyyiâtu: &lt;/b>kötülükler, günahlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>kesebû: &lt;/b>kazandilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>zalemû: &lt;/b>zulmettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>hâulâi: &lt;/b>bunlar&lt;br />&lt;b>se yusîbu-hum: &lt;/b>onlara isabet edecek&lt;br />&lt;b>seyyiâtu: &lt;/b>kötülükler, günahlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>kesebû: &lt;/b>kazandilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar degiller&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mu'cizîne: &lt;/b>aciz birakanlar, aciz birakacak güce sahip olanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.039.052">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem ya'lemû: &lt;/b>ve bilmiyorlar, bilmediler&lt;br />&lt;b>enne: &lt;/b>oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yebsutu: &lt;/b>genisletir&lt;br />&lt;b>er rizka: &lt;/b>rizik&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yakdiru: &lt;/b>ve takdir eder, kisitlar&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>fî zâlike: &lt;/b>bunda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtin: &lt;/b>âyetler, ibretler, deliller&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmin: &lt;/b>kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>yû'minûne: &lt;/b>mü'min olurlar, îmân ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.039.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ibâdiye: &lt;/b>kullarim&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>esrefû: &lt;/b>israf ettiler, haddi astilar&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>karsi, üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>enfusi-him: &lt;/b>kendi nefsleri&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ taknetû: &lt;/b>ümit kesmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmeti allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in rahmeti&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yagfiru: &lt;/b>magfiret eder, günahlari sevaba çevirir&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zunûbe: &lt;/b>günahlar&lt;br />&lt;b>cemîan: &lt;/b>hepsi, tümü&lt;br />&lt;b>innehu: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>el gafûru: &lt;/b>magfiret eden&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahîmu: &lt;/b>rahîm esmasiyla tecelli eden, rahmet nuru gönderen"
    <string name="sozluk.039.054">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve enîbû: &lt;/b>ve yönelin (ve ulasmayi dileyin)&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ rabbi-kum: &lt;/b>(sizin) Rabbinize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve eslimû: &lt;/b>ve teslim olun&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli: &lt;/b>önceden&lt;br />&lt;b>en ye'tiye-kum: &lt;/b>size gelmesi&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbu: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tunsarûne: &lt;/b>yardim olunmazsiniz"

    <string name="sozluk.039.075">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve terâ: &lt;/b>ve görürsün&lt;br />&lt;b>el melâikete: &lt;/b>melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâffîne: &lt;/b>kusatanlar, çevreleyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>havli: &lt;/b>etraf&lt;br />&lt;b>el arsi: &lt;/b>ars&lt;br />&lt;b>yusebbihûne: &lt;/b>tesbih ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hamdi: &lt;/b>hamd ile&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin Rabbi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kudiye: &lt;/b>ve hüküm verildi, hükmedildi&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin aralarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kîle: &lt;/b>ve denildi&lt;br />&lt;b>el hamdu: &lt;/b>hamd&lt;br />&lt;b>lillâhi (li allâhi): &lt;/b>Allah için, Allah'a mahsus&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi el âlemîne: &lt;/b>âlemlerin Rabbi"
    <string name="sozluk.040.001" />

    <string name="sozluk.040.021">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yesîrû: &lt;/b>ve dolasmiyorlar, dolasmadilar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardi: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>yenzurû: &lt;/b>baksinlar&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>kâne: &lt;/b>oldu&lt;br />&lt;b>âkibetu: &lt;/b>akibet, son&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû-hum: &lt;/b>onlar idiler&lt;br />&lt;b>esedde: &lt;/b>daha siddetli, daha kuvvetli, daha üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>kuvveten: &lt;/b>kuvvet bakimindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âsâran: &lt;/b>ve eserler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardi: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>ehaze-hum allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah onlari aldi, yakaladi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zunûbi-him: &lt;/b>günahlari sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ kâne lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlar için olmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>vâkin: &lt;/b>bir koruyucu

    <string name="sozluk.040.038">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî âmene: &lt;/b>âmenû olan, îmân eden kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmittebiûni: &lt;/b>(kavmi ittebiû-ni)&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmi: &lt;/b>kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>ittebiû-ni: &lt;/b>bana tâbî olun&lt;br />&lt;b>ehdi-kum: &lt;/b>sizi hidayet edeyim, ulastirayim&lt;br />&lt;b>sebîle er resâdi: &lt;/b>irsad yolu

    <string name="sozluk.040.040">"&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>amile: &lt;/b>yapti, isledi&lt;br />&lt;b>seyyieten: &lt;/b>seyyie, günah, kötülük&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuczâ: &lt;/b>cezalandirilmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, den baska, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>misle-hâ: &lt;/b>onun misli, onun kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>men amile: &lt;/b>kim yapar, kim isler&lt;br />&lt;b>sâlihan: &lt;/b>nefsi islâh edici ameller, nefs tezkiyesi&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>zekerin: &lt;/b>erkek&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>ya da&lt;br />&lt;b>unsâ: &lt;/b>kadin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>mû'minun: &lt;/b>mü'minler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ulâike: &lt;/b>ve iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yedhulûne: &lt;/b>girerler, konulurlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el cennete: &lt;/b>cennet&lt;br />&lt;b>yurzekûne: &lt;/b>riziklandirilirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fîhâ: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayri: &lt;/b>olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>hisâbin: &lt;/b>hesap"

    <string name="sozluk.040.059">"&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>es sâate: &lt;/b>o saat (bilinen zaman)&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>âtiyetun: &lt;/b>gelecek&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ reybe: &lt;/b>kusku, süphe yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>fîhâ: &lt;/b>onda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>eksere: &lt;/b>çok, ekseriyet&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yû'minûne: &lt;/b>îmân etmezler, inanmazlar"
    <string name="sozluk.040.060">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ud'û-nî: &lt;/b>bana dua edin&lt;br />&lt;b>estecib: &lt;/b>(ben) icabet edeyim&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yestekbirûne: &lt;/b>kibirlenirler&lt;br />&lt;b>an ibâdetî: &lt;/b>bana kul olmaktan&lt;br />&lt;b>se yedhulûne: &lt;/b>dahil olacaklar, girecekler&lt;br />&lt;b>cehenneme: &lt;/b>cehennem&lt;br />&lt;b>dâhirîne: &lt;/b>alçalmislar olarak, hakir ve zelil olarak"
    <string name="sozluk.040.061">&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>ceale: &lt;/b>kildi, yapti, yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum(u): &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>el leyle: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>li teskunû: &lt;/b>sükûn bulmaniz için&lt;br />&lt;b>fîhi: &lt;/b>onda, içinde, de&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>en nehâre: &lt;/b>gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>mubsiren: &lt;/b>gösterici, aydinlatici&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>zû fadlin: &lt;/b>fazlin sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlara, insanlar üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>eksere: &lt;/b>çok, ekseriyet&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yeskurûne: &lt;/b>sükretmezler

    <string name="sozluk.040.080">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekum: &lt;/b>ve sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>onda vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>menâfiu: &lt;/b>faydalar, yararlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li: &lt;/b>ve için&lt;br />&lt;b>teblugû: &lt;/b>ulasirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhâ: &lt;/b>onun üstünde&lt;br />&lt;b>hâceten: &lt;/b>hacet, ihtiyaç, arzu, istek&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, de&lt;br />&lt;b>sudûri-kum: &lt;/b>sineleriniz, gögüsleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve aleyhâ: &lt;/b>ve onlarin üstünde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ: &lt;/b>ve üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>el fulki: &lt;/b>gemiler&lt;br />&lt;b>tuhmelûne: &lt;/b>tasinirsiniz

    <string name="sozluk.041.015">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>emmâ: &lt;/b>fakat, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>âdun: &lt;/b>Ad (kavmi)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, daha sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>istekberû: &lt;/b>büyüklendiler, kibirlendiler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>bi gayri: &lt;/b>olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakki: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>eseddu: &lt;/b>daha kuvvetli, daha güçlü&lt;br />&lt;b>min-nâ: &lt;/b>bizden&lt;br />&lt;b>kuvveten: &lt;/b>kuvvet bakimindan&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yerev: &lt;/b>ve görmediler&lt;br />&lt;b>enne: &lt;/b>oldugunu&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka-hum: &lt;/b>onlari yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>eseddu: &lt;/b>daha kuvvetli, daha güçlü&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>kuvveten: &lt;/b>kuvvet bakimindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kânû: &lt;/b>ve oldular, idiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimizi&lt;br />&lt;b>yechadûne: &lt;/b>bilerek inkâr ediyorlar
    <string name="sozluk.041.016">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, bunun üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>erselnâ: &lt;/b>gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>rîhan: &lt;/b>rüzgâr&lt;br />&lt;b>sarsaran: &lt;/b>siddetli sesle gelen soguk firtina&lt;br />&lt;b>fî eyyâmin: &lt;/b>günlerde&lt;br />&lt;b>nahisâtin: &lt;/b>ugursuzlar&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>nuzîka-hum: &lt;/b>onlara tattiririz&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbe: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>el hizyi: &lt;/b>alçaklik, zillet&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayatinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le: &lt;/b>ve mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbu el âhireti: &lt;/b>ahiret azabi&lt;br />&lt;b>ahzâ: &lt;/b>daha çok rüsva edici, rezil edici&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yunsarûne: &lt;/b>yardim olunmazlar
    <string name="sozluk.041.017">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emmâ: &lt;/b>ve fakat, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>semûdu: &lt;/b>Semud (kavmi)&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, ondan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>hedeynâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlari hidayete erdirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, buna ragmen&lt;br />&lt;b>istehabbû: &lt;/b>sevdiler, tercih ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>el amâ: &lt;/b>âmâ, kör&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>el hudâ: &lt;/b>hidayet&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, bu sebeple&lt;br />&lt;b>ehazet-hum: &lt;/b>onlari yakaladi&lt;br />&lt;b>sâikatu: &lt;/b>simsek, yildirim&lt;br />&lt;b>el azâbi el hûni: &lt;/b>alçaltici azap&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>dolayisiyla, sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>yeksibûne: &lt;/b>kazaniyorlar

    <string name="sozluk.041.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ testevî: &lt;/b>ve esit, müsavi degil&lt;br />&lt;b>el hasenetu: &lt;/b>hasenat, sevap, iyilik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>es seyyietu: &lt;/b>günah, kötülük&lt;br />&lt;b>idfa': &lt;/b>söndür, bertaraf et, karsila&lt;br />&lt;b>bi: &lt;/b>ile&lt;br />&lt;b>elletî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>ahsenu: &lt;/b>daha güzel, en güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, o zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-ke ve beyne-hu: &lt;/b>onunla senin aranda&lt;br />&lt;b>adâvetun: &lt;/b>düsmanlik&lt;br />&lt;b>ke enne-hu: &lt;/b>o sanki, o gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>veliyyun: &lt;/b>velî, dost&lt;br />&lt;b>hamîmun: &lt;/b>yakin, samimi dost"
    <string name="sozluk.041.035">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ yulakkâ-hâ: &lt;/b>ve kavusturulmaz, ulastirilmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç, den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>saberû: &lt;/b>sabrettiler, sabrin sahibi oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ yulakkâ-hâ: &lt;/b>ve kavusturulmaz, ulastirilmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>hariç, den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>zû: &lt;/b>sahip&lt;br />&lt;b>hazzin azîmin: &lt;/b>hazzül azîm, en büyük haz

    <string name="sozluk.042.013">"&lt;br />&lt;b>serea: &lt;/b>seriat kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>size, sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min ed dîni: &lt;/b>dînden&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ vassâ: &lt;/b>vasiyet ettigi sey, farz kildigi sey&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu, onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>nûhan: &lt;/b>Nuh&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezî: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>evhaynâ: &lt;/b>biz vahyettik&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ vassaynâ: &lt;/b>ve vasiyet ettigimiz sey, farz kildigimiz sey&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu, onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>ibrâhîme: &lt;/b>Ibrâhîm&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mûsâ: &lt;/b>ve Musa&lt;br />&lt;b>ve îsâ: &lt;/b>ve Isa&lt;br />&lt;b>en ekîmû: &lt;/b>ikame etmeleri, ayakta, hayatta tutmalari&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dîne: &lt;/b>dîn&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ teteferrekû: &lt;/b>ve ayriliga düsmeyin, firkalara ayrilmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>onda, onun hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>kebure: &lt;/b>büyük oldu, agir geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ el musrikîne: &lt;/b>müsriklere&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ted'û-hum: &lt;/b>onlari davet ettigin sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona, kendisine&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yectebî: &lt;/b>seçer&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona, kendisine&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yehdî: &lt;/b>ve hidayete erdirir, ulastirir&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhi: &lt;/b>ona, kendisine&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>yunîbu: &lt;/b>yönelir"
    <string name="sozluk.042.014">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ teferrekû: &lt;/b>ve ayriliga düsmediler, firkalara ayrilmadilar&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>sonradan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ câe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara gelen sey&lt;br />&lt;b>el ilmu: &lt;/b>ilim&lt;br />&lt;b>bagyen: &lt;/b>azginlik&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin arasinda, aralarinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev lâ: &lt;/b>ve olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>kelimetun: &lt;/b>kelime, söz&lt;br />&lt;b>sebekat: &lt;/b>geçti&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbinden&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ ecelin: &lt;/b>bir ecele kadar, tayin edilmis bir zamana kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>musemmen: &lt;/b>belirlenmis&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>kudiye: &lt;/b>hükmedilir, hüküm verilir&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ûrisû: &lt;/b>varis kilindilar&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di-him: &lt;/b>onlardan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>sekkin: &lt;/b>sek, süphe&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>murîbin: &lt;/b>süphe içinde"
    <string name="sozluk.042.015">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe li zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bunun için&lt;br />&lt;b>fed'u (fe ud'u): &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra davet et&lt;br />&lt;b>ve istekim: &lt;/b>ve istikamet üzere ol&lt;br />&lt;b>kemâ: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>umirte: &lt;/b>sen emrolundun&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tettebi': &lt;/b>ve tâbî olma&lt;br />&lt;b>ehvâe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin hevesleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kul: &lt;/b>ve söyle, de&lt;br />&lt;b>âmentu: &lt;/b>ben îmân ettim&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ enzele: &lt;/b>indirilen seye&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>min kitâbin: &lt;/b>Kitap'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve umirtu: &lt;/b>ve ben emrolundum&lt;br />&lt;b>li a'dile: &lt;/b>adil olmaya, adaletli olmaya&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbu-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim Rabbimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rabbu-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin Rabbiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>lenâ: &lt;/b>bize ait&lt;br />&lt;b>a'mâlu-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim amellerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekum: &lt;/b>ve size ait&lt;br />&lt;b>a'mâlu-kum: &lt;/b>amelleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ huccete: &lt;/b>huccet, çekisme yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-nâ: &lt;/b>(bizim) aramizda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve beyne-kum: &lt;/b>ve (sizin) aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>yecmeu: &lt;/b>toplar&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim aramizda&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ileyhi: &lt;/b>ve ona&lt;br />&lt;b>el masîru: &lt;/b>dönüs"
    <string name="sozluk.042.016">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhâccûne: &lt;/b>tartisiyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>sonradan&lt;br />&lt;b>mestucîbe (mâ istucîbe): &lt;/b>icabet edilen sey&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>huccet-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin huccetleri, delilleri&lt;br />&lt;b>dâhidatun: &lt;/b>bâtil, geçersiz&lt;br />&lt;b>inde: &lt;/b>yaninda, katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin Rabbi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve aleyhim: &lt;/b>ve onlarin üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>gadabun: &lt;/b>gazap, öfke&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlari, ve onlar için vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdun: &lt;/b>siddetli"

    <string name="sozluk.042.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>yese': &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>yuskin: &lt;/b>teskin eder, sükûnet verir, durdurur&lt;br />&lt;b>er rîha: &lt;/b>rüzgâr&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>yazlelne: &lt;/b>olurlar, kalirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>revâkide: &lt;/b>yürümeyen, hareketsiz, sabit duran&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ zahri-hi: &lt;/b>onun üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, içinde, vardir&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtin: &lt;/b>âyetler&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli: &lt;/b>her, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>sabbârin: &lt;/b>çok sabredenler&lt;br />&lt;b>sekûrin: &lt;/b>çok sükredenler"
    <string name="sozluk.042.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>yûbik-hunne &lt;br>(vebeka): &lt;/b>onlari helâk eder, helâke sürükler &lt;br>: (helâk etti)&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>seyle, sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kesebû: &lt;/b>kazandilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ya'fu an: &lt;/b>ve affeder&lt;br />&lt;b>kesîrin: &lt;/b>çogu"
    <string name="sozluk.042.035">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ya'leme (ya'lem): &lt;/b>ve bilsinler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yucâdilûne: &lt;/b>mücâdele ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim âyetlerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>mahîsin: &lt;/b>kaçacak yer"
    <string name="sozluk.042.036">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>iste böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtî-tum: &lt;/b>size verildi&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>bir seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>metâu: &lt;/b>meta, faydalanilacak mal&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayati&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>inde: &lt;/b>yaninda, katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>hayirli, daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ebkâ: &lt;/b>ve bâki, daha kalici&lt;br />&lt;b>li ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû oldular, Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve alâ rabbi-him: &lt;/b>ve Rab'lerine&lt;br />&lt;b>yetevekkelûne: &lt;/b>tevekkül ederler"
    <string name="sozluk.042.037">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yectenibûne: &lt;/b>kaçinirlar, sakinirlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kebâire el ismi: &lt;/b>günahlarin büyükleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el fevâhise: &lt;/b>ve fuhuslar (kötülükler, zina, sirk, katletmek vb)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ gadibû: &lt;/b>öfkelendikleri sey&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yagfirûne: &lt;/b>affederler, bagislarlar

    <string name="sozluk.042.053">"&lt;br />&lt;b>sirâti allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolu&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey, ne&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, içinde, var&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey, ne&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, içinde, var&lt;br />&lt;b>el ardi: &lt;/b>arz, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>e lâ: &lt;/b>degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>Ilâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>tesîru: &lt;/b>seyreder, gider, döner, ulasir&lt;br />&lt;b>el umûru: &lt;/b>isler"

    <string name="sozluk.043.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el kitâbi: &lt;/b>ve kitaba andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>el mubîni: &lt;/b>açiklanmis olan, apaçik
    <string name="sozluk.043.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>cealnâ-hu: &lt;/b>onu kildik&lt;br />&lt;b>kur'ânen: &lt;/b>bir Kur'ân&lt;br />&lt;b>arabiyyen: &lt;/b>Arapça&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki siz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'kilûne: &lt;/b>akil edersiniz"
    <string name="sozluk.043.004">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne-hu: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, de&lt;br />&lt;b>ummi el kitâbi: &lt;/b>ümmül kitap, ana kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>ledey-nâ: &lt;/b>katimizda&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>alîyyun: &lt;/b>âlî, yüce&lt;br />&lt;b>hakîmun: &lt;/b>hakîm, hüküm ve hikmet sahibi
    <string name="sozluk.043.005">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>nadribu ...     <string name="sozluk.043.006">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kem: &lt;/b>ve nice, ne kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>erselnâ: &lt;/b>biz gönderdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min nebiyyin: &lt;/b>nebîlerden, peygamberlerden&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el evvelîne: &lt;/b>evvelkilerin arasinda, içinde

    <string name="sozluk.043.009">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve le: &lt;/b>ve gerçekten, elbette, muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, sâyet&lt;br />&lt;b>seelte-hum: &lt;/b>sen onlara sordun&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka: &lt;/b>yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve arz, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlunne: &lt;/b>derler&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka-hunne: &lt;/b>onlari yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîz: &lt;/b>azîz, yüce ve üstün, izzet sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>el alîmu: &lt;/b>alîm, en iyi bilen

    <string name="sozluk.043.030">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lemmâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>câe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakku: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>sihrun: &lt;/b>bir sihir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve innâ: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onu&lt;br />&lt;b>kâfirûne: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler
    <string name="sozluk.043.031">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olmaz mi, olsaydi, (öyle) degil mi&lt;br />&lt;b>nuzzile: &lt;/b>indirilir&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>el kur'ânu: &lt;/b>Kur'ân&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ raculin: &lt;/b>bir adama&lt;br />&lt;b>min: &lt;/b>den&lt;br />&lt;b>el karyeteyni: &lt;/b>iki belde&lt;br />&lt;b>azîmin: &lt;/b>azîm, büyük"
    <string name="sozluk.043.032">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yaksimûne: &lt;/b>taksim ediyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>rahmete: &lt;/b>rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>nahnu: &lt;/b>biz&lt;br />&lt;b>kasemnâ: &lt;/b>kisimlara ayirdik, paylastirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>maîsete-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin maisetleri, geçimleri&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayâti ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya hayati&lt;br />&lt;b>ve refa'nâ: &lt;/b>ve biz yükselttik&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'da-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin bir kismini&lt;br />&lt;b>fevka: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'din: &lt;/b>bir kismi&lt;br />&lt;b>derecâtin: &lt;/b>dereceler&lt;br />&lt;b>li yettehize: &lt;/b>edinmeleri için&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'du-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin bir kismi&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'dan: &lt;/b>bir kismi&lt;br />&lt;b>suhriyyen: &lt;/b>boyun egdirerek, emir altina alarak&lt;br />&lt;b>ve rahmetu: &lt;/b>ve rahmet&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>yecmeûne: &lt;/b>topluyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.043.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev lâ: &lt;/b>ve olmasaydi&lt;br />&lt;b>en yekûne: &lt;/b>olmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ummeten: &lt;/b>bir ümmet&lt;br />&lt;b>vâhideten: &lt;/b>tek&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>cealnâ: &lt;/b>kildik, yaptik&lt;br />&lt;b>li men: &lt;/b>o kimse için, o kimseye&lt;br />&lt;b>yekfuru: &lt;/b>inkâr ediyor&lt;br />&lt;b>bi er rahmâni: &lt;/b>Rahmân'i&lt;br />&lt;b>li buyûti-him: &lt;/b>onlarin evlerine, evleri için&lt;br />&lt;b>sukufen: &lt;/b>tavanlar, çardaklar&lt;br />&lt;b>min fiddatin: &lt;/b>gümüsten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve meârice: &lt;/b>ve katlar, merdivenler&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhâ: &lt;/b>üzerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>yazherûne: &lt;/b>yükselirler"

    <string name="sozluk.043.053">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>lev lâ: &lt;/b>olsaydi olmaz miydi, olmali degil miydi&lt;br />&lt;b>ulkiye: &lt;/b>atildi, verildi (takildi)&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>esviretun: &lt;/b>bilezikler&lt;br />&lt;b>min zehebin: &lt;/b>altindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>câe: &lt;/b>geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-hu: &lt;/b>onunla beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>el melâiketu: &lt;/b>melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>mukterinîne: &lt;/b>karîn olanlar, yakin olanlar

    <string name="sozluk.043.057">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lemmâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>duribe ...     <string name="sozluk.043.058">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>alihetu-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim ilâhlarimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>(daha) hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ darebû-hu: &lt;/b>onu örnek vermediler&lt;br />&lt;b>leke: &lt;/b>sana&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>cedelen: &lt;/b>mücâdele, tartisma&lt;br />&lt;b>bel hum: &lt;/b>hayir onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmun: &lt;/b>bir kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>hasimûne: &lt;/b>düsmanlar, düsman olanlar
    <string name="sozluk.043.059">"&lt;br />&lt;b>in ...     <string name="sozluk.043.060">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, sâyet&lt;br />&lt;b>nesâu: &lt;/b>dileriz&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>cealnâ: &lt;/b>biz kildik&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>melâiketen: &lt;/b>melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>yahlufûne: &lt;/b>halef olurlar, yerine geçerler
    <string name="sozluk.043.061">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne-hu: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>ilmun: &lt;/b>ilim&lt;br />&lt;b>li es sâati: &lt;/b>o saat için&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ temterunne (lâ temteru-enne): &lt;/b>sakin süphe etmeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>bihâ: &lt;/b>onda (onun hakkinda)&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittebiû-ni: &lt;/b>ve bana tâbî olun&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>sirâtun: &lt;/b>yol&lt;br />&lt;b>mustekîmun: &lt;/b>istikamet verilmis, yönlendirilmis

    <string name="sozluk.045.022">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve halaka: &lt;/b>ve halketti, yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>bi el hakki: &lt;/b>hak ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li tuczâ: &lt;/b>ve karsiligi (ceza veya mükâfat) verilsin diye&lt;br />&lt;b>kullu: &lt;/b>her, bütün, hepsi&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsin: &lt;/b>nefs&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-mâ: &lt;/b>sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>kesebet: &lt;/b>kazandi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yuzlemûne: &lt;/b>zulmedilmezler
    <string name="sozluk.045.023">"&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, bu durumda, hâlâ&lt;br />&lt;b>reeyte: &lt;/b>sen gördün&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>ittehaze: &lt;/b>edindi&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhe-hu: &lt;/b>onun ilâhi, kendi ilâhi&lt;br />&lt;b>hevâ-hu: &lt;/b>onun hevasi, kendi hevasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve edalle-hu: &lt;/b>ve dalâlette birakti&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ ilmin: &lt;/b>ilim üzere&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hateme: &lt;/b>ve mühürledi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine, ... a&lt;br />&lt;b>sem'i-hi: &lt;/b>onun isitme hassasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kalbi-hi: &lt;/b>ve onun kalbi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ceale: &lt;/b>ve kildi&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine, ... a&lt;br />&lt;b>basari-hi: &lt;/b>onun görme hassasi&lt;br />&lt;b>gisâveten: &lt;/b>gisavet, perde&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, bu durumda, hâlâ&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse, kisi&lt;br />&lt;b>yehdî-hi: &lt;/b>onu hidayete erdirir&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, bu durumda, hâlâ&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tezekkerûne: &lt;/b>tezekkür etmiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.045.024">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâlû: &lt;/b>ve dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>hiye: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>hayâtu-nâ: &lt;/b>bizim hayatimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya&lt;br />&lt;b>nemûtu: &lt;/b>ölürüz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nahyâ: &lt;/b>ve diriliriz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ yuhliku-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bizi helâk etmez&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ ed dehru: &lt;/b>zamandan baska birsey&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ lehum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zâlike: &lt;/b>bununla, bu konuda&lt;br />&lt;b>min ilmin: &lt;/b>ilimden&lt;br />&lt;b>in ...     <string name="sozluk.046.006">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>husire: &lt;/b>hasrolundu&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsu: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>a'dâen: &lt;/b>düsman&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kânû: &lt;/b>ve oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ibâdeti-him: &lt;/b>onlarin ibadetlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>kâfirîne: &lt;/b>kâfirler, inkâr edenler"
    <string name="sozluk.046.007">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>tutlâ: &lt;/b>okundu&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâtu-nâ: &lt;/b>âyetlerimiz&lt;br />&lt;b>beyyinâtin: &lt;/b>beyan edilerek, açik belgeler olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr eden kimseler&lt;br />&lt;b>li el hakki: &lt;/b>hak için&lt;br />&lt;b>lemmâ câe-hum: &lt;/b>onlara geldigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>sihrun: &lt;/b>bir sihirdir, büyüdür&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînun: &lt;/b>apaçik

    <string name="sozluk.046.022">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>e ci'te-nâ: &lt;/b>bize mi geldin&lt;br />&lt;b>li te'fike-nâ: &lt;/b>bizi çevirmek, vazgeçirmek için&lt;br />&lt;b>an âliheti-nâ: &lt;/b>ilâhlarimizdan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe'ti-nâ: &lt;/b>o zaman bize getir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mâ: &lt;/b>seyi&lt;br />&lt;b>teidu-nâ: &lt;/b>bize vaadettigi&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>kunte: &lt;/b>isen&lt;br />&lt;b>min es sâdikîne: &lt;/b>dogru sözlülerden"

    <string name="sozluk.046.024">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe lemmâ reev-hu: &lt;/b>onu gördükleri zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>âridan: &lt;/b>bir bulut olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>mustakbile: &lt;/b>yönelip gelen&lt;br />&lt;b>evdiyeti-him: &lt;/b>vadilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>âridun: &lt;/b>bir bulut&lt;br />&lt;b>mumtiru-nâ: &lt;/b>bize yagmur yagdiracak&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>mesta'celtum: &lt;/b>çabuklastirdiginiz, acele istediginiz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onun hakkinda&lt;br />&lt;b>rîhun: &lt;/b>bir rüzgâr&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>onun içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbun: &lt;/b>bir azap&lt;br />&lt;b>elîmun: &lt;/b>aci, elîm"

    <string name="sozluk.046.026">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun ki&lt;br />&lt;b>mekkennâ-hum: &lt;/b>onlara imkân (tasarruf hakki ve kudret) verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî mâ: &lt;/b>seyin içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>mekken-nâ-kum: &lt;/b>size imkân (tasarruf hakki ve kudret) verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>fî hi: &lt;/b>onun içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve cealnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz kildik, verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>sem'an: &lt;/b>isitme hassasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ebsâren: &lt;/b>ve görme hassasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ef'ideten: &lt;/b>ve fuad hassasi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe mâ agnâ: &lt;/b>kâfi gelmedi, müstagni kilmadi&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>sem'u-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin isitme hassasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ ebsâru-hum: &lt;/b>ve ne de görme hassasi&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ ef'idetu-hum: &lt;/b>ve ne de fuad hassasi&lt;br />&lt;b>min sey'in: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>iz kânû: &lt;/b>olduklari zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>yechadûne: &lt;/b>bilerek inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in âyetleri ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hâka: &lt;/b>ve kusatti, sardi, isabet etti&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>kânû: &lt;/b>oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hî: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>yestehziûne: &lt;/b>alay ettiler"

    <string name="sozluk.047.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>iste bu (bunlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ennellezîne (enne ellezîne): &lt;/b>onlarin olmalari sebebiyle&lt;br />&lt;b>keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ittebeû: &lt;/b>tâbî oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>el bâtile: &lt;/b>bâtil&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ennellezîne (enne ellezîne): &lt;/b>ve onlarin olmalari&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>Allah'a ulasmayi dilediler&lt;br />&lt;b>ittebeû: &lt;/b>tâbî oldular&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakka: &lt;/b>hak&lt;br />&lt;b>min rabbi-him: &lt;/b>Rab'lerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>yadribullâhu: &lt;/b>Allah misâl verir, örnek gösterir&lt;br />&lt;b>li en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlara&lt;br />&lt;b>emsâle-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin misâlleri, kendi durumlari"
    <string name="sozluk.047.004">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe izâ: &lt;/b>artik, bundan sonra olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>lekîtum (u): &lt;/b>karsilastiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne keferû: &lt;/b>inkâr edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>fe darbe: &lt;/b>o zaman, derhal, hemen vurun&lt;br />&lt;b>er rikâbi: &lt;/b>boyunlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ izâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>eshantumû-hum: &lt;/b>onlari güçsüz, zayif biraktiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fe suddû: &lt;/b>o zaman kuvvetli tutun, baglayin&lt;br />&lt;b>el vesâka: &lt;/b>baglar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>bundan sonra, artik, nihayet&lt;br />&lt;b>immâ: &lt;/b>amma, ya veya, ister öyle ister böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>mennen: &lt;/b>ni'metlendirerek, lütfederek (bedelsiz)&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'du: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>ve immâ: &lt;/b>ve amma, ya veya, ister öyle ister böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>fidâen: &lt;/b>fidye alarak (bedel karsiligi)&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ tedaa: &lt;/b>birakana kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>el harbu: &lt;/b>harp, savas&lt;br />&lt;b>evzâre-hâ: &lt;/b>onun agirliklari (silâhlar, levazimatlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>zalike: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev: &lt;/b>ve eger, sâyet&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâullâhu (yesâu allâhu): &lt;/b>Allah diler&lt;br />&lt;b>lentasara (le intasara): &lt;/b>elbette intikam alirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkin: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat&lt;br />&lt;b>li yebluve: &lt;/b>imtihan etmek için&lt;br />&lt;b>ba'da-kum: &lt;/b>sizin bir kisminiz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ba'din: &lt;/b>bir kisminiz ile&lt;br />&lt;b>vellezîne (ve ellezîne): &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kutilû: &lt;/b>öldürüldüler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sebîli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in yolunda&lt;br />&lt;b>fe len yudille: &lt;/b>o taktirde, o zaman bosa çikarilmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>a'mâle-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin amelleri"
    <string name="sozluk.047.005">&lt;br />&lt;b>se-yehdî-him: &lt;/b>onlari hidayete erdirecek&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuslihu: &lt;/b>ve islâh edecek&lt;br />&lt;b>bâle-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin hallerini
    <string name="sozluk.047.006">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yudhilu-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlari dahil edecek&lt;br />&lt;b>el cennete: &lt;/b>cennet&lt;br />&lt;b>arrefe-hâ: &lt;/b>onu tarif etti, tanitti, bildirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara

    <string name="sozluk.047.027">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, artik&lt;br />&lt;b>keyfe: &lt;/b>nasil&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ: &lt;/b>o zaman, olunca&lt;br />&lt;b>teveffet-hum: &lt;/b>onlari vefat ettirdiler, öldürdüler&lt;br />&lt;b>el melâiketu: &lt;/b>melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>yadribûne: &lt;/b>vururlar&lt;br />&lt;b>vucûhe-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin yüzleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve edbâre-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlarin arkalari, sirtlari

    <string name="sozluk.047.029">&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>hasibe: &lt;/b>zannettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî kulûbi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kalplerinin içinde, kalplerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>maradun: &lt;/b>hastalik&lt;br />&lt;b>en len yuhrice allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah asla çikarmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>adgâne-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin gizli kinleri

    <string name="sozluk.048.009">"&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için, diye&lt;br />&lt;b>tû'minû: &lt;/b>îmân edin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>resûli-hi: &lt;/b>onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>tuazzirû-hu: &lt;/b>ona hürmet edin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>tuvakkirû-hu: &lt;/b>ona tazim edin, onu saygiyla yüceltin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>tusebbihû-hu: &lt;/b>onu tespih edin&lt;br />&lt;b>bukreten: &lt;/b>sabah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>asîlen: &lt;/b>aksam"

    <string name="sozluk.050.009">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nezzelnâ: &lt;/b>ve biz indirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan, gökten&lt;br />&lt;b>mâen: &lt;/b>su&lt;br />&lt;b>mubâreken: &lt;/b>mübarek, bereketli&lt;br />&lt;b>fe enbetnâ: &lt;/b>böylece bitirdik, yetistirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî: &lt;/b>onunla&lt;br />&lt;b>cennâtin: &lt;/b>bahçeler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve habbe: &lt;/b>ve tane, hububat&lt;br />&lt;b>el hasîdi: &lt;/b>hasat edilen, biçilen nebat

    <string name="sozluk.051.001">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>yemin olsun, andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâriyâti: &lt;/b>tozu dumana katan, esip savuran rüzgârlar, firtina&lt;br />&lt;b>zerven: &lt;/b>uçuran, savuran, dagitan
    <string name="sozluk.051.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>ve de, de, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>el hâmilâti: &lt;/b>yüklenenler, tasiyanlar (bulutlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>vikren: &lt;/b>agir yük yüklenerek

    <string name="sozluk.051.004">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>hem de, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>el mukassimâti: &lt;/b>sonra taksim edenlere&lt;br />&lt;b>emren: &lt;/b>isleri
    <string name="sozluk.051.005">&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>tûadûne: &lt;/b>size vaadolunuyor&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, mutlaka, kesinlikle&lt;br />&lt;b>sâdikûn: &lt;/b>dogrudur

    <string name="sozluk.051.049">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>min kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyden&lt;br />&lt;b>halaknâ: &lt;/b>biz yarattik&lt;br />&lt;b>zevceynî: &lt;/b>ikili, çift&lt;br />&lt;b>lealle-kum: &lt;/b>umulur ki böylece siz&lt;br />&lt;b>tezekkerûne: &lt;/b>tezekkür edersiniz, ögüt alir düsünürsünüz"
    <string name="sozluk.051.050">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe firrû: &lt;/b>öyleyse kaç, sigin&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan, onun tarafindan&lt;br />&lt;b>nezîrun: &lt;/b>nezir, uyarici&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînun: &lt;/b>açik, apaçik"
    <string name="sozluk.051.051">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ tec'alû: &lt;/b>ve kilmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>mea allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'la beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhen: &lt;/b>bir ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>âhara: &lt;/b>baska&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hu: &lt;/b>ondan, onun tarafindan&lt;br />&lt;b>nezîrun: &lt;/b>nezir, uyarici&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînun: &lt;/b>açikça, apaçik"
    <string name="sozluk.051.052">&lt;br />&lt;b>kezâlike: &lt;/b>iste bunun gibi, iste böyle&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey, ne, kim&lt;br />&lt;b>etâ ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlara (kendilerine) ne geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>min resûlin: &lt;/b>(resûllerden) bir resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>den baska, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>kâlû: &lt;/b>dediler&lt;br />&lt;b>sâhirun: &lt;/b>sihir yapan, sihirbaz, büyücü&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>mecnûnun: &lt;/b>mecnun, deli
    <string name="sozluk.051.053">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>tevâsav: &lt;/b>vasiyet, tavsiye ettiler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>onunla, onu&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir, bilâkis&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmun: &lt;/b>kavim, topluluk, toplum&lt;br />&lt;b>tâgûne: &lt;/b>azgin, taskin
    <string name="sozluk.051.054">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe tevelle: &lt;/b>öyleyse yüz çevir&lt;br />&lt;b>anhum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe mâ: &lt;/b>artik degil&lt;br />&lt;b>ente: &lt;/b>sen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi melûmin: &lt;/b>kinanacak
    <string name="sozluk.051.055">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zekkir: &lt;/b>ve sen ögüt verip hatirlat&lt;br />&lt;b>fe inne: &lt;/b>böylece muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zikrâ: &lt;/b>ögütle hatirlatma&lt;br />&lt;b>tenfe: &lt;/b>fayda verir&lt;br />&lt;b>el mû'minîne: &lt;/b>mü'minlere"
    <string name="sozluk.051.056">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ halaktu: &lt;/b>ve ben yaratmadim&lt;br />&lt;b>el cinne: &lt;/b>cinler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el inse: &lt;/b>ve insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>li ya'budû-ni: &lt;/b>bana kul olmalari"
    <string name="sozluk.051.057">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ urîdu: &lt;/b>ben istemiyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>min rizkin: &lt;/b>bir rizik&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ urîdu: &lt;/b>ve ben istemiyorum&lt;br />&lt;b>en yut'imû-ni: &lt;/b>beni doyurup"
    <string name="sozluk.051.058">&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>er rezzâku: &lt;/b>rizik veren&lt;br />&lt;b>zu el kuvveti: &lt;/b>kuvvet sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>el metînu: &lt;/b>metin, saglam, güçlü

    <string name="sozluk.052.022">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emdednâ-hum: &lt;/b>ve onlara imdat ettik, uzattik, sunduk, verdik&lt;br />&lt;b>bi fâkihetin: &lt;/b>meyveler ile&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lahmin: &lt;/b>ve et&lt;br />&lt;b>mim-mâ: &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>yestehûne: &lt;/b>istah duyuyorlar, arzu ediyorlar

    <string name="sozluk.052.024">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yetûfu: &lt;/b>ve tavaf ederler, dönüp dolasirlar, hizmet ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlarin etrafinda, onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>gilmânun: &lt;/b>gilmanlar (genç delikanlilar)&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara ait, kendilerine ait&lt;br />&lt;b>ke enne-hum: &lt;/b>sanki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lû'luun: &lt;/b>inciler&lt;br />&lt;b>meknûnun: &lt;/b>sedefinde sakli"

    <string name="sozluk.052.027">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe menne: &lt;/b>simdi, oysa, lütufta bulundu&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>aleynâ: &lt;/b>bize&lt;br />&lt;b>ve vekâ-nâ: &lt;/b>ve bizi korudu&lt;br />&lt;b>azâbe: &lt;/b>azap&lt;br />&lt;b>es semûmi: &lt;/b>hücrelere isleyen kavurucu ates

    <string name="sozluk.052.029">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o halde&lt;br />&lt;b>zekkir: &lt;/b>zikret, ögüt ver, hatirlat&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>çünkü&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ ente: &lt;/b>sen degilsin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ni'meti: &lt;/b>ni'metiyle, ni'meti sayesinde&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kâhinin: &lt;/b>kâhin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ mecnûnin: &lt;/b>ve mecnun degil"
    <string name="sozluk.052.030">&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlûne: &lt;/b>onlar diyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>sâirun: &lt;/b>bir sairdir&lt;br />&lt;b>neterabbesu: &lt;/b>gözlüyoruz, bekliyoruz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hi: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>reybe: &lt;/b>süphe, belirsizlik, ansizin olabilecek olan&lt;br />&lt;b>el menûni &lt;br>(reybe el menûni): &lt;/b>zaman &lt;br>: (zamanin musîbetinin ansizin gelmesi)
    <string name="sozluk.052.031">&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de&lt;br />&lt;b>terabbesû: &lt;/b>gözleyin, bekleyin&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>ayni zamanda, hem de&lt;br />&lt;b>innî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-kum: &lt;/b>sizinle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>min el muterabbisîne: &lt;/b>gözetleyenlerden, bekleyenlerden
    <string name="sozluk.052.032">"&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa&lt;br />&lt;b>te'muru-hum: &lt;/b>onlara emrediyor, kendilerine emrediyor&lt;br />&lt;b>ahlâmu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin akillari&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hâzâ: &lt;/b>bunu&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa&lt;br />&lt;b>hum: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmun: &lt;/b>kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>tâgûne: &lt;/b>azgin"
    <string name="sozluk.052.033">"&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa, yahut&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlûne: &lt;/b>diyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>tekavvele-hu: &lt;/b>onu kendisi uydurup söyledi&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yû'minûne: &lt;/b>onlar îmân etmiyorlar, etmezler"
    <string name="sozluk.052.034">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>li ye'tû: &lt;/b>getirsinler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi hadîsin: &lt;/b>bir söz&lt;br />&lt;b>misli-hi: &lt;/b>onun gibi, benzeri&lt;br />&lt;b>in kânû: &lt;/b>eger onlar ... oldu iseler&lt;br />&lt;b>sâdikîne: &lt;/b>sadiklar, sözlerinde sadik olanlar, dogru söyleyenler"
    <string name="sozluk.052.035">"&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>hulikû: &lt;/b>yaratildilar&lt;br />&lt;b>min gayri sey'in: &lt;/b>bir sey olmaksizin&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa, ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>hum(u): &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el hâlikûne: &lt;/b>yaratici"
    <string name="sozluk.052.036">"&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>halakû: &lt;/b>onlar yarattilar&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yûkinûne: &lt;/b>(Allah'a) yakîn hasil edemezler"
    <string name="sozluk.052.037">&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>inde-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin yaninda&lt;br />&lt;b>hazâinu: &lt;/b>hazineler&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbi-ke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>hum(u): &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el musaytirûne: &lt;/b>hakim olanlar, sahip olanlar
    <string name="sozluk.052.038">"&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya, yoksa ... mi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlarin var&lt;br />&lt;b>sullemun: &lt;/b>merdiven&lt;br />&lt;b>yestemiûne: &lt;/b>dinliyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hi: &lt;/b>orada&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>li ye'ti ... bi: &lt;/b>getirsin&lt;br />&lt;b>mustemiu-hum: &lt;/b>onlari dinleyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>bi sultânin: &lt;/b>güç, delil&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînin: &lt;/b>açik, apaçik"

    <string name="sozluk.053.026">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kem: &lt;/b>ve nice&lt;br />&lt;b>min melekin: &lt;/b>melekler&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalarda, göklerde&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tugnî: &lt;/b>gani olmaz, fayda vermez&lt;br />&lt;b>sefâatu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin sefaatleri&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'en: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>ancak, baska, hariç&lt;br />&lt;b>min ba'di: &lt;/b>den sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>en ye'zene: &lt;/b>izin vermesi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>li men: &lt;/b>bir kimse için&lt;br />&lt;b>yesâu: &lt;/b>diler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yerdâ: &lt;/b>ve razi olur"

    <string name="sozluk.053.029">"&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>böylece&lt;br />&lt;b>a'rid: &lt;/b>yüz çevir&lt;br />&lt;b>an men: &lt;/b>kimseden&lt;br />&lt;b>tevellâ: &lt;/b>yüz çeviren&lt;br />&lt;b>an zikrinâ: &lt;/b>zikrimizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lem yurid: &lt;/b>ve istemeyen&lt;br />&lt;b>ille: &lt;/b>baskasini&lt;br />&lt;b>el hayâte: &lt;/b>hayatindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dunyâ: &lt;/b>dünya"
    <string name="sozluk.053.030">"&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>odur&lt;br />&lt;b>mebleguhum: &lt;/b>onlarin erisebildikleri&lt;br />&lt;b>min el ilmi: &lt;/b>ilimden&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki&lt;br />&lt;b>rabbeke: &lt;/b>senin Rabbin&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>a'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi men: &lt;/b>kimseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>dalle: &lt;/b>sapan (dalâlette kalan)&lt;br />&lt;b>an sebîlihî: &lt;/b>yolundan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>a'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>bi men: &lt;/b>kimseyi de&lt;br />&lt;b>ihtedâ: &lt;/b>hidayete eren"

    <string name="sozluk.055.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahmânu: &lt;/b>Rahman; Allahû Teâlâ'nin isimlerindendir, O'nun kudretini, sevgisini, bütün yarattiklarina karsi merhametli, lütuf ve ihsan sahibi olmasi gibi sifatlarini ifade eder. Tüm yarattiklarina \"Rahman\" sifati ile tecelli eder."

    <string name="sozluk.055.008">&lt;br />&lt;b>ellâ: &lt;/b>yapmayin&lt;br />&lt;b>tatgav: &lt;/b>haddi asmayiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, konusunda, da&lt;br />&lt;b>el mîzâni: &lt;/b>mizan

    <string name="sozluk.056.056">&lt;br />&lt;b>hâzâ: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>nuzulu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin ziyafeti, agirlanmasi&lt;br />&lt;b>yevme: &lt;/b>gün&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dîni: &lt;/b>dîn
    <string name="sozluk.056.057">&lt;br />&lt;b>nahnu: &lt;/b>biz&lt;br />&lt;b>halaknâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizleri yarattik&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, öyleyse, hâlâ&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger, sâyet, olsa, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tusaddikûne: &lt;/b>tasdik etmiyorsunuz
    <string name="sozluk.056.058">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, o halde&lt;br />&lt;b>reeytum: &lt;/b>siz gördünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>ne, nedir (mahiyeti, özelligi nedir ), nasildir&lt;br />&lt;b>tumnûne: &lt;/b>meni akitiyorsunuz
    <string name="sozluk.056.059">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>sizler&lt;br />&lt;b>tahlukûne-hû: &lt;/b>onu siz yaratiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa, veya&lt;br />&lt;b>nahnu: &lt;/b>biz&lt;br />&lt;b>el hâlikûne: &lt;/b>yaratan, yaratici
    <string name="sozluk.056.060">&lt;br />&lt;b>nahnu: &lt;/b>biz&lt;br />&lt;b>kaddernâ: &lt;/b>takdir ettik, bir kader tayin ettik&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin aranizda&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevte: &lt;/b>ölüm&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>degil, olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>nahnu: &lt;/b>biz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi mesbûkîne: &lt;/b>önüne geçilmis olan
    <string name="sozluk.056.061">"&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ en nubeddile: &lt;/b>degistirmemiz&lt;br />&lt;b>emsâle-kum: &lt;/b>sizin emsalleriniz, suretleriniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve nunsie-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizi yaratmamiz, insa etmemiz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>içinde, de&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmiyorsunuz, bilmediginiz"
    <string name="sozluk.056.062">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lekad: &lt;/b>ve andolsun&lt;br />&lt;b>alimtum(u): &lt;/b>bildiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>en nes'ete: &lt;/b>yaratilis&lt;br />&lt;b>el ûlâ: &lt;/b>ilk&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, hâlâ, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>lev: &lt;/b>eger, sâyet, olsa, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tezekkerûne: &lt;/b>tezekkür etmiyorsunuz"
    <string name="sozluk.056.063">&lt;br />&lt;b>e: &lt;/b>mi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o halde, öyleyse&lt;br />&lt;b>reeytum: &lt;/b>siz gördünüz&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>ne, nedir (mahiyeti, özelligi nedir), nasildir&lt;br />&lt;b>tahrusûne: &lt;/b>ekin ekiyorsunuz
    <string name="sozluk.056.064">&lt;br />&lt;b>e entum: &lt;/b>siz misiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>tezreûne-hû: &lt;/b>onu yetistiriyorsunuz, bitiriyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>yoksa&lt;br />&lt;b>nahnu: &lt;/b>biz&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâriûne: &lt;/b>ziraati yapan, yetistiren, bitiren

    <string name="sozluk.057.002">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onun&lt;br />&lt;b>mulku: &lt;/b>mülk&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhyî: &lt;/b>hayat verir, diriltir&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>yumîtu: &lt;/b>öldürür&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>... e&lt;br />&lt;b>kulli: &lt;/b>her&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'in: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>kadîrun: &lt;/b>kaadir"
    <string name="sozluk.057.003">"&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>el evvelu: &lt;/b>evvel, ilk, tüm varliklardan önce var olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el âhiru: &lt;/b>ve ahir, son, tüm varliklardan sonra bâki olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ez zâhiru: &lt;/b>ve zahir, varligi alâmetleri tüm varliklarda görünen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el bâtinu: &lt;/b>ve bâtin, görülemeyen, gizli olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve: &lt;/b>ve&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>bi kulli sey'in: &lt;/b>herseyi&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen"
    <string name="sozluk.057.004">"&lt;br />&lt;b>huve ellezî: &lt;/b>o ki, ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>halaka: &lt;/b>yaratti&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el arda: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>fî: &lt;/b>de, da&lt;br />&lt;b>sitteti: &lt;/b>alti&lt;br />&lt;b>eyyâmin: &lt;/b>günler&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>estevâ: &lt;/b>istiva etti&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine&lt;br />&lt;b>el arsi: &lt;/b>ars&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'lemu: &lt;/b>bilir&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>yelicu: &lt;/b>girer&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yerin içine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>yahrucu: &lt;/b>çikar&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>yenzilu: &lt;/b>iner&lt;br />&lt;b>min es semâi: &lt;/b>semadan, gökten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>ya'rucu: &lt;/b>uruc eder, yükselir&lt;br />&lt;b>fî-hâ: &lt;/b>orada, onun içine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>mea-kum: &lt;/b>sizinle beraber&lt;br />&lt;b>eyne mâ: &lt;/b>nerede&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allahu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>bimâ: &lt;/b>seyleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'melûne: &lt;/b>yapiyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>basîrun: &lt;/b>en iyi gören"
    <string name="sozluk.057.005">"&lt;br />&lt;b>lehu: &lt;/b>onundur&lt;br />&lt;b>mulku: &lt;/b>mülk&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ilâ allahi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a&lt;br />&lt;b>turceu: &lt;/b>döndürülür&lt;br />&lt;b>el umûru: &lt;/b>emirler, isler"
    <string name="sozluk.057.006">&lt;br />&lt;b>yûlicu: &lt;/b>girdirir, sokar&lt;br />&lt;b>el leyle: &lt;/b>gece&lt;br />&lt;b>fî en nehâri: &lt;/b>gündüzün içine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yûlicu: &lt;/b>ve girdirir, sokar&lt;br />&lt;b>en nehâre: &lt;/b>gündüz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el leyl: &lt;/b>gecenin içine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>alîmun: &lt;/b>en iyi bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>bi zâti: &lt;/b>sahip oldugu, ... de olan&lt;br />&lt;b>es sudûri: &lt;/b>gögüsler

    <string name="sozluk.058.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>yuzâhirûne: &lt;/b>zihar yapiyorlar, bosuyorlar (sen bana anamin sirti gibisin diyorlar)&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden, içinizden&lt;br />&lt;b>min nisâi-him: &lt;/b>onlarin kadinlarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>degil&lt;br />&lt;b>hunne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ummehâti-him: &lt;/b>onlarin anneleri&lt;br />&lt;b>in (illâ): &lt;/b>olsa, ancak, sadece&lt;br />&lt;b>ummehâtu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin anneleri&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ ellâî: &lt;/b>ancak onlar ki&lt;br />&lt;b>veledne-hum: &lt;/b>onlari dogurdu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne-hum: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak ki onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>le yekûlûne: &lt;/b>gerçekten, mutlaka ..... söylüyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>munkeren: &lt;/b>inkâr edici, kötü, çirkin&lt;br />&lt;b>min el kavli: &lt;/b>sözden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zûren: &lt;/b>ve bâtil, asilsiz, yalan, agir, günaha sokan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve inne: &lt;/b>ve muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>gerçekten, mutlaka&lt;br />&lt;b>afuvvun: &lt;/b>affeden&lt;br />&lt;b>gafûrun: &lt;/b>magfiret eden

    <string name="sozluk.059.007">"&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>efâe: &lt;/b>fey verdi, savassiz elde edilen ganimetten verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah'in&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ resûli-hî: &lt;/b>resûlüne&lt;br />&lt;b>min ehli: &lt;/b>ehlinden, halkindan&lt;br />&lt;b>el kurâ: &lt;/b>belde, sehir&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah için, Allah'in&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li er resûli: &lt;/b>ve resûl için, resûlün&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li: &lt;/b>ve için&lt;br />&lt;b>zî: &lt;/b>sahip olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el kurbâ: &lt;/b>yakinligi olanlar, akrabalar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el yetâmâ: &lt;/b>ve yetimler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el mesâkîni: &lt;/b>ve miskinler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ibni es sebîli: &lt;/b>ve yolcular&lt;br />&lt;b>key lâ yekûne: &lt;/b>olmamasi için&lt;br />&lt;b>dûleten: &lt;/b>elden ele dolasan mal, servet&lt;br />&lt;b>beyne: &lt;/b>arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>el agniyâi: &lt;/b>zenginler&lt;br />&lt;b>min-kum: &lt;/b>sizden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>âtâ-kum(u): &lt;/b>size verdi&lt;br />&lt;b>er resûlu: &lt;/b>resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>huzû-hu: &lt;/b>onu alin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey&lt;br />&lt;b>nehâ-kum: &lt;/b>sizi nehyetti&lt;br />&lt;b>an-hu: &lt;/b>ondan&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>artik, o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>intehû: &lt;/b>vazgeçin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekû: &lt;/b>ve takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah'a karsi&lt;br />&lt;b>inne: &lt;/b>muhakkak&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>sedîdu: &lt;/b>siddetli&lt;br />&lt;b>el ikâbi: &lt;/b>azap, ceza"
    <string name="sozluk.059.008">"&lt;br />&lt;b>li: &lt;/b>için&lt;br />&lt;b>el fukarâi: &lt;/b>fakirler&lt;br />&lt;b>el muhâcirîne: &lt;/b>hicret edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>uhricû: &lt;/b>çikarildi&lt;br />&lt;b>min diyâri-him: &lt;/b>yurtlarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emvâli-him: &lt;/b>ve mallarindan&lt;br />&lt;b>yebtegûne: &lt;/b>talep ederler, ararlar, isterler&lt;br />&lt;b>fadlen: &lt;/b>fazl, hayir, lütuf&lt;br />&lt;b>min allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'tan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ridvânen: &lt;/b>ve riza, gönül hoslugu&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yansurûne: &lt;/b>ve yardim ederler&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>ve resûle-hu: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum(u) es sâdikûne: &lt;/b>onlar sadik olanlar, sadiklar"
    <string name="sozluk.059.009">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ellezîne: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>tebevveû: &lt;/b>konakladilar, mesken edindiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ed dâre: &lt;/b>yurt&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el îmâne: &lt;/b>ve îmân&lt;br />&lt;b>min kabli-him: &lt;/b>onlardan önce&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhibbûne: &lt;/b>severler&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kimse(ler)&lt;br />&lt;b>hâcere: &lt;/b>hicret edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhim: &lt;/b>onlara, kendilerine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ yecidûne: &lt;/b>ve bulunmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>fî sudûri-him: &lt;/b>sadirlarinda, gögüslerinde&lt;br />&lt;b>hâceten: &lt;/b>hacet, ihtiyaç, ragbet&lt;br />&lt;b>mimmâ (min mâ): &lt;/b>seyden&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtû: &lt;/b>verildiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yu'sirûne: &lt;/b>ve tercih ederler, üstün tutarlar&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ: &lt;/b>üzerine, ...e&lt;br />&lt;b>enfusi-him: &lt;/b>kendi nefsleri, kendileri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lev kâne: &lt;/b>ve olsa bile&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>hasâsatun: &lt;/b>ihtiyaci olma, muhtaç olma&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim&lt;br />&lt;b>yûka: &lt;/b>korunuyor&lt;br />&lt;b>suhha: &lt;/b>cimrilik afeti&lt;br />&lt;b>nefsi-hî: &lt;/b>onun nefsi, kendi nefsi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe ulâike: &lt;/b>o taktirde iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum(u): &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>el muflihûne: &lt;/b>felâha erenler, kurtulusa erenler"

    <string name="sozluk.059.022">&lt;br />&lt;b>huve allâhu ellezî: &lt;/b>O Allah ki&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ: &lt;/b>yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhe: &lt;/b>ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>âlimu: &lt;/b>bilen&lt;br />&lt;b>el gaybi: &lt;/b>gayb, görünmeyen&lt;br />&lt;b>ve es sehâdeti: &lt;/b>ve müsahede edilen, görünen&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahmânu: &lt;/b>rahmân, rahmân olan&lt;br />&lt;b>er rahîmu: &lt;/b>rahîm olan, rahmet nuru gönderen
    <string name="sozluk.059.023">"&lt;br />&lt;b>huve allâhu ellezî: &lt;/b>O Allah ki&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ: &lt;/b>yoktur&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâhe: &lt;/b>ilâh&lt;br />&lt;b>illâ: &lt;/b>den baska&lt;br />&lt;b>huve: &lt;/b>o&lt;br />&lt;b>el meliku: &lt;/b>hükümran olan&lt;br />&lt;b>el kuddûsu: &lt;/b>mukaddes olan&lt;br />&lt;b>es selâmu: &lt;/b>selâmete erdiren&lt;br />&lt;b>el mû'minu: &lt;/b>mü'min, emin olunan, emniyet veren, îmân edilen&lt;br />&lt;b>el muheyminu: &lt;/b>koruyup gözeten&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzu: &lt;/b>azîz olan, yüce olan&lt;br />&lt;b>el cebbâru: &lt;/b>cebreden, zorla yaptiran&lt;br />&lt;b>el mutekebbiru: &lt;/b>pek büyük olan&lt;br />&lt;b>subhâne allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah Sübhan'dir, noksan sifatlardan münezzehtir (uzaktir)&lt;br />&lt;b>ammâ (an-mâ): &lt;/b>seylerden&lt;br />&lt;b>yusrikûne: &lt;/b>sirk kosuyorlar"

    <string name="sozluk.060.011">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in: &lt;/b>ve sâyet, eger&lt;br />&lt;b>fâte-kum: &lt;/b>elinizden çikip giderse&lt;br />&lt;b>sey'un: &lt;/b>bir sey&lt;br />&lt;b>min ezvâci-kum: &lt;/b>zevcelerinizden, zevcelerinizden dolayi, eslerinizden dolayi&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ el kuffâri: &lt;/b>kâfirlere&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>âkabtum: &lt;/b>sira size geldi&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>âtû: &lt;/b>verin&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne zehebet: &lt;/b>giden kimselere, gidenlere&lt;br />&lt;b>ezvâcu-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin esleri, esleri&lt;br />&lt;b>misle: &lt;/b>misli kadar&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ enfekû: &lt;/b>sey verdiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve ittekû allâhe: &lt;/b>ve Allah'a karsi takva sahibi olun&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezî: &lt;/b>ki o&lt;br />&lt;b>entum: &lt;/b>siz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-hî mu'minûne: &lt;/b>ona, kendisine îmân edenlersiniz"

    <string name="sozluk.062.001">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yusebbihu: &lt;/b>tespih eder, ediyor&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah için, Allah'i&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey, ne varsa, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî es semâvâti: &lt;/b>göklerde&lt;br />&lt;b>ve mâ: &lt;/b>ve sey, ne varsa, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ardi: &lt;/b>yeryüzünde&lt;br />&lt;b>el meliki: &lt;/b>malik, mülkün sahibi, söz sahibi&lt;br />&lt;b>el kuddûsi: &lt;/b>bütün noksan sifatlardan uzak, münezzeh, mukaddes&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzi: &lt;/b>azîz, üstün&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakîmi: &lt;/b>hakîmdir, hüküm ve hikmet sahibidir"
    <string name="sozluk.062.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>huve ellezî: &lt;/b>o ki&lt;br />&lt;b>bease: &lt;/b>beas etti, hayata getirdi, görevlendirdi&lt;br />&lt;b>fî el ummiyyîne: &lt;/b>ümmîlerin, okuma yazma bilmeyenlerin arasinda&lt;br />&lt;b>resûlen: &lt;/b>resûl&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan, kendilerinden&lt;br />&lt;b>yetlû: &lt;/b>tilâvet eder, okuyup açiklar&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>âyâti-hî: &lt;/b>onun âyetleri&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuzekkî-him: &lt;/b>ve onlari tezkiye eder, nefslerini tezkiye eder, temizler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yuallimu-hum(u): &lt;/b>ve onlara ögretir&lt;br />&lt;b>el kitâbe: &lt;/b>kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el hikmete: &lt;/b>ve hikmet&lt;br />&lt;b>ve in kânû: &lt;/b>ve eger onlar ..... iseler, sadece ..... idiler&lt;br />&lt;b>min kablu: &lt;/b>önceden, daha önce&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>elbette, gerçekten&lt;br />&lt;b>fî dalâlin: &lt;/b>dalâlet içinde&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînin: &lt;/b>açik, apaçik
    <string name="sozluk.062.003">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve âharîne: &lt;/b>ve sonrakiler&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hum: &lt;/b>onlardan&lt;br />&lt;b>lem mâ yelhakû: &lt;/b>henüz ilhak olmadilar, dahil olmadilar, katilmadilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi-him: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>ve huve: &lt;/b>ve o&lt;br />&lt;b>el azîzu: &lt;/b>azîz, üstün, güçlü&lt;br />&lt;b>el hakîmu: &lt;/b>hakîm, hüküm ve hikmet sahibi

    <string name="sozluk.062.005">"&lt;br />&lt;b>meselu: &lt;/b>mesele, örnek, durum, hal&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>o kimseler, onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hummilû: &lt;/b>yüklendi (yüklenildi)&lt;br />&lt;b>et tevrâte: &lt;/b>Tevrat&lt;br />&lt;b>summe: &lt;/b>sonra&lt;br />&lt;b>lem yahmilû-hâ: &lt;/b>onu yüklenmez, onu tasimaz&lt;br />&lt;b>ke: &lt;/b>gibi&lt;br />&lt;b>meseli: &lt;/b>mesele, örnek, durum, hal&lt;br />&lt;b>el himâri: &lt;/b>merkep&lt;br />&lt;b>yahmilu: &lt;/b>tasir&lt;br />&lt;b>esfâran: &lt;/b>ciltlerle kitap&lt;br />&lt;b>bi'se: &lt;/b>ne kötü&lt;br />&lt;b>meselu: &lt;/b>mesele, örnek, durum, hal&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavmi: &lt;/b>kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>kezzebû: &lt;/b>yalanladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>bi âyâti allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in âyetlerini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yehdî: &lt;/b>hidayete erdirmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavme: &lt;/b>kavmi&lt;br />&lt;b>ez zâlimîne: &lt;/b>zalimler"
    <string name="sozluk.062.006">"&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne hâdû: &lt;/b>yahudi olanlar, yahudiler&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, sâyet&lt;br />&lt;b>zeamtum: &lt;/b>siz zannettiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>enne-kum: &lt;/b>sizin oldugunuzu&lt;br />&lt;b>evliyâu: &lt;/b>evliyalar, dostlar&lt;br />&lt;b>li allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in&lt;br />&lt;b>min dûni: &lt;/b>baska, ayri olarak&lt;br />&lt;b>en nâsi: &lt;/b>insanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>öyleyse, o halde&lt;br />&lt;b>temennevû: &lt;/b>temenni edin&lt;br />&lt;b>el mevte: &lt;/b>ölüm&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, sâyet&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz iseniz&lt;br />&lt;b>sâdikîne: &lt;/b>sadiklar, dogru söyleyen kimseler"

    <string name="sozluk.062.009">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar, Allah'a ulasmayi dileyenler, îmân edenler&lt;br />&lt;b>izâ nûdiye: &lt;/b>nida edildigi zaman, seslenildigi, çagrildigi zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>li es salâti: &lt;/b>namaza, namaz için&lt;br />&lt;b>min yevmi: &lt;/b>(günlerden) ..... günü&lt;br />&lt;b>el cumuati: &lt;/b>cuma&lt;br />&lt;b>fes'av (fe is'av): &lt;/b>o zaman, hemen kosun&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ zikri allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'i zikretmeye, Allah'in zikrine&lt;br />&lt;b>ve zerû: &lt;/b>ve birakin&lt;br />&lt;b>el bey'a: &lt;/b>alisveris&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlikum: &lt;/b>iste bu&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger, keske&lt;br />&lt;b>kuntum: &lt;/b>siz oldunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>ta'lemûne: &lt;/b>biliyorsunuz, bilirsiniz"

    <string name="sozluk.062.011">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>raev: &lt;/b>gördüler&lt;br />&lt;b>ticâreten: &lt;/b>bir ticaret&lt;br />&lt;b>ev: &lt;/b>veya&lt;br />&lt;b>lehven: &lt;/b>eglence&lt;br />&lt;b>infaddû: &lt;/b>dagildilar, dagilip gittiler&lt;br />&lt;b>ileyhâ: &lt;/b>ona&lt;br />&lt;b>ve terekû-ke: &lt;/b>ve seni terkettiler, biraktilar&lt;br />&lt;b>kâimen: &lt;/b>ayakta&lt;br />&lt;b>kul: &lt;/b>de, söyle&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>sey&lt;br />&lt;b>inde allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in indinde, katinda&lt;br />&lt;b>hayrun: &lt;/b>daha hayirli, en hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>min el lehvi: &lt;/b>eglenceden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve min et ticâreti: &lt;/b>ve ticaretten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>hayru: &lt;/b>daha hayirli, en hayirli&lt;br />&lt;b>er râzikîne: &lt;/b>rizik verenler"

    <string name="sozluk.063.005">"&lt;br />&lt;b>ve izâ: &lt;/b>ve oldugu zaman&lt;br />&lt;b>kîle: &lt;/b>denildi&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara&lt;br />&lt;b>teâlev: &lt;/b>geliniz&lt;br />&lt;b>yestagfir: &lt;/b>magfiret dilesin&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>resûlu allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>levvev: &lt;/b>alay ederek iki yana salladilar&lt;br />&lt;b>ruûse-hum: &lt;/b>onlarin baslari, baslarini&lt;br />&lt;b>ve raeyte-hum: &lt;/b>ve sen onlari gördün&lt;br />&lt;b>yasuddûne: &lt;/b>vazgeçiyorlar, yüz çeviriyorlar, kaçiniyorlar&lt;br />&lt;b>ve hum: &lt;/b>ve onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>mustekbirûne: &lt;/b>kibirlenenler, büyüklük taslayanlar"
    <string name="sozluk.063.006">&lt;br />&lt;b>sevâun: &lt;/b>musavi, bir, esit, ayni&lt;br />&lt;b>aleyhim: &lt;/b>onlara, onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>estagferte: &lt;/b>sen magfiret diledin&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>em: &lt;/b>veya (olsa da olmasa da)&lt;br />&lt;b>lem testagfir: &lt;/b>sen dilemedin&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlar için&lt;br />&lt;b>len: &lt;/b>asla olmaz&lt;br />&lt;b>yagfire allâhu: &lt;/b>Allah magfiret eder, bagislar&lt;br />&lt;b>lehum: &lt;/b>onlara, onlari&lt;br />&lt;b>inne allâhe: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yehdî: &lt;/b>hidayete erdirmez&lt;br />&lt;b>el kavme: &lt;/b>kavim&lt;br />&lt;b>el fâsikîne: &lt;/b>fasiklar
    <string name="sozluk.063.007">"&lt;br />&lt;b>hum(u) ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar ki&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlûne: &lt;/b>derler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tunfikû: &lt;/b>infâk etmeyin, vermeyin&lt;br />&lt;b>alâ men: &lt;/b>kimselere&lt;br />&lt;b>inde: &lt;/b>yaninda&lt;br />&lt;b>resûli allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'in resûlü&lt;br />&lt;b>hattâ: &lt;/b>oluncaya kadar, ki olsun&lt;br />&lt;b>yenfaddû: &lt;/b>dagilip gitsinler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'indir&lt;br />&lt;b>hazâinu: &lt;/b>hazineler&lt;br />&lt;b>es semâvâti: &lt;/b>semalar, gökler&lt;br />&lt;b>ve el ardi: &lt;/b>ve arz, yeryüzü, yer&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, fakat, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>el munâfikîne: &lt;/b>münafiklar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ yefkahûne: &lt;/b>fikih edemezler, idrak edemezler"
    <string name="sozluk.063.008">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yekûlûne: &lt;/b>derler&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>in reca'nâ: &lt;/b>eger biz dönersek&lt;br />&lt;b>ilâ el medîneti: &lt;/b>medineye, sehre&lt;br />&lt;b>le: &lt;/b>mutlaka, elbette&lt;br />&lt;b>yuhricenne: &lt;/b>mutlaka çikarir&lt;br />&lt;b>el eazzu: &lt;/b>daha azîz, daha güçlü olan&lt;br />&lt;b>min-hâ: &lt;/b>ondan, oradan&lt;br />&lt;b>el ezelle: &lt;/b>daha zelil, daha güçsüz olan&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li allâhi: &lt;/b>ve Allah'in&lt;br />&lt;b>el izzetu: &lt;/b>izzet, güç&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li resûli-hî: &lt;/b>ve onun resûlünün&lt;br />&lt;b>ve li el mu'minîne: &lt;/b>ve mü'minlerin&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâkinne: &lt;/b>ve lâkin, ancak&lt;br />&lt;b>el munâfikîne: &lt;/b>münafiklar, nifak çikaranlar&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ ya'lemûne: &lt;/b>bilmiyorlar"
    <string name="sozluk.063.009">"&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ eyyuhâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>ellezîne: &lt;/b>onlar, olanlar&lt;br />&lt;b>âmenû: &lt;/b>âmenû olanlar, Allah'a ulasmayi dileyenler&lt;br />&lt;b>lâ tulhi-kum: &lt;/b>sizi oyalamasin, alikoymasin&lt;br />&lt;b>emvâlu-kum: &lt;/b>sizin mallariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>ve lâ evlâdu-kum: &lt;/b>ve sizin evlâtlariniz&lt;br />&lt;b>an zikri allâhi: &lt;/b>Allah'i zikretmekten&lt;br />&lt;b>ve men: &lt;/b>ve kim ise&lt;br />&lt;b>yef'al: &lt;/b>yapar&lt;br />&lt;b>zâlike: &lt;/b>bu&lt;br />&lt;b>fe: &lt;/b>o zaman, o taktirde&lt;br />&lt;b>ulâike: &lt;/b>iste onlar&lt;br />&lt;b>hum(u) el hâsirûne: &lt;/b>hüsranda olanlar"

    <string name="sozluk.064.017">&lt;br />&lt;b>in: &lt;/b>eger&lt;br />&lt;b>tukridû: &lt;/b>kredi verirsiniz, borç verirsiniz&lt;br />&lt;b>allâhe: &lt;/b>Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>kardan: &lt;/b>borç&lt;br />&lt;b>hasenen: &lt;/b>güzel&lt;br />&lt;b>yudâif-hu: &lt;/b>onu kat kat artirarak öder&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizi, size&lt;br />&lt;b>ve yagfir: &lt;/b>ve magfiret eder&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizi, size&lt;br />&lt;b>ve allâhu: &lt;/b>ve Allah&lt;br />&lt;b>sekûrun: &lt;/b>sekurdur, sükredilen, sükrün karsiligini veren&lt;br />&lt;b>halîmun: &lt;/b>halîm, yumusak ve yavas davranan

    <string name="sozluk.071.002">&lt;br />&lt;b>kâle: &lt;/b>dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>yâ: &lt;/b>ey&lt;br />&lt;b>kavmi: &lt;/b>kavmim&lt;br />&lt;b>in-nî: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki ben&lt;br />&lt;b>lekum: &lt;/b>sizin için&lt;br />&lt;b>nezîrun: &lt;/b>nezir, uyarici&lt;br />&lt;b>mubînun: &lt;/b>apaçik, açiklayan, açikça

    <string name="sozluk.076.003">&lt;br />&lt;b>innâ: &lt;/b>muhakkak ki biz&lt;br />&lt;b>hedeynâ-hu: &lt;/b>onu hidayet ettik, ulastirdik&lt;br />&lt;b>es sebîle: &lt;/b>sebîl, yol&lt;br />&lt;b>immâ: &lt;/b>ama, fakat, ya - ya da, veya&lt;br />&lt;b>sâkiran: &lt;/b>sükreden&lt;br />&lt;b>ve immâ: &lt;/b>ve ama, fakat, ya - ya da, veya&lt;br />&lt;b>kefûran: &lt;/b>küfreden, inkâr eden

    <string name="sozluk.082.009">&lt;br />&lt;b>kellâ: &lt;/b>hayir&lt;br />&lt;b>bel: &lt;/b>aksine, bilâkis&lt;br />&lt;b>tukezzibûne: &lt;/b>siz yalanliyorsunuz&lt;br />&lt;b>bi ed dîni: &lt;/b>dîni

    <string name="sozluk.084.007">&lt;br />&lt;b>fe emmâ: &lt;/b>fakat, ise&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtiye: &lt;/b>verildi&lt;br />&lt;b>kitâbe-hu: &lt;/b>onun kitabi&lt;br />&lt;b>bi yemîni-hî: &lt;/b>onun sagindan

    <string name="sozluk.084.010">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve emmâ: &lt;/b>ve ise&lt;br />&lt;b>men: &lt;/b>kim, kimse&lt;br />&lt;b>ûtiye: &lt;/b>verildi&lt;br />&lt;b>kitâbe-hu: &lt;/b>kitabi, hayat filmi&lt;br />&lt;b>verâe: &lt;/b>arka&lt;br />&lt;b>zahri-hî: &lt;/b>onun sirti, onun arkasi

    <string name="sozluk.099.003">&lt;br />&lt;b>ve kâle: &lt;/b>ve dedi&lt;br />&lt;b>el insânu: &lt;/b>insan&lt;br />&lt;b>mâ: &lt;/b>ne, ne oluyor&lt;br />&lt;b>lehâ: &lt;/b>ona
